4Cs Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the mail order business for cosmetics and health food products. It operates through the following business segments: Communication and Sales and Cosmetics Wholesale. The Communication and Sales segment sells cosmetics and health food. The Cosmetics Wholesale segment sells wholesale cosmetics and bath products. The company was founded on December 5, 2003 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

A.F.W. Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing of accumulators. It offers OEM parts and develops friction welded goods, covering from general machinery parts to lithium polymer battery for electric vehicles. The company was founded on September 30, 1998 and is headquartered in Chilgok, South Korea.

ACCESS GROUP HOLDINGS CO., LTD. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its group companies. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Promotions Business, Recruitment of Public Relations Business and School Public Relations Business. The Promotions Business segment produces various sales promotion materials; and provides web-related production and promotions, media interaction, event planning, and other services. The Recruitment of Public Relations Business segment plans and manages employment information sites and joint company briefing sessions; and offers recruitment support services. The School Public Relations Business segment plans and operates admission information sites, junior high school information magazines, newspaper coalition, and joint explanatory meeting, as well as produces various public information tools, such as websites and web application systems. The company was founded in October 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Ace Pillar Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of automatic mechatronics components. Its products include automation controller & monitor system, automation drive control system, automation mechanical transmission system, pneumatic components and inverters. The company was founded on March 31, 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

ADD Industry (Zhejiang) Corp. Ltd. manufactures automotive suspension system. It is a manufacturer and integrated services provider for automotive aftermarket; completed vehicle matching and processing; and providing integral solutions for suspension struts assembly. The company was founded by Lian Song Zheng, Nian Hui Zheng and Lian Ping Zheng on August 20, 1998 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

ADES International Holding Plc engages in the provision of oil and gas drilling and production services in the Middle East and Africa. Its services include offshore and onshore contract drilling as well as workover and mobile offshore production unit. The firm operates through the following geographical segments: Egypt, Algeria, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, and United Arab Emirates. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Advanced Technology & Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of advanced metal materials & products. Its products include Amorphous & Nano-crystalline Materials & Products, Refractory Materials & Products, Powder Materials & Products, Magnetic Materials & Products, Welding Materials & Products, Filtration Materials & Environmental Protection Engineering, High Speed Steel and Diamond Tools. The company was founded on December 30, 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Advancer Global Ltd. is an investment holding company, which provides integrated services offering workforce solutions and services in Singapore. It operates through the following segments: Employment Services Business, Building Management Services Business, and Security Services Business. The Employment Services Business segment offers one-stop shop services for the sourcing, employment and training of foreign domestic workers to households, as well as the sourcing and employment of foreign workers to, amongst others, corporations and organizations. The Building Management Services Business segment involves in integrated building facility management services including property consultancy, property and facilities management services, property valuation, investment sales, cleaning and stewarding, waste management, landscape, pest control and fumigation services. The Security Services Business segment comprises of manpower and technology for security solutions and services to, amongst others, commercial, industrial, and residential properties. The company was founded on February 2, 2016 and is headquartered in Singapore.

AEM Holdings Ltd. operates as an investment company, which engages in the provision of handling and test solutions. It operates through the following segments: Equipment Systems Solutions (ESS), System Level Test & Inspection (SLT-i), Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS), Test and Measurement Solutions (TMS) and Others. The ESS segment provides customized system solutions involving precise speed motion and mechanical design to both mass volume manufacturers and new technology development laboratories. The SLT-I segment provides solutions that bridge the growing gap between user applications and standard ATE coverage with IC designs and packaging techniques. The MEMS segment provides test solutions for Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems and special wafer probing needs ranging from the R&D phase to high volume production and system-level testing which enables manufacturers to achieve the lowest cost-of-test, reduced time to market, effective process cycle, accurate stimulus, and high production yields. The TMS segment engages in the research, development, and production of advanced communications and industrial test solutions. The Others segment includes non allocated, dormant companies and other activities. The company was founded on July 21, 2000 and is headquartered in Singapore.

AEON Co., Ltd. is a holding company which engages in the management of its group companies in the operation of supermarkets and shopping centers. It operates through the following segments: General Merchandise Store (GMS), Supermarket (SM), Health and Wellness, Financial Services, Development, Services and Specialty Store, International, and Other. The GMS segment includes general merchandise and bento specialty stores. The SM segment manages supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-sized shops. The Health and Wellness segment oversees drugstores and dispensing pharmacies. The Financial Services segment offers s credit card, financing, and banking services. The Development segment deals with the development and leasing of shopping centers. The Services and Specialty Store segment engages in the management of facilities, amusement centers, restaurants, and specialty stores that sell casual apparel and footwear. The International segment handles retail stores in the ASEAN region and China. The Other segment includes mobile marketing and digital business. The company was founded by Sozaemon Okada in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

Aeon Fantasy Co., Ltd. engages in the operation and management of indoor theme parks and amusement facilities. It operates through the following segments: Domestic, China, and Asean. It offers franchises, original game machines, and prizes in park establishments. Its amusement facilities include Molly Fantasy, Ranrando, PALO, Kidzoona, Kodomono-Yu, and Cafe Moriccha. The company was founded on February 14, 1997 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

Aero Win Technology Corp. engages in the repair, manufacture and sale of chemical equipment and spare parts for various types of aircraft engines. It offers super alloy sheet metal and machining parts assembly, super alloy sheet metal forming parts, and super alloy forging precision machining parts. The company was founded on October 5, 1974 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

Aerospace Hi-Tech Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, research and development of transportation equipment. It focuses on vehicle electronics, environmental monitoring products, aerospace products, optical and electrical control, and oil & network equipment. The company was founded on January 27, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Aerosun Corp. engages in the production of special purpose vehicles. Its business production segments include special equipment, sanitation equipment, flexible piping, chemical machineries, and art engineering industries. Its Special Equipment production segment offers military special vehicles, civil aviation special tankers, transport trucks, and emergency satellite communication vehicles. Its Sanitation Equipment production segment provides compressed garbage trucks, sweep trucks, sprinkler trucks, suction trucks, waste suction trucks, and dump trucks. Its Flexible Piping production segment manufactures the following products: metal hose, metal bellows expansion joints, automotive flexible tubes, non-metallic expansion joints, marine hose, and reinforced thermoplastic pipes. Its Chemical Machineries production segment offers pressure vessels, and low temperature storage and transportation equipment. Its Arts Engineering business provides forged artwork, and material casting services. The company was founded in 1865 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

AF Global Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of hotel management and property development services. It operates through the following segments: Property, Hotel and Serviced Residence, and Leisure and Others. The Property segment relates to project and property management, real estate consultancy services, investment in properties, and development of properties for sale. The Hotel and Serviced Residence segment owns and operates of hotels and serviced residences. The Leisure and Other segment handles ownership and operation of family entertainment centers and investment holding activities. The company was founded on June 14, 1973 and is headquartered in Singapore.

AFCON Holdings Ltd. engages in the execution of infrastructure, electromechanical systems, communication, control, and automation projects. It operates the following segments: Buildings and Infrastructure, Control and Automation, Trade, and Communications. The Buildings and Infrastructure segment includes the provision of full financing for the services provided to clients in all stages of the project. The Control and Automation segment engages in the provision of systems installation services and integration in the areas of industrial control, buildings control, fire detection and extinguishing, parking security and control, and development, manufacture, sale, and distribution of technology-intensive products in this area. The Trade segment engages in the import, marketing, and distribution of equipment in the fields of electricity and control in Israel. The Communications segment engages in the planning, development, manufacture, installation, marketing, distribution, and maintenance of unified communication systems for businesses, and installation of data networks for businesses. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Petach-Tikva, Israel.

Ainavo Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the construction, design, and sale of tiles, home equipment, sanitary equipment, air-conditioning equipment, pipe materials, and imported stones. It operates through the following business segments: Large Property Business and Detached House Business. The Large Property Business segment includes interior and exterior tiles, unit bath, system kitchen, luxury bathtubs, and other housing construction equipment for large property buildings and apartments. The Detached House Business segment includes interior and exterior tiles, bathtubs, system kitchen, health equipment, and other related products for detached houses. The company was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Aisan Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include fuel system, intake and exhaust system, emission control system, and valve train system products. It also offers motor vehicle parts including electronic fuel injection parts, throttle casings, carburetors, and exhaust valves. It also provides computer system and programs, car transport handling, and construction services. It operates through the following segments: Japan, Asia, North America, and Europe. The company was founded on December 2, 1938 and is headquartered in Obu, Japan.

Aisin Seiki Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. It operates through the following segments: Aisin Seiki Group, Aisin Takaoka Group, Aisin AW Group, Advics Group, and Others. The Aisin Seiki Group segment provides general automotive parts and services, life and amenity-related equipment, public works, and petroleum sales. The Aisin Takaoka Group segment handles engine and brake cast components. The Aisin AW Group deals with automatic transmissions and car navigation systems. The Advics Group segment offers brake components. The Others segment engages in the civil construction and petroleum sales businesses. The company was founded on August 31, 1965 and is headquartered in Kariya, Japan.

Aisino Corp. engages in the provision of information security solutions and services. It operates through the following divisions: Golden Tax, Financial Payment, Smart System, and Network Information. The Golden Tax division Develops a variety of tax related products, including anti-counterfeiting tax control core business products, anti-counterfeiting tax control value-added products, general invoice integrated management system, and electronic invoice system. The Financial Payment division promotes and provides financial technology services and applications, such as enterprise-related fiscal, taxation, and financial services. The Smart System division carries out informatization system for public services in the fields of government affairs, public security, supervision, transportation, and other businesses. The Network Information division offers consultation, design, and integration of network information system, as well as operation and maintenance services of core software and hardware. Aisino was founded on November 1, 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

AK Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its subsidiaries which deals with chemical products, department store operations, real etates, household items and air transportation. The company was founded on October 13, 1970 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Al Gassim Investment Holding Co. engages in the investment and production of agricultural crops and dairy products. The company was founded on February 24, 1984 and is headquartered in Buraidah, Saudi Arabia.

Alfresa Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries that deal with wholesaling, manufacturing, import, and export of pharmaceutical products, diagnostic reagents, and medical devices. It operates through the following segments: Ethical Pharmaceuticals Wholesaling, Self-Medication Products Wholesaling, Manufacturing, and Medical-related. The Ethical Pharmaceuticals Wholesaling segment provides wholesale prescription drugs, medical diagnostic reagents, medical devices, equipment, and materials to hospitals, clinics, dispensing pharmacies, and other institutions. The Self-Medication Products Wholesaling segment sells over-the-counter drugs, health food, and supplements. The Manufacturing segment manufactures and markets pharmaceutical ingredients, pharmaceuticals, diagnostic reagents, and medical devices. The Medical-related segment offers medical services through its dispensing pharmacies. The company was founded on September 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Alleanza Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its group companies. Its services include the operation of pet shops, commercial complex business, office supply business, lottery sales business, home centers, real estate leasing and management business, sale of pet animals, pet food and supplies through pet shops, developing and procuring product business, manufacture of organic cultivation engines, retail business and others. The company was founded on September 1, 2016 and is headquartered in Fukushima, Japan.

Allied Telesis Holdings K.K. engages in the planning, development, manufacture and sale of network devices and solutions. Its operations are carried out through the following geographical segments: Japan; America; Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA); and Asia and Oceania. The company products include wireless local area network (LAN) equipment, routers and other network devices for home users, wide area network (WAN), and metro area network (MAN) equipment for telecommunication companies and large corporations. It also offers IP (Internet Protocol) Triple Play services, wireless and advanced solutions for home, factories, government agencies, universities, and medical institutions. The company was founded on March 9, 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Altech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial machinery. It operates through the Wholesale and Preform segments. The Wholesale segment deals with the procurement and sale industrial machinery and equipment. The Preform segment manufactures and sells preforms for plastic bottles and plastic caps. The company was founded on May 15, 1976 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

AMADA Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, leasing, repair, maintenance, checking, and inspection of metal working machinery and tools. It operates through the following business divisions: Sheet Metal Fabrication Machine, Metal Cutting Machine, Machine Tools, Stamping Press, Precision Welding Machine and Others. The Sheet Metal Fabrication Machine division offers integrated solutions from machines through control software, peripheral devices and consumables to maintenance service. The Metal Cutting Machine division provides steel frames for high-rise buildings, bridges and other structures. The Machine Tools division provides the precision finishing of medical devices and other equipment. The Stamping Press division engages in the sale of stamping presses. The Precision Welding Machine division provides precision welding and processing solutions for automotive electrical equipment, secondary batteries, household electrical appliances, LCD (Liquid Crystal Display) displays, personal computers, medical devices, and numerous other products. The Others segment includes real estate and automobile leasing, and golf course management services. The company was founded by Isamu Amada on September 10, 1946 and is headquartered in Isehara, Japan.

Amano Corp. engages in the manufacture and distribution of time information, environmental, and other industrial systems. It operates through the Time Information System and Environmental-Related System segments. The Time Information System segments offers information systems, time management equipment, and parking systems. The Environmental-Related System segment offers environmental and clean systems. The company was founded by Shuichi Amano on November 3, 1931 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Amara Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of hotels, properties, specialty restaurants, and food services under the Amara brand. It operates through the following segments: Hotel Investment and Management, Property Investment and Development, Specialty Restaurants and Food Services. The company was founded on August 21, 1970 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Amiad Water Systems Ltd. is engaged in providing water treatment filtration systems. It operates through the following segments: Irrigation, Industrial, Municipal, Oil & Gas, and Ballast Water. Its products include fertigation injectors and automatic, semi automatic and manual filters. It distributes its products under the Arkal, Filtomat, and Amiad brands. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Kibbutz Amiad, Israel.

Amita Holdings Co., Ltd engages in environmental solutions, certification business, and consulting services. It operates through the following business segments: Land Resource Business and Environmental Solutions Business. The Land Resource Business segment includes land resource production, sale, recycling operation, and resource marketing services. The Environmental Solutions Business segment deals with environmental support and information management, environmental consulting, survey and research, and Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) and Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification Schemes (PEFC) certification services. It also offers Chain of Custody (COC) certification which provides for the manufacturers (of paper, furniture, building materials, homes, lumber and paper products, packaging, etc.), distributors, printers, retailers, etc; Forest Management (FM) certification which provides to forestry associations, governments, companies, etc; and Project Certification (PC) which provides for the building companies, construction firms, manufacturers (of furniture, building materials, homes and lumbe, etc.), event organizers, etc. The company was founded by Eisuke Kumano  on January 4, 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

AmorePacific Group, Inc. is a holding company which engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Through its subsidaries, it offers cosmetics, hair care, medical products, cosmetic glass containers, tea raw materials, and printing equipment. The company was founded on March 6, 1959 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Amvis Holdings, Inc. engages in medical center business. It offers services such as home-visit nursing, daily life support, home service plans, and home care support for severe cases and person with disabilities. The company was founded in October 2016 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Anhui GreatWall Military Industry Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which engages in military and civilian businesses through its subsidiaries. Its Military division involves in the research, design, assembly, production, and sale of military products such as mortar shells, optoelectronic countermeasure systems, single military rockets, fuses, submunition, and pyrotechnics. Its Civilian division offers high strength fasteners and anchors, low retraction anchors, and mining anchors. The company was founded on November 16, 2000 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

Anhui Guozhen Environment Protection Technology JSC Ltd. engages in the provision of water management and sewage treatment service. It focuses on urban water environment comprehensive management, industrial wastewater treatment, and small town environmental management. Its business includes investment operations, environmental engineering's engineering, procurement, and construction business, water treatment equipment production and sales, and water environment design consulting business, Its products and services include municipal wastewater, industrial wastewater, environmental engineering, engineering design, pipe network business, water environment management, film manufacturing, and equipment manufacturing. The company was founded on February 25, 1997 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

Anji Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of solar modules. Its products include single and multi crystalline silicon photovoltaic modules, multi crystalline silicon building integrated photovoltaic modules, and multi crystalline silicon photovoltaic double glass modules. It also offers energy technical services. The company was founded on February 13, 2007 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

Anritsu Corp. engages in the development, production, and sale of measuring equipment and industrial machines. It operates through the following business divisions: Test and Measurement, PQA, and Others. The Test and Measurement division provides measuring instruments for digital communications and internet protocol (IP) networks, optical communications, mobile communications, and micro and high-frequency bands. The PQA division deals with automatic weight sorters, automatic weighing machines, foreign object detection machines, and precision measuring machines. The Others division includes telecommunications, device, logistics, welfare services, real estate leasing, personnel and accounting back-office jobs, and parts manufacturing businesses. The company was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Atsugi, Japan.

Anshan Heavy Duty Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of shaker machinery and equipment for industry and mining use. Its business activities include coal and steel mining, metallurgy, steel restructuring, and electrical and mechanical equipment installation, housing rental, and equipment leasing. It offers large linear vibrating screens, circular vibrating screens, mining shakers, hot material vibrating screen, multi-unit combination vibrating screen, processing equipment, mixed stations and accessories. The company was founded by Yong Zhou Yang on October 13, 1994 and is headquartered in Anshan, China.

Aoxin Q&M Dental Group Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. The firm engages in the provision of private dental services and dental equipment and supplies. It operates through following segments: Primary Healthcare, Distribution of Dental Equipment and Supplies and Laboratory Services. The Primary Healthcare segment comprises dentistry services. The Distribution of Dental Equipment and Supplies segment includes distribution of equipment and supplies used in the provision of dental services. The Laboratory Services segment involves in manufacturing of porcelain crown, bridges and dentures. The company was founded on May 5, 2011 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Apaman Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of brokerage and property management services. It operates through the following segments: Sharing Economy, Platform, Cloud Technology, and Others. The Sharing Economy segment manages co-working spaces, share parking spaces and coin parking establishments. The Platform segment provides rental arrangements for directly managed stores. The Cloud Technology segment deals with system provision for franchise stores. The Others segment includes real estate investments, construction, and vending machine businesses. The company was founded by Koji Ohmura in October 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Apex Medical Corp. engages in the design and manufacture of home care medical equipment. It focuses on wound care and respiratory therapy. Its product lines and services includes support surfaces system, respiratory therapies products, and medical equipment. The company was founded on March 17, 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

APLUS FINANCIAL Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies with interest in providing financial services. It operates through the following business segments: Shopping Credit, Credit Card, Loans, Payment, Other Subsidiaries, and Others. The Shopping Credit segment provides reimbursement and debt collection services. The Card segment issues credit cards and offers reimbursement services. The Loan segment deals with financing services through cash dispensers and automated teller machines. The Payment segment handles bill collection and rent reimbursement for apartments and condominiums. The Other Subsidiaries segment involves with the management and operation of subsidiaries. The Others segment manages lease and housing loan business. The company was founded on October 6, 1956 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Aprogen KIC, Inc. engages in the manufacture, maintenance, and repair of heavy and chemical plant facilities. It operates through the following business divisions: Hardfacing, Metal, Nukon System, Manufactured Pharmaceuticals, Merchandised Pharmaceuticals, and Others. The Hardfacing business division welds and develops surface of machine parts into corrosion, heat, shock resistant. The Nukon System business division provides nuclear power plants and special thermostat systems. The Others business division offers steel and others. The company was founded on November 15, 1971 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

Arad Investment & Industrial Development Ltd. an investment firm operating in the fields of real estate, computers,, and roof tiles production. It operates through the following segments: Hardware, Software, Outsourcing, Payroll, Human Resources, Attendance, and Long -Term Savings Services, Rental Properties and Assisted Living Housing, and Residential Real Estate for Sale. The Hardware segment engages in the marketing and maintenance of computers, computing systems, consultation, and design of infrastructure solutions. The Software segment engages in the development, marketing, and maintenance of software, enterprise computing, and supply of manpower services for software development and maintenance. The Outsourcing segment engages in process management and provision of technology services. The Payroll, Human Resources, Attendance, and Long -Term Savings Services segment engages in the provision of payroll services through solutions for managing and investigating organizational information, human resources systems, attendance systems, and pension and long-term savings operating systems. The Rental Properties and Assisted Living Housing segment engages in the rental of commercial centers, offices, industrial buildings, and parks for high-tech industries. The Residential Real Estate for Sale segment engages in the sale of apartments, and improvement and sale of residential lands. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Aramex PJSC engages in providing logistics and transportation solutions. It operates through the following segments: International Express, Freight Forwarding, Domestic Express, Logistics and Other Operations. The International Express segment delivers small packages across the globe to both retail and wholesale customers. The Freight Forwarding segment includes express delivery of small parcels as well as pick up and deliver of shipments within the country. The Logistics segment covers warehousing activity, distribution management, supply chain management, inventory management and other value added services. The Other Operations segment provides catalogue shipping services, document storage, airline ticketing and travel, visa services and publication and distribution services. The company was founded by Fadi Ghandour and William Kingson in 1982 and is headquartered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Aran Research & Development (1982) Ltd. engages in the provision of product design and development services, import of equipment, and solar energy. It operates through the following segments: Development, Planning and Manufacture Services, Sale of Equipment, Solar Energy, and Investments in Ventures and Start-ups. The Development, Planning and Manufacture Services segment engages in the development of new products and upgrade and renewal of existing products. The Sale of Equipment segment engages in the supply of injection molding machines and robots for the plastics industry. The Solar Energy segment engages in investments in photovoltaic power stations, and planning, sale, and installation of photovoltaic facilities. The Investments in Ventures and Start-ups segment engages in investments in start-ups at early development stages. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Caesarea, Israel.

Arcland Sakamoto Co., Ltd. engages in the retail and wholesale of general consumer and Do It Yourself (DIY) products. It operates through the following segments: Retail Business, Wholesale Business, Restaurant Business and Real Estate Business. The Retail Business segment handles the over-the-counter sale of DIY related products, gardening tools, pet supplies, home supplies, arts and crafts, foods, daily goods, and alcoholic beverages. The Wholesale Business segment deals with the sale of the DIY supplies in the company's home center and the whole country. The Restaurant Business segment manages the Katsuya shop which specializes in Tonkatsu. The Real Estate Business segment involves in real estate leasing services. The company was founded on July 1, 1970 and is headquartered in Sanjo, Japan.

ARCLAND SERVICE HOLDINGS CO., LTD. engages in the operation of restaurants and franchise stores. It operates through the following business divisions: Katsuya (Domestic), Karayama and Karaage Yukari(Domestic), Overseas Business and Others. The Katsuya (Domestic) division manages tonkatsu, Japanese pork cutlet on rice, restaurants under the name Katsuya. The Karayama and Karaage Yukari (Domestic) division covers restaurants that specialize in Japanese fried chicken under the chain of restaurant, Karaage Yukari. The Overseas Business division handles the overseas franchise of Katsuya, Karayama and Karaage Yukari restaurants. The Others division includes the management of other restaurant franchise business, italian cafe and vegetarian restaurant. It also provides processed meat products for restaurants and mass merchandisers, and involved in real estate leasing business.The company was founded on March 2, 1993 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Arcs Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of supermarket chain stores. It operates through the following business divisions: Retail and Others. The Retail business division manages supermarkets and home centers; and also sells home-related goods and pharmaceutical products. The Others division includes tourism, building maintenance services, real estate leasing, life and non-life insurance agencies, food production, collection and transport of industrial and general wastes, and building businesses. The company was founded on October 28, 1961 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

Arte Salon Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies that operate and franchise beauty salon chains. It also develops the corporate strategy of the group, provides human resource training and store development, and lends store facilities. The company was founded by Naoki Yoshihara in August 1986 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

ArtSpark Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its subsidiaries, which engage in software business. It operates through the Services of Creators and User Interface or User Experience (UI or UX) segments. The Services of Creators segment provides illustration, comic, and animation creation software and web services. It also offers e-book solutions for content creation to distribution. The UI or UX segment handles UI development solutions and network-related products for manufacturers of mobile devices and digital home appliances in the automotive field. The company was founded on April 2, 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

AS ONE Corp. engages in the sale of research instruments and equipment, hospital and nursing care products, and other scientific instruments. Its products include temperature and humidity control instruments, microscopes, glass slides, fume hoods, laboratory chairs, dehumidifying storage, ultrasonic cleaners, masks, gloves, white gowns, and nursing supplies. The company was founded by Moriichi Iuchi in 1933 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Asahi Broadcasting Group Holdings Corp. engages in the commercial television and radio broadcasting businesses. It operates through the following segments: Broadcasting, Housing, and Golf. The Broadcasting segment offers television programming, news, and radio services. The Housing segment includes housing exhibit management and related businesses. The Golf segment operates golf courses. The company was founded on March 15, 1951 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of food and beverages. It operates through the following segments: Alcoholic Beverages, Soft Drinks, Food, Overseas, and Other. The Alcoholic Beverages segment sells beer-type beverages, shochu (Japanese distilled beverage), RTD (ready-to-drink) low-alcohol beverages, whisky and spirits, and wines. The Soft Drinks segment offers chilled beverages such as tea-based drinks, coffee, carbonated soft drinks, water, fruit and vegetable drinks, and lactic acid drinks. The Food segment provides confectioneries, pharmaceuticals, supplements, baby products, dried foods, and seasonings. The Overseas segment handles the sale of food and beverage in other countries. The Other segment includes logistics and other businesses. The company was founded on September 1, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Asahi Holdings, Inc. engages in the manufacture, recycling, and sale of precious and rare metals. It operates through the following segments: Precious Metal Business, Environmental Preservation Business, and Life and Health Business. The Precious Metal Business segment collects, refines, and recycles gold, silver, palladium, platinum, and indium out of waste materials containing precious and rare metals, such as electronic materials, dental materials, jewelry, Flat Panel Display (FPD) and automotive catalysts. The Environmental Preservation Business segment provides industrial waste collection transportation license, industrial waste disposal license, specially-controlled industrial waste collection transportation license, specially-controlled industrial waste disposal license, and certified company as the environmentally sound management of hazardous wastes. The Life and Health Business segment provides equipment and systems related to lifestyle and health. The company was founded in July 1952 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust engages in the investment in a diverse portfolio of properties and property related assets. It operates through the following segments: Business and Science Park Properties, and Suburban Offices; Integrated Development, Amenities and Retail Properties; High-Specifications Industrial Properties and Data Centres; Light Industrial Properties and Flatted Factories; and Logistics and Distribution Centres. The company was founded on October 9, 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Asia Cement Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cement and ready-mixed concrete. It operates trough the the following business divisions: Cement, Remicon and Mortar. Its products include Portland cement, normal concrete, customized cement, underwater concrete, mass concrete, plastering mortar, foamed mortar, aggregates and others. The company was founded on October 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Aseed Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the development of business strategy and management of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Retail Vending Machine Operations, Beverage Manufacturing Business, Beverage Service System Business, and Real Estate Management Business. The Retail Vending Machine Operations segment handles the management and maintenance of vending machines which sell bottled and canned beverages. The Beverage Manufacturing Business segment manufactures and sells carbonated beverages, canned coffee drinks, and liqueurs. The Beverage Service System Business segment oversees the operation, management and sales of beverage vending machine that uses card in gaming halls. The Real Estate Management Business segment includes the leasing of real estate properties. The company was founded by Takao Komoto on November 20, 1972 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

Asia Enterprises Holding Ltd. engages in the distribution of steel products. It operates through the following segments: Steel Distribution, Provision of Steel Processing, and Corporate. The Steel Distribution segment procures, distributes, and trades shipbuilding plates, hot-rolled plates, wide-flanged beams, bulb flats, channels, angles, bars, hollow sections, pipes, and serrated galvanized gratings. The Provision of Steel Processing segment processes steel materials for sale. The Corporate segment involves in investment and management activities. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Asia Gate Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business. It operates through the following business segments: Golf and Resort, Construction, Real Estate, and Others. The Golf and Resort segment deals with the acquisition and management of golf courses. The Construction segment undertakes water and sewerage contract works, electricity, gas, and underground lifeline such as pipe and drain laying. The Real Estate segment covers the sale, lease and brokerage of real estate properties. The Others segment includes the finance business. The company was founded on August 1, 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Asian Healthcare Specialists Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. Through its subsidiaries, it engages in the provision of medical consultancy and services in the field of orthopaedic medicine. The company was founded by Ching Su Hsien and Chyn Hong Tan on September 27, 2017 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Asian Star Anchor Chain Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of anchor chains and offshore mooring chains. Its products are applied in projects of ships, offshore mooring engineering, and military. 60% of the company products are exported to Japan, Korea, Europe and the U.S. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jingjiang, China.

Aspen (Group) Holdings Ltd. is an investment company with interests in real estate development in Malaysia. It focuses on residential and mixed development projects which include the Tri Pinnacle, Vervéa and Vertu Resort projects. It also offers value-added services including furnishings and home appliances. The company operates through following segments: Property development and Food and beverages. The Property development engages in the Development of residential and commercial properties; the Food and beverages segment engages in sales of food and beverages. Aspen (Group) Holdings was founded by Murly Manokharan and Nazir Ariff bin Mushir Ariff on December 22, 2016 and is headquartered in George Town, Malaysia.

Avaco Co., Ltd. engages in the development and production of flat panel display (FPD) equipment. It operates through the following business areas: Display, PV, and Other Industry. The Display business provides LCD panel by coating oxide or metallic materials. The PV business offers solar cells. The Other Industries business provides FRS series used for touch panel. The company was founded by Jae-Gon Wie on January 16, 2000 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Avarga Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the trading of paper products and provision of management services. It operates through the following segments: Paper Mill, Power Plant, Building Products, and Others. The Paper Mill segment manufactures and sells industrial grade paper products; and collects and trades in waste paper products. The Power Plant segment operates a 50 MW gas-fired generating plant in Ywama, Myanmar. The Building Products segment focuses on Canada, United States, and overseas. The Others segment identifies new investment opportunities locally and overseas.  The company was founded on October 7, 1967 and is headquartered in Singapore.

AVIC Capital Co., Ltd. is engaged in industrial and equity investment and investment advisory. It operates through the following segments: Financial, Aviation, and Emerging Indutries. The Financial Industry segment includes investment in AVIC Securities, AVIC Finance, AVIC Leasing, AVIC Trust, AVIC Futures, AVIC Fund of China, and Groupama Avic Insurance Company. The Aviation Industry segment includes investment in Zhonghang Heibao, AVIC International, AVIC Xian Aircraft Industry Group, AVIC Shenfei Civil Aircraft, AVIC Chengfei Commercial Aircraft, and AVIC Chengdu CAIC Electronics Company. The Emerging Industry segment includes development of new materials, new technology, and new energy such as composites, laser forming technology, and lithium-ion battery and power management system. The company was founded on July 24, 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Axial Retailing, Inc. engages in the supermarket business. It operates through the following segments: Supermarkets and Others. The Supermarkets segment handles the sale of food products. The Others segment includes information processing, cleaning, forwarding, car sales and printing businesses. The company was founded on August 1, 1967 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.

Azorim Investment Development & Construction Co. Ltd. engages in the development and acquisition of real estate properties. It operates through the following segments: Residential Construction Development in Israel, Non-residential Investment Property in Israel and Other. Residential Construction Development in Israel segment includes acquisition and sale of rights in land, initiation and execution of projects, including stages of planning, construction, marketing and sales. Non-residential Investment Property in Israel segment includes land and buildings under construction. Other segment operates in rental housing and in holding a plot of land in Houston, as well as in land rights designated for a residential project in Yonkers in the U.S. The operations are conducted by subsidiaries. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

BOS Better Online Solutions Ltd. provides intelligent robotics and supply chain solutions to enterprises. It offers smart automation systems for industrial processes, logistics and retail stores. The firm operates through the following segments: RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) & Mobile Solutions; and Supply Chain Solutions. The RFID & Mobile Solutions segment offers the integration of turnkey solutions as well as stand-alone products, including best-of-breed RFID and automatic identification data capture hardware, communications, equipment and industry-specific software applications. The Supply Chain Solutions segment provides electronic components, telecommunications equipment and components consolidation services to the aerospace, defense, medical and telecommunications industries as well as enterprise customers worldwide. The company was founded by Israel Gal in 1990 and is headquartered in Rishon LeZion, Israel.
Baazeem Trading Co. engages in retail and wholesale business of food and household products. The company was founded on March15, 1978 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

BANDAI NAMCO Holdings, Inc. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of entertainment-related products and services. It operates through the following segments: Toys and Hobby, Network Entertainment, Real Entertainment, Video and Music Production Business, IP Creation Business and Others. The Toys and Hobby segment manufactures and sells toys, capsule toys, plastic models, cards, confectionery and foods, apparel, sundries, prizes, stationery, and other products. The Network Entertainment segment produces and merchandises home video game software, and plans and operates amusement and other facilities. The Visual & Music Production segment provides animation; visual and music software; distributing video on demand content; and conducting live entertainment operations. The Other segment includes logistics and printing services. The company was founded on September 29, 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Banyan Tree Holdings Ltd. engages in managing and developing premium resorts, hotels and spas. It operates through the following segments: Hotel Investments, Property Sales, Fee-based, and Head Office. The Hotel Investment segment engages in hotel and restaurant operations. The Property Sales segment includes hotel residences, property sales, and development project sales. The Fee-based segment comprises the management and operation of hotels, resorts, clubs, funds, spas, galleries, and other related services. The Head Office segment relates to expenses incurred by corporate office. Banyan Tree Holdings was founded by Kwon Ping Ho in 1984 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Bawan Co. is a holding company, which engages in the manufacture of carpentry and concrete products. The company operates through the following segments: Metal and Wood, Electrical, Concrete, and Head Office. It offers metal and steel works, wooden pallets, plywood panels, boards and all types of carpentry and decorations, electrical transformers, packaged and unit substations, and ready mix and concrete products. The company was founded on August 20, 1980 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

BEENOS, Inc. engages in the electronic commerce business. It operates through the Electronic Commerce and Incubation segments. The Electronic Commerce segment handles net purchase sales through Brandear; products produce licensing through Mono Sense; internet shopping through Net Price; overseas transfer through Tenso.com and Buyee; and global shopping through Sekaimon. The Incubation segment manages investment promotions and new businesses before monetization. The company was founded by Teruhide Sato on November 25, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Beijing Aritime Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture and sale of industrial automation and control systems. Its products include open distributed control systems, electric transmission series, high voltage thyristor, industrial detection instruments, industrial manufacturing execution system software, metallurgical process control systems, depth indicators, and robot integration systems. The company was founded on December 28, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing Centergate Technologies (Holding) Co., Ltd. engages in the development, management and investment of real estate. It operates business through four business segments-biomedical, personal care products, real estate & construction and other business. It mainly engages in the biomedical product preparation including tablets, injections, APIs, capsule, oral solution, granules, narcotic drugs, personal care products, manufacture and sale of commercial concrete and cement products. The firm also engages in the research and development of psychotropic drugs manufacturing and sales and real estate management and development. The company was founded on June 2, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing ConST Instruments Technology, Inc. engages in the provision of solutions for pressure, temperature, and process instrument calibration and detection technology. It offers digital testing equipment and auxiliary testing services. Its business includes pressure detection calibration, temperature detection and calibration, process signal detection, and electrical testing and calibration. Its products includes digital pressure gauge, intelligent pressure calibrator, automatic pressure calibrator, intelligent pressure generator, intelligent pressure controller, pressure calibrator, intelligent dry body furnace, intelligent thermometer, intelligent precision constant temperature bath, intelligent precision verification furnace, temperature and humidity automatic verification system, and process calibrator. The company was founded on September 20, 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. engages in the development, construction, and sale of real estate properties. Its business activities include development of commercial housing, housing construction guarantee, building construction, property management, development of hotels, asset management, and landscaping design and construction services. The company was founded on June 3, 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing Etrol Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of intelligent industry solutions and automations. Its products include DCS (Distributed Control System), compact RTU (Remote Terminal Unit), modular RTU, expansion input/output, and oil and gas products. The company was founded on September 17, 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology Inc. provides information technology services. Its solutions and services mainly include file management outsourcing services, audio and video solutions and services, content management solutions and its office information system solutions and services are used by governments, enterprises and public institutions to improve the circulation and management of office information, including paper files, video information, audio information and electronic information as well as provides long term operating outsourcing services to its clients, including examining, repairing, upgrading and monitoring of the whole system, consulting and training services for users, as well as technical supports. The company was founded on January 8, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

New Universal Science Technology Co., Ltd. engages in provision of equipment and digitalisation equipent for use in the rubber tire industry. The compnay's activity involves the research, development, production and servicing of intelligent environmentally friendly pneumatic conveyance systems; ; ingredient weighing system; automatic rubber preparation system; single step low temperature rubber forming equipment, waste gas purification system, finished tire automatic transport and sorting line; manufacturing execution system; logistics transportation and warehousing system, and personalized industrial electronic weighing equipment. The company was founded on September 24, 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing OriginWater Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the businesses of environmental protection and water treatment. It provides overall technical solutions for the construction of water supply, sewage treatment plants, reclaimed water plants, seawater desalination plants, and urban ecosystems; and engineering construction services for urban ecological environment governance, municipal administration and water supply and drainage. The company also develops, produces and sells household and commercial water purifier products. Beijing OriginWater Technology was founded by Jian Ping Wen on July 17, 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing Sanlian Hope Shin-Gosen Technical Service Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of synthetic fiber new material engineering technical service. It specializes in overall engineering technology solutions in nylon polymerization and spinning. Its business focuses on the overall technical solution of polyamide. The company was founded by Di Liu on October 12, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing SPC Environment Protection Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, construction, and operation of flue gas desulfurization equipment for fire coal power plants. It offers wet process flue gas desulfurization equipment and dry process flue gas desulfurization equipment. The company was founded on September 03, 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing Urban-rural Commercial (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the retail and wholesale of commodities. It involves in the operation of supermarkets and hotels, property leasing, warehousing, supply and marketing of supplies, venue rentals, and import and export. The company was founded on January 18, 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Beijing WKW Automotive Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of interior and exterior trim systems, car parts, and smart electrical integration controlling system. Its products include side sill trims, car door trim, window frame, corner window trim, B-pillar trim, C-pillar trim, luggage rack, roof water strip, aluminum interior trim, threshold layering, scuff strip, rear trim, and door section. The company was founded on July 3, 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

BELLSYSTEM24 Holdings, Inc. engages in the formulation of group strategies, administers group companies, and handles distribution of the group's management resources. It operates through the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and Others segments. The CRM segment offers services that use information technology (IT) such as web and social media services. The Others segment includes contract sales organization (CSO), which handles pharmaceutical sales; medical information service (MIS), which provides contact center services related to health; site management organization (SMO), which offers medical service support for clinical trial sites; sales of weather forecast contents through mobile and personal computer; and promotion of employment of people with disabilities. The company was founded in September 20, 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo,Japan.

Benesse Holdings, Inc. operates as a a holding company which provides the overall group management strategy formulation and management oversight. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Education, Domestic English Education, Overseas Business Development, Nursing Care and Childcare, Benesse USA, and Others. The Domestic Education segment offers correspondence courses and teacher support services as well as operates cram and preparatory schools. The Domestic English Education segment handles the English classes for children and interpretation and translation business. The Overseas Business Development segment provides preschool courses for students in China and Taiwan. The Nursing Care and Childcare segment operates nursing homes for the elderly and provides residential care, nursing care personnel training, staff placement, and personnel dispatch services. The Benesse USA segment covers global human resources training and English language education in overseas. The Others segment includes telemarketing, computer information processing, system development and sales businesses. It also handles nursery and school children management business. The company was founded on January 28, 1955 and is headquartered in Okayama, Japan.

BGRIMM Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of mining and metallurgical equipment. It also provides related services. Its products include magnetic devices, flotation equipment, magnetic separation equipment, and other mining equipment. The company was founded on September 6, 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Black Peony Group Co. Ltd. engages in the textile and garment industry. Its business scope includes purchasing, processing, and marketing of cotton; import and export goods and technology, industrial investment, sales of building materials, decoration materials, general merchandise, hardware, AC power, chemical products, and labor insurance supplies. The company products include denim fabric and denim garments. Black Peony Group was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Changzhou, Jiangsu.

Bonvests Holdings Ltd. engages in property development and investment, hotel ownership and management, and waste management and contract cleaning. It operates through the following business segments: Rental, Industrial, Hotel, Investment, Development and Others. The Rental segment comprises of owning and letting of properties. The Industrial segment covers the collection and disposal of waste and contract cleaning. The Hotel segment covers the development and operation of hotels and golf course. The Investment segment consists of securities trading and investment holding. The Development segment includes the development of properties. The Others segment engages in the provision of management services and operation of restaurant. The company was founded by Henry Ngo in 1982 and headquartered in Singapore.

Br. Holdings Corp. engages in the management and operation of its subsidiaries which are in the construction business. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Product Sales, Information Systems, and Real Estate Leasing. The Construction segment designs prestressed concrete works and building bridges. The Product Sales segment produces and sells concrete secondary products. The Information Systems segment provides information processing and software development services. The Real Estate Leasing segment rents out properties. The company was founded on September 27, 2002 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

Broadway Industrial Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture of precision-machined components for the electronics, automotive, and oil and gas industries. It operates through the following geographical segments: China, Singapore, Thailand, United States of America, and Other Countries. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Brook Crompton Holdings Ltd. engages in the distribution of electric motors. The firm also offers management services. It operates through the following segments: Asia Pacific, United Kingdom, North America, and Corporate. The company was founded on December 11, 1947 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Brother Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of communication, printing, and electronic products and instruments. It operates through the following segments: Printing and Solutions Business, Personal and Home Business, Machinery Business, Network and Contents Business, Domino Business and Others. The Printing and Solutions Business segment offers printers, all-in-ones, fax machines, and electronic stationeries. The Personal and Home Business segment composes of sewing products, which include home sewing and embroidery machines. The Machinery Business segment supplies industrial sewing machines, garment printers, reducers, gears, and machine tools. The Network and Contents Business segment provides karaoke systems, content-delivery systems, and content services. The Domino Business segment offers coding, marking, and digital printing equipment. The Others segment engages in the sale and leasing of real estate. The company was founded by Kanekichi Yasui in April 1908 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Bumitama Agri Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the operation of oil palm plantations and mills. It operates through the Plantations and Palm Oil Mills, and Downstream Biodiesel Refinery segments. The Plantations and Palm Oil Mills segment focuses on the cultivation and maintenance of oil palm plantations and operation of palm oil mills. The Downstream Biodiesel Refinery segment sells biodiesel products from the refinery. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

C&G Systems, Inc. engages in the development of computer aided design (CAD) and computer aided manufacturing (CAM) systems. It operates through CAD/CAM Systems, and Mold and Die Manufacturing segments. The CAD/CAM Systems segment develops and sells CAD/CAM software for mold and die. It also offers maintenance services, sells hardware, and provides contracted development. The Mold and Die Manufacturing segment provides mold and die contract fabrication for automobile parts. The company was founded on July 2, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CAC Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the information technology services. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Information Technology (IT), Overseas Information Technology (IT), and CRO. The Domestic IT segment provides human resoruce, BPO, and system development, operation, and management services for domestic subsidiaries. The Overseas IT segment offers system development, operation, management, and maintenance services for overseas subsidiaries. The CRO segment provides pharmaceutical companies with contract and proxy services for clinical testing and post-manufacturing. The company was founded on August 8, 1966 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Canature Health Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of residential water treatment products. It operates through the following business segments: Water purification and softening equipment, Fireplace and furnace equipment, Maintenance, and Cell storage and other services. Its products include whole house water purifiers, whole house water softeners, commercial purification water dispensers, reverse osmosis membrane water purifiers, multi-control valves, and composite pressure vessels. The company was founded by Jian Guo Qu on February 27, 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

CANDEAL Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its subsidiaries. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Repair & Inspection Service, Construction Service and Trading & Distribution. The Repair & Inspection Service division provides the service of repair for the defects of furniture and defects interior materials of due to the construction. The Construction Service division provides the services for the commercial facilities such as various functions lifting for the building materials, office moving, interior decoration change, installation of hotel's furniture, etc. The Trading & Distribution division  import materials and products from manufacturers in Europe, America and Asia; and distribution to the home-center, web-shop for selling to DIY (Do-It-Yourself) and professional craftsmen. The company was founded on August 7, 2014 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CapitaLand Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of consultancy services. It operates through the following business segments: CapitaLand Singapore and International, CapitaLand China, CapitaLand India, CapitaLand Lodging, and CapitaLand Financial. The CapitaLand Singapore and International segment comprises CL Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia, CL Vietnam and CL International. The CapitaLand China segment operates in china. The CapitaLand India operates in India. The CapitaLand Lodging engages in global network and scale, comprises the Group's lodging business. The CapitaLand Financial segment is the real estate fund management unit comprising the Group’s REIT managers and Fund managers. The company was founded in November 2000 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Captii Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management services, telecommunications products, and customized solutions. It operates through the following segments: Unifiedcomms, GlobeOSS, Captii Ventures, and Others. The Unifiedcomms segment offers value-added services, messaging and signaling systems, solutions, and managed services. The GlobeOSS segment includes mobile network operation support systems, solutions, and managed services. The Captii Ventures segment focuses on investments in early and late-stage technology ventures. The Others segment involves in the activities of the group. The company was founded on December 27, 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Carta Holdings, Inc. engages in the business of online commerce, media, advertising, research, and mobile services. It operates through the following segments: Ad Platform, Point Media, and Incubation. The Ad Platform segment includes platforms such as fluct, Zucks, and CMerTV. The Point Media segment includes products such as EC Navi and PeX. The Incubation segment handles the new graduate recruitment support project and game publishing business. The company was founded by Shinsuke Usami on October 8, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Cashway Fintech Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of intelligent banking solutions centered on financial self-help equipment. Its products include cash self-service equipment, non-cash self-service equipment, mobile payment products, equipment accessories, and software. The company was founded on May 12, 2004 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

Casio Computer Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of watches and personal electronic equipment. It operates through the following segments: Consumer, Systems Equipment and Others. The Consumer segment provides watches, clocks, electronic dictionaries and calculators, label printers, electronic musical instruments, digital cameras, and cellular phones. The Systems Equipment segment offers handy terminals, electronic cash registers, office computers, page printers, and data projectors. The Others segment handles the wafer level package processing consignments, liquid crystal displays, and molds. The company was founded by Tadao Kashio in April 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Castec Korea Co., Ltd. manufactures automobile components. Its products include turbo charger, other automobile parts, pump and motor parts, and compressors. The company was founded on December 23, 1998 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.

CCOOP Group Co., Ltd. is engaged in the merchandise wholesaling and retailing business. It provides jewelry, general merchandise, textiles, general machinery, electrical equipment, construction materials, garments and shoes, cosmetics, home appliances and sports goods, among others through chain supermarkets and department stores. CCOOP Group was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

CE Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the business and fund management of its subsidiaries which offers software packages and information systems for medical institutions. It operates through the Medical System Business and Others segments. The Medical System Business segment develops medical accounting system, electronic medical record system, ordering system, inspection system, blood transfusion system, and medical information system for hospitals and medical institutions. The Others segment deals with health care-related information services. The company was founded on March 25, 1996 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

Centurion Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the ownership, development, and management of purpose-built accommodation assets. It operates through the following segments: Workers Accommodation, Student Accommodation, and Others. The Workers Accommodation segment offers dormitory accommodation and services for workers. The Student Accommodation segment covers accommodation and services for students. The Other segment manufactures and sells optical discs, and related data storage products. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Singapore.

CGN Nuclear Technology Development Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electronic accelerators and modified polymer materials. It also provides radiation processing services. It operates through the following business segments: Accelerator and radiation processing, Modified polymer materials, Ocean shipping, Contractor, Real estate, Import and export trade, and Others. The Accelerator and radiation processing segment includes low, medium, and high energy products used in radiation crosslinking, grafting, and pollution control, as well as electron beam radiation modification technology, medical supply sterilization, and food preservation. The modified polymer materials segment includes modified cable materials and modified engineering plastics. The company was founded on April 17, 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co., Ltd. engages in product development, supply, delivery, and after-sale service for the whole building process of vehicle. Its main products include interiors, exteriors, wheels, lamp electronics, and body structures. The company was founded on June 28, 1993 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Changchun UP Optotech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of photoelectric measurement and control equipment, medical testing equipment, and optical materials. It focuses on precision optical mechanical and electrical equipment, light mechanical and electrical integration equipment, optical materials, optical components, medical optical instruments, and endoscopic equipment. Its products include medical testing equipment, photoelectric theodolite optical systems, aeronautical and aerospace cameras, television goniometers, aerial remote sensors, antenna blocks, antenna seats, radar antenna seats, military and civilian medical equipment, K9 Chinese optical borosilicate crown glasses, coating materials, and optical materials. The company was founded on June 26, 2001 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Changchun Yidong Clutch Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive components. It focuses on automotive clutch and hydraulic lifting mechanism. The company was founded on February 11, 1993 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Changsha Tongcheng Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the commercial retail, banking and pawnbroking, and tourism and hotel industry. Its retail business covers department stores, electronics chain, outlets, and supermarkets. It also operates Dolton online store and group membership card and prepaid card; Dolton logistics; and Dolton property. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

Changshu Automotive Trim Co., Ltd. engages in the development, design, manufacture, processing, and sale of automotive accessories. Its products include automotive interiors component systems, door panel, instrumental panels, sun shade, parcel shelf, bumpers, and pillars. The company was founded by Xiao Chun Luo in 1992 and is headquartered in Changshu, China.

Changying Xinzhi Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the innovation, research, manufacture, and sale of motor parts. It includes automobile stator core and assembly, rotors, electric motorcycle stator core and assembly, elevator traction motor stator, power tool motor rotor, and household appliance rotor. The company was founded on July 14, 1990 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

Changzheng Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, engineering design, and technical service of aerospace pulverized coal pressurized gasification technology. Its products include pulverized coal gasifier, gasification burner, special pump series, special valve series, and non-standard equipment. The company was founded on June 22, 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Changzhou Shenli Electrical Machine Inc. Co. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of motor and generator stator. It also involves in rotor punching and iron core. Its products include diesel generator, wind power generator, medium voltage & high voltage motor, railway motor, elevator motor, alternating current motor, small and special motor and large series of products. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Changzhou Tenglong Auto Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing and sale of automotive parts. Its products include automotive air-conditioning pipelines, heat exchange system connecting pipes, heat exchange system accessories, new energy automotive thermal management system components, automotive exhaust gas recirculation system components, automotive lightweight alloy materials, automotive sensors, and automotive brake system parts. The company was founded on May 26, 2005 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Chengdu Galaxy Magnets Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of bonded NdFeB magnets, hot-pressed magnets, and samarium-cobalt magnets. It also offers optical disc drive principal axis motor magnets, hard disc drive principal axis motor magnets, automobile mini motor magnets, samarium cobalt magnets, magnet fittings, magnetic powders, injected plastic-bonded magnets and magnet assemblies. The company was founded on July 20, 1993 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Haoneng Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include forging synchronizer tooth rings, stamping synchronizer gear rings, and synchronizer gear rings. The company was founded on September 25, 2006 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of roller press. It offers roller press and associated equipment which is mainly applied for grinding of brittle materials in cement and building materials industry, as well as the mining, metallurgy, and chemical industry; and aviation components and tools. The company was founded on November 23, 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture, research and development of equipment for the production of LPG, gas storage, purification and liquefaction - as well as valves and transportation pipes. It offers Natural Gas Liquefaction Plant, Tail-gas from Chemical Plant & LPG/ NGL Recovery Facility, Coke-oven gas liquefaction Plant, Coal-bed Methane Liquefaction Plant, Air Separation Unit, N2, O2 Liquefier, Booster Turbo-Expander Unit, Large-scale Cryogenic Storage Tank, LNG/LCNG Refueling Station and Stored Energy Facility. The company was founded on 28 April 2008, and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of compound fertilizers and flavouring. Its products include water soluble compound fertilizers, urea based compound fertilizers, chlorine based compound fertilizers, organic and inorganic compound fertilizers, nitryl compound fertilizers, nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium (NPK) fertilizers, soda ash, ammonium chloride, anhydrous sodium sulfate, edible salt and industrial salt. The company was founded on August 31, 1995 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Xiling Power Science & Technology Inc. Co. engages in the manufacture, research and development of key components of automobile engines. It supplies automotive engine supporting rod, damping pulley, shock absorption belt wheel, camshaft and other important auto parts. The company was founded on September 30, 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of security systems for rail-transport applications. Its products include metro security platforms, track management automation systems, intelligent display unit for trains, locomotive management information systems, maintenance management systems, locomotive safety and fire protection monitoring systems, running gear monitoring devices and braking control units. The company was founded on March 10, 2006 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Chia Chang Co. Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of precision molds for optronics, information technology and communication application. Its business activities include the stamping of metal components and manufacture, processing & trading of metal spare parts and molds. Its products include optical information electronic components, metal stamping bezels, metal stamping back covers, inverters, shielding, lamp covers, plates, and brackets. The company was founded by Chen Tsang Hai on September 9, 1985 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

Chifeng Jilong Gold Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the mining and sale of gold. Its business scope include investment and management of gold mining. The company was founded on June 22, 1998 and is headquartered in Chifeng, China.
