China Baoan Group Co., Ltd. engages in the business of high technology enterprise industry, biological pharmacy, and real estate services. Its main products include graphene heat conductive materials, lithium-ion batteries, silicon oxide anode materials, lithium iron phosphate, aluminum nickel cobalt, and nickel cobalt manganese. The company was founded in July 1983 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

China Chemical & Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture and sale of drugs and health-related products and services. Its products include active pharmaceutical ingredients, drugs for human use, functional foods, home care and cosmetics, and animal health products. The company was founded on March 12, 1952 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corp. Ltd. engages in the provision of engineering contracting services. Its business activities include export of equipment and construction contracting, general trading, and overseas industrial operations. Its Export of Equipment and Construction Contracting division provides foreign aid engineering contracting services. Its General Trading division exports textiles, electronic machineries, solar energy systems, and agricultural machinery parts. Its Overseas Industrial Operations offers sucrose and alcohol products. The company was founded on March 1, 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

China CSSC Holdings Ltd. engages in the business of shipbuilding and ship maintenance services. It operates through the following businesses: Shipbuilding, Ship Maintenance, and Ship Equipment. The company's engages in the provision of ship repair, marine engineering, and mechanical and electrical equipment. China CSSC Holdings was founded on May 12, 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

China Distance Education Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of online education in China, which focuses on professional education. The company offers online courses through its websites, which are designed to help course participants obtain and maintain the skills, licenses and certifications necessary to pursue careers and professions in China. Its online professional education courses cover a wide range of industries, including accounting, law, healthcare, construction engineering and others. The company also offer online test preparation courses to self-taught learners pursuing higher education diplomas or degrees and to secondary school and college students for various academic and entrance exams. It offers online foreign language courses. China Distance Education Holdings was founded by Zhengdong Zhu, Baohong Yin and Hongfeng Sun in July 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

China Fangda Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale and service of integrated high technologies business. Its business segments cover curtain wall systems and materials, rail transit equipment and systems, solar photovoltaic power generation, and real estate and finance sectors. Its products include energy-saving curtain wall, photoelectric curtain wall, light-emitting diode color curtain wall, other types of building walls and aluminum materials, rail transit screen door system, Shenzhen Fangda City project and Nanchang Phoenix Island project, and solar photovoltaic power station. The company was founded on December 28, 1991 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

China Jishan Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of printing and dyeing services for garments and home textiles, as well as the sale of print and dye finished products. It operates through the following business segments: Printing & Dyeing, Fabric Processing, Leasing Property, and Property Development. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

China Kings Resources Group Co., Ltd. engages in the investment and development of fluorite mine and production & trade of fluorite products. Its product includes acid grade fluorite fine powder, high-grade fluorite lump ore, metallurgical grade fluorite fine powder and common fluorite ore. The company was founded on May 15, 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

China Merchants Expressway Network Technology Hlds Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, management, and operation of toll expressway. The business scope of the company include: investment and operation of expressway infrastructure, development of transportation science and technology, intelligent transportation, and other industries related to expressway. The company was founded on December 18, 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

China Reform Culture Holdings Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture and distribution of fluorine chemical products. Its main products are fluoropolymers, fluorocarbons, fluorine-containing fine chemicals, CFC substitutes, including polyvinylidene fluoride (PVDF) functional resins, specialty fluorine rubber, environment friendly fluorine rubber products polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) resins and among others. The company was founded on April 16, 1960 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

China Southern Airlines Co. Ltd. engages in the provision of domestic, international, and regional scheduled and unscheduled air transportation of passenger, cargo, mail and baggage, general aviation, and aircraft maintenance. The company operates through the following segments: Airline Transportation Operations and Other segments. The Airline Transportation Operations segment engages in the passenger and cargo and mail operations. The other segment includes hotel and tour operation, ground services, cargo handling and other miscellaneous services. The company was founded on March 25, 1995 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

China Sunsine Chemical Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the production specialty chemical, rubber accelerators, and insoluble sulphur. It operates through the following segments: Rubber Chemicals and Heating Power. The Rubber Chemicals segment manufactures and sells rubber chemicals. The Heating Power segment focuses on the production and supply heating power. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Singapore.

China Wafer Level CSP Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of semiconductor CMOS image sensor chips. It provides wafer-level chip size packaging and testing services. Its products include biometric identification chips, micro-electromechanical system chips, ambient light sensor chips, medical electronic devices, and radiofrequency chips. The company products widely used in various electronic products such as smart phones, tablets and wearable electronics. China Wafer Level CSP was founded on June 10, 2005 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

China Yuchai International Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of management, financial planning, internal audit services, internal control testing, international financial reporting standard (IFRS) training, business enhancement consulting, and other services. It operates through the following segments: Yuchai, HL Global Enterprises Limited (HLGE), and Corporate. The Yuchai segment conducts manufacturing and sale of diesel engines which are mainly distributed in the People's Republic of China (PRC) market. The HLGE segment includes hospitality and property development activities conducted mainly in the PRC, and Malaysia. The company was founded on April 29, 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Chip Eng Seng Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of general building contracting services, and property investment and development through its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Property Development, Property Investments, Hospitality, Education, and Corporate and Others. The Construction segment engages in the business of general building contractors. The Property Development segment includes management of construction projects. The Property Investment segment leases and manages investment properties. The Hospitality segment involves in hotel operations. The Education segment offers academe services. The Corporate and Others segment includes group-level corporate services, treasury functions, and investments in marketable securities. The company was founded by Tiam Seng Lim in 1960 and is headquartered in Singapore.

ChongKunDang Holdings Corp. is a business development and investment company, which focuses on pharmaceutical operations. Through its subsidiaries, it also engages in the following activities; real estate leasing, engineering and construction, outsourcing and transportation, advertisement, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 7, 1941 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture and sale of small thermal power machinery products. It specializes in motorcycle engine, general purpose gasoline engine, various agricultural and forestry machinery, special power and multi-fuel power, diesel engines, marine power, automobile engines, and auto parts. The company was founded on March 14, 1989 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

Chori Co., Ltd. engages in the textile, chemical and machinery businesses. It operates through the following segments: Textile, Chemicals, Machinery, and Others. The Textile segment provides synthetic and natural fibers, industrial materials, and knitting products. The Chemicals segment offers fine, organic, and inorganic chemicals; pharmaceutical raw materials; minerals; and food additives. The Machinery segment handles vehicles and machinery-related components. The Others segment includes outsourcing of clerical and office services. The company was founded in 1861 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Chuokeizai-Sha Holdings, Inc. engages in the publication and sale of specialized books and magazines. It operates thorugh the Publication Business and Publication Incidental Business divisions. The Publication Business division publishes and sells books and magazines related to corporate management. The Publication Incidental Business division plans and creates magazine advertisements, product catalogs, and sales promotion pamphlets; manages published products; and leases out real estate. The company was founded on October 13, 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CITIC Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sales of heavy machinery. It operates through the following segments: Heavy Equipment, Engineering Package, Robots & Intelligent Equipment, Energy Saving & Environmental Protection equipment, Spare Parts Service, and High-Tech. The Heavy Equipment segment manufactures machineries in fields of mining, building materials, metallurgy, coal, water power, and tunnelling. The Engineering Package segment operates in production lines of cement and lime. The Robots & Intelligent Equipment segment researchers and develops intelligent robots such as light manipulators, light crawler robots, and fire-fighting robots. The Energy Saving & Environmental Protection Equipment segment promote environment friendly industrialization projects and offers energy-saving steam turbines. The Spare Parts Service segment provides distant inspection and spare parts maintenance services. The High-Tech segment develops industrial computed tomography and X ray inspection system. The company was founded on July 19, 1983 and is headquartered in Luoyang, China.

Citizen Watch Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of watches, their components, machine tools, and electronic devices and products. It operates through the following segments: Watches, Machine Tools, Devices and Components, Electronic Products, and Other Products. The Watches segment provides watches and quartz movement. The Machine Tools segment manufactures numerical control automatic lathes. The Devices and Components segment offers light-emitting diode, automotive parts, quartz crystals, micro display devices, and switches. The Electronic Products segment offers calculators, printers, and healthcare equipment. The Other Products segment manufactures jewelry. The company was founded on May 28, 1930 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

City Developments Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the property development and ownership. It operates through the following segments: Property Development, Hotel Operations, Rental Properties, and Others. The Property Development segment develops and purchases properties for sale. The Hotel Operations segment owns and manages hotels. The Rental Properties segment develops and purchases investment properties for sale. The Others segment comprises of club operator and owner, investment in shares, property management, project management and consultancy services; and provides information technology and procurement services. The company was founded on September 7, 1963 and is headquartered in Singapore.

CJ Corp. engages in managing investments. The company through its subsidiaries operates in the following businesses: Food and Food services, Retail and Logistics, Entertainment and Media, Infrastructure, and Life Science. The company was founded on August 1, 1953 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

CK San-Etsu Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of brass bar and wire products in Japan and internationally. It operates through the following segments: Copper & Brass; Precision Parts; and Piping & Plating. The Copper & Brass segment includes brass rods, wires, and tubes. The Precision Parts segment manufactures camera mounts, flare nuts, and faucet fittings. The Piping & Plating segment produces residential piping equipment and molten zinc plating. The company was founded in June 1920 and is headquartered in Takaoka, Japan.

CKD Corp. is engaged in the machinery business. Its operations are carried out through Automated Machinery and Component segments. The Automated Machinery segment deals with the manufacture and sale of large-scale equipment such as automatic packaging system, image processing inspection system, lithium-ion battery manufacturing system, three-dimensional solder printing inspection machines, lighting manufacturing system, and capacitor manufacturing system. The Component segment involves in the manufacture and sale of labor-saving devices, pneumatic control system, drive equipment, pneumatic equipment and fluid control devices. The company was founded on April 2, 1943 and is headquartered in Komaki. Japan.
Clal Industries & Beverages Ltd. engages in the production and marketing of soft drinks and mineral water. The company was founded on March 20, 2018 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Clean & Science Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive and industrial air filtration papers. Its products include filter paper, melt blown, electrostatic nonwoven, carbon media and composite filters. The company was founded on March 1, 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Cleanup Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of household equipment and appliances. It manufactures and sells kitchen equipment, bath equipment, and washstand fixtures. It also sells, cuts and offers color processing services for stainless materials. The company was founded by Noboru Inoue on October 5, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CMIC Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of support services for pharmaceutical development, manufacturing, and sales. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Contract Research Organization (CRO), Contract Manufacturing Organization (CMO), Contract Sales Organization (CSO), Health Care, and Intellectual Properties Development (IPD). The CRO segment provides the professional services related to the administration of clinical study and survey upon manufacture and sale such as monitoring, data management, pharmaceutical consulting, and preclinical businesses. The CMO segment handles the contract manufacture of medical supplies for pharmaceutical companies. The CSO segment includes sale and marketing support for pharmaceutical companies. The Health Care segment provides medical and support services for health maintenance and improvement. The IPD segment involves in the development and sale of diagnostic and orphan drugs. The company was founded by Kazuo Nakamura on March 14, 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
CMS Education Co., Ltd. operates as a private educational institute. The company was founded on July 24, 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

CNMC Goldmine Holdings Ltd. engages in the business of exploration, mining of gold, and the processing of mined ore into gold dores. It operates through the Gold Mining and Other Operations segments. The Gold Mining segment explores, develops, mines, and markets gold. The Other Operations segment includes investment holding activities and provision of corporate services. The company was founded by Xian Xiong Lin on August 11, 2011 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings, Inc. oversees its group companies with key business in manufacturing beverages. It operates through the Beverage and Healthcare and Skincare segments. The Beverage segment manufactures and sells carbonated beverages, coffee, tea, and mineral water. The Healthcare and Skincare segment retails health food items, cosmetics, and green juice using Kale as a raw material. The company was founded on December 20, 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

cocokara fine, Inc. engages in the planning and management of its group companies that are involved in drugstore chain operations. It operates through the following segments: Drug Store and Pharmacy Business, Nursing Care Business, and Others. The Drug Store and Pharmacy Business segment deals with the retail distribution of pharmaceutical products, cosmetics, and household items. The Nursing Care Business segment operates nursing care facilities and offers home-care services. The Others segment covers wholesale, e-commerce and international businesses. The company was founded on April 1, 2008 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Cocolonet Co., Ltd. is a holding company that engages in the provision of ceremonial services that includes wakes and weddings. It operates through the following segments: Funeral, Stone Wholesale, Stone Retail, Wedding, Floral Arrangement, Mutual Aid, Nursing Care and Others. The Funeral segment provides wake and funeral ceremonies. The Stone Wholesale segment sells wholesale tombstones to local stone retailers. The Stone Retail segment sells retail tombstones to general consumers. The Wedding segment provides wedding ceremony rites services. The Floral Arrangement segment produces and sells wholesale and retail flower arrangements and artificial flowers. The Mutual Aid segment provides association members with discounted prices on special occasions such as weddings and funerals paid through its monthly premiums. The Nursing Care segment includes nursing care support and management of nursing care house for senior citizens. The Others segment covers the wholesale business of funeral supplies. The company was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Fukushima, Japan.

Colex Holdings Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of waste management and contract cleaning services. It operates through the following segments: Waste Disposal, Contract Cleaning and Others. The Waste Disposal segment provides services for domestic waste, commercial waste and industrial waste, sale and rental of equipment to customers and repair of waste compactors. The Contract Cleaning segment engages in the provision of cleaning services. The company was founded on December 31, 1971 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Colowide Co., Ltd. is a holding company that engages in the restaurant business. It operates through Colowide MD Co. Ltd., Atom Corp., Reins International Inc., Kappa Create Co., Ltd. and Others segments. The Colowide MD Co., Ltd. segment operates directly-managed Japanese-style bars under the names Tezukuri Izakaya Amataro, Kita no Ajikiko to Jizake Hokkaido, and Yushokuzanmai Niju-Maru; as well as handles overall merchandising including food product development, procurement, production and distribution. The Atom Corp. segment deals with directly-managed and franchise restaurants under the Nigirinotokubei and Suteki Miya names. The Reins International Inc. segment manages the direct and franchise operations of restaurant brands namely Gyukaku, Onyasai, Doma Doma, Kamadoka, and Freshness Burger including food product planning and sales and ingredients supply. The Kappa Create Co., Ltd. segment manages the delicatessen business and the directly-operated sushi bar Kappa Sushi. The Others segment handles overall merchandising via the central kitchen and food market from procurement of raw materials to processing and delivery. The company was founded on April 19, 1963 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

ComfortDelGro Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of land transportation services. It operates through the following segments: Public Transport Services; Taxi; Automotive Engineering Services; Inspection and Testing Services; Driving Centre; Car Rental and Leasing; and Bus Station. The Public Transport Services segment focuses on the provision of bus and rail services to commuters travelling on public transport systems, coach rental services, and ancillary advertisement. The Taxi segment deals with renting out taxis, operating taxi bureau services, and ancillary advertisement. The Automotive Engineering Services segment offers vehicular maintenance and repair services, construction of specialized vehicles, assembly of bus bodies, crash repair services, engineering services, and sale of diesel. The Inspection and Testing Services segment comprises of motor vehicle inspection services and non-vehicle testing, inspection, and consultancy services. The Driving Centre segment operates driving schools. The Car Rental and Leasing segment involves the renting and leasing of cars. The Bus Station segment includes commission income from fare collection. The company was founded on March 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Computer Direct Group Ltd. provides consultancy, outsourcing, and managed services solutions. It operates through the following segments: Software solutions and services, Infrastructure and IT solutions, Provision of a range of managed services in the field of computerization for organizations, and Development and marketing of software products for the cellular sector. The company was founded by Adi Eyal on May 23, 1991 and is headquartered in Rosh Haayin, Israel.

COMSYS Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the telecommunications business. It operates through the following segments: Nippon Comsys Group, Sanwa Comsys Engineering Group, Tosys Group, Tsuken Group, Comsys Joho System Group, and Others. The Nippon Comsys Group segment handles the telecommunication facility construction with focus on Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp. The Sanwa Comsys Group segment offers telecommunications engineering to new common carrier. The Tosys Group segment provides telecommunication engineering in the Shinetsu region. The Tsuken Group segment provides telecommunication engineering in the Hokkaido region. The Comsys Joho System Group segment deals with information processing-related services. The Others segment covers temporary staffing and shared services. The company was founded on September 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

COPRO-HOLDINGS. Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its group companies. Its services include the temporary staffing business mainly in the construction field. The company was founded by Kosuke Kiyokawa on October 2, 2006 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

COSCO Shipping International (Singapore) Co., Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in shipping and other logistics services. It operates through the following segments: Shipping; Ship Repair and Marine Engineering Activities; Logistics: Property Management; and All Other Segments. The company was founded on October 25, 1961 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Cosmax BTI, Inc. engages in the investment and business management activities. It operates through the Health Functional Food and Other business divisions. The Health Functional Food business includes the manufacture of omega-3, glucosamine, vitamins, weight-loss product, and other health food products. The Other business refers to management support services, and brand and trademark revenue. The company was founded on November 12, 1992 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

Cosmo Energy Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries involved in the oil business. It operates through the following business segments: Petroleum, Petrochemical, Oil Exploration and Production (E&P), and Others. The Petroleum segment covers gasoline, naphta, kerosene, light oil, heavy oil, crude oil, lubricating oil, and asphalt. This segment also handles the import and export of crude oil and petroleum products; petroleum refining; and sale, storage, and transportation of petroleum products through its subsidiaries. The Petrochemical segment offers petrochemical products such as ethylene, mixed xylene, paraxylene, benzene, and toluene. The Oil E&P segment handles the development and production of crude oil. The Others segment includes construction, insurance agency, leasing, and wind power generation businesses. The company was founded on October 1, 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Cosmos Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development. Its business includes real estate development, commercial property management, property management services, real estate finance, and medical and diagnostic center. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Cota Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of hair care and quasi-pharmaceutical products. It operates through the following divisions: Toiletries, Hair Dressing, Hair Dye, Hair Growth Tonic, Permanent Wave Solution, and Others. The Toiletries division produces shampoo and hair treatments. The Hair Dressing division offers lotion, hair spray, hair foam, and hair wax. The Hair Dye division sells hair coloring and manicure products. The Hair Growth Tonic division provides medicated hair growth enhancers. The Permanent Wave Solution division manufactures hair wave agent, hair straightener, and hair curling products. The Others division includes sales promotional materials. The company was founded on September 27, 1979 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

COWAY Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of household electronic appliances. It operates through the following business divisions: Rental, Lump-Sum Payment, and Others. Its products include water purifiers, air purifiers, bidet, water softeners, and mattresses. The company was founded on May 22, 1989 and is headquartered in Gongju-si, South Korea.

create restaurants holdings, inc. engages in the maangement and operation of restaurant, casual food courts and Japanese style bars. Its restaurant brands include Hina-Sushi, Shabu Sai, Harvest, Hong Kong Chonron, TANTO TANTO, Yasia-ya Mei, Kichiza and Kagonoya. For the Japanese style bar, it operates Toriyoshi, Isomaru-suisa and Ichigoro. It also offers ramen and food court fares through its brands, TETSU, Food Bazaar Gotemba and Marche de Metro.The company was founded in May 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CRG Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of business management and policy development services for its group companies. Its group companies are engaged in temporary staffing and referrals, manufacturing consignment and business process outsourcing. The company was founded on October 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CROWNHAITAI Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its services include branding and consulting. The company was founded on September 18, 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Cryomax Cooling System Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacture and distribution of automobile cooling systems and related components. It offers automobile cooling system products, including automobile water tanks, intercoolers, oil coolers, condensers, as well as components for automobile cooling systems, including sinks, fixed plates, and cores and sealing gaskets, among others which are applied in minibuses, light trucks, trucks, generators and off-road vehicles, among others. The company was founded on August 22, 1984 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

CS HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its services include brand royalty, dividend to related companies, and others. The company was founded on January 12, 1949 and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea.

CSS Holdings, Ltd. engages in the operation and management of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Steward Business, Food Business, Space Produce Business, and Others. The Steward Business segment develops nationwide dishwashing and management work centered on hotels and restaurants. The Food Business segment handles employee cafeteria and restaurant management contracts through its subsidiaries. The Space Produce Business segment designs, constructs, manages, and sells items related to video, audio, broadcasting, and security. The Others segment includes general affairs, personnel, and management related business. The company was founded on December 19, 1984 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CSSC Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of ship parts and steel structure products. It involves in the following businesses: tank, shaft rudder, construction interior, hatch cover, and steel structures and equipment. Its business activities include engineering design and consulting, engineering general contracting, engineering supervision, planning, and environmental assessment services. The company was founded in May 28, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

CUB Elecparts, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of electrical and electronic parts. It offers products such as tire pressure monitoring systems, CAN BUS applied products, switches, windows and sensors. The company was founded by S. C. Arbula on January 9, 1979 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

Cuckoo Holdings Co., Ltd. is engaged in providing investment holdings in small household appliances and the rental of small household appliances. It manufactures kitchen electrical equipment. The company was founded on November 15, 1978 and is headquartered in Yangsan-si, South Korea.

DAEWON KANG UP Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. It products include industrial springs, automotive seats, and machineries. The company founded by Ju-Yeol Heo on September 20, 1946 and is headquartered in Cheonan-si, South Korea.

Daehan Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel products. The company operates through the Steel and Rolling businesses. Its products include steel, billet, bar in coil, and others. The company was founded on June 10, 1954 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.

Daekyo Co., Ltd. is a holding company which engages in the provision of educational materials and learning programs. Its services include domestic education and publishing. The company was founded by Young-Joong, Kang on July 9, 1976 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

DAESANG HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the management and support of its subsidiaries. Its services include consulting, analyzing, and supporting to its subsidiaries. The company was founded on August 1, 2005 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Daewoong Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It provides management and consultant services to its subsidiaries. The company was founded by Yoon Young-Hwa on August 15, 1945 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

Daihen Corp. engages in the manufacture, sale, and repair of electric power transmission and distribution products. It operates through the following segments: Power Equipment, Welding and Mechatronics, Semiconductor Related Equipment, and Others. The Power Equipment segment produces and supplies transformers, power distribution equipment, switches, surveillance and control systems, and dispersed power equipment. The Welding and Mechatronics segment produces and sells electric welding machines, plasma cutting machine, industrial air purifiers, and industrial-use robots. The Semiconductor Related Equipment segment offers high-frequency power sources and clean transfer robots. The Others segment deals with real estate leasing. The company was founded by Aizo Kobayashi on December 1, 1919 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Daiichi Jitsugyo Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of production equipment and systems. It operates through the following segments: Plant and Energy, Industrial Machinery, Electronics, Pharmaceuticals, Aviation, and Other. The Plant and Energy segment handles machinery and equipment for energy development and production, oil and gas refining, chemical, engineering, construction, and pulp and paper industries. The Industrial Machinery segment includes machinery and equipment for plastics, rubber, automobiles, steel, and food enterprises. The Electronics segment produces electronics, information and communication devices, electrical machinery, precision parts, optics, sound, and musical instruments. The Pharmaceuticals segment handles machinery and equipment for pharmaceutical and medical fields. The Aviation segment manages machinery and equipment for aviation and disaster prevention. The Other segment includes rental of machinery and equipment and insurance agencies. The company was founded by Shojiro Kuramochi on August 12, 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Daiki Axis Co., Ltd. engages in the environmental and housing equipment-related businesses. It operates through the following segments: Environmental Equipment-Related, Housing Equipment-Related, Renewable Energy-Related, and Others. The Environmental Equipment-Related segment manufactures, sells, and constructs facilities related to water and sewage. The Housing Equipment-Related segment constructs and sells housing-related products as well as interior and exterior construction materials. The Renewable Energy-Related segment handles small wind power generation business. It also manufactures and sells biodiesel fuel and constructs purifications plants. The Others segment includes domestic drinking water and civil engineering businesses. The company was founded on July 12, 2005 and is headquartered in Matsuyama, Japan.

Dainichi Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of oil fan heaters, ceramic fan heaters, coffee makers and others. Its products include household fan heaters, commercial oil stoves, coffee maker with roasters, coffee bean roasters, smoke machines, automatic feeding machines, photosynthesis promotion machines, and horticulture dedicated heaters. It operates through the following segments: Tohoku Sales Office, Niigata Sales Office, Kanto Sales Office, Kansai Sales Office, Kyushu Sales Office, and Sales Department. The company was founded by Fumio Sasaki on April 1, 1964 and is headquartered in Niigata, Japan.

Daiohs Corp. engages in the provision services for offices. These includes rental service of clean care products, coffee service, and water service. Its products include coffee, tea, bottled water, entrance mats, and cleaning mops. It operates through the Japan and United States of America geographical segments. The company was founded on June 2, 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Daitron Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electronic and manufacturing equipment. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Sales, Domestic Manufacturing, and Overseas. The Domestic Sales segment provides electronic components & assembly goods, semiconductors, embedded systems, power supply equipment, image-related equipment and components, and information systems for domestic customers. The Domestic Manufacturing segment develops and manufactures electronic parts and assembly products of electronic devices, power supply devices, image-related devices and parts, flat panel display manufacturing equipment, and electronic material manufacturing equipment for domestic customers. The Overseas segment sells, manufactures, imports and exports electronic parts and assembly products of electronic devices for overseas markets. The company was founded on June 24, 1952 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

DAIWA INDUSTRIES LTD. engages in the manufacture and sale of commercial-use freezers, refrigerators, showcases, and ice machines. It also purchases, sells, and repairs refrigeration equipment and power generation systems for kitchen stores. The company was founded by Shigeru Ozaki on February 1, 1958 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Daiwabo Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the business of textile products and machine tools. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: IT Infrastructure Distribution Business, Fiber Business, Machine Tools & Automatic Packing Machine Business and Others. The IT (Information Technology) Infrastructure Distribution Business segment provides the sale of computer appliances and peripheral devices etc. The Fiber Business segment provides the manufacture and sale of synthetic fibers, nonwovens, industrial materials, spun yarn, fabrics, knitting and related products. The Machine Tools & Automatic Packing Machine Business segment provides the manufacture and sale of machine parts for production equipment and casting parts. The Others segment includes hotel management, golf course operation, real-estate, insurance agency and engineering businesses. The company was founded on April 1, 1941 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Dalian Huarui Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of new energy equipment. Its products include metallurgical machinery, port machinery, hoisting machinery, bulk material handling machinery, coke oven machinery, wind power core component, high-end casting, marine crankshaft, tunnel boring machinery, and crane for nuclear power station. The company was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of plastic modeling machineries. Its products include polyethylene, polypropylene, and polyvinyl chloride double side wave pipe auto-production line, CNC single and precision molds, and other types of double side wave pipe products. The company was founded on August 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

Dalian Zeus Entertainment Co., Ltd. is a network gaming company. It operates its businesses through four segments: Game Products, Mobile Platform, Mobile Internet Platform and Film & Television Entertainment. The Mobile Platform segment is engaged in the development and distribution of web games and mobile games. The Mobile Platform segment provides Aisi Helper tool through the company's subsidiary. The Mobile Internet Platform segment operates its business through its subsidiary, Avazu Inc. The Film & Television Entertainment segment is engaged in the investment business. The company was founded on August 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the automation equipment business. It operates through the following product divisions: Automatic Test Equipment, Automatic Assembly Equipment, Material Handling Equipment, and Others. The Automatic Test Equipment division manufactures automated apparatuses that perform measurements and evaluations on an electronic device. The Automatic Assembly Equipment division provides automated machines and systems for the production of goods. The Material Handling Equipment division offers mechanical equipment involved in the movement, storage, control, and protection of materials and goods. The Others division supplies cleaning and filtration equipment, and cutting-processing equipment. The company was founded on November 29, 1992 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

DAMAC Properties Dubai Co. PJSC engages in the development of residential, leisure, and commercial properties in Dubai and Middle East. The company was founded by Hussain Ali Habib Sajwani on June 20, 1976 and is headquartered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Damsan JSC engages in the manufacture and supply of woven fabrics and yarn products. It is also involved in the production and export of raw cotton and napkins. Its other activities include the following: wholesale of readymade garments, textile machinery, equipment, and spare parts; building construction; and real estate business. The company was founded on June 12, 2006 and is headquartered in Thai Binh, Vietnam.

Dayou Automotive Seat Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of car seats. It operates through the Seat and Rental business divisions. The company was founded on January 16, 1960 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea.

DCM Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of laminated steel sheet products. It operates through the following divisions: Steel, Deco and Synthetic Resins. The Steel division manufactures laminated color steel sheets and industrial films. The Deco division manufactures petroleum, high gloss, and metallic films. The Synthetic Resins division manufactures agricultural films and master batch. The company was founded on March 4, 1972 and is headquartered in Yangsan-si, South Korea.

DCM Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management and operations of its group companies that are involved in home center business. It operates through the following geographical segments: DCM Kahma, DCM Daiki, DCM Homac, and Others. The DCM Kahma operates business in Chubu and Hokuriku area. The DCM Daiki operates business in Shikoku, Kinki and Chugoku. The DCM Homac operates business in Hokkaido, Tohoku and Kanto. The Other segments include trading with DCM Holdings, DCM Sanwa and DCM Kuroganeya. Its products include daily necessities, interior goods, pet supplies, gardening materials, leisure products, stationery, do-it-yourself goods, and shop tools. The company was founded on September 1, 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DD Holdings Co. Ltd. engages in the restaurant business. It operates through the Restaurant and Amusement segments. The Restaurant segment manages restaurant chains. The Amusement segment operates billiard, darts, karaoke, and golf simulation amusement centers. The company was founded in March 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Delek Group Ltd. engages in the oil and gas exploration and production in Israel and abroad through investee companies and partnerships, and in marketing of fuel products in Israel. It operates through the Energy segments and Fuel Products segment. The Energy segment consists of development, production, and sale of natural gas and exploration of oil and natural gas in the existing oil assets of the partnerships in the Mediterranean waters, and placement of new investments in international markets with the intention of becoming an international energy company. The Fuel Products segment consists of sale of fuel, operation of gas stations and convenience stores in fueling station complexes, and provision of fuel storage and supply services in Israel. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.

Delica Foods Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the investment holdings of production and sale of whole and cut vegetables for households and restaurants. It operates through the following segments: Fruits and vegetables, Logistics, Research development and analysis, and Holding Company. The fruits and vegetable segment sells vegetables and cuts vegetables for the food service industry and the catering industry. The logistics segment operates individual route delivery by small chilled cars to the foodservice industry and food service industry. The research development and analysis segment research the functionality to work on evaluating fruits and vegetables with contents. The company was founded on October 6, 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DENSO Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive component and systems, industrial products and home appliances. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Automotive, Consumer Products, Industrial Products and New Business Fields. The Automotive division delivers a wide variety of automotive products and technologies that minimize environmental impact and traffic accidents while also increasing comfort and convenience. The Consumer Products division helps to make smart homes a reality with product and technology offerings from charging stations to hot water supply systems. The Industrial Products division engages in the development and manufacture of factory automation products (industrial robots, programmable logic controllers,) automatic identification products (bar-code readers, QR (Quick Response)code readers and IC (Integrated Circuit) card-related products). The New Business Fields division engages in the business of solving problems and benefiting society beyond the automotive industry. The company was founded on December 16, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Depo Auto Parts Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the transport equipment manufacturing, processing, and trade. It focuses on automotive parts stamping, plastic injection, and surface processing, It also in mold manufacturing, processing, and trade. It offers automotive lights and parts. The company was founded on April 25, 1980 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.

Deutsch Motors, Inc. engages in the authorized sales of BMW automobiles. Its products include automobiles such as BMW 1 series, 2 series, 3 series, 4 series, 5 series, 6 series, 7 series, X series, Z4, Gran Turismo, M series and BMW i. The company was founded on August 17, 1997 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

DIGITAL HEARTS HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. is a holding company that engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It operates through the Entertainment and Enterprise segments. The Entertainment segment provides console games, mobile games, debugging services, outsourced development of games, and support for promotional activities. The Enterprise segment offers testing for enterprise systems, outsourced development services, and information technology support including help desk and security. The company was founded in April 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DISCO Corp. engages in the manufacturing and sale of precision cutting, grinding and polishing machines. It operates through the following business divisions: Precision Machines, Precision Processing Tools, and Other Products. The Precision Machines division includes dicing saws, laser saws, grinders, polishers, wafer mounter, die separator, surface planer, and water jet saws. The Precision Processing Tools offers dicing blades, grinding wheels, and dry polishing wheels. The Other Products handles accessory equipment and its related products. It also includes maintenance services, training services for operation, disassembly, recycling, lease, and contract processing of precision parts. The company was founded on May 5, 1937 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DK-Lok Corp. engages in the manufacture and supply of instrumental fittings and valves. It operates through the following business areas: Offshore and Onshore, Automotive and Hydrogen Fuel Cell, Shipbuilding and Marine Engine, and Chemical, Petrochemical and Refinery. The company was founded by Noh Eun-Sik in January 1986 and is headquartered in Gimhae-si, South Korea.

Dongil Technology Ltd. engages in the production of electro magnetic interference (EMI) filters. It operates through the Electronic Components and Industrial Electronic Components business divisions. Its products include EMI filters, cluster ion generator, medical equipment, and others. The company was founded on March 10, 1986 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.

Dong-A Socio Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures pharmaceutical preparations and products. It operates through the following divisions: Holding Company, Pharmaceuticals, Logistics, Packaging and Others. The Pharmaceuticals division manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products such as prescription medicine and over-the-counter drug. The Logistics division offers cargo, courier, forwarding vehicle transportation arrangement, transport and lease of warehousing. The Packaging division manufactures and sells glass and glass products. The Others division is engaged in the business of information technology solution, production and sale of agricultural products, and real estate development. The company was founded on August 9, 1949 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Dong Feng Electronic & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, procurement, manufacture and sales of automotive electric fuel injection, anti-lock braking, global positioning system car navigation and electronic anti-theft system components. Its products include automotive electric drive, trim, brake and automotive electronics systems; and metal casting products. The company was founded in April 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Dongguan Eontec Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and manufacture of light alloy, liquid metal, and bio-degradable magnesium materials. Its products include amorphous alloy; parts for mobile phone accessories, cameras and light emitting diode accessories, notebook parts and auto structural parts. The company was founded by Yang De Li on May 27, 1993 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

Dongsung Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. The company through its subsidiaries operates in the following business areas: polyurethane (PU) resins and other chemical products, petrochemical products, medical supplies, real estate leasing,  PU insulation products and gas business. The company was founded on May 14, 2008 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.

DongYang Piston Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures automobile parts. Its products include pistons for automobile, commercial vehicle, industrial vehicle, motorcycle, military vehicles, ship engines, and agricultural equipment. The company was founded on July 1, 1977 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

Doosan Bobcat, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of compact excavators. Its products include compact & heavy construction and portable power machines. The company was founded on April 25, 2014 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Doosan Infracore Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction equipment and engines. It operates through the following business divisions: Engine, Construction Equipment, and Machine Tool. The Engine business division provides land transportation engine and engine parts. The Construction Equipment business division offers excavator, excavator parts, and portable power. The Machine Tool business division involves in the provision of industrial machine tool and automation machine. The company was founded in June 1937 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

Doutor Nichires Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management, planning, and operation of its group company, which deals with the processing, roasting, and selling of coffee beans. It operates through the following segments: Nippon Restaurant System Group, Doutor Coffee Group, and Others. The Nippon Restaurant System Group segment handles the operation of a restaurant chain. It also manages its manufacturing and sale activities. The Doutor Coffee Group operates a coffee store franchise chain. It also engages in purchasing coffee beans, roasting processes, and sales. The Others segment includes retail and wholesale businesses related to domestic and overseas restaurants. The company was founded on October 1, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

OncoQuest Pharmaceuticals, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive carpets. It operates through Fabric business division, Seat business division, and Airbag business division. The company was founded on August 25, 1993 and is headquartered in Miryang-si, South Korea.

Duckyang Ind. Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of parts and accessories for motor engines. Its products include cocktail modules, crash pads and anti-vibration pads. The company was founded on July 11, 1977 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

DuoLun Technology Corp. Ltd. engages in the provision of intelligent training and examination systems for motorists. Its products include smart driving test, smart transportation, and smart driving training systems. The company was founded by An Qiang Zhang on December 25, 1995 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Dutech Holdings Ltd. engages in designing and manufacturing of security products. It operates through the High Security and Business Solutions segment. The High Security segment designs and manufactures automated teller machine safes, fire-resistant commercial safes, safes for storage of weapons, and other security products. The Business Solutions segment provides business solutions by designing, engineering, manufacturing, and assembling electro-mechanical equipment and modules, precision engineering parts, semi-conductor instruments, and other products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

DyDo Group Holdings, Inc. engages in the production and sale of beverages. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Beverage Business, International Beverage Business, Pharmaceutical-related Business, Food Business and Other business. The Domestic Beverage Business segment purchases and sells sports drinks and beverage products in Japan. The International Beverage Business segment deals with the sale of beverage products overseas through the companies' subsidiaries. The Pharmaceutical-related Business segment handles manufacturing for medicinal drinks. The Food Business segment manufactures and sells fruit jelly. The Other segment includes pharmaceutical for rare disease treatment business. The company was founded by Tomio Takamatsu on January 27, 1975 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Dynac Holdings Corp. engages in the restaurant business. It operates through the Directly Operated Restaurant and Contract Management divisions. The Directly Operated Restaurant division manages bars and restaurants; and provides party and catering services. The Contract Management division operates golf club restaurants, expressway food courts and shopping zones, and leisure facilities. The company was founded on March 11, 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

East Asia Holdings Investment Ltd. is an investment holding company and operates through its subsidiaries. The company engages in the manufacture and sale of casual shoes, sports footwear, and sports apparel. The company was founded on July 22, 2009 and is headquartered in Hong Kong.

Ebara Jitsugyo Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of environment related products and medical care machinery. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: Environmental, Water Processing, and Pneumatic and Hydraulic Machinery and Air Conditioning Equipment. The Environmental segment covers ozone concentration meter, deodorization equipment, disease control products, waste treatment and water processing plants, aquaculture facilities, and cushioning materials. The Water Processing segment deals with the planning, design, construction, and sale of water supply and sewerage treatment facilities, industrial waste water treatment facilities, and other seascape facilities. The Pneumatic and Hydraulic Machinery and Air Conditioning Equipment segment includes pumps, blowers, compressors, refrigerating equipment, boilers, and other industrial machinery. The company was founded on November 26, 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
ECOCAB Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of automotive cables, wiring harness, protection, and bulb sockets. The company was founded on August 16, 2007 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

Eiken Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and development of filter elements for internal combustion engines of automobiles, construction machinery, and agricultural machinery. It operates through the following segments: Filters, Combustion Equipment, and Others. The Filters segment manufactures and sells automobile filters and packaging materials. The Combustion Equipment segment produces gas equipment. The Others segment includes business activities not stated above. The company was founded on August 1, 1967 and is headquartered in Omaezaki, Japan.

Elco Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, with interests in the construction, infrastructure, electric consumer products, real estate, and gas industries. It operates through following segments: Electra, Electra Consumer Products, Electra Real Estate, and SuperGas Energy. The Electra segment engages in the provision of services for buildings and infrastructure in Israel and abroad, including installation of centralized air conditioning systems, elevators, security solutions, electric connections, and management and maintenance of assets. The Electra Consumer Products segment engages in the import, manufacture, export, marketing, sale, and distribution of electric consumer products, and in the operation of retail stores for the sale of electric consumer products. The Electra Real Estate segment engages in the acquisition, management, and improvement of housing clusters for rent in the United States. The SuperGas Energy segment engages in the marketing, sale, and distribution of liquefied petroleum gas, and in the marketing and sale of natural gas, electricity, and thermal energy. The company was founded by Alexander Salkind in 1949 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Elec & Eltek International Co. Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in manufacture of double-sided, multi-layer, and high density interconnect printed circuit boards through its subsidiaries. The firm offers its products to the communication and networking, automotive industries, computer and computer peripherals, and consumer electronics sectors. It operates through the Fabrication and Distribution of PCB, and Property Investment segments. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Hong Kong.

Emerging Towns & Cities Singapore Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the development of residential and commercial properties. It operates through the following segments: Property Development, Property Investment, and Corporate. The Property Development segment relates to the development of properties for sale. The Property Investment segment involves in the business of investing in properties to earn rentals and for capital appreciation. The Corporate segment comprises corporate office which incurs general corporate expenses and inactive entities in the group. The company was founded on October 17, 1980 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Enviro-Hub Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the provision of environmental management solutions. It operates through the following segments: Property Investments & Management; Trading, Recycling & Refining of Metals; Piling Contracts, Construction, Rental, & Servicing of Machinery; and Others. The Property Investments & Management segment invests in properties for rental income and capital appreciation. The Trading, Recycling & Refining of Metals segment includes trading, recycling and refining of e-waste and metals, comprising the recycling, extraction and refining of platinum group metals and copper. The Piling Contracts, Construction, Rental, & Servicing of Machinery segment engages in the provision of piling, building and construction related engineering and technical services as well as rental and servicing of machinery. The Others segment includes plastics to fuel refining which involve in conversion of waste plastic to usable liquid hydrocarbon fuel oil. The company was founded on June 3, 1998 and is headquartered in Singapore.

EPS Holdings, Inc. engages in the drug development business. It operates through the following segments: Contract Research Organization (CRO), Site Management Organization (SMO), Contract Sales Organization (CSO), Global Research, Ekishin, and Others. The CRO segment offers clinical trials, data management, and statistical analysis. The SMO segment enters into contracts with medical institutions to conduct clinical trials. The CSO segment provides drug information and awareness for medical and pharmaceutical industries. The Global Research segment provides consignment services through its subsidiary for multilateral clinical trials in Asia-Pacific. The Ekishin segment focuses on medical equipment, pharmaceutical and investment related businesses through its Japan and China based subsidiaries. The Others segment provides various services related to management of clinical research from business processing outsource business related to medicine and medical care. The company was founded on May 30, 1991 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Equital Ltd. operates as an holding company. It engages in the provision of real estate management & rental and oil and gas exploration & extraction services. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel.

ES Group (Holdings) Ltd. engages in the provision of management and technical services. It operates through the New Building and Repair, and Shipping business segments. The New Building and Repair segment comprises of the new building, conversion and repair of offshore, and marine structures and vessels, and labor supply. The Shipping segment represents ship chartering, marine supplies, and related activities. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Estic Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of electric power tools, industrial robots, and automatic assembly lines. Its products include servo and handheld nutrunners, servo press, and automatic machines. The company was founded on August 25, 1993 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Estun Automation Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of intelligent equipment and its key components. It operates through the Automation Core Component and Industrial Robot and Factory Automations System businesses. The Automation Core Component business deals with controlling machineries such as metal forming Computer Numerical Control (CNC) machines, wood processing, textile machines, packaging machines, consumer electronics manufacturing equipment, photovoltaic equipment, and control equipment on ships, vehicles, and radars. The Industrial Robot and Factory Automation System business includes industrial robots which are used for welding, CNC loading and unloading, pick and place, palletizing, bending, assembly, sorting, spraying, polishing, and granding. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
Eurocrane (China) Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes cranes, hoists and industrial lifting equipment. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Wujiang, China.

EUSU HOLDINGS CO., LTD. operates through its subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries operations include marine transportation and information technology businesses. The company was founded on December 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

EVERDIGM Corp. engages in the development and production of construction equipment. It operates through the following business divisions: Construction Equipment, Automobile, Drill, and Heavy Equipment. The Construction Equipment business division includes concrete pump, attachments, tower crane, and power plant. The Automobile business division offers concrete pump car and fire truck. The Drill business division provides rock and soil drilling services, and produces ground excavation equipment. The Heavy Equipment business division comprises of excavator and wheel loader. The company was founded on July 1, 1994 and is headquartered in Jincheon-gun, South Korea.

Excelpoint Technology Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the trading of electronics equipment, sale and distribution of electronic components and dealers of all types of electronic and electrical components and accessories. It operates through the following business segments: Hong Kong Business Unit, Singapore Business Unit, and Corporate Unit. The Hong Kong Business Unit segment covers the business entities located in Hong Kong, and the People’s Republic of China. The Singapore Business Unit segment focuses on entities located in Southeast Asia and India. The Corporate Unit segment comprises of the corporate services, treasury functions, investment securities, and other dormant companies. The company was founded by Yong Hen Phuay in 1987 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Excelsior Medical Co. Ltd. is primarily engaged in the distribution of medical equipment. Its products include Hemodialysis related medical supplies, surgical equipment and supplies, blood bags, stoma, and health appliances and skin care products. The company other activities include hospital management, medical engineering maintenance, procurement of medical supply and management of medical information. Excelsior Medical was founded by Fu Hui Tung on March 15, 1988 and is headquartered at Taipei, Taiwan.

Ezdan Holding Group engages in the management and rentals of real estate properties. It operates through the following segments: Residential and Commercial Properties, Investments, Hotel and Suites, and Malls.The Residential and Commercial Properties segment includes developing, owning, and renting of real estate properties. The Investments segment focuses on investing activities in shares and Sukuk. The Hotel and Suites segment manages hotels, suites, and restaurants. The Malls segment deals with the management of shopping malls. The company was founded by Thani bin Abdullah Al-Thani in 1960 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

F.C.C. Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of clutches for automobiles, motorcycles, general-purpose machinery and others. It operates through the following segments: Motorcycle Clutches and Automobile Clutches. The Motorcycle Clutches segment manufactures and markets motorcycles, scooters, all-terrain vehicles (ATVs) and components. The Automobile Clutches segment includes the production and sale of clutches for automatic and manual transmission automobiles. The company was founded on June 15, 1939 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

FALCO HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of clinical testing and dispensing pharmacy services. It operates through the Clinical Testing and Dispensing Pharmacy segments. The Clinical Testing segment offers genetic testing, clinical research and trials, medical information technology, food hygiene, and environmental inspection services. It also develops and sells clinical information systems. The Dispensing Pharmacy segment deals with prescription drugs. The company was founded on July 1, 1962 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

FamilyMart Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which engages in convenience store business, general retail business and related businesses. The company was founded on September 1, 1981 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

FANUC Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, sale, and maintenance of computer numerical control (CNC) systems, lasers, robot systems, robomachines, roboshot, robocut and nano robots. It operates through the following divisions: Factory Automation (FA), Robot, and Robomachine. The FA division manufactures CNC systems, CNC servo motors, and lasers. The Robot division markets industrial robots through its subsidiaries. The Robomachine division manufactures robodrill (compact machining centre), roboshot (electric injection molding machine), robocut (wire cut electric discharge machine) and roconsists (ultra precision machine). The company was founded by Seiuemon Inaba in1958 and is headquartered in Minamitsuru, Japan.

Far East Hospitality Trust is a real estate investment trust, which engages in the business of investing in real estate. It operates through the following two segments: Hotels & Serviced Residences, and Retail Units, Offices, & Others. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Favite, Inc. engages in the manufacturing and sale of thin-film transistor liquid crystal display testing machines. Its products include automatic optical inspection machines, radio frequency identification (RFID) tags, RFID readers, RFID reader antennas, RFID reader modules, flat panel displays, solar cells, printed circuit boards, semiconductors, light-emitting diode modules, and metal halide lamps. The company was founded on March 10, 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

Fawer Automotive Parts Ltd. Co. engages in the manufacture, design, research, development, and sale of automotive parts. Its business activities include manufacture and process of equipment; leasing business; provision of property service; and warehouse and distribution operations. Its products are categorized into the following divisions: Environment Control System, Steering and Transmission System, Engine Accessory System, Chassis Accessory System, Suspension and Running System, Brake System, and Others. The company was founded on September 1, 1993 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Federal International (2000) Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and trade of flowline control products and services and oil and gas equipment. It operates through the following segments: Trading, Manufacturing/Design/Research and Development, Marine Logistics, Energy and Utilities, Resources, and Corporate and Others. The Trading segment supplies assembly and distribution of flowline control products. The Manufacturing/Design/Research and Development segment offers the research, development, design and manufacture of flowline control products and high pressure and temperature valves and related oilfield products. The Marine segment charters vessels to the offshore oil and gas and other related industries. The Energy and Utilities segment provides procurement and construction projects; and electricity, steam, condensate, liquefied natural gas and compressed natural gas. The Resources segment sells and mines coal and other natural resources. The Corporate and Others segment includes group-level corporate services and treasury functions. The company was founded by Kian Kiong Koh in 1974 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Feilong Auto Components Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile water pumps; intake and exhaust manifolds; and flywheel and turbine housing which are used in construction, agriculture, marine and generating set. Its water pump business is divided into five major series: heavy duty, medium duty, light, sedan and mini type. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Nanyang, China.

Fenwal Controls of Japan Ltd. engages in the development, sale, design, construction, and maintenance of thermal control systems. It operates through the following segments: Safety Security Protection (SSP), Thermal, Medical, and Printed Wiring Board Assembly (PWBA). The SSP segment provides residential fire alarm, fire extinguishing system, explosion suppressor, smoke detection system, sprinkler, and maintenance inspection services. The Thermal segment offers hot plate for semiconductor manufacturing equipment, temperature sensors, controllers, and thermo-switches. The Medical segment deals with the design and manufacture of kidney dialysis machinery and medical equipment. The PWBA segment handles the design and assembly of printed circuit boards. The company was founded on May 24, 1961 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

FHT holdings Corp. engages in the provision of information technology (IT), environmental and IT communication services. It operates through the following business segments: IT-Related, Environmental, Renewable Energy, and Healthcare. The IT-Related segment offers solutions and support on Linux products and web system construction. The Environmental segment deals with building maintenance, purchase and sale of light emitting diode products, and renovation support. The Renewable Energy segment develops and operates geothermal power plants and solar power plants. It also provides general consultancy on renewable energy. The Healthcare segment manages pharmacy, develops and sells supplements, and research and development of gene therapy. The company was founded on July 13, 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DAESUNG FINE TEC Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture components from fine blanking mold for automobiles. It operates through the following divisions: Fine Blanking and Renewable energy division. Its products include break part, seat recliner parts, door locks, safety belt parts and power-ski engine parts. The company was founded in July 1980 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

FIYTA Precision Technology Co. Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and retail for its self-own watch brands. It provides services on retail business for the world famour Swiss-made watches. It establishes its wholly-owned subsidiary Harmony World Watch Center chain store. The company was founded on December 25, 1992 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

FLC Group JSC engages in the provision of real estate development services. Its activities include the following: real estate investment and construction; real estate consulting, advertising, and management services; architectural, technical consultancy, project and construction management; trading of construction materials; and hotel, resorts and golf source operations. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.

Flex Ltd. engages in provision of real-time supply chain insight and logistics services to companies. It operates through the following segments: Communications and Enterprise Compute (CEC), Consumer Technologies Group (CTG), Industrial and Emerging Industries (IEI), High Reliability Solutions (HRS), and Corporate and Others. The Communications and Enterprise Compute segment includes telecom business of radio access base stations, remote radio heads, and small cells for wireless infrastructure; networking business; server and storage platforms for both enterprise and cloud-based deployments; next generation storage and security appliance products; and rack level solutions, converged infrastructure, and software-defined product solutions. The Consumer Technologies Group segment offers consumer-related businesses in Internet of Things enabled devices, audio, and consumer power electronics, mobile devices; and supply chain solutions for consumer, computing, and printing devices. The Industrial and Emerging Industries segment comprises of metering infrastructure, energy storage, smart lighting, smart solar energy; and industrial, including semiconductor and capital equipment, office solutions, household industrial, and lifestyle, industrial automation and kiosks. The High Reliability Solutions segment relates to health solutions business and automotive business. The company was founded in May 1990 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Fine Em Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of liquid crystal flat display boards. It offers case top, cover bottom, lamp housing, and cover shield. The company was founded in March 2004 and is headquartered in Anyang, South Korea.

Food Empire Holdings Ltd. operates as a branding and manufacturing company, which specializes in the food and beverage industry. The firm operates through the following geographical segments: Russia; Ukraine, Kazakhstan & CIS markets; South-East Asia; South Asia; and Other. Its brands include instant beverages, coffee capsules, frozen finger food, snack food, confectionery, and private label manufacturing. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Suntec Real Estate Investment Trust engages in the ownership of income-producing real estate, which is primarily used for retail and office purposes. The firm operates through the following business segments: Office, Retail and Convention. The Office segment comprises of Suntec city, park mall, and pacific highway. Its portfolio comprises office and retail properties in Singapore and Australia. The company was founded on November 1, 2004 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Foryou Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of electronics equipment and components. Its business segment covers automotive electronics equipment, precision electronic components, precision die casting, and light-emitting diode (LED) lighting. The automotive electronics products include smart phone link, car compact disc (CD) and digital video disk (DVD) player and navigator, car audio system, motorized screen, car wireless charger, car air purifier, and dashboard. The precision electronic components include DVD mechanism and projector. The precision die casting products include automotive key components, precision 3C components, and precision laser head unit. The LED lighting products include LED package, LED power supply, and LED lighting. The company was founded on January 16, 1993 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of intelligent machines and systems. It operates through the following business segments: Automated production equipment and Lithium battery and silicone materials. Its products include automated production lines, lithium battery equipment, silicone equipment, and silicone rubber products. It also provides installation services. The company was founded by Qi Fa Zhang and Ke Liang on January 29, 2002 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

FPT Corp. is engaged in the provision of information, technology, and telecommunications products and services. It operates through the Technology and Telecommunications, and Investment and Education business segments. The Information Technology and Telecommunications segment is divided into the following sub segments: telecommunications, digital content, software development, system integration, informatics services and education. The Investment segment involves the management of investments in associates in the finance field and real estate projects. The company was founded by Binh Gia Truong, Tien Quang Le, Ngoc Quang Bui, Bao Cao Do, Nam Thanh Nguyen, and Thanh Thanh Thi Truong on September 13, 1988 and is headquartered in Ha Noi, Vietnam.

FRANCE BED HOLDINGS CO., LTD. oversees the operation and business activities of its group companies.
