It operates through the following segments: Medical Services, Home Furnishing and Health, and Other. The Medical Services segment supplies nursing beds, welfare equipment, and linens to hospitals and hotels. The Home Furnishing and Health segment manufactures, purchases, and wholesales beds, furniture, bedroom furnishing, and health-related equipment. The Other segment handles marketing of interior goods, fashion, jewelry, and special need equipment through door-to-door sales, exhibition sales, and retail stores. It also includes real estate leasing. The company was founded on March 30, 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fraser & Neave Ltd. engages in the production and sale of beverage and dairy products. The firm involves in printing and publishing industries along with the development and investment in properties. It operates its business through the following segments: Beverages, Dairies, Printing & Publishing, and Others. The company was founded by John Fraser and David Chalmers Neave in 1883 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Frasers Property Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in the development of residential, commercial, hospitality, and industrial properties. It operates through the following strategic business units (SBU): Singapore SBU, Australia SBU, Hospitality SBU and Europe and Rest of Asia. The Singapore SBU encompasses the development, ownership, management and operation of residential, retail and commercial properties. The Australia SBU refers to the development, ownership, management and operation of residential, commercial and industrial properties. The Hospitality SBU includes the Group's hospitality operations and the ownership/management and operation of hotels and serviced apartments. The Europe and Rest of Asia SBU comprises development activities and/or ownership and management of investment properties in China, the United Kingdom and continental Europe, Vietnam and Thailand. The company was founded on December 14, 1963 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Frencken Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of global technology capital equipment, automotive, and consumer product solutions. It operates through the following segments: Mechatronics, and Integrated Manufacturing Services (IMS), Investment Holding and Management Services, and Other. The Mechatronics segment focuses in the design and manufacture of complex electro-mechanical assemblies and automation systems for original equipment manufacturers. The IMS segment deals with one-stop integrated solution to manufacture plastic components PCBAs for assembly into modules and finished products. The Other segment includes investment property holding. The company was founded by Hock Peng Low and Soon Hock Gooi on August 27, 1999 and is headquartered in Prai, Malaysia.

Freund Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of granulation and coating equipment for pharmaceutical, food, and chemical industries. It operates through the following segments: Machinery and Chemical Products. The Machinery segment includes granule machinery and equipment, fine grinding consignment of synthetic resin, and plant construction of powder machines. The Chemical Products segment engages in the research and development of pharmaceutical additives, dietary supplements, and food preservatives. The company was founded by Yasutoyo Fusejima on April 22, 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

FSPG Hi-tech Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of advanced polymer functional film. It provides logistics services and operating real estate business. The firm focuses on packaging, electric and optical, construction, personal healthcare and clothing, and advertisement and labelling materials. Its products include biaxially-oriented polyamide film (BOPF), biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) drinking straw package, BOPP cigarette package, laminated aluminum packaging film, BOPP capacitor film, polarize film, woven fabric, cross-linked polyethylene (PEX) pipe, intelligent glass window film, adhesive tape, easytex, polythene casting embossed film, and polyvinyl chloride film for graphic use. The company was founded on June 28, 1988 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Fuan Pharmaceutical (Group) Co., Ltd. is engaged in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of active pharmaceuticals and formulation. Its products include penicillin and cephalosporins. The company was founded on February 25, 2004 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

Fuji Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of machine tools and assembly machines for electronic components. It operates through the following segments: Robot Solutions, Machine Tools, and Others. The Robot Solutions segment produces electronic parts auto mounting machines. The Machine Tools segment manufactures automatic lathe machines and specialized machines. The Others segment covers the manufacture of control devices, and accepts commissioned electronic substrate manufacturing, and software development. The company was founded on April 7, 1959 and is headquartered in Chiryu, Japan.

FUJI DIE Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cemented (tungsten) carbide tools. Its products include dice, plug, forging mold, cold roll, knife, high pressure equipment tool, hot extrusion die, and seal ring. The company was founded by Takayoshi Shinjo on June 6, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fuji Media Holdings, Inc. engages in the operation of television broadcasting services. It operates through the following segments: Broadcasting, Production, Video and Music, Life Information, Advertising, Urban Development, and Others. The Broadcasting segment deals with television and radio broadcasting business. The Production segment involves planning, production, engineering, relay operations, and other businesses for television programming. It is also involved in the movie, live event, and content licensing businesses. The Video and Music segment produces and sells audio and video software, both in Japan and overseas. It also operates a music copyright business. The Life Information segment offers direct marketing and publication of newspaper. It also provides lifestyle-related information for local community newspapers. The Advertising segment manages advertising agencies, produces various live events, and provides other services in the media communications business. The Urban Development segment creates and furnishes urban living spaces, including building leasing and management, housing, and other real estate developments; and operates commercial facilities and restaurants. The Others segment includes publishing, temporary staffing, property leasing, and software development businesses. The company was founded in June 1957 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fuji Oil Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of group strategy and business operations of its group companies.  It operates through the following segments: Oils and Fats Processing, Confectionery and Baking Ingredients, and Soy Protein. The Oils and Fats Processing segment includes hard butters for chocolate, confectionery oils and fats, frying and spraying oils, fats for frozen confectionery, emulsified oils and fats, powdered oils and fats, and lubricating and releasing oils. The Confectionery and Baking Ingredients segment includes the development, marketing, and sale of chocolate, cream products, and margarine. The Soy Protein segment offers soy protein ingredients particularly soy protein isolate, textured soy protein, soy milk, soluble soy polysaccharide, soy peptide, and soy ingredients. It also includes soy food products such as frozen tofu, deep-fried tofu, ganmo or soy protein food products, kinchaku or shinoda products, and tofu burgers. The company was founded in October 1950 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

FUJI OOZX Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of engine valve and other engine related components. It operates through the following business divisions: Products, Products-Machine, Technology, and Others. The Products business division manufactures and sells engine valve and molds through its subsidiaries. The Products-Machine business division sells machinery, equipment, and tools through its subsidiaries. The Technology business division provides technology services. The Others business division handles transportation and packing related products. The company was founded on December 21, 1951 and is headquartered in Kikugawa, Japan.

Fuji Seal International, Inc. is a holding company which engages in the planning, development, manufacture, and sale of packaging systems. It operates through the following geographical segments: Japan, Americas, Europe, PAGO, and ASEAN. Its products includes shrink and tack labels, soft and spouted pouches, carton and packaging equipment, and heat-activated labelers. The company was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fujian Funeng Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of electricity and textile. It operates through the following business segments: Electricity, Textile, and Headquarters and others. Its products include electricity, heat, and textile products. The company was founded in May 1970 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

Fujian Longking Co., Ltd engages in the manufacture, sale, and installation of environment contamination prevention equipment. Its products include flue gas desulfurization devices; pneumatic conveying system; electrostatic-fabric integrated precipitator; IPC system for ESP; micro-processor control high voltage silicon rectifier transformer; micro-processor control LV control equipment; electronic energy conservation lamp and equipment parts; machinery equipment; meter apparatus and spare parts; high voltage silicon rectifier equipment; low voltage set equipment; hydroelectric irrigation; station-used high and low voltage control equipment; electric appliances; high voltage silicon piles; high voltage insulator and conservation fluorescent lamp. It is also involved in real estate development; house interior decoration and repair; investment on water and electricity; and water conservation or irrigation works industry. The company was founded on February 23, 1998 and is headquartered in Longyan, China.

FUJIFILM Holdings, Inc. engages in the development, production, sales and service of imaging, information, and document solutions. It operates through the following segments: Imaging Solutions, Information Solutions, and Document Solutions. The Imaging Solutions segment handles color films, digital cameras, optical devices, color paper, services and equipment for photofinishing, instant photo systems, etc. The Information Solutions segment deals with the equipment and materials for medical systems, life sciences products, pharmaceuticals, graphic arts, flat panel display materials, recording media and electronic materials, etc. The Document Solutions segment provides office copy machines/MFPs, printers, production systems and services, office services, paper and consumables, etc. The company was founded on January 20, 1934 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fujitsu Frontech Ltd. engages in the provision of front technology products and solutions. It operates through the following segments: Global Product Business, Solution and Service Business, and Other. The Global Product Business segment offers mechatronic and system products which includes mechanical components, applied equipment, ATMs, and banking terminals. The Solution and Service Business segment provides service integration and frontline solutions which includes ATM and financial solutions, industrial solutions, total services for retail stores (LCM services), palm vein authentication, RFID and sensor solutions, settlement solutions, and mobile systems. The Other segment includes employee welfare services. The company was founded by Kiichi Hasegawa on November 9, 1940 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Fukui Computer Holdings, Inc. engages in the development and sale of computer-aided design software for architecture and civil engineering projects. It operates through the following business segments: Architectural Computer-aided Design (CAD) Software, Measurement Civil Engineering CAD and Information Technology (IT) Solutions. The Architectural CAD Software segment is engaged in the development, sale and maintenance of architecture CAD software and others. The Measurement Civil Engineering CAD segment is engaged in the development, sale and maintenance of measurement CAD software and civil engineering CAD software. The Information Technology (IT) Solutions segment offers solution services, including systems development, web applications and hosting services. The company was founded on December 17, 1979 and is headquartered in Fukui, Japan.

Fullcast Holdings Co., Ltd. provides human resource outsourcing services for various industries. It operates through the following segments: Short-Term Operational Support, Sales Support, and Security and Other Business. The Short-Term Operational Support segment provides temporary staffing and human resource dispatching. The Sales Support segment performs sales agency business for communication products centered on call centers and sales agent networks. The Security and Other Business segment deals with security operations for public facilities and general companies. The company was founded by Takehito Hirano on September 14, 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Funai Soken Holdings, Inc. engages in business management consulting that includes guidance, research, and analysis. It operates through the following segments: Management Consulting, Logistics, Direct Recruiting and Others. The Management Consulting segment provides guidance related to corporate management, consulting services such as surveys and diagnostics, management research meetings by member organizations, and seminars. The Logistics segment handles logistic operations including design, construction, and management. The Direct Recruiting segment provides solutions through the recruitment advertisement management service. The Other segment includes information technology (IT) and contact center consulting. The company was founded by Yukio Funai on March 6, 1970 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Fund Creation Group Co., Ltd. engages in the business of asset management services which includes the creation, management, and operation of funds. It operates through the following segments: Asset Management and Investment Banking. The Asset Management segment handles the management and operation of real estate, solar power generation, and securities fund. The Investment Banking segment provides investment services for real estate properties, solar power generation equipment and new businesses. It also provides the financial product intermediation business. The company was founded on May 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Furubayashi Shiko Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of printed papers and wrapping materials. It operates through the Printed Paper Products and Plastic Wrapping Materials business divisions. The Printed Paper Products division includes printed boxes, labels, and tetra packs for commodities such as cosmetics, detergents, body soaps, toothpastes, chocolates, candies, medicine, and perfume. The Plastic Wrapping Materials division manufactures and sells plastic containers and wrappers for desserts, cosmetics, and liquid and gel products. The company was founded by Masao Furubayashi on September 10, 1934 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Furusato Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel frame building materials, piping products, and industrial tools. It operates through the following segments: Equipment and Tools; Machinery and Facility; and Construction and Piping Materials. The Equipment and Tools segment provides industrial tools, housing equipment, metal working tools, and material handling systems for the manufacturing industry. The Machinery and Facility segment offers factory automation and production line equipment. The Construction and Piping Materials segment produces steel frame building supplies, steel fabricators, pipes, valves, and fittings. The company was founded in October 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Futaba Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile and vehicle assembly parts, office equipment parts, jigs and welding machines. Its products include automobile parts, information and environmental equipment parts, assembly lines, and stamping dies. The company was founded in November 1945 and is headquartered in Okazaki, Japan.

Future Innovation Group, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its subsidiaries. Its operations are carried out through the Information and Communications Business and Equipment-related Business segments. The Information and Communications Business segment develops and sells mobile management systems, and provides maintenance of related applications. The Equipment-related Business segment deals with the manufacture and sale of semiconductor and automobile- related manufacturing equipment and molds, unmanned aircrafts, and robot control systems. The company was founded on July 2, 2018 and is headquartered in Oita, Japan.

Fuxin Dare Automotive Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and design of the auto parts. It offers power steering pumps, hydraulic steering pump, gear pumps, automatic transmission oil pumps, electric oil pump, electric power steering motors, electro-hydraulic power steering pumps, brushless DC motor controllers, tire pressure monitoring system, vacuum pump, electric vacuum pump, passive entry passive start (PEPS), thermal insulation, noise reduction & lightweight products. The company products widely used in steering, transmission, braking, automotive electronics, car body and other systems. The company was founded on November 12, 2004 and is headquartered in Fuxin, China.

G-7 Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies that are involved in store franchising business. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Autobacs/Automotive Related Business, Business Supermarket and Kodawari Food Products Business, and Others. The Autobacs/Automotive Related Business segment handles the sales of parts and other related product for two wheel and four wheel vehicles. The Business Supermarket and Kodawari Food Products Business segment deals with the sale of frozen and processed foods, and wholesale on other selected foods. The Others segment includes re-use, agriculture, and real estate businesses. The company was founded by Mamoru Kinoshita in October 1975 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

Gakken Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the publication and sale of books, magazine, and other related products. It operates through the following business segments: Education Services, Education Contents, Education Solutions, Medical Welfare, and Others. The Education Services segment offers classroom-type education, cram schools, and home tutor dispatching services. The Education Contents segment manufactures and sells various printed works for distribution and bookstores. It also produces and sells digital contents; and plans, develops and sells miscellaneous goods and stationaries. The Education Solutions segment provides educational materials for kindergarten, elementary school, middle school, high school, and university. It also includes employment support services. The Medical Welfare segment deals with serviced residences for the elderly, and establishes and operates childcare facilities. It also publishes specialty books catered for nurses and doctors. The Others segment involves miscellaneous goods, logistic services and group specialty services. The company was founded by Hideto Furuoka in April 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Gallant Venture Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in commercial development and management of industrial parks and resorts. It operates through the following segments: Industrial Parks, Utilities, Resort Operations, Property Development, Automotive, and Corporate. The Industrial Parks segment develops, construct, operates, and maintains industrial properties in Batam Island and Bintan Island together with the supporting infrastructure activities. The Utilities segment comprises activities of provision of electricity and water supply, telecommunications services and waste management, and sewage treatment services to the industrial parks in Batam Island and Bintan Island as well as resorts in Bintan Island. The Resort Operations segment deals in servicing the resort operators in Bintan Resort, including ferry terminal operations, workers accommodation, security, fire-fighting services, and facilities required by resort operators. The Property Development segment involves in the activities of developing industrial and resort properties in Batam Island and Bintan Island. The Automotive segment focuses in vehicle sales distribution, after sales services, vehicle ownership financing, spare part distribution, vehicle assembly, automotive parts manufacturing, and other related supporting services. The company was founded on April 7, 2003 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Gamecard-Joyco Holdings, Inc. engages in the issuance and sale of prepaid game cards. It is also involved in the planning, development, sale, lease, and maintenance of prepaid system equipment for gaming machines through its subsidiaries. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

GCA Corp. provides advisory services in mergers and acquisitions (M&A). It operates through the Advisory and Asset Management segments. The Advisory segment offers advisory in M&A planning, execution, and after-execution; finance and tax due diligence; and enterprise valuation. The Asset Management segment manages independent mezzanine funds. The company was founded by Akihiro Watanabe on April 1, 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

GEM Co., Ltd. engages in the research and industrialization of recycling and recycled products. It focuses on used batteries, waste electrical and electronics, scrapped automobiles, and cobalt-nickel-tungsten rare metal waste. Its products include cobalt and nickel products, wood plastic composites, recycling, and plastic products. The company was founded on December 28, 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Generation Capital Ltd. operates as an investment fund with interest in the fields of transportation, power stations, renewable energy, and natural gas. The company was founded by Erez Balasha and Joseph Singer in 2018 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.

Geo Energy Resources Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management support. It operates through the following segments: Coal Mining, Coal Trading, and Mining Services. The Coal Mining segment sells coal produced from operating own coal mines. The Coal Trading segment purchase and sell coal from third parties. The Mining Services segment comprises mining contracting and project management for mining activities conducted at third party mines. The company was founded by Charles Antonny Melati, Dhamma Surya, and She Thong Huang in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

Geo Holdings Corp. engages in the provision of retail services. It operates through the following business divisions: Media Shop, Reuse Shop, Online Services, and Amusement Center. The Media Shop division operates GEO shop which offers in-home amusement products, digital versatile discs, compact discs, game titles, and books through rental, sale, and resale. The Reuse Shop division operates 2nd STREET and JUMBLE STORE which purchases and sells second-hand goods such as apparel, furniture, household appliance, and other miscellaneous goods. The Online Services division deals with the wholesale of these products online. The Amusement Center division operates amusement facilities. The company was founded by Yuki Endo in June 1986 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

GiG Works, Inc. is a holding company that manages its group companies which engage in the provision of marketing and communication, field support, contact center, and technology services. It operates through the On-Demand Economy and Sharing Economy segments. The On-Demand Economy segment offers support services centered on information technology (IT) business through its subsidiaries. The Sharing Economy segment provides entrepreneur support and co-working space services for small businesses through its subsidiaries. The company was founded on January 20, 1977 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Global Invacom Group Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. The firm engages in the manufacture and supply of satellite and television peripheral equipment. It operates through the following segments: Satellite Communications and Contract Manufacturing. The company was founded on March 25, 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Globe Union Industrial Corp. engages in the manufacturing and sales of plumbing products. Its products include faucets, showerheads, bath accessories, porcelain fixtures, and hardware. It was founded by Ming Ou Yang on October 29, 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

Glory Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of cash handling machines and systems. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Financial Market, Retail and Transportation Market, Amusement and Gaming Market, Overseas Market, and Others. The Financial Market segment offers open teller systems, coin and banknote recyclers for tellers, money changers for bank lobbies, and security storage systems. The Retail and Transportation Market segment produces coin and banknote recyclers for cashiers, sales proceeds deposit machines, multi-functional banknote changers, cash recyclers for gas stations, and coin-operated lockers. The Amusement and Gaming Market segment provides card systems for local pachinko parlours and casinos. The Overseas Market segment markets banknote recyclers, sorters, and deposit modules for overseas financial institutions, cash-in-transit companies, and casinos. The Others segment deals with facial recognition systems and collaborative robot SI business. The company was founded in March 1918 and is headquartered in Himeji, Japan.

GMB KOREA Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of the automotive parts. Its products include engine, auto transmission, chassis, bearing, and green energy parts. The company was founded on February 23, 1979 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

GMO AD Partners Inc. engages in the Internet related advertising business. It operates through the following segments: Agency, and Media and AdTech. The Agency segment deals with the media representative, search engine marketing, and web marketing services. The Media and AdTech segment focuses on ad network development, media development, and application development services. The company was founded on September 8, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

GMO Financial Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies that are in securities and foreign exchange (FX) trading businesses. It operates through the following segments: Securities and FX, Virtual Currency, and Others. The Securities and FX segment provides financial products trading services such as Internet securities trading and FX trading. The Virtual Currency segment offers currency-related trading services such as buying and selling of virtual currency and margin trading. The Others segment includes systems-related business. The company was founded on January 4, 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Golden Energy & Resources Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the exploration, mining, marketing, and trading of thermal coal. It operates through the following segments: Coal Mining, Coal Trading, and Non-Coal Business. The Coal Mining segment involves in the exploration, mining, processing, and marketing of thermal coal from its coal mining concession areas. The Coal Trading segment includes procuring sales orders from customers and sourcing for domestic suppliers. The Non-Coal segment comprises forestry, investment holding company, and provision of management services. The company was founded by Quee Hock Chia on December 2, 1995 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Goldenmax International Technology Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of copper clad laminates and related products used in printed circuit. The company was founded on October 19, 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Greatoo Intelligent Equipment, Inc. engages in the design, research, and manufacturing of radial tire mold. It develops tire molds, curing presses, industrial robots and precision machine tools. The Company was founded on December 30, 2001 and is headquartered in Jieyang, China.

Green Build Technology Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. The firm engages in the enhancement of existing housing estates using green architecture and green technology. It operates through the following segments: Insulation, Underground Utility Tunnel, Project Management, Materials Trading and Others. The Insulation segment constructs and operates external insulation projects. The Underground Utility Tunnel segment produces underground tunnels for utility lines such as electricity, gas supply pipes and water supply pipes and communications lines such as fibre optics, television and telephone cables. The Project Management segment consults service for external insulation project. The Materials Trading segment trades green technology materials. The Others segment focuses in investment holding. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Green Cross Holdings Corp. is a holding company of Green Cross Corp. that engages in the manufacture of pharmaceutical products. It establishes and coordinates business strategies for Green Cross subsidiaries that launch business and investment portfolio management. Its products include prescription drugs such as blood derivatives, cerebrovascular disease treatment, fibrinolytic agent, vaccines, hunter syndrome drug, herbal medicine, and recombinant. It also offers over the counter drugs such as skin disease treatment and topical non-steroidal anti-inflammatories. The company was founded on October 5, 1967 and is headquartered in Yongin-si, South Korea.

GS Global Corp. engages in the export, logistics, import and trade of steel and natural resources. It operates through the Industrial Materials and Import Distribution Business divisions. The Industrial Materials division provides steel, petroleum, and chemical products, cement, coal, machine plants, and other materials import and export. The Import Distribution division offers engine and biomass imports, imported automobiles pre-delivery inspection service, and general logistics services. The company was founded on July 31, 1954 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

GS Holdings Corp. is a holding company that engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It operates by its subsidiaries through the following Businesses: Retail, Trade, Gas and Electricity, Investment, and Other. The company was founded on July 1, 2004 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

GS Yuasa Corp. is a holding company, which engages in the manufacture and supply of batteries, power supply systems, lighting equipment, and other specialty electrical equipment. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Automotive Batteries, Domestic Industrial Batteries and Power Supplies, Overseas Operations, Automotive Lithium-ion Batteries, and Other. The Domestic Automotive Batteries segment produces and sells lead-acid batteries for automotive. The Domestic Industrial Batteries and Power Supplies segment covers rectifiers, lead, alkali, and general batteries, and power supply systems. The Overseas Operations segment manufactures and markets batteries and power supply devices in the international market. The Automotive Lithium-ion Batteries segment handles lithium-ion batteries for vehicles. The Other segment includes environment related equipment, mobile communication batteries, battery related equipment, battery manufacturing equipment, and applications batteries. The company was founded on April 1, 2004 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

GSH Corp. Ltd. engages in the hospitality, property development, and trading. and distribution businesses. It operates through the following segments: Hospitality, Property, and Others. The Hospitality segment involves in the operation of hotels, golf, and marina clubs. The Property segment includes properties and rental income from investment properties. The Others segment consists of non-current assets relate to the carrying amounts of investment properties and property, plant and equipment. The company was founded on September 18, 2001 and is headquartered in Singapore.

GSS Energy Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of precision engineering. It operates through the following segments: Mechanisms Division, Microshafts Division, and Oil Extraction. The Mechanisms Division segment provides advanced production technology to multi-national manufacturers in the field of home and car audio entertainment, communication, computer and office automation industries, and medical industries. The Microshafts Division segment concentrates on the manufacturing of high precision shafts. The Oil Extraction segment represents the operation of drilling and distribution of oil in Indonesia. The Company was founded on October 31, 2014 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Guangbo Group Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of stationery and office supplies. It also provides Internet advertisement marketing and services. It operates through the following business segments: Internet and services, Cross-border electricity supply, and Stationery. Its products include books, albums, packaging materials, and office supplies. Its services include logistics, Internet advertising, and cross-border electricity. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Guangdong Chant Group, Inc. engages in thermal energy and gas appliance manufacturing. It uses renewable biomass such as domestic waste and agricultural and forestry waste as raw materials to produce renewable energy, including thermoelectric and solid fuels. The firm also offers household gas appliances, heating equipment, and gas vales and accessories. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.

Guangdong Dcenti Auto-Parts Stock Ltd. Co. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of aluminum alloy wheels. It focuses on electroplated wheels and painted wheels. The firm involves in sale of automobile tires and other auto parts products. Its products include STW series, small car series, the coupe series, luxury car series, cross-country car series, and sport utility vehicle (SUV) series. The company was founded on October 26, 2001 and is headquartered in Jiangmen, China.

Guangdong Delian Group Co., Ltd. engages in automotive fine chemicals businesses and car after-sales services. It operates through the following business divisions: Antifreeze, Brake Fluid, Power Steering Oil, Automatic Transmission Fluid, Motor Oil, Adhesive, Fuel Additives, Automotive Films, Automotive Glass Cleaning Fluid, Manual Transmission Oil, Refrigerant, and Others. Its business activities include the wholesale and retail of chemical raw materials and its products, provision of automotive supplies, and import and export. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Guangdong Gensho Logistics Co., Ltd. engages in the providing of logistics services. The company provides 3PL logistics services. It also engages in the investment in logistics management information system. The company was founded on August 15, 2005 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

Guangdong Guanghong Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the following businesses: meat supply industries, education publication, and agriculture enterprises. Its Meat Supply industries include refrigerated services and shop rental for cold storage and market; and frozen goods trading services. Its Education Publication business provides kindergarten, primary, and secondary school teaching materials, teaching aids, and textbooks. Its Agriculture business offers epidemic prevention and control programs, immunization and disinfection procedures, breeding management, cost assessment, and product marketing services. The company was founded on November 5, 1985 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

Guangdong Hongtu Technology (Holdings) Co., Ltd. engages in the development, design, production and sales of precision aluminium alloy die-casting parts for automobiles, communication equipment, escalator grades and electromechanical. It operates business through the following segments: Die Casting, Automotive Interior & Exterior Trim, Special Vehicle and Investment. The Die Casting segment engages in the design and manufacture of precision aluminium alloy die castings. The Automotive Interior & Exterior Trim segment engages in the design, research, development, production, sales and after-sales service of automotive interior and exterior decoration parts. The Special Vehicle segment engages in the research, development, production and sales of bulletproof transport trucks, military police vehicles, civil armoured vehicles, recreational vehicles, ambulances, inspection vehicles, low-speed electric vehicles, disabled vehicles and engineering vehicles. The Investment segment engages in the industrial fund, buyout fund, equity investment and capital operation business. The Company was founded on December 22, 2000 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.

Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-Speed Railway Equipment Corp. engages in the production and sale of chemical fiber. Its business activities include the processing, production, and marketing of polyester filament yarn, nylon filament yarn, high viscosity chips, bottle grade chips, other fiber products; storage of goods; management of cargo; development, sale, and leasing of real estate; property management; and management and investment of hotels. The company was founded in September 1992 and is headquartered in Kaiping, China.

Guangdong Shaoneng Group Co., Ltd. is engaged in the electricity industry. It provides hydroelectric and thermal power in Hunan and Guangdong. It also involved in manufacture of machinery such as trucks and bus gearboxes, machinery parts and accessories; and paper product such as pulp and offset paper, and paper tableware. The company was founded on June 14, 1993 and is headquartered in Shaoguan, China.

Guangdong Shunna Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the transmission and distribution of electrical equipment. Its business activities include supply chain management, business factoring, industrial capital, and financial services. Its products include dry type transformers, box type power generation, prefabricated substation, reactors, and switchgears. The company was founded on October 28, 1992 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Guangdong Sky Dragon Printing Ink Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production and sale of printing ink products. Its products include water-based printing ink, gravure printing ink, acrylic resin, over printing varnish, and offset printing ink. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.

Guangdong Topstar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development of industrial robots. It main businesses are systems integration, products manufacturing & software development, robot ecosystems and overall automation solution. The company products include industrial robot, spruce picker, single axix AC servo driven robots, three & five axex AC servo driven robots, centralized feeding systems, THD series hoppers dryers, stainless steel hoppers dryers, TDLS series drying loaders combination, mold temperature control systems, dosing & mixing systems, granulating & cycling system and other related industrial equipments. Guangdong Topstar Technology was founded on June 1, 2007 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

Guangdong Wencan DIE Casting Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production and sales of automobile aluminum alloy precision die castings. The company products are mainly used in engine systems, gearbox systems, and chassis systems in mid- to high-end automobiles, brake system, body structure parts and other auto parts. Its products include engine system, electronic control system, transmission systems, chassis steering system, brake system, air management system, wiper system, body structure, non automotive pressure casting parts and other related products. The company was founded on September 4, 1998 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, manufacture, sale and service of molding machines. Its products include injection molding machine, die casting machine, rubber injection machine, and high-speed injection molding machine for packaging. The company was founded on July 17, 2002 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Guangdong Zhengye Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of inspection equipment and consumable materials. Its products include asida prototype circuit board testing equipment, asida lithium battery testing, asida-oxford instrument, filtration purification, precision photosensitive, precision positioning and dedicated plastics. The company was founded by Di Hua Xu and Guo Feng Xu on November 14, 1997 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the engineering design and construction, research and development, equipment manufacture and operations and investment operation of environmental protection industry chain. Its business involves wastewater treatment, cleaning production, utilization of solid waste, waste gas denitrification, heavy metal pollution treatment and ecological restoration. The company was founded on April 13, 1999 and is headquartered in Nanning, China.

Guangxi Liugong Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction equipment. Its products include wheel loaders, hydraulic excavators, motor graders, skid steer loaders, rollers, pavers, cold planners, backhoes, bulldozers and mobile cranes. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Liuzhou, China.

Guangxi Wuzhou Zhongheng Group Co., Ltd. engages in the pharmaceutical manufacturing, food production, and real estate development and management. The pharmaceutical manufacturing industry's core business includes research and development, production, sale, and service of Chinese medicines and injection products. The company was founded on April 1, 1993 and is headquartered in Zhangzhou, China.

Guangzhou Baiyunshan Pharmaceutical Holdings Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture, wholesale, retail, import, and export of pharmaceutical products, medical apparatus, and Chinese medicine. It operates in the following segments: Great Southern TCM, Great Commerce, and Great Health. The Great Southern TCM segment provides Chinese and Western medicine, chemicals for medicine, natural drugs, biological medicine. The Great Commerce segment sells, imports, and exports Western medicine, Chinese medicine, and medical apparatus and instruments. The Great Health segment manufactures and sells health products. The company was founded on September 1, 1997 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

Guangzhou Pearl River Piano Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, sale, and service of piano and digital piano instruments. It involves in investment and operation of art education, and film and television media industry. It offers financial services. The company was founded in January 1956 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China

Guangzhou Tech-Long Packing Machine Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of beverage packing machinery. Its business activities include the development of molding equipment, bottle blowing equipment, hot bottling equipment, CSD bottling equipment, bottle arranging equipment, water treatment equipment, beer bottling equipment, daily chemical bottling equipment, UHT sterilizing equipment, encasement equipment machine and set equipment. The company was founded on December 18, 1998 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

Guilin Fuda Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of auto parts. Its products include engine crankshafts, car clutches, automobile gears, engine crankshaft blank, and automotive front beam. The company was founded on August 23, 1995 and is headquartered in Guilin, China.

Guizhou Guihang Automotive Components Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing and sale of auto parts. Its main products include electric wipers and glass lifters, car seals, electronic and electrical switches, car locks, door handles, and heat exchangers. The company was founded on December 29, 1999 and is headquartered in Guiyang, China.

Gulf International Services QSC operates as a holding company, which provides investment services for national and international oil and gas companies. It operates its business through the following segments: Insurance, Aviation, Catering, and Drilling. The Insurance segment provides insurance and reinsurance services. The Aviation segment engages in the provision of helicopter maintenance and transportation services in Qatar and India. The Catering segment provides catering, manpower, and related services. The Drilling segment involves in the provision of drilling, and ancillary services. Gulf International Services was founded on February 12, 2008 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

GuoCheng Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the non-ferrous metal mining business and industrial sulfuric acid business. Its products are lead concentrate, zinc concentrate, copper concentrate, sulfur concentrate, industrial sulfuric acid, and secondary iron concentrate. Its business segments include mining sector, chemical smelting, and trade sector. The company was founded in October 1988 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

GUYOUNG TECHNOLOGY Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive parts. Its products include body, chassis, large body part, small body part, and power train. The company was founded in November 9, 1989 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

HAE IN Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of heavy machinery. It operates through the following business divisions: Construction and Heavy Equipment, Engine and Generator, Industrial Equipment, Business Development, Parts and Maintenance Service, Used Equipment Sales and Rental. The Construction and Heavy Equipment division provides excavators, wheel loaders, bulldozers, and skid loaders. The Engine and Generator division offers inland generators, marine generators and engines, industrial engines, and pumps. The Industrial Equipment division offers equipment domestic construction, civil engineering sites, and industrial logistics field. The Business Development division develops new business lines. The Parts and Maintenance Service division offers parts supply and maintenance service. The Used Equipment Sales and Rental division sells pre-owned equipment. The company was founded on October 17, 1960 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Haesung Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate rental and facility maintenance business. Its services include facilities management services, real estates leasing and rental business, management and maintenance services, parking projects. The company was founded by Dan Sa-Chun on February 5, 1954 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hafary Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the distribution of building materials. It operates through the following segments: General, Project, and Others. The General segment includes retail walk-in customers who purchase their requirements from the showrooms and who make ad-hoc purchases for home renovation or small property development. The Project segment consists of customers who are involved in major property development projects. The Others segment refers to investing activities including property development. Its products include tiles, stone, mosaic, wood, and bathrooms and kitchen equipment. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Haibo Heavy Engineering Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the bridge steel structure engineering. It specializes in construction and installation of bridge steel structure. The company's business activities covers design of bridge steel structure, steel beam production, segmental transportation, bridge installation, and bridge steel structure maintenance. Haibo Heavy Engineering was founded on January 27, 1994 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Hainan Drinda Automotive Trim Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sales and trade of automobile parts. The company sales auto parts, molds, hardware accessories, plastic products, plastic raw materials, chemical raw materials and other related products. The company was founded on April 3, 2003 and is headquartered in Haikou, China.
Halla Holdings Corp. offers retail and logistics service and engages in management of its subsidiaries. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.

Hamat Group Ltd. engages in the manufacture and marketing of construction products, sanitary ware, faucets, plumbing products, and ceramics. It operates through the following segments: Taps, Sanitary Tools, Plastics and Plumbing, Retail and Ceramics, Distribution, and Other Activities. The Taps segment engages in the manufacture of taps for kitchen and bathroom. The Sanitary Tools segment engages in the manufacture and marketing of pottery sanitary tools, mainly toilets and sinks. The Plastics and Plumbing segment engages in the manufacture of plumbing, plastic flushing containers, toilet seats, threaded products and plug-in sockets and plastic-designed consumer products for bathroom and kitchen. The Retail and Ceramics segment engages in the import and sale of flooring, cladding, ceramic tile, sanitary ware, and construction finishing products for construction design. The Distribution segment engages in the import, marketing, and distribution of faucets and accessories, plumbing products, irrigation and gardening accessories, sanitary ware, and accessories for bathrooms. The Other Activities segment engages in the manufacture, import, and marketing of glass showers, marketing of finishing products for bathroom and kitchen, and marketing of sanitary products in the United States. The company was founded on July 10, 1951 and is headquartered in Ashdod, Israel.

Hamaton Automotive Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of various products to automotive industries worldwide. It offers TPMS systems, maintenance tools, parts and sensors, commercial car, passenger car, tank, tube valves as well as valve extensions and valve parts. The company was founded on December 25, 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hanan Mor Group-Holdings Ltd. engages in real estate and property development. The company develops, plans, manages and markets residential projects in Israel, Romania, Bulgaria, Poland and Ukraine. It operates through the following segments: Initiation, marketing, construction and management of residential real estate projects in Israel and abroad and Initiation, marketing, construction and management of investment property projects in Israel and abroad. The company was founded by Hanan Mor and Avi Maor on November 7, 2004 and is headquartered in Ness Ziona, Israel.

Handok Clean Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of carbon block filter for water purifier, pre-processing filter and compound carbon filter. Its products include carbon block filter, PE sediment filter, and deodorizing filter. The company was founded on November 26, 2003 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.

Hands Corp. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. Its products include aluminium wheels and others. The company was founded on March 3, 1972 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

Hangzhou Chang Chuan Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research & development, production and sale of semiconductor test equipment. Its products include automatic taping machines, test systems and test handler systems. The company was founded on April 10, 2008 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hangzhou Huning Elevator Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture and sale of elevator parts and mechanical & electrical components. Its products include hydraulic buffer, progressive safety gear, rope brake, instantaneous safety gear and roller guide shoe. The company was founded on January 4, 2006 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hangzhou Jizhi Mechatronic Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, research and develops high-precision automatic balancing correction machines and other electronic components. It products include Two station alternator ABM, Balance tester, Turbocharger impeller Tester, Two station smart ABM, Two station semi-automatic ABM, Two station automatic balance correction machine, Two station IV Type ABM, Five station I type ABM, Five station P type ABM, Five station ABM, Five station ABM (update version), Five station alternator ABM, Brake ABM, Vertical Balancing Machine, Clutch riveting ABM, Welding ABM (Clutch) and Four station induction motor ABM. The company was founded by Lou Rong Wei and Wu Dian Mei on June 2, 2004 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of air separation equipment, petrochemical equipment, and industrial gases. Its products include air separation equipment & units, ethylene cold boxes, liquid nitrogen washing cold boxes, propane dehydrogenation units, natural gas liquefaction units, oxygen, nitrogen, argon, neon, helium, krypton, xenon, high purity oxygen, high purity nitrogen, carbon dioxide, and mixed gases. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hangzhou Steam Turbine Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial steam turbines. Its products include condensing turbine, extraction condensing, backpressure turbine, multi-stage backpressure turbine, and extraction backpressure turbine. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Hangzhou XZB Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of precision cold forging products. Its products include valve train parts such as valve cotter, valve retainer, and hydraulic lash adjuster and roller finger follower; and cold forming components. The company was founded by Na Xu and Xin Hu on July 31, 2002 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

HANJIN HEAVY INDUSTRIES & CONSTRUCTION HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the management of subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries are Hanjin Heavy Industries & Construction, Daeryun E&S, Hanil Leisure, and Hancor Inc. The company was founded on July 10, 1937 and is headquartered in Namyangju-si, South Korea.

HANJIN KAL Corp. operates as a holding company that engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries provide air transportation, hotel, computerized reservation systems, travel service, real estate and leisure services. The company was founded on August 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

HanJung Natural Connectivity System Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. Its products include brake lever and pedal assembly, door, weight classification system, engine mounting bracket, lamp parts, spare tire sub assembly, electronic and exhaust system parts. The company was founded on August 31,1995 and is headquartered in Yeongcheon-si, South Korea.

Hankyu Hanshin Holdings, Inc. engages in the management and support of group companies. It operates through the following segments: Urban Transportation, Real Estate, Entertainment and Communications, Travel, International Transportation, Hotels, and Other. The Urban Transportation segment handles railway operations, automobile, retailing, and advertising businesses. The Real Estate segment manages rental and sale of real estate. The Entertainment and Communications segment includes sports-related businesses, stage events, and communications and media. The Travel segment offers travel services. The International Transportation segment provide international cargo services. The Hotels segment engages in hotel ownership and management business. The Other segment includes construction business. The company was founded by Ichizo Kobayashi on October 19, 1907 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.   ^ ^

Hanmi Science Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It is mainly engaged in the manufacturing and selling of pharmaceutical ingredients and intermediates. The company was founded on June 15,1973 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.

Hanon Systems engages in the manufacture of automotive heat management systems and modules. Its products include heating, ventilation and air-conditioning system, powertrain cooling system, compressor, fluid transport system. The company was founded on March 11, 1986 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.

HANSAE YES24 HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It operates through acquisition, ownership of shares and stakes of its subsidiaries. The company was founded on November 16, 1982 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hansol Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. The company through its subsidiaries operates in the following businesses such as Paper Production, Information Technology (IT) Parts and Materials, Chemical Materials, Power Generation, Logistics, Recreation, and IT Solutions. The company was founded on January 19, 1965 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hanwei Electronics Group Corp. engages in the manufacture of gas sensor, gas detection products, industrial fixed systems, breath alcohol testers and gas analyzer series, as well as key element for gas detection. Its business activities include research and development, production, and sales of electronic sensors; sales of instrumentation and control systems; mechanical and electrical equipment; and research and development of intelligent transport and security monitoring systems. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

Harbin Boshi Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automatic weighing, packaging, and palletizing machines for granular and powdery products. Its products are divided into the following categories: Automatic Bagging and Palletizing Production Line; Rubber Post Treatment Line; Rubber After-processing Equipment, and Bulk Material Conveying Equipment. It also provides form, fill and seal machines and equipment solutions which are used in the chemical and petrochemical industries. It offers complete synthetic rubber finishing line including synthetic rubber dewatering and drying extruder, drying box, rubber baler, rubber bale bagging machine, rubber bale palletizer and case filler. The company was founded on September 12, 1997 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

Harbin Dongan Auto Engine Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of mini-car engines and parts. Its products include engine; transmission; and parts such as iron block, camshafts, casting, cast aluminium cylinder block and cylinder head, and transmission gear items. The company offers its products with "Dongan" brand name. Harbin Dongan Auto Engine company was founded on September 4, 1998 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

Harbin VITI Electronics Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of electronic products for cars and buses. Its product portfolio includes a series of CAN bus, combination instrument, recorder, central processor, central electric box, retarder power switch, ECU control unit, and sensors. The company was founded on July 28, 2000 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

Harim Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the livestock food business. The company operates through the following business areas: Poultry, Pig, Pork, Feed, Distribution and Animal Healthcare. It also provides Cattle feeds and feed concentrates, Feeds and feed concentrates for pigs. The company was founded on April 1, 1950 and is headquartered in Iksan, South Korea.

Harima Chemicals Group, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of synthetic resins, paper-making chemicals, tall oil products and electronic materials. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Resin and Tall Oil Products, Paper Chemicals, Electronic Materials, Lawter, and Others. The Resin and Tall Oil Products segment manufactures and sells paint resin, resins for print inks, tall oil products, and synthetic rubber emulsifiers. The Paper Chemicals segment handles manufacture and sale of paper strengthening agents, sizing agents, and surface-coating agents. The Electronic Materials segment deals with the manufacture and sale of electronic materials. The Lawter segment involves in the manufacture and sale of resins for print ink and adhesives. The Others segment engages in the real estate management. The company was founded on November 18, 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Haw Par Corp. Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the licensing of Tiger trademarks, and owning investments for long term holding purposes. It operates through the following segments: Healthcare, Investments and Others. The Healthcare segment manufactures and distributes topical analgesic products under the Tiger Balm and Kwan Loong brands. The Investments segment engages in investing activities such as quoted and unquoted securities in the Asia region. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Healthway Medical Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of healthcare management. It operates through the Primary Healthcare, and Specialist Healthcare segments. The Primary Healthcare segment comprises of family medicine, dentistry, healthcare benefit management, and investment in strategic medical related business. The Specialist Healthcare segment includes pediatrics, orthopedics, aesthetic medicine, obstetrics and gynecology, and Nobel specialist such as cardiology, gastroenterology, psychiatry, ophthalmology, otorhinolaryngology, and general surgery. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Hebei Huijin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sales and service of banking and financial equipment. The company operates business through the following segments: Intelligent Manufacturing and Information Integrated Solution & Technical Service. The Intelligent Manufacturing segment provides software and hardware solutions for the financial banking industry. The Information Integrated Solution & Technical Service segment provides information technology integrated solutions and equipment operation & maintenance services. Its products include banknote binding machine, self-service return machine, self-service ticket machine, banknote optical density quantitative detection instruments, renminbi clearing packaging lines and virtual counters. Hebei Huijin Electromechanical was founded by Jing Tao Sun, Feng Liu and Xi Bo Bao on March 21, 2005 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.

Hebei Sailhero Environmental Protection High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production and sale of environmental monitoring apparatus and device. It also offers air quality continuous automatic monitoring systems, water quality continuous automatic monitoring systems, acid rain automatic monitoring systems, sewage on line automatic monitoring systems, smoke on line automatic monitoring systems as well as digital emergency monitoring cars and management systems. The company was founded on July 6, 1996 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.

Heiwa Corp. engages in the development and sales of pachinko machines and other gaming machines. It operates through the Pachinko and Paschislot Machine Business and Golf Business segments. The Pachinko and Paschislot Machine Business segment develops, manufactures, and sells entertainment equipment, such as pachinko machines and slots. The Golf Business segment manages and operates golf courses. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Henan Thinker Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. is engaged in the research and development, upgrade, industrialization and technical support of train operation control system. It offers train operation control system, driving safety monitoring system, LKJ security management and information systems, and other overall solutions which include LKJ automotive equipment, system parts, ground equipment, management and information software systems and derivative devices. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

Hengkang Medical Group Co. Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing, sale, research and development of traditional Chinese medicines. It manufactures tablets, syrups, capsules, mixtures, pills and others. The company was founded on September 30, 2001 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Hikari Tsushin, Inc. operates as a holding company which engages in the office automation and telecommunications business. It operates through the following business segments: Corporate, Shop and Insurance. The Corporate business segment provides office automation equipment sales, subscription agency communication services, and corporate mobile communication services. The Shop business segment sells mobile phone units and peripheral equipment. The Insurance business segment operates insurance agency focusing on third sector insurance. The company was founded by Yasumitsu Shigeta on February 5, 1988 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Hi-Lex Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of control cables and systems for automobiles, industrial equipment, medical devices, and metal molds. Its products include control cables, marine engine control systems, actuators, and housing-related equipment. It operates through the following segments: Japan, North America, China, Asia, Europe, and South America. The company was founded by Tomesaburo Teraura on January 20, 1946 and is headquartered in Takarazuka, Japan.

Himile Mechanical Science & Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and technology development of automobile radial tire molds and tire manufacturing equipment. The company was founded by Sheng Jun Liu on March 31, 1995 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China.

HIMS CO., LTD. manufactures and sells inspection module, machine on display, and semiconductors. Its products include inspection system, vision module, and vision components. The company was founded on January 15, 1999 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

Hinokiya Group Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies that are in the real estate business. It operates through the following business segments: Housing, Real Estate, Insulation, Remodeling, Nursing Care and Others. The Housing segment includes the custom housing contract, housing franchise, sale of detached home, sale and brokerage of land and rental housing contract. The Real Estate segment includes the acquisition, operation and sale of profitable properties and leasing real estates. The Insulation segment includes the development, manufacture and sale of foam insulation and home energy conservation-related materials. The Nursing Care segment operates elder care facilities and childcare centers. The Others segment provides rental houses, house remodeling, travel agency business, insurance agency business and consulting for real estate activities. The company was founded on October 13, 1988 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

HIRATA Corporation is principally engaged in the manufacture and sale of various manufacturing line systems, industrial robot and logistic equipment. The Automobile-related Manufacturing Equipment segment mainly provides automated assembly lines of various automobile parts, such as engines, transmissions and other in-vehicle electronic parts. The Semiconductor-related Manufacturing Equipment segment provides silicon wafer transfer equipment used in semiconductor manufacturing processes, as well as the manufacturing equipment for flat panel displays (FPDs). The Home Appliance-related and Other Manufacturing Equipment segment provides manufacturing equipment for a range of home appliances, as well as logistics-related equipment including stockers and transportation equipment, and tire-related manufacturing equipment. As of March 31, 2013, the Company had 12 consolidated subsidiaries.

Hitachi Zosen Corp. engages in the design and construction of environmental systems, industrial plants, industrial machinery, process and infrastructure-related equipment, disaster prevention systems, and precision machinery. It operates through the following segments: Environmental Systems and Industrial Plants, Machinery, Infrastructure, and Others. The Environmental Systems and Industrial Plants segment includes environmental protection systems, desalination and potabilization plants, chemical plants, and water treatment systems. The Machinery segment produces marine diesel engines, boilers, nuclear equipment, plastic machinery, food filling, and packaging systems. The Infrastructure segment includes bridge construction, water gates, and shield tunneling machines. The Others segment includes transportation and warehousing businesses. The company was founded by Edward H. Hunter on April 1, 1881 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Hite Jinro Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management and development of its subsidiaries. It provides financial and business support to its subsidiaries. The company was founded on August 9, 1933 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

D Western Therapeutics Institute, Inc is a Japan-based company engaged in the research and development of new pharmaceuticals. The Company generates revenue from licensing of its developed drugs to other companies. As of December 31, 2012, the Company’s drug pipeline included anti-thrombotic medicine K-134, therapeutic agent K-115 for glaucoma, and anticancer drug HMN-214. Its newly-developed products include new anti-thrombotic medicine and signal-transduction inhibitors, including therapeutic agent for high-blood pressure, protective agent for nerves, therapeutic agent for atherosclerosis, ophthalmologic drug and anticancer drug, among others. The Company is also developing new drug candidate compounds focusing on protein kinase inhibitors.

HIWIN Technologies Corp. engages in the research and development,manufacture, and sale of motion control products. It offers linear guideway, ball screws, industrial robots, rotary tables, reducers, precision bearings, and medical equipment. The company was founded by Yung Tsai Cho on October 11, 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

HL Global Enterprises Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the business of hotel management and property development. It operates through the following segments: Investments and Others; Hospitality and Restaurant; and Property Development. The Investments and Others segment invests in properties for rental and investment holding. The Hospitality and Restaurants segment focuses on the operating and management of hotels and restaurants. The Property Development segment develops properties for sale and rental and development project management. The company was founded on September 21, 1961 and is headquartered in Singapore.

HNAC Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of automated solutions for water utilities, power and industrial users. It offers power plants integrated automation system, substation automation system, water resources information system, industrial process automation system, intelligent power distribution engineering water engineering, mechanical and electrical engineering contracting and photovoltaic power generation solutions. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

CAISSA TOSUN DEVELOPMENT Co., Ltd. engages in the tourism business. It focuses on outbound travel, rally tours, travel e-commerce, aviation and rail catering, investment and asset management as one industry chain services. It provides wholesale and retail of outbound travel products and destination service, The company was founded in March 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Hotai Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution, assembly, and trading of vehicle and components including chassis and vehicle parts. Its business scopes include car leasing, vehicle installment payment, property insurance, vehicle air-conditioner, and spare parts business. Its Car Leasing business provides branded car leasing services. Its Property Insurance business offers fire, vehicle, goods transportation, construction, liability, injury, and health insurance services. Its Vehicle Air-Conditioner business supplies air-conditioner for buses and trucks. Its Spare Parts business covers vehicle spare parts and equipment. Its products consist of luxury, passenger, and commercial vehicles. The company was founded by Lieh Huo Huang on September 1, 1947 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Hoa Phat Group JSC engages in the manufacture, trade, export, and import of iron and steel. It also trades materials and equipment for refining and rolling steel. It operates through following segments: Production and Trading of Steel; Trading of Construction Machinery; Manufacturing of Furniture and Refrigeration Products; Energy and Exploring and Exploiting Minerals; and Financial Investment (Parent Entity). The Production and Trading of Steels segment refines and casts steel and iron. The Trading of Construction Machinery segment produces and trades construction equipment, and exploits medium and small sized metals. The Manufacturing of Furniture and Refrigeration Products segment produces and trades interior furniture and refrigerant products. The Energy and Exploring and Exploiting Minerals segment involves in exploring, exploiting, refining, processing, importing, and exporting minerals; producing and selling coke coal; collecting fossil coal; producing refined oil products; and distributing of electricity. The Financial investment (parent entity) segment offers long-term investment in subsidiaries and associates. The company was founded in August 1992 and is headquartered in Hung Yen, Vietnam.

Hochiki Corp. engages in the manufacture, sale, construction, and maintenance of fire alarm, smoke control, fire extinguishing, security, and network systems. It operates through the Disaster Prevention and Information and Communications segments. The Disaster Prevention segment offers fire alarm systems and fire control equipment. The Information and Communications segment provides networking, broadcasting, and security equipment. The company was founded on April 2, 1918 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Hock Lian Seng Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of civil engineering services. It operates through the following segments: Civil Engineering, Properties Development, and Properties Investment. The Civil Engineering segment involves in the infrastructure construction and civil engineering works for bridges, expressways, tunnels, and related infrastructure works. The Properties Development segment focuses on developing properties in the residential and industrial sectors. The Properties Investment segment includes investment properties held to earn rentals and for capital appreciation. The company was founded by Leong Hai Chua in 1969 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Home Center Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of ready-mixed concrete. It operates through the following divisions: Ready-Mixed Concrete, Construction Materials Wholesale & Retail, and Leisure & Lease. The Construction Materials Wholesale & Retail division deals with the architectural finishes, including tiles, sanitary ware, faucets, gas boilers, sinks and pipes. The Construction division engages in the provision of building machineries and fire-fighting facilities. The Leisure & Lease division operates leisure sports and neighboring convenience facilities such as sauna and hot spring, Korean dry sauna, swimming pool and health clubs. The company was founded on July 25, 1988 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Hong Fok Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in property investment, development, and construction through its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Property Investment, Property Development and Construction, and Property Management. The Property Investment segment includes investments in investment properties. The Property Development and Construction segment sells residential units and develops properties. The Property Management segment provides maintenance and management services. The company was founded on December 15, 1967 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Hongda High-Tech Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, weaving, printing, distribution, and dyeing of warp knitting fabrics. Its products include auto interior, innerwear, swimwear, sports leisure, and home textile fabrics. The company also involved in medical devices, trading, and financial investments. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Haining, China.

Hosen Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the import, export, and distribution of fast moving consumer goods, specializing in packaged foods. It operates through the following segments: House Brands and Non-House Brands. The House Brands segment handles the development, trading, and distribution of canned seafood, canned fruits and vegetables, canned meat products, and chocolate products. The Non-House Brands segment includes the importation, distribution, wholesaling, and retailing of canned food and household consumable goods. The company was founded by Poh Soon Chong and Hai Cheok Lim on March 15, 2004 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Hotel Properties Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the hotel ownership, management and operation, and property development. It operates through the following business segments: Hotels, Properties, and Others. The Hotels segment includes the operation of hotels, shopping galleries, and provision of hotel management services. The Properties segment offers rental and sale operations of residential properties and commercial units. The Other segment involves the distribution and retail operations, and activities on quoted and unquoted investments.
