The company was founded by Beng Seng Ong on January 28, 1980 and is headquartered in Singapore.

HRnetGroup Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of personnel recruitment and human resource related services. It operates through the following segments: Professional Recruitment, Flexible Staffing, and Others. The company was founded on September 21, 2016 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co. Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, installation and after-sales services of automated intelligent equipment. Its products include flexible welding production line, assembly automation production line, painting automation production line, digital factory solution, intelligent transportation equipment, factory automation system and robot advanced manufacturing system. The company was founded by Hua Yan and Hui Luo on February 27, 2003 and is headquartered in Shiyan, China.

Huada Automotive Technology Corp., Ltd. manufactures automobile parts. Its products include various types of cars parts, metal pipe, welding assembly & stamping drawing pieces, insulation board series, mold, aluminium composite film, plating board doubble-deck series, brazing parts-oil filter assembly, car longitudinal beam, welding fixture tool and other auto parts. The company was founded on November 25, 2002 and is headquartered in Jingjiang, China.

Huafang Co., Ltd. engages in the textile industry, which offers textile, printing and dyeing, textile products, clothing, thermoelectric, real estate, financial and information services. Its business activities include home textile, fabric, cloth, bedding, clothing line, new fiber and blue platinum series. The company was founded on September 3, 1999 and is headquartered at Binzhou, China.

Huagong Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the businesses of laser technology and applications. Its products include laser equipment, optical communication devices, laser holographic anti-counterfeiting, sensors, active optical devices, passive optical devices, smart terminals, and optical components. The company also provides products and solutions for intelligent manufacturing. Huagong Tech was founded on July 28, 1999 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Huaiji Dengyun Auto-Parts (Holding) Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of engine valve. It focuses on research, production, and sales of automobile engine exhaust valve series products. The firm's products include valves for passenger car, marine diesel engine, diesel engine, gran turismo and racing car, industrial diesel engine, motorcycle, and heavy duty truck. The company was founded in May 1971 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.

Huaming Power Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of diverter switch systems and equipment for power grids and industrial customers, as well as integrated optical and electromechanical intelligent steel structure computer-numerical-control complete processing equipment; and the contracting of photovoltaic power station and integrated substation projects. The company was founded on August 19, 2002 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.

Huayu Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research, development, and sale of parts and assemblies of transportation vehicles and construction machinery. Its products include interior and exterior parts and components for automobiles, motorcycles, and tractors, as well as metal molds, functional parts, and electronic and electrical components. The company was founded on October 28, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Hubei Jiuzhiyang Infrared System Co., Ltd. engages in the research and fabrication of infrared thermal imagers, laser rangefinders. Its products include cooled and uncooled infrared imagers, laser range finders, and thermoscopes. The company was founded on April 27, 2001 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd. engages in production of civil explosives. It offers industrial explosives, ammonium nitrate, nano calcium carbonate and paper plastic package as well as engages in the manufacturing and installation of chemical machinery. The company was founded on June 30, 1994 and is headquartered in Hubei, China.

Hunan Oil Pump Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of engine pump products and key engine system components. Its business areas include automotive parts and general machinery. Its products include oil pumps, water pumps, displacement pumps, transmission pumps, module integration parts, reducers, gears, and die castings. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Hengyang, China.

Hunan Zhongke Electric Co., Ltd. is engaged in the research, development, production and distribution of industrial magnetism application technologies and equipment as well as related services. It offers continuous casting electromagnetic stirring integrated systems (EMSs), magnetic lifting complete equipment, magnetic separators and high voltage transducers as well as engineering and construction services. The company was founded in April 2004 and is headquartered in Yueyang, China.

Hwa Hong Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the investment, development, and rental of real estate properties. It operates through the following segments: Rental, Investments, and Corporate and Others. The Rental segment leases residential, commercial properties, and warehouse. The Investments segment covers the investment holding activities. The Corporate and Others segment includes packing and trading of edible oils as well as the investment holding of subsidiaries. The company was founded on December 29, 1952 and is headquartered in Singapore.

HS R&A Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of automotive parts. Its products include flash application, weather strip, brake hose, power steering hose, air conditioning hose, general purpose high pressure hose, low pressure hose, plastic tube and pipe bending. The company was founded on September 15, 1978 and is headquartered in Yangsan-si, South Korea.

HY Energy Group Co. Ltd. engages in the production and sale of propylene, isooctane, and methyl ethyl ketone as well as the storage, wholesale, and retail of gasoline. It operates through the following business segments: Product sale, Investment, Highway toll, and Lease. Its products include propylene, isooctane, methyl ethyl ketone, isobutane, butane, gasoline, diesel, and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded on July 26, 1993 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.

HYOSUNG Corp. engages in variety of industrial and technology business areas. It operates through the following business divisions: Information and Communication, Finance, Pump Manufacturing, and Imported Car Dealing and Others. The Information and Communication business division offers automated financial services and products such as automated teller machine and certificate of deposits. The Finance business division operates as a loan-specialized financial business which offers loan services including guarantees, corporate bonds and bills. The Pump Manufacturing business division offers pumps for fluid transportation of different industries. The Imported Car Dealing business division imports, sells and repairs cars. The Others business division engages in the management of subsidiaries and investment in shares. The company was founded on November 3, 1966 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hyosung TNC Corp. manufactures chemical fibers such as spandex, nylon yarn, polyester yarn, fabric, and dyed products. Spandex includes spandex for clothing and diapers, among others. Fabrics include fabrics for general clothing, workwear and nonwoven, among others. It also engages in the trading of steel, chemicals and electronics. The company was founded in February, 1957 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hyphens Pharma International Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of specialty pharmaceutical and consumer healthcare products. It operates through the following segments: Specialty Pharma Principals, Proprietary Brands, and Medical Hypermart and Digital. The Specialty Pharma Principals segment focuses in marketing and selling a range of specialty pharmaceutical products. The Proprietary Brands segment involves in the development, marketing, and selling its own proprietary range of dermatological products and health supplement products. The Medical Hypermart and Digital segment deals with wholesaling of pharmaceuticals and medical supplies. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Hyundai Heavy Industries Holdings Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures robotic equipments. Its products include industrial robots, cleaning robots, controller, and additional equipment. The company was founded by Chung Ju Yung on April 3, 2017 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Hyundai Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of motor vehicles and parts. It operates through the following business areas: Vehicle, Financial and Others. The Vehicle division offers motor vehicles. The Financial division provides financing, leasing and credit cards. The Other division includes manufacture of railways. The company was founded on December 29, 1967 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Hyundai WIA Corp. engages in the production and sale of automobile parts. It operates through the following business areas: Automotive components and Machinery. The Automotive components business division offers modules, engines, transmissions, castings and others. The Machinery business division offers machine tools, factory automation equipment, robots and defense industry products. The company was founded on March 29, 1976 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

HYUNWOO INDUSTRIAL Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of double-sided and multilayer printed circuit boards (PCB). Its products include PCB for display, automobile, home appliance, and multimedia, and flexible PCB for display. The company was founded on July 1, 1987 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

I.A. Group Corp. engages in the sale of automobile products and operation of equipment stores. It operates through the following business segments: Car Supplies, Bridal, Construction and Real Estate, and Others. The Car Supplies segment sells Autobacs, super Autobacs, and techno cube products and services. The Bridal segment handles the wedding ceremony services. The Construction and Real Estate segment covers the construction, rental, and sale of real estate properties. The Others segment includes the computer and games software business, restaurant operations, and provision of accounting and administration services. The company was founded on March 21, 1984 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Ichigo, Inc. engages in the management of its group of companies that deals in real estate investment and asset management. It operates through the following segments: Asset Management, Added Value, Clean Energy, and Others. The Asset Management segment provides property management, facility management, property procurement support, and real estate services. The Added Value segment improves the value of real estate by maximizing the use of technology. The Clean Energy segment develops business that is centered on solar power generation. The company was founded on March 17, 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ICHINEN HOLDINGS CO., LTD. engages in the management of its group of companies. It operates through the following segments: Automotive Leasing, Chemical, Parking, Machine Tool, Synthetic Resin, and Others. The Automotive Leasing segment handles automobile and equipment leasing, car inspection and maintenance, and sales of petroleum fuel and automobile supplies. The Chemical segment manufactures chemical products used for power, iron and steel, and chemical fields. The Parking segment manages coin parking and visitor parking lots. The Machine Tool segment sells machine and automobile servicing, air conditioning, and measurement tools. The Synthetic Resin segment sells synthetic resin raw materials and designs and manufactures synthetic resin products. The Others segment includes real estate leasing and management. The company was founded on June 1, 1930 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Ichishin Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides general education services to elementary, junior high and senior high school students. The company is primarily engaged in the provision of group, individual and video tutorial services; as well as the production and sale of videos; inventory management and delivery of educational materials; Japanese classes for foreigners; management of classroom facilities and the operation of franchised (FC) cram schools through its subsidiaries. It also provides the various administrative and human resources support services for all its subsidiary companies. The company was founded by Takeo Umeda in May 1965 and is headquartered in Ichikawa, Japan.

ID Holdings Corp. engages in the provision of information technology services. It operates through the following divisions: System Operation Management, Software Development, System Infrastructure, Cyber security, Consulting and Training, and Others. The System Operation Management division manages and operates information processing systems. The Software Development division deals with contracted software development and client residency services. The System Infrastructure division handles the customer IT platform design, construction, operation, and maintenance operations. The Cyber Security, Consulting and Training division covers sales of network and web application security products, construction; installation support; operation of security system, assessment, and advisory work; business process; reengineering (BPR), IT governance, IT service management consulting and training work. The Others division offers data entry, security, and consulting services. The company was founded on October 20, 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

IDIS Holdings Co., Ltd. provides management, and business support services for its subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries main businesses include manufacture of closed circuit televisions such as digital video records and Internet protocol products, including network video recorder and IP cameras. The company was founded on September 24, 1997 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.

IHI Corp. engages in the design, manufacture, sale, installation, repair, overhaul, and maintenance of heavy machinery. It operates through the following segments: Resources, Energy and Environment; Social Infrastructure and Offshore Facilities; Industrial System and General-Purpose Machinery; Aero Engine, Space and Defense; and Others. The Resources, Energy and Environment segment includes boilers, power systems, motors for land and marine use, gas processes for storage facilities and chemical plants, nuclear power, gas engines, environmental systems, and pharmaceutical plants. The Social Infrastructure and Offshore Facility segment deals with bridges, water gates, steel structures, shield tunneling machines, transportation systems, urban development, and security. The Industrial System and General-Purpose Machinery segment offers rotating machinery, logistics systems, materials handling equipment, parking systems, steel manufacturing equipment, industrial machinery, heat and surface treatment, papermaking machinery, vehicular turbochargers and compressors, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment. The Aero Engine, Space and Defense segment handles aircraft engines, rocket systems, space exploration, and defense systems. The Others segment includes inspection and measurement business as well as the manufacture and sale of related equipment. The company was founded on December 5, 1853 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Iida Group Holdings Co., Ltd. manages its group companies which engage in the residential property sales, condominium development, contract construction, real estate leasing, and hot spring businesses. It operates through the following segments: "Hajime Construction Group", "Iida Sangyo Group", "Touei Housing Group," "Tact Home Group", "Arnest One", and "ID Home". The company was founded on November 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

IKD Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, production and sales of automotive aluminum alloy precision casting. Its main products include wiper systems, transmission systems, steering systems, engine systems, brake systems, filter systems, air condition system, oil pump, damper system, mirror system, and new energy three-electric systems. The company was founded on December 8, 2003 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

ILJIN Holdings Co., Ltd. is a holding company which engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its services include consulting and brand management of its subsidiaries. The company was founded in January 27, 1982 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.

Iljin Materials Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of electronic foils for printed circuit boards (PCB). It operates through the following business division: Elecfoil and Energy. The Elecfoil business offers I2B, IHT, IUT, I2K, IKD, and ICS. The Energy business produces lithium manganese oxide used as a cathode material for rechargeable batteries. The company was founded on August 11, 1987 and is headquartered in Iksan, South Korea.

Ilji Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of automobile body parts. It operates through the Domestic and Overseas business divisions. Its products include dash panels, radiator support, and pressed molds. The company was founded on November 24, 1986 and is headquartered in Gyeongsan, South Korea.

Imasen Electric Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. It operates through the following segments: Automotive Parts, Wire Harness, and Welfare Equipment. The Automotive Parts segment produces and sells mechanical and electric products. The Wireless Harness segment manufactures large wire harnesses for aircrafts and machine tools. The Welfare Equipment segment produces and merchandises electric wheelchairs, and artificial arms and legs. The company was founded by Senzaburo Imai on February 1, 1939 and is headquartered in Inuyama, Japan.

Impress Holdings, Inc. engages in the total media business. It operates through the following segments: Information Technology (IT), Music, Design, Mountaineering and Nature, Mobile Service, and Others. The IT segment provides consigned production of promotional materials. The Music segment offers music related publishing. The Design segment handles design and desktop publishing, and web design planning and production. The Mountaineering and Nature segment handles the publication of books and magazines on mountaineering skiing and traveling. The Mobile Service segment manages mobile related media services. The Others segment operates publishing business and business development of electronic publishing. The company was founded by Keiichiro Tsukamoto on April 1, 1992 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Imuraya Group Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which engages in the manufacture and sale of food and seasonings. It operates through the following business divisions: Confectionery Division, Processed Food Division, Steamed Food Division, Ice Cream Division, Chilled (Refrigerated) Food Division, Food Service Division, Seasoning Division and Other Business. The Confectionery Division engages in the manufacture and sale of food products such as castella (sponge cake), dorayaki (pancake with szuki bean paste) and wagashi (the Japanese traditional confectionery). The Processed Food Division engages in the manufacture and sale of healthy, safe and selected traditional Japanese foods. The Steamed Food Division provides readily available and freshly cooked nikuman (steamed bun with meat filling) and anman (sweetened azuki bean filling) in a place like the steamer at convenience store. The Ice Cream Division engages in the manufacture and sale of uniquely Japanese style ice cream and original ice cream including 'Azuki bar'. The Chilled (Refrigerated) Food Division manufactures and sells food products such as a long-life Tofu and refrigerated 'Nikuman' and 'Anman'. The Food Service Division manages 'Anna Miller's' American restaurant and 'Jouvaud Le Patissier Provencal' French bakery. The Seasoning Division sells seafood, meat and mainly vegetable extracts in powdered, liquid and granule form to food manufacturers as seasoning products. The Other Business is engaged in the property management, insurance and leasing agency businesses. The company was founded by Wazo Imura on November 15, 1896 and is headquartered in Tsu, Japan.

IMV Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of vibration simulation systems and measuring systems. It operates through the following business divisions: Vibration Test Systems, Test and Solution Services, and Measuring Systems. The Vibration Test Systems division engages in the development, production, repair and maintenance of vibration test systems, environmental test systems, software signal processing and control systems; and related equipment. The Test and Solution Services division offers test house, measuring analysis service and other consulting service for vibration environment tests. The Measuring Systems division engages in the development, production, repair and maintenance of seismic monitoring systems, vibration measuring and monitoring systems, environmental evaluation systems and related equipment. The company was founded on April 17, 1957 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Indofood Agri Resources Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in research and development, oil palm seed breeding, and cultivation of oil palm plantations and agricultural plantations. It operates through the following business segments: Plantations, Edible Oils & Fats and Others.The Plantations segment develops and maintains oil palm, rubber and sugar cane plantations, and other business activities relating to palm oil, rubber and sugar cane processing, marketing, and selling. The Edible Oils and Fats segment produces, markets, and sells edible oil, margarine, shortening, and other related products and its derivative products. The Others segment includes assets and liabilities that relates to inter-segment receivables and payable. The company was founded on October 5, 2001 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Industries of Qatar Co. engages in the petrochemicals, fuels, fertilizers, additives and steel industries. It operates through the following segments: Petrochemicals, Fertilisers, and Steel. The Petrochemicals segment offers ethylene, low density polyethylene and linear low density low polyethylene, sulphur, mixed liquefied petroleum gas, methanol, and methyl-tertiary-butyl-ether. The Fertilisers segment includes ammonia, urea, urea formaldehyde condensate, and melamine. The Steel segment comprises of Hot Briquetted Iron and Direct Reduced Iron, steel billets, re-bars, and steel coils. The company was founded on April 19, 2003 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

Inner Mongolia North Hauler Joint Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and marketing of off-highway mining vehicles, construction machineries, related parts, and components. Its products include non-road (dual or mining) dump truck, scrapers, loaders, bulldozers, and excavators. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Baotou, China.

InnoTek Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacturing and sale of precision metal stamping components and precision machining components. It operates through the following segments: Precision Components and Tooling, Precision Machining, and Corporate and Others. The Precision Components and Tooling segment specializes in sales of stamping components, tooling design, and fabrication to a wide range of industries. The Precision Machining segment includes the machining of products mainly from the television and office automation industries. The Corporate and Others segment covers the group-level corporate services and treasury functions. The company was founded on November 28, 1995 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the business of rare earth permanent magnet materials and products, motor series products and fire safety intelligent equipment. Its products include N52, N45SH, N40UH, micro motor, electric push rod actuator, parallel shaft, worm gear, planetary gear reducer, motor drivers and scooters. Innuovo Technology also provides fire safety simulation training facilities development and construction; and fire safety equipment products sales services. The company was founded on August 4, 1997 and is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

INTAGE HOLDINGS, Inc. engages in the provision of marketing research and consulting services. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Marketing Research and Consulting, System Solutions, and Healthcare Solutions. The Marketing Research and Consulting segment provides panel survey and custom research services. The System Solutions segment deals with system development, operation, and maintenance services. The Healthcare Solutions segment provides marketing research, business solutions, and solution-based clinical research services for CRO (Contract Research Organization) and clinical drug development in the healthcare industry, and serving as an outsourcing partner of pharmaceutical companies for drug development. It also creates a research and marketing platform for the future to ensure mutual identification and co-creation between consumers and companies. The company was founded in March 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

INTEKPLUS Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of visual inspection equipment. Its product include semiconductors visual inspection, semiconductors mid-end, and display visual inspection equipment, and others. The company was founded on October 13, 1995 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.

InterLife Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the business administration of its group companies that provides store services. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Personnel Service, Store Service and Real Estate. The Construction segment covers the interior construction of shops, office design, design of amusement shops, and construction of sound and lighting equipment. The Personnel Service segment provides temporary staffing dispatch, and education and training. The Store Service segment covers the sales of mobile phones and mobile communication service sales agency business. The Real Estate segment includes leasing of amusement facilities. The company was founded in February 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

International Cement Group Ltd. manufactures and distributes cement. It operates through the following segments: Aluminium Division; Cement Division and Other Operations. The segment Aluminium Division undertakes aluminium architectural contracts and engineering works and subcontracting of building construction projects, and manufacturing of aluminium extrusions, and supply of all such related products. The segment Cement Division engages in the production, sales and/or distribution of cement. The segment Other Operations include Investment holding and Energy related products and services Division. The Investment holding Division invests in land and buildings for either development or capital appreciation purposes. The Energy related products and services Division engages in the development of prototype equipment for generation of electricity through recycling of shredded tyres. The company was founded on November 05, 2015 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Interpark Corp. engages in management and development of its subsidiaries. It plans new businesses and gives support to the invested companies. The company was founded in November, 1995 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Interra Resources Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the business of petroleum exploration and production. Its portfolio of production, development and exploration assets comprises petroleum contract areas in Indonesia and Myanmar. The company was founded on January 30, 1973 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Intraco Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the trading of plastics products, providing fire protection solutions, and services relating to wireless telecommunication related infrastructure. It operates through the Fire Protection, and Trading and Others segments. The Fire Protection segment deals with manufacturing and installation of passive fire protection products. The Trading and Others segment focuses on trading in industrial materials including plastics, provision of commercial wireless services, and investment holding. The company was founded on November 5, 1968 and is headquartered in Singapore.

INZI Controls Co., Ltd. engages in the production of automobile parts and accessories. Its products include parts of cooling system and management system, sensors, antenna, switches and engineering plastic parts. The company was founded on January 31, 1978 and is headquartered in Siheung-si, South Korea.

IR Japan Holdings, Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its subsidiaries. It provides the consulting business specializing in investor relations (IR), shareholder relations (SR), and public relations (PR) services. The company was founded on February 2, 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

IREIT Global operates as a real estate investment trust. It invests directly and indirectly in a portfolio of income-producing real estate in Europe. The company was founded on November 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Singapore.

I'rom Group Co., Ltd. engages in the medical support business. It operates through the following business divisions: Advanced Medicinal Treatment Services, Site Management Organization (SMO) Services, Contract Research Organization (CRO) Services and Medical Support Business. The Advanced Medicinal Treatment Services division enages in the development of advanced medical technologies such as regenerative medicine and gene therapy to the practical level has been long awaited. The SMO services division conducts clinical trial, various operations, besides examinations and tests, arise at the medical institution, including data organization and document management. The CRO Services division provides clinical trials of pharmaceuticals or medical devices in the development stage or in post-marketing clinical trials etc. The Medical Support Business division supports the enhancement of convenience and quality of medical care for patients by providing clinic malls. The company was founded on April 9, 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ISEC Healthcare Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of medical eye care services. It operates through the Specialized Health Services and General Health Services. The Specialized Health Services segment includes medical care, consultancy, treatment, and surgery in the field of ophthalmology. The General Health Services provides general medical services. The company was founded on January 2, 2014 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which deals in the management of department stores. It operates through the following segments: Department Store, Credit, Financing, and Membership, Real Estate, and Other. The Department Store segment sells apparel, accessories, sundry goods, household, and food products. The Credit, Financing, and Membership Club segment provides credit card, personal loan, insurance, and guarantee services along with the provision of membership club services. The Real Estate segment includes building maintenance, real estate leasing, and interior construction projects. The Other segment deals with manufacturing, import, export, wholesale, logistics, personnel, and information processing services. The company was founded on April 1, 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ITOCHU Corp. engages in business of product trading and business investment activities. It operates through the following segments: Textile; Machinery; Metals and Minerals; Energy and Chemicals; Food; ICT and Realty; and Others. The Textile segment covers fiber, raw materials, textile fabrics, clothing apparel, and brand marketing business. The Machinery segment includes plant projects, marine, aerospace, automobile, construction machinery, industrial systems, and life and healthcare business. The Metals and Minerals segment offers metals and mineral resources, steel and non-ferrous products, and coal, nuclear, and solar business. The Energy and Chemicals segment pertains to oil and gas trading, energy resources development, and chemicals business. The Food segment focuses on food resources, product processing, midstream distribution, and retail business. The ICT and Realty segment deals with forest products, general merchandise, ICT, insurance, logistics, construction, realty, and financial business. The Others segment includes the overseas legal corporations in the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, China and Hong Kong. The company was founded by Chubei Itoh in 1858 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Itoham Yonekyu Holdings, Inc. operates as an holdings company with an interest in the business management of its group companies which manufacture and sell processed meat products and processed foods. The company was founded on April 1, 2016 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

J. FRONT RETAILING Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of department stores. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Department Store, Parco, Wholesale, Credit, and Others. The Department Store segment sells clothing, accessories, household goods, and food products. The Parco segment deals with the development, operation, and management of shopping centers. The Wholesale segment manages the wholesale of food, chemical products, and materials. The Credit segment handles the issuance and management of credit cards. The Others segment includes mail-order business, real estate leasing, parking lot and lease services, contracting works, upholstery, and retail sales. The company was founded on September 3, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Japan Cash Machine Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of currency-handling machines, banking machines, and amusement equipment. Its products include bill validator, bill recycler, intelligent cash box, multi-currency bill checker, foreign currency exchange machine, OEM terminal, compact coin and bill recycler, iClear system, automatic token circulating system, and prize management POS-system. It operates through the following segments: Global Gaming, Overseas Commercial, Domestic Commercial, and Amusement Equipment. The company was founded by Tamotsu Kamihigashi on January 11, 1955 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

JAPAN Creative Platform Group Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are involved in the printing business. It offers on-demand printing, desktop publishing, offset printing, signs and displays, three-dimensional computer graphics video production, commercial printing, web creation and promotion, digital contents production, and advertising agency services. The company was founded on January 5, 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Japan Elevator Service Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the maintenance and renewal services for elevators and escalators. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Maintenance, Parts Center, Technical Support, Control Center and Renewal. The Maintenance division provides the development, sale and installation of elevators and escalators. The Part Center division provides the maintenance of recycled parts (repair parts), elevator parts and others. The Technical Support division engages in the provision of engineering, quality and repair services. The Control Center division provides the safety and security services to the passengers. The Renewal division offers elevators designing, development of control panels, advanced technology and equipment performance improvement services. The company was founded by Katsushi Ishida on October 3, 1994 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Japan Exchange Group, Inc. operates as a financial exchange holding company that manages stock-company type financial instruments exchange and related businesses. It provides market infrastructure for financial instruments that offers investors a venue to manage their financial assets and listed companies, a platform to raise funds they require. The company was founded on January 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Japfa Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management services. It operates through the following segments: Animal Protein Indonesia; Animal Protein Other; Dairy; Consumer Food, and Others. The Animal Protein Indonesia segment operates animal protein of its publicly listed subsidiaries. The Animal Protein Other segment focuses in animal protein operations in Vietnam, India, Myanmar, and China. The Dairy segment includes production of premium raw milk in China and Indonesia and premium downstream milk products. The Consumer Food segment uses the animal protein products that are produced in-house as raw materials for .downstream consumer food segment. The Others segment involves in corporate office, central purchasing office, and consolidation adjustments. The company was in 1975 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Jardine Cycle & Carriage Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture, assembly, distribution, and retail of motor vehicles and motorcycles. It operates through the following segments: Astra, Direct Motor Interests, and Other Strategic Interests. The Astra segment produces, distributes, and retails motor vehicles and motorcycles. The Direct Motor Interests distributes and retails automobiles through its automotive firms and dealers in Singapore, Malaysia, Myanmar, Indonesia, and Vietnam. The Other Strategic Interests segment comprises of interests in Siam City Cement and Refrigeration Electrical Engineering Corporation. The company was founded on June 15, 1899 and is headquartered in Singapore.

JBCC Holdings Inc. operates as a holding company which provides management services to its group companies. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Information Solutions, Distribution and Product Development & Manufacturing. The Information Solutions segment provides services such as consulting, application development, system integration, operation, maintenance, monitoring, and outsourcing. The Distribution segment deals with the sale of hardware, software, and services to corporate partners. The Product Development & Manufacturing segment develops and produces printers and peripheral equipment, as well as provides printing support and information collaboration services. The company was founded on April 1, 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture and sale of heat treatment equipment. Its products include atmosphere and vacuum furnace which are mainly used in automotive, aeronautical, and other mechanical industries. The company also develops and manufactures the plasma surface modification equipment and large gas-fired industrial furnaces. It provides warranty maintenance services for heat treatment equipment and professional consulting services for heat treatment technology. The company was founded on July 30, 1988 and is headquartered in Dafeng, China.

Jcontentree Corp. engages in the production of contents and films. Its products include broadcasting programs such as dramas, contents, and films. The company was founded on September 28, 1987 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

JDM Jingda Machine (Ningbo) Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of machinery for both the mechanically expanded and brazed micro channel heat exchanger industry. Its products include metal form press, high speed press, micro channel coil machine, heat exchanger equipment, powder metallurgy equipment, tube benders, and tube expanders. The company was founded on August 15, 2002 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

JFE Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides strategic planning, risk management, accountability and corporate communications for all the subsidiaries and affiliates. It operates through the following segments: Steel, Engineering and Commercial Affairs. The Steel segment includes steel products, steel processing products, and raw materials. It also handles equipment maintenance and construction and the transportation industry. The Engineering segment provides engineering services for energy, urban environment, recycling, steel manufacturing, and industrial systems. The Commercial Affairs segment processes, supplies, and sells steel products, raw steel materials, and non-ferrous metal products. The company was founded on September 27, 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JGC Holdings Corp. engages in the provision of engineering, procurement and construction (EPC)services for plants and facilities. It operates through the following segments: Total Engineering, Catalyst and Fine Products, and Others. The Total Engineering segment handles the oil, petroleum refining, petrochemical, gas, LNG device, and the design, procurement, construction, and machinery and plant performance test services. The Catalyst and Fine Products segment includes chemical and fine products such as hydrotreating and petrochemical catalysts. The Others segment offers information processing business, consulting business, office building management business, power generation and desalination business, and production and sale of crude oil and gas. The company was founded by Masao Saneyoshi on October 25, 1928 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

j-Group Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies that operates restaurants and provides wedding services. It operates through the following segments: Restaurant, Bridal, Real Estate, and Others. The Restaurant segment operates drinking bars and restaurants serving Japanese and foreign food and beverages. The Bridal segment provides venues for wedding ceremonies and catering services for wedding receptions. The Real Estate segment engages in the rental, lease, management, and maintenance of real estate properties. The Others segment includes wholesale business, paid employment placement and advertising agency services. The company was founded on March 3, 1997 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Jiangmen Kanhoo Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of rare-earth luminescent materials and lithium ion battery autonomous manufacturing facilities. Its product includes tricolor, cold cathode fluorescent lamp, light-emitting diode (LED), neon, and special phosphor powder. The products are applied to energy-saving, discharge, and full spectrum fluorescent lamps; LED, flat panel display, plant growth lights, and medical ultraviolet light. The company was founded on April 2, 1994 and is headquartered in Jiangmen, China.

Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of automotive components. Its business segments include automobile and hospital industries. Its Automobile business produces and sells car bumpers, dashboards, license plates, grille, spoilers, anti-rubbing, and hood decorative products. Its Hospital business involves in the provision of diagnosis, and treatment for cardiovascular and diabetes diseases. The company was founded by Ming Fang Cao in June 1988 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.

Jiangsu Asia-pacific Light Alloy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of aluminum extrusion and precision drawn tubes. Its products include drawn tubes, multi-port extrusion tubes, extrusion profiles, and coaxial tube which are used across the automotive, transportation, HVAC & R and industrial sector. The company was founded on October 19, 2001 and is headquartered in Jiangsu, China.

Jiangsu Eastern Shenghong Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of services for silk industry management and operations. It provides electricity, heat energy, and advertising services for silk industries. The company was founded on July 16, 1998 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Jiangsu Jiangnan High Polymer Fiber Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture and sale of polyester top and bicomponent fiber products. Its products include polyester fiber, chemical fiber, polyester cuts and plastic pouch garment. The company also engages in the research and manufacture of its raw materials, machine equipment, apparatus and parts. Jiangsu Jiangnan High Polymer Fiber was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Jin Tong Ling Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of wind and air system and manufacture and sale of fluid mechanical products. The firm provides industrial centrifugal fans and blowers, axial fans, multi-stage centrifugal blower, single-stage high speed centrifugal blower, energy-efficient centrifugal air compressor, and small steam turbine. It also offers related project works and operation services, and manufacture and sale of fan accessories. Its products are used in the iron and steel smelting, thermal power, cement production, petrochemical, sewage treatment, and waste heat recovery industries. The company was founded in April 1993 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

Jiangsu Jiuwu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and application of ceramic membranes and membrane separation technologies. It also develops and manufactures membrane materials and complete sets of membrane separation equipment. The company provides systematic membrane integration technology overall solutions, membrane separation system integration, operational technical support, and operational services. Jiangsu Jiuwu Hi-Tech was founded on December 22, 1997 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automobile parts. Its products include automotive sensors and accessories, car fuel system accessories, automobile interior parts, and new energy components. The company was founded on November 19, 1993 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.

Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of heavy lifting machineries. Its major business is high-end equipment manufacture and environmental protection. The high-end equipment manufacture module include material lifting, offshore equipment and ship building, the products covered all kinds of lifting machinery, ship equipment, marine equipment, car parking equipment, engineering vessels and other related products. The environmental protection module include industrial wastewater treatment, sludge treatment, hazardous solid waste disposal and other energy saving, recycling economy business. The company was founded on September 25, 2003 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

Jiangsu Riying Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive and motorcycle related products. It specializes in automotive washing systems, automotive precision injection molded parts, automotive small wiring harnesses, automotive electronics, motorcycle wiring harnesses, high voltage distribution boxes, ambient lights, and new energy chains. The cleaning system including car front stop cleaning system and headlight cleaning system. The automotive electronic including solar sensors, rain sensors, and sunroof controllers. Wiring harness for vehicles including rear view mirror harness, door harness, and motorcycle harness. The company was founded on August 12, 1998 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Jiangsu Seagull Cooling Tower Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacturing, installation and technical services of industrial cooling towers. Its products include seawater, high-receiving, low-noise, closed, fiber-reinforced plastic structure, steel-concrete structure, and steel structure cooling towers. The company was founded by Zhu Ping Wu, Jun Ze Gong, Zu Gen Xu, Qi Pei Yin and Hui Ying Zhang on November 12, 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in development and manufacture of energy efficient hydraulic equipment. It also engages in the installation, repair, replacement and leasing of mechanical and electrical equipment. The company was founded on June 22, 2001 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.

Jiangsu Xinquan Automotive Trim Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of automotive interior and exterior trim parts and moulds. It specializes in auto parts and automotive accessories product line. Its products include dashboard assembly, overhead file cabinet assembly, door inner panel assembly, column guard assembly, flow tank cover assembly, and bumper assembly. Its product has been fully covered in commercial vehicle and passenger vehicle applications. The company was founded on April 28, 2001 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Jiangsu Yunyi Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of  ntelligent automotive power controller. It develops, manufactures, and markets automotive electronic components. Its products include automotive rectifier, regulator, and high power diodes. The company was founded in July 2001 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.

Jiangxi Xinyu Guoke Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of pyrotechnics and related products. The company's military products business includes research, development, production, and sales of military pyrotechnics, including pyrotechnic components and pyrotechnic devices. The company was founded on May 5, 2008 and is headquartered in Xinyu, China.

Jihua Group Corp. Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of footwear and leather shoes; textile printing and dyeing, and branded clothing. Its also offers protective equipment, medical equipment, fine dust control filter and equipment, and new energy facilities. The company was founded on June 26, 2009 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Jilin Yatai (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the business of real estate, finance, commerce & trade, Internet media, wholesale of coal, and manufacture and sale of building materials and pharmaceutical products. It also offers cement and clinker products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Jingjin Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of filter press machines. Its products include diaphragm filter press machines, chamber filter press machines, and supporting equipment and accessories such as filter plates and filter cloths. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Dezhou, China.

Jinhong Holdings Group Co., Ltd. engages in the integration of natural gas development application and environmental engineering. Its business activities include gas supply, long-distance pipelines, storage station, gas city network, transportation application, industrial application, energy distribution and environmental engineering. The company was founded on December 25, 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of gold jewelry business and financial leasing business. It focuses on gold jewelry research and development, design, manufacturing, wholesale, and retail; financial leasing and rental income, and entrusted loan interest income. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Jiutian Chemical Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in manufacturing and selling of chemical-based products such as methylamine and dimethylformamid. It also deals with the processing and sale of consumable carbon dioxide and oxygen. The company was founded on November 30, 1994 and is headquartered in Singapore.

JK Holdings Co., Ltd. manages its group companies which are in the building materials industry. It operates through the following segments: General Building Material Wholesale, Plywood Manufacturing and Wood Processing, General Building Material Retail, and Others. The General Building Material Wholesale deals with the wholesale of timber, lumber, plywood, housing equipment, fixtures, and various building materials. The Plywood Manufacturing and Wood Processing segment manufactures and sells ordinary plywood, structural laminated veneer lumber, glued laminated timber, and wood panels. The General Building Material Retail segment offers plywood, secondary plywood products, building materials, and housing equipment to consumers. The Others segment includes franchise, real estate leasing, warehousing and transportation, construction, travel, and insurance agency businesses. The company was founded by Takeshi Yoshida in October 1937 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JL MAG Rare-Earth Co., Ltd. engages in the research & development, production and sales of rare earth permanent magnetic materials. It supplies various grades of NdFeB permanent magnet materials. The company was founded on August 19, 2008 and is headquartered in Ganzhou, China.

Joincare Pharmaceutical Group Industry Co., Ltd. principally engages in the research, development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical products and healthcare products. It offers healthcare products, active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) (including intermediates), final dosage forms, prescription drugs, over-the-counter (OTC) medicines, Chinese traditional medicines, chemical drugs, and testing agents, etc. Its brands for the healthcare products included Taitai, Jingxin, and Eagle. The company was founded by Bao Guo Zhu on December 18, 1992 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Jonjee Hi-Tech Industrial & Commercial Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the investment and development of high-tech industries, infrastructure, real estate, and industrial park development. The company was founded on January 16, 1993 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.

JP Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of nursery service; gymnastic; English and eurythmic school service; food service; distribution service; and research, training and consulting services. The company was founded in August 1992 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

JUKI Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial sewing machines, SMT (Surface Mounting Technology) systems and household sewing machines. It operates through the following divisions: Industrial Sewing Machinery Business, Household Sewing Machinery Business, Electronic Assembly Systems Business, Group Business, and Customer Support Business. The Industrial Sewing Machinery Business division engages in the sale of industrial sewing machines integrated with automation equipment and IT (Information Technology) systems such as sewing machine for clothes, knitwear and non-apparels; and also provides automatic machines for lockstitches and automatic welding machines. The Household Sewing Machinery Business division provides household computerized sewing machines, 2-needle and 4-thread over lock machines, portable semi-industrial sewing machines and long arm quilting machines. The Electronic Assembly Systems Business division focused on SMT equipment for electronic circuit boards production systems or related products such as printing machines and inspection machines. The Group Business division focused on contracted development and manufacturing business, sleep busters and data entry systems. The Customer Support Business division provides consumables and spare parts. The company was founded on December 15, 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JUTEC Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies which provides and sells construction materials, plywood, housing equipment, and DIY goods. Its other businesses include logistic business of transporting general cargo, construction works contract, apartment renovation, and information systems rental services. The company was founded in October 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JW Holdings Corp, a holding company, operates through the control over subsidiary entities and engages in the wholesale, retail, import and export of medical products. It operates through the following business divisions: holding, medicine, medical equipment and others. The holding business division engages in the management of affiliate companies within the holding group. The medicine business division engages in the manufacture and sale of medicines. The medical equipment business division engages in the manufacture and sale of medical equipment. The others business division engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile products and in real estate investments. The company was founded in July 1, 2007 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

ENEOS Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the energy, resources, and materials businesses. It operates through the following segments: Energy, Oil and Natural Gas Exploration and Production, Metals, and Others. The Energy segment offers petroleum refining and marketing, basic chemical products, lubricants, specialty and performance chemical products, coal, electricity, gas, and new energy. The Oil and Natural Gas Exploration and Production segment deals with the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas. The Metal segment encompasses non-ferrous metal resources development and mining, non-ferrous metal recycling and industrial waste treatment, shipping of products including metal business products, and production of copper, gold, silver, sulfuric acid, copper foils, materials for rolling and processing, thin film materials, and titanium. The Others segment includes asphalt paving, civil engineering, construction, electric wire, land transportation, real estate leasing, research, planning, consulting and finance-related businesses. The company was founded on April 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

K&O Energy Group, Inc. engages in the management of gas and iodine businesses. It operates through the following segments: Gas, Iodine and Brine, and Others. The Gas segment involves in the production and distribution of natural gas, city gas, compressed natural gas, and liquefied petroleum gas. The Iodine and Brine segment produces and sells iodine, iodine compounds, and brine as raw material for iodine. The Others segment includes civil works and pipe laying; and gas equipment sales. The company was founded on January 6, 2014 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kadokawa Corp. engages in the management of its group companies that are involved in the publishing, film, publishing rights, and digital content businesses. It operates through the following segments: Books and IP Business, Information Media Business, Video and IP (Intellectual Property) Business, Portal Business, Live Business, Mobile Business, Game Business, and Others. The Books and IP Business segment includes the sale and publishing of books and e-books. The Information Media Business segment covers publication and sale of magazines, and web advertising. The Video and IP Business segment deals with the sale of DVD (Digital Versatile Disc) packaged software, and movie planning, production and distribution services. The Portal Business segment manages video community services. The Live Business segment handles the planning and management of events and rental of event venues. The Mobile Business segment includes mobile content delivery services. The Game Business segment plans, develops and sells software and networking games. The Others segment covers sales of goods. It also handles the planning, development and operation of network entertainment service and content; and video sharing websites. The company was founded on October 1, 2014 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kama Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, export and import, and sale of truck, diesel engine, mining engine, and small mechanical and electrical products. The company was founded on June 19, 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Kanaden Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of various types of electrical, electronic, communications machinery, related components and materials. It operates through the following segments: Factory Automation (FA) Systems, Building Facilities, Infrastructures, and Information and Communication Equipment. The FA Systems segment provides factory automation equipment, laser processing machines, and mechatronic products. The Building Facilities segment offers uninterruptible power supplies, elevators, building management systems, air-conditioning equipment, housing equipment, and low-temperature equipment. The Infrastructure segment manages the sale of substation power equipment, telecommunications equipment and vehicle-use electrical equipment. It also sells systems for traffic safety, air traffic control, disaster prevention, and large videos. The Information & Communication Equipment segment handles the sale of microcomputers for security systems, video systems, telecommunications equipment, automobiles, and industrial equipment. The company was founded on May 15, 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kappa Create Co., Ltd. engages in the management of sushi chain restaurants. It operates through the following segments: Conveyor Belt Sushi and Delicatessen Business. The Conveyor Belt Sushi segment deals with the operation of sushi-go-round restaurant chains. The Delicatessen Business segment produces and supplies sushi and prepared bread for convenience stores. It also engages in the processing and sale of food products. The company was founded by Junwa Tokuyama in August 1973 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Katrina Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the ownership and operation of restaurant. It specializes in multi-cuisine concepts under Bali Thai, Honguo, Indobox, So Pho, Streats, Bayang, Hutong, Muchos, RENNthai, and Tomo Izakaya brands. It operates through the following segments: Hospitality, and Food and Beverage. The Hospitality segment offer an affordable, accessible and comfortable option for leisure travelers and corporate expatriates seeking serviced apartments in Singapore. The company was founded by Keng Chian Goh and Kim Wah Tan on March 31, 2016 and is headquartered in Singapore.

KBI METAL Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of motor cores used in automobiles and transformers. It operates through the following business divisions: Automotive electrical parts, Metal, and Wire.The Automotive electrical parts business division offers products such as alternating current motor, alternator, starter motor, seat ventilation heating module, ventilation boosting module. The Metal business division offers copper rod, annealed copper wire and hard-drawn copper wire. The Wire business division offers wires and cables. The company was founded on February 25, 1987 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
KC Green Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the investment and management of its subsidiaries. The company was founded on November 27, 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Keboda Technology Co., Ltd. provides system solutions for smart and energy-saving electronic components of cars. It researches, develops, produces, and sells electronic automobile products including lighting control systems, motor control systems, energy management systems, as well as automotive electrical appliances and electronics. The company was founded on September 12, 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

KEC Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of business management and consulting services to its subsidiaries, which are engaged in the manufacturing of diodes, transistors and similar semi-conductor devices. It operates through following business areas: direct management of subsidiaries; supporting of fund and business for subsidiaries; management consulting and other consulting business; technology research and development and technical information provision; licensing of brand and trade mark right; real estate development and lease; and import and export related agency business. The company was founded on September 9, 1969 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Keda Industrial Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of building industrial machinery and equipment. Its business scope includes the manufacture of ceramic, stone, wall materials, energy saving, environmental protection and other large-scale integration of mechanical & electrical machinery and equipment. The company also provides complete solution for ceramics, building materials, natural & artificial stone processing as well as new power and clean coal gasification. Keda Industrial Group was founded on December 8, 1992 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Kehua Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive component. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of turbocharger components, hydraulic pumps, valves and machinery fittings. The company was founded on June 13, 2002 and is headquartered in Liyang, China.

Keihan Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which provides the local railway, bus, water transportation, and station services. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: Transportation, Real Estate, Distribution, Leisure and Service, and Others. The Transportation segment includes railway and bus transportation services. The Real Estate segment handles real estate leasing and sales, survey design, and wholesale of construction materials. The Distribution segment operates department stores, shopping malls, and restaurants. The Leisure and Service segment manages hotels, resorts and tourist boat business. The Others segment provides credit card services. The company was founded by Eiichi Shibusawa on November 19, 1906 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Kencana Agri Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the oil palm business. It operates through the Plantation, and Logistics and Bulking segments. The Plantation segment comprises of plantations, palm oil mills, and kernel crushing plants. The Logistics and Bulking segment provides support storage facilities and transportation of palm oil products. The company was founded by Henry Maknawi in 1995 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Kenon Holdings Ltd. engages in the operation of growth-oriented businesses. It operates through the following segments: OPC and Quantum. The company was founded on March 7, 2014 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Keong Hong Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of building construction services. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Property Development, Investment Property, and Investment Holding. The Construction segment deals with the business of general building contractors. The Property Development segment includes developing properties with partners. The Investment Property segment involves in the leasing office and retail shops in commercial buildings acquired in Osaka Japan. The Investment Holding segment consists of corporate services and investments in quoted and unquoted equity shares. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Keppel Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding and management company, which engages in the provision of offshore and marine engineering and construction services. It operates through the following segments: Offshore & Marine, Infrastructure, Property, and Investments. The Offshore & Marine segment includes offshore rig design, construction, repair and upgrading, ship conversions, repair, and specialized shipbuilding. The Infrastructure segment comprises of environmental engineering, power generation, logistics, and data centers businesses. The Property segment covers property development, investment, and fund management services. The Investments segment consists mainly of interest in investment holding companies. The company was founded on August 3, 1968 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Keppel DC REIT is a real investment trust company, which invests in real estate assets. It focuses on investment directly and indirectly in a diversified portfolio of income-producing real estate assets which are used primarily for data centre purposes, as well as real estate related assets, with an initial focus on Asia Pacific and Europe. It operates through the following segments: Colocation, Fully Fitted, and Shell and Core. The company was founded on March 17, 2011 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Keppel REIT is engaged in the investments in a portfolio of commercial real estate and other real estate-related assets. Its portfolio includes office and commercial towers and financial center buildings. The company was founded on November 28, 2005 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Kerur Holdings Ltd. engages in the production, marketing, and distribution of non-alcoholic beverages, soft drinks, snacks, and frozen foods. The company was founded on May 10, 1929 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

KeyHolder, Inc. engages in the operation, planning, development, and construction of amusement and commercial facilities. It operates through the following business segments: General Entertainment, Video Production, Advertising Agency, Real Estate, and Commercial Facility Construction. The General Entertainment segment covers event planning, event space operation, and talent management. The Video Production segment deals with the planning and production of video contents as well as training and dispatch of video production staff. The Advertising Agency segment undertakes casting calls and advertising planning for talent artists. The Real Estate segment develops, sells, and leases real estate properties. The Commercial Facility Construction segment designs and constructs pachinko halls, karaoke shops, and restaurants. The company was founded by Katsunori Manabe on February 11, 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
KFC Holdings Japan Ltd. engages in the sale of fried chicken and processed chicken. The company was founded on July 4, 1970 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kian Shen Corp. engages in the manufacturing and trading of auto parts. The company offers car body beam, stamping moulds, electric scooter frames, rear body, dies & jigs, suspension, components, high tensile steel and other related parts. It mainly distributes its products mainly within the domestic market. Kian Shen was founded on May 30, 1963 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

Kikkoman Corp. is a holding company which engages in the food manufacturing business. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Foods-Manufacturing and Sales, Domestic Others, Overseas Foods-Manufacturing and Sales, and Overseas Foods-Wholesale. The Domestic Foods-Manufacturing and Sales segment manufactures and sells soy sauce, beverages, and alcoholic beverages. The Domestic Others segment involves in the production and sale of clinical diagnostic reagents, hygiene inspection agents, processing enzymes and chemical products such as hyaluronic acid. It also operates in real estate property leasing, logistics, and back-office support for Kikkoman Group, and other businesses. The Overseas Foods-Manufacturing and Sales segment sells soy sauce, Del Monte products, and overseas health foods. The Overseas Food-Wholesale segment purchases and sells oriental food products in Japan and overseas. The company was founded on December 7, 1917 and is headquartered in Noda, Japan.

Kimly Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management services. It operates through the following business segments: Outlet Management, Food Retail, and Others. The Outlet Management segment comprises of coffee shop operations. The Food Retail segment retails cooked food through the stalls operated by the Group. The Others segment provides management and human resource services. The company was founded by Hee Liat Lim and Oon Kee Peh on March 23, 2016 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Kingdom Holding Co. provides investment services. It operates through the following business segments: Equity, Hotels and Real Estate & Domestic. The Equity segment involves in investment securities quoted on the Saudi stock and international quoted securities as well as in private equities, managed funds and other entities existing within the structure of the Group. The Hotels segment includes investments in subsidiaries and associates that are in the business of managing and owning hotel properties and related activities. The Real Estate & Domestic segment includes investments in activities relating to ownership and development of land and real estate projects and local entities. The company was founded by Al-Waleed bin Talal bin Abdul Aziz bin Al-Saud on 1980 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Kingland Technology Co., Ltd. engages in smart ecological operations, and provision of clean energy and cloud services. Its activities include the following: investment in and construction of high-efficient water works, pipe networks, and related projects; waste heat and residual power generation, energy management, and chemical industry upgrading; and cloud-based ecological monitoring, e-commerce, and financial services. The company was founded on March 31, 1993 and is headquartered Beijing, China.

Kingsmen Creatives Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in communication design and production. It operates through the following business segments: Exhibitions, Thematic and Attractions; Retail and Corporate Interiors; Research and Design; Alternative Marketing; and Corporate and Others. The Exhibitions, Thematic and Attractions segment relates to the production of exhibition displays for trade shows and promotional events; interiors and displays for museums and visitor centers and thematic and scenic displays for theme parks; and development and operation of experiential and themed attractions. The Retail and Corporate Interiors segment provides interior fitting-out services to retail and commercial properties. The Research and Design segment designs works for upmarket specialty stores, departmental stores, eateries, museums, visitors' centers, corporate offices, showrooms, trade shows, events, promotional functions, and festivals. The Alternative Marketing segment engages in event management, branding consultancy services, and custom publishing. The Corporate and Others segment deals with Group-level corporate services. The company was founded by Chin Sim Ong and Siak Poh Soh in 1976 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Kirin Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of beverages and pharmaceutical products. It operates through the following segments: Japan Beer and Spirits, Japan Non-Alcoholic Beverages, Oceania Integrated Beverages, Pharmaceuticals, and Other. The Japan Beer and Spirits segment manufactures and sells beer, sparkling wine, Western liquor, and other alcoholic beverages through its subsidiary. The Japan Non-Alcoholic Beverages segment handles the manufacture and sale of soft drinks in Japan through its subsidiary. The Oceania Integrated Beverages segment provides beer, Western liquor, dairy products, and fruit juice drinks in the Oceania region through its subsidiary. The Pharmaceuticals segment deals with prescription drugs through its subsidiary. The Other segment includes domestic wine, Myanmar liquor, North American beverage, and biochemical businesses. The company was founded on February 23, 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kirindo Holdings Co. Ltd. engages in the sale of pharmaceutical, child care, cosmetics, health food products and related miscellaneous goods for drugstores. It operates through the Retail and Others segments. The Retail segment covers the sale of pharmaceutical, child care, cosmetic products, and health food products in drugstores and pharmacies. The Others segment includes wholesale, medical consulting, and overseas businesses. The company was founded in March,1958 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

KISCO Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries are engaged in the business of blast furnaces and steel mills sector. The company was founded on February 19, 1957 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.

Kitagawa Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of castings, construction equipment, industrial machinery, and related equipment. It operates through the following segments: Metal Forges and Foundries, Construction Machinery, and Industrial Machinery. The Metal Forges and Foundries segment provides automobile parts and other machinery components. The Construction Machinery segment handles lathe chucks, hydraulic rotary cylinders, NC rotary tables, and power vises. The Industrial Machinery segment manages concrete mixers, concrete plants, cranes, environment-related facilities, and recycling plants. It also operates self-propelled multi-storey car parks. The company was founded in March 1918 and is headquartered in Fuchu, Japan.

KITAKEI CO., LTD. engages in the sale of building materials and housing equipment to wood shops, construction stores, and building contractors. Its products include fixtures, fittings, interior and exterior materials, functional products, hardware, and wood. The company was founded on December 22, 1959 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Kito Corp. engages in the design, manufacture, construction, sale, repair, and maintenance of material handling equipment and its facilities. It operates through the following geographical segments: Japan, Americas, China, Asia, Europe, and Other. Its products include hoists, cranes, below hook devices, lashings, and balancers. The company was founded by Miyoshi Kito in November 1932 and is headquartered in Nakakoma, Japan.

KNT-CT Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management and administration of its group companies with an interest in travel and tour services business. The company was founded on May 26, 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kobelco Eco-Solutions Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of water treatment related equipment, and chemical and food machinery products. It operates through the following segments: Water Treatment-related, Waste Treatment-related, and Chemical and Food Machinery-related.
