The Water Treatment-related segment offers facilities and equipment for industrial water and above water, sewer, manufacturing facilities and apparatus for ultra pure water, pure water, plant water and wastewater treatment equipment, recycling equipment of sewage sludge and food such as organic waste, and cooling tower for industries and air-conditioning. The Waste Treatment-related segment includes incineration and melting facilities of municipal solid waste, various recycling equipment such as bulky waste, electronic waste, PCB detoxification-related, and management of waste final disposal site. The Chemical and Food Machinery-related segment provides chemical industrial equipment and devices, powdered or granular equipment and devices, brewing equipment, and hydrogen oxygen generator. The company was founded on June 1, 1954 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

Koei Tecmo Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in game software development. It operates through the following business segments: Entertainment, SP, Amusement Facility Operations, Real Estate, and Others. The Entertainment segment develops and sells entertainment contents for personal computers, family consoles, online games, and smartphone applications. The SP segment develops the pachinko and pachislots, and royalty income. The Amusement Facility Operations segment manages amusement arcades. The Rea Estate segment covers real estate leases. The Others segment includes the venture capital businesses. The company was founded by Keiko Erikawa on April 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Koh Young Technology, Inc. engages in the development and manufacture of inspection and measurement automation equipment. Its products include 3D SPI systems, bump inspection systems for printed circuit board wrapping, and semiconductor substrate bump. The company was founded on April 25, 2002 by Kwang-Ill, Koh and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Kohsoku Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of light-weight food containers and industrial packaging materials. Its products include food trays, plastic bags, films, laminates, labels, flyers, and machinery such as sealing, packaging, and food processing equipment. The company was founded by Kikuo Terashi on February 12, 1966 and is headquartered in Sendai, Japan.

Kolon Corp. is a holding company which engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its main businesses include governance, management guidance, organization, and promotion of its subsidiaries; intellectual property rights such as brand trademark of Kolon, and related advertisement; property sales and leasing; and intangible assets sales, and market research and management consulting services. The company was founded on April 12, 1957 and is headquartered in Gwacheon, South Korea.

Komatsu Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction and mining equipment, utility devices, forest and industrial machineries. It operates through the following business segments: Construction Machinery and Vehicles, Retail Finance, Industrial Machinery, and Others. The Construction Machinery and Vehicle segment covers machineries for mining, loading, transportation, underground construction, and recycling. It also includes leveling roadbed for machinery, industrial vehicle, engine, other machineries and equipment, casting and logistics. The Retail Finance segment offers sales financing related to construction and mining machineries. The Industrial Machinery and Others segment covers forming and sheet metal machinery, machine tools, defense related, temperature controlled equipment, prefabricated house for business, and semiconductor exposure equipment for excimer laser. The company was founded by Meitaro Takeuchi on March 13, 1921 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

KOMEDA Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are involved in the coffee shop franchise business. It carries Kohisho Komeda Kohiten and Kanmi Kissa Okagean coffee shop brands. The company was founded on November 28, 2014 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Konami Holdings Corp. engages in the development, production, and distribution of amusement arcade games, video game software products, social games, and entertainment content. It operates through the following segments: Digital Entertainment, Gaming & Systems, Amusement, and Sports. The Digital Entertainment segment provides mobile, computer, video, arcade, and card games. The Gaming & Systems segment develops, manufactures, distributes and services gaming machines and casino management systems for the casino market. The Amusement segment handles design, production and sales of amusement machines and online game services. The Sports segment manages and operates fitness clubs and sports classes; and also designs, manufactures and sells fitness machines as well as sports-related products. The company was founded by Kagemasa Kozuki on March 21, 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

KOREA FLANGE Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of machineries. It operates through the following businesses: Automotive Parts, Frange, Industrial Machineries. Its products include halfshaft, axle, measuring devices, crank shaft, connecting rod, flanges, vessel engine base, and others. The company was founded on July 15, 1974 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

Korea Fuel-Tech Corp. engages in the manufacturing of fuel system and interior parts for vehicles. Its products include canister, filler neck, intake, intercooler, ashtray, cup holder, air vent, arm rest, trim and sun shade. The company was founded on July 5, 1984 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.

Kolmar Korea Holdings Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. It operates through the following business: Cosmetics, Pharmaceuticals and Health Functional Foods. The Cosmetics business offers skin care, make up, perfume, quasi drugs, hair care, and body care products. The Pharmaceuticals business includes specialized medicines, general medicines, bio-equivalence medicine, contract process, and quasi drugs. The Health Functional Foods business offers functional health foods and specialty foods. The company was founded on May 15, 1990 and is headquartered in Sejong, South Korea.

Hankook Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the leasing and holding business. It operates through following business divisions: Tire, General Machinery, Mold Manufacturing, and Storage Battery. The company was founded on May 10, 1941 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Kori Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the provision of management and administrative support to its subsidiary corporations. It operates through the following segments: Structural Steelworks Services and Tunneling Services. The Structural Steelworks Services segment offers designs, purchases, and fabricates reusable steel struts and steel beams for temporary strutting works in earth retaining or stabilizing structures for excavation works and rental of steel beams and oil jacks. The Tunneling Services segment supplies skilled personnel with the required technical expertise to provide macro-tunneling works. The company was founded by Kori Nobuaki on May 18, 2012 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Kotobuki Spirits Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which engages in the manufacture and sale of confectionery products. It operates through the following segments: KCC, Kotobuki Seika, Sales Subsidiary, Kujukushima Group, Tajima Kotobuki, Sucrey, and Others. The KCC segment manufactures and sells confectioneries under the LeTAO and GLACIEL brands. The Kotobuki Seika segment produces and sells confectioneries with the shop brands Kotobuki-jo sweets and KAnoZA. The Sales Subsidiary segment sells confectionery products under the Konditorei Kobe brand. The Kujukushima Group segment manufactures and sells confectioneries with the shop brands Akai Fusen and Ivorish. The Tajima Kotobuki segment produces and sells confectioneries under the Yuzukitei brand. The Sucrey segment sells confectionery products with the shop brands Tsukiji Chitose and Tokyo Milk Cheese Factory. The Others segment provides insurance services and sells healthy food. The company was founded on April 25, 1952 and is headquartered in Yonago, Japan.

Koufu Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the operation and management of coffee shops, hawkers, and food courts. It operates through the following segments: Outlet and Mall Management Business, Food and Beverages (F&B) Retail Business, and Others. The Outlet and Mall Management Business segment leases food outlet premises, provides cleaning and utilities services, and offers management services to third party food courts. The F&B Retail Business segment retails cooked food directly to consumers through the stalls. The Others segment includes provision of management, treasury, and administrative services. The company was founded by Lim Pang and Hoon Tien Ng in 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

KU Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company and engages in the management of its group companies. The company was founded by Yoshihiro Inoue on October 26, 1972 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kuangda Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, spinning, dyeing, weaving, post-finishing, and lamination to car seat cover. Its products include automotive interior fabric and differentiated color polyester filament for car seats, door panels, ceiling, woven fabrics, warp knitted fabrics and weft knitted fabrics. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Kurita Water Industries Ltd. engages in the provision of water treatment solution products, technology, and maintenance services. It operates through the following business segments: Water Treatment Chemicals and Water Treatment Facilities. The Water Treatment Chemicals segment provides chemicals for the following: boiler water treatment, cooling water treatment, wastewater treatment, and process treatment. It also provides packaged contracts, chemical injection, and dosing equipment. The Water Treatment Facilities segment provides ultrapure water production system, water treatment systems for general industrial use, wastewater treatment, and reclamation systems. The company was founded on July 13, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kuriyama Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group of companies that deals in the sale and application of rubble and plastic components. It operates through the following segments: Asia Business, North America Business, and Europe Business. The Asia Business segment sells and installs rubber products for construction and agricultural machinery. It also offers rubber bearings and fenders used for the construction of sports facilities, railways, and large commercial facilities. It also handles technical research and product development, sale of mats for dust control, and real estate management. The North America Business segment markets industrial hoses and fittings in North America through its subsidiaries. The Europe Business segment manufactures and sells lay flat hoses, fittings, fire hoses, and nozzles in Europe and South America. The company was founded on April 5, 1939 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Kushikatsu Tanaka Holdings Co. engages in the operation of restaurants specializing in skewers. It also deals with the development of franchises. The company was founded by Keiji Kan in November 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

KYORIN Holdings, Inc. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of pharmaceutical products through its subsidiaries. It operates through the Pharmaceutical Business and Healthcare Business segments. The Pharmaceutical Business segment engages in the production and sales of prescription drugs, generic drugs, and over the counter drugs. The Healthcare Business segment engages in the development and sales of skincare and cosmetics using drug formulation technology. The company was founded on October 31, 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Kyowa Corporation Co. Ltd. engages in the amusement business. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Amusement and Others. The Amusement division operates amusement facilities, batting centers, bowling alley management centers, game equipment sales and consignment vendor management facilities. The Other division engages in the business of advertising agency services. The company was founded by Kazuhiko Miyamoto and Sanae Miyamoto on January 1, 1982 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan.

KyungDong Invest Co., Ltd. operates as an investment holding company focused on natural gas and energy investment. The company engages in providing city gas and energy-saving projects. Its products and services include liquefied natural gas (LNG), compressed natural gas (CNG) charging services, gas heating system and gas boiler. The company was founded on June 15, 1977 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, design and sale of jewelries, gold, silver, and stones. It also involves in the manufacture, sale and distribution of stationary products with the brand name "CHUNGHWA", import and export business, arts & crafts, property management, and pawn and auction business. The company was founded on May 20, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Leejam Sports Co. JSC engages in the management and operation of sports and recreational centers. It's activities consist solely of the provision of high quality health, fitness facilities, and personal training services. The company was founded by Abdul Mohsen Bin Ali Al-Hagbani in May 6, 2008 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

LG Corp. as a holding company engages in the management of subsidiary companies. It operates through its subsidiaries which include: LG Electronics, LG Chem, LG Uplus, LG CNS, SERVEONE, LG Siltron, LUSEM, LG Solar Energy and LG Sports. The company was founded on January 5, 1947 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

LG International Corp. engages in the development of energy, raw materials and trading industrial materials. Its products include oil, coal, nonferrous metals, and steel products. The company was founded on November 26, 1953 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

LHN Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in the real estate management services. It operates through the following segments: Space Optimisation Business, Facilities Management Business, and Logistic Services Business. The Space Optimisation Business segment specializes in the design, refurbishment, leasing, and management of industrial, commercial, and residential properties. The Facilities Management Business segment provides building maintenance, security, cleaning, landscaping, pest control, and car park management services. The Logistics Services Business segment gives transportation and container depot management service. The company was founded by Hean Nerng Lim on July 10, 2014 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Liaoning Cheng Da Co., Ltd. engages in the commodities distribution, import and export trading as well as biological drug manufacturing. It also engages in the trade of textile products, bulk steel raw materials, vaccines, development of energy and management of pharmacy retail stores. It provides the agricultural production materials, financial and investment services. The company was founded in June 1993 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

Lijiang Yulong Tourism Co., Ltd. engages in the tourism business. It focuses on the services of passenger ropeway, Impression Lijiang Snow Mountain performance, and construction and operation of hotels. The firm operates Yulong Snow Mountain, Yunshanping, and Maoniuping cableway. It also involves in investment and construction of Lijiang Business and Cultural Main Street for hire, Yulong Snow Mountain Tourist Service Centers, White Deer Travel Agency, and tourist vehicles. The company was founded on October 18, 2001 and is headquartered in Lijiang, China.

Lingyun Industrial Corp. Ltd. engages in manufacturing and distribution of automobile metal and plastic spare parts, as well as plastic pipeline systems. It offers automobile metal spare parts, including automobile door sashes, door tracks, bumpers, reinforcing plates, brackets, and door glass run channels. The company was founded on April 10, 1995 and is headquartered in Zhuozhou, China.

Lionco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of chemical drug and antibiotic agents. Its business operations include the development of medical device technology, and the investment and management of pharmaceutical industries. It products include chinese medicines and health care products. The company was founded on December 24, 2003 and is headquartered in Shannan, China.

LIXIL Group Corp. engages in the management of its group companies that operates housing and urban environment-related businesses. It operates through the following business divisions: Water Technology, Housing Technology, Building Technology, Kitchen Technology, Distribution and Retail, and Housing and Services. The Water Technology segment covers sanitary equipment, faucet fittings and bathroom fixtures. The Housing Technology segment includes sash, door, shutter, interior building materials and related fixtures. The Building Technology segment handles curtain walls. The Kitchen Technology segment manufactures and sells kitchen system equipment. The Distribution and Retail segment sells daily necessities, Do It Yourself (DIY) goods and building materials. The Housing and Services segment offers housing solutions, real estate sales and brokerage, and management of nursing apartments. The company was founded by Kenjiro Ushioda on September 19, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Longlife Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the management of group companies that provides home care nursing and related services. It operates through the following segments: Nursing Home, In-home Nursing Care, Welfare Equipment, Food, Resort, and Others. The Nursing Home segment operates and manages nursing and group homes. The In-home Nursing Care segment provides home care services to elderly and sickly people. The Welfare Equipment segment sells and loans assistive devices, and supports senior citizens living on their own with the assistance of nursing care equipment specialists. The Food segment handles the preparation of meals served to nursing homes and daytime care service facilities operated by the subsidiaries. The Resort segment covers the resorts in Yufuin, Ishigakijima, Hakodate, and Hakone. The Others segment includes pharmaceutical and investment businesses. The company was founded on September 17, 1986 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Look Holdings, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of women's clothing. It operates through the following business segments: Apparel, Production and Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), Logistics, and Food and Beverage. The Apparel segment handles the promotion of existing and new brands, such as Il Bisonte and Mirimekko. The Production and Original Equipment Manufacturer segment produces apparel related products. The Logistics segment handles the inspection and logistics operations of the company products. The Food and Beverage segment manufactures and sells gelato products. The company was founded on October 29, 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

LS Cable & System Asia Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of electric power and communication cables. Its products include Overhead Wire, HV, LV/MV Power Cable, UTP, Shielding and Optical Fiber Cable. The company was founded on May 15, 2015 and is headquartered in Anyang-si, South Korea.

LS Corp., a holding company, engages in the management and controlling of business contents of its domestic companies through ownership of shares. The company, through its subsidiaries, operates following business divisions: Electric Cable, Power Generation, Mtron, I&D, and LS-Nikko Copper Smelting. The Electric Cable business division produces and offers ultra-high voltage power lines and optical communication cables. Power Generation business division engages in manufacturing and supplying of copper pipes, automation devices and systems. Mtron business division engages in the machinery and component business that offers products such as tractors and injection machines. I&D business division engages in the real estate development and in overseas investment. The LS-Nikko Copper Smelting business division operates as raw material processing business. The company was founded on May 15, 1962 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Lucky Harvest Co., Ltd. specializes in the development, production, and sales of automotive parts. Its business includes precision stamping dies and metal structural parts. The company was founded on May 20, 2004 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

Luenmei Quantum Co., Ltd. engages in the following business activities: heat supply, steam supply, power generation, access network service, and engineering industries. Its Heat Supply business provides heating services through heating pipe networks. Its Steam Supply business distributes and sells steam supplies. Its Power Generation business operates coal-fired and biomass power generation enterprise. Its Access Network Service business offers heating pipe network access with corresponding fees. Its Engineering business involves in the heating engineering projects. The company was founded on January 25, 1999 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

Lumax International Corp. Ltd. engages in the distribution of electronic and telecommunication components, trading of process control equipment, and system integration. The company was founded on August 16, 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

MACHVISION, Inc. engages in the manufacture and provision of semiconductors and printed circuit board inspection service products. Its products include drill bit inspection systems, PCB line inspection equipment, high density interconnect (HDI) and integrated circuit (IC) substrate inspection equipment. The Company provides three categories of technologies: advanced visual interface (AVI) technology; two dimensional (2D) and three dimensional (3D) measurement technology; and automated optical inspection (AOI) technology. MACHVISION was founded on June 9, 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

Macnica Fuji Electronics Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the electronic components business. It operates through the Integrated Circuits and Electronic Devices, and Network Business segments. The Integrated Circuits and Electronic Devices segment produces semiconductors, integrated circuits, and electronic components. The Network Business segment deals with network-related software, hardware, and services. The company was founded on April 1, 2015 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Maeil Dairies Co. Ltd. develops and sells dairy products. It operates through the following brands: Maeil Milk, Absolute, Sangha Farm, Maeil Bio, Cafe Latte, Barista Rules, Easily Digested Mild, Sunup, Maeil Soy Milk, Sangha Cheese, Mammameal, Almond Breeze, Mister Brown, Florida's Natural, Maeil Processed milk, Inside Milk, Banana is White, Hershey, Picnic, Domashno, Pure, Enyo, Gut, Calcium Soy milk, Maeil Yogurt, Fine Cool, MCC Kobe Restaurant Curry, Ferrero Rocher, Special Powdered Milk, ARLA, ECHIRE, AMBROSI, and Absolute Absomom. Its products offered are milk, baby foods, fermented milk, organic foods, beverages, coffee, cheese, home meal replacements, and imported products. The company was founded on May 1, 2017 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Mannai Corp. QPSC operates within the diversified financials sector focusing on multi-sectors. It offers a range of products and services, which include information and communication technology, automotive and heavy equipment distribution and service, geotechnical, geological, environmental and material testing services, engineering services to the oil and gas sector, logistics and warehousing, office systems, medical equipment, building materials, travel services, home appliances and electronics, trading and representation, facilities maintenance and management services and engages in trading of gold and gold jewelry, diamond jewelry, pearls, watches, silver and precious stones on wholesale and retail basis. The company operates through the following segments: Information Technology, Auto Group, Energy & Industrial Markets, Geotechnical Services, Logistics, Travel, Engineering, Jewelry Trading, Telecom Retail, and Others. Mannai was founded on January 26, 1963 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

Maoye Commercial Co., Ltd. engages in the retail and wholesale of general merchandise, knitting and textiles, cosmetics, foods and hardware. The company also sells health food, Chinese medicine materials, wine and cigarette, apparel and sounds equipment, among others. Maoye Commercial was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Marketech International Corp. provides marketing and technology integration support services. Its products and services include representative business, system solutions, engineering services and equipment manufacturing. The company was founded on December 27, 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Marubun Corp. engages in the semiconductor and electronic device solutions business. It operates through the following segments: Device and Systems. The Device segment offers semiconductors and its parts such as general-purpose integrated circuit (IC), memory IC, and application-specific IC. The Systems segment provides equipment for the fields of aerospace, instrumentation, lasers, science, and medicine. The company was founded in 1844 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Maruka Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial machinery and construction equipment. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Industrial Machinery, Construction Equipment, and Others. The Industrial Machinery segment offers machine tools, presses, plastic injection molding equipment, and bearings. The Construction Equipment segment sells cranes, earth augers, pile drivers, and aerial work platforms. The Others segment provides insurance agency services. The company was founded on December 16, 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Maruyama Mfg Co., Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of agricultural and forestry spraying machines, outdoor power equipment, environmental sanitation machines, firefighting equipment, and industrial high-pressure pumps. It operates through the following segments: Agriculture and Forest Machinery, Industrial Machinery, Other Machinery, and Real Estate Leasing and Others. The Agriculture and Forest Machinery segment includes sprayers, spreaders, brush cutters, chainsaws, hedges, and others. The Industrial Machinery segment manufactures and sells high-pressure pumps, high-pressure washers, and cleaning equipment. The Other Machinery segment produces fire extinguishers, disaster prevention-related equipment, and environmental sanitation machinery. The Real Estate Leasing and Others segment includes real estate leasing and electricity selling business. The company was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Maruzen CHI Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of books, magazines, and periodicals. It operates through the following business segments: Educational Market Sales, Store and Net Sales, Library Support, Publishing and Others. The Educational Market Sales segment provides books and content products to educational institutions and public libraries. The Store and Net Sales segment engages in the sale of books and stationery items through bookstores. The Library Support segment involves consigned management of public and university libraries. The Publishing segment handles publications of academic books, children's books, and books for libraries. The Others segment includes interior design and construction of cultural retail stores, warehousing business, and repair services for Apple products and personal computers. It also manages online bookstores. The company was founded on February 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Maruzen Co., Ltd. (5982) engages in the manufacture and sale of commercial kitchen equipment. It operates through the following segments: Commercial Kitchen Equipment, Bakery equipment and Building Leasing. The Commercial Kitchen Equipment segment engages in the manufacture and sale of fryers, ramen boilders, gas burners, grillers, frozen noodle boilers, steamers, gyoza grill machines, rice cookers, gas table stoves and others. The Bakery equipment segment engages in the manufacture and sale of oven for baking bread and other. The Building Leasing segment leases hotels and nursing homes. The company was founded by Masahiko Watanabe in March 20, 1961 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Matsumotokiyoshi Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management and supervision of its group companies that are in drugstore and pharmacy operations. It operates through the following segments: Retail Business, Wholesale Business, and Management Support. The Retail Business segment deals with the retail sales of pharmaceutical and related products. The Wholesale Business segment operates as a wholesale distributor of medicines and miscellaneous daily goods, and offers franchising services. The Management Support segment manages the Group and indirect operations. The company was founded on October 1, 2007 and is headquartered in Matsudo, Japan.

Maxi-Cash Financial Services Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management services. It operates through the following segments: Pawnbroking; Money Lending, Retail and Trading of Jewellery and Braded Merchandise; and Others. The Others segment covers the rental of properties and provision of other support services. The company was founded on April 10, 2008 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Maxrotec Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of factory automation systems and automobile parts. Its products include wireless gantry robots, engine blocks and parallel kinematics machines. The company was founded in August 3, 1995 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Mayer Steel Pipe Corp. engages in the manufacture of steel pipes and tubular products. It offers carbon steel tubes, welded steel pipes, carbon steel square pipes, stainless steel pipes & tubes, stainless steel sheets & plates, and stainless steel paste protective films. The company was founded on September 29, 1959 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Maytronics Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of pool cleaning and safety systems It operates through the following business segments: Private Pools, Public Pools, and Safety Products and Related Products for Swimming Pools. The Private Pools segment offers cleaning robots for private swimming pools. The Public Pools segment develops, manufactures, and markets cleaning products for public swimming pools. The Safety Products and Related Products for Swimming Pools segment comprises of alarms and other detection systems. It also operates under the Dolphin, AQUAlife, Aqualarm and Espio brands. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Yizre'el, Israel.

McDonald's Holdings Co. (Japan) Ltd. engages in the planning and execution of consolidated group management strategies for its subsidiaries and affiliates which are in the hamburger chain business. Its activities include franchise licensing and real estate leasing. The company was founded on May 1, 1971 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MCJ Co., Ltd. is a Japan-based company mainly engaged in the personal computer (PC) related business, general entertainment business, and information and communication technology (ICT) business. The Company operates in three business segments. The PC segment is engaged in manufacture and sale of PCs and monitors, as well as procurement and wholesale of PCs, peripheral PC equipment and PC parts. The General Entertainment segment is engaged in operation of composite cafes under brand name aprecio. The ICT-related segment is engaged in sale of apparel-related products. As of March 31, 2015, the Company had 15 consolidated subsidiaries.

Medical Ikkou Group Co., Ltd. engages in the management of dispensing pharmacies and residential nursing care facilities. It operates through the following segments: Dispensing Pharmacy, Healthcare, Medical Supplies Wholesale, and Real Estate. The Dispensing Pharmacy segment provides over-the-counter drugs and fulfills medical prescriptions. The Healthcare segment operates nursing homes, leases medical facilities, and renders medical and nursing care services. The Medical Supplies Wholesale segment sells pharmaceuticals to medical institutions. The Real Estate segment offers general real estate leasing services. The company was founded by Toshihisa Minamino on April 17, 1985 and is headquartered in Tsu, Japan.

Medipal Holdings Corp. manages its group companies which are engaged in the sale of pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and daily necessities. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Prescription Pharmaceutical Wholesale Business; Cosmetics, Daily Necessities, and Over-The-Counter (OTC) Pharmaceutical Wholesale Business; and Animal Health Products Wholesale Business. The Prescription Pharmaceutical Wholesale Business segment conducts wholesale business for hospitals, clinics, and dispensing pharmacies. The Cosmetics, Daily Necessities, and OTC Pharmaceutical Wholesale Business segment deals with wholesale business for drugstores, home centers, convenience stores, and supermarkets. The Animal Health Products Wholesale Business segment handles wholesale business for animal hospitals, farms, agricultural cooperatives, and processed food manufacturers. The company was founded on October 8, 1898 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MegaStudy Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of education services. It operates through the following business divisions: Education, Food Delivery, and the Other. The Education division provides online and offiline teaching services. The Other division offers real estates rental and developent. The company was founded on July 12, 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Meiji Electric Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of control instruments, industrial equipment, and measuring devices. It also develops, designs, and manufactures electronic products, inspection devices, mechatronics, information and logistics systems, and factory automation equipment. The company was founded in July 1920 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Meiji Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries with business activities focusing on food and pharmaceutical production. It operates through the Food and Pharmaceutical segments. The Food segment manufactures and sells confectionery, ice cream, milk, dairy, cheese, beverage, and health food products. The Pharmaceutical segment manufactures and sells ethical pharmaceuticals, agricultural chemicals, and veterinary drugs. The company was founded on April 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mendelson Infrastructure & Industries Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the trade and marketing of products in transport flows. It operates through two segments: Trade in Israel and Others. The Trade in Israel segment handles the marketing of transporting liquids such as, water, sewer, gas, fuel, oil, steam, and chemicals. The Others segment includes production of polyvinyl chloride and polyethylene pipes. The company was founded on March 2, 2005 and is headquartered in Kiryat Ata, Israel.

Metallurgical Corp. of China Ltd. engages in the metallurgical engineering and construction business. It operates through the following segments: Engineering Contracting, Property Development, Equipment Manufacture and Resource Development. The company was founded on December 1, 2008 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Mianyang Fulin Precision Machining Co. Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automotive engine parts. Its products include mechanical tappet, valve rocker, hydraulic automatic tenser, oil nozzle and oil valve, hydraulic tappet, clutch parts, one-way valve, and oil pump follower. The company was founded on November 10, 1997 and is headquartered in Mianyang, China.

Mie Kotsu Group Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its subsidiaries which are in the transportation, real estate, and leisure industries. It operates through the following segments: Transportation, Real Estate, Distribution, and Leisure Service. The Transportation segment provides transportation through buses and taxis. The Real Estate segment handles brokerage, leasing, real estate management, and construction services. The Distribution segment sells petroleum products, daily necessities, and vehicles. The Leisure Service segment manages travel services, Japanese style lodging, golf courses, drive-ins, driving schools, and ropeways. The company was founded on October 2, 2006 and is headquartered in Tsu, Japan.

H.U. Group Holdings, Inc. provides the strategic planning, investor relations, public relations, and supervisory management of the entire group. It operates through the following segments: Contracted Clinical Testing, Clinical Laboratory Testing, Sterilization related, New Development Business and Others. The Contracted Clinical Testing segment offers clinical laboratory testing services; collecting consigned specimens of patients from medical institutions, conducting analyses and reporting the test results back. The Clinical Laboratory Testing segment develops, manufactures and sales diagnostic products globally that are used at medical field for early detection and diagnosis. The Sterilization related segment provides general solutions to the issues facing operating rooms and central materials rooms. It establishes new out-of-hospital centers and promoting automation of operations. The New Development Business and Others segment pertains to newly established food, environment and cosmetic inspection businesses. The company was founded on December 18, 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Miracle Automation Engineering Co., Ltd. provides solutions of automation equipment and related services. Its products include logistics automation systems for enterprises of large-scale production, airport logistics automation systems, logistics warehousing systems, public logistics warehousing platform systems, bulk material transportation equipment, and wind power equipment. It operates through Automobile, Recycling, Heavy Industry, and New Energy segments. The company was founded by Wei Xing Huang in 1984 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

MIRAIT Holdings Corp. engages in the telecommunications engineering work, electrical work, civil engineering work, and construction work. It operates through the following segments: Mirait, Mirait Technologies, and Others. The Mirait and Mirait Technologies segments both cover the information and communications engineering business, as well as the electrical, air conditioning and hygienic facility constructions. The Others segment pertains to the holding company. The company was founded on October 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Miroku Corp. engages in manufacturing and selling hunting guns, machine tools, automotive-related products. It operates through the following segments: Hunting Gun Business, Machine Tool Business, Automotive-Related Business, and Others. The Hunting Gun Business segment manufactures and sells shotguns, rifles for sports, and hunting gun-related goods. The Machine Tool Business segment manufactures and sells hole drilling machines and industrial tools. The Automotive-Related Business segment buys up and sells steering wheels for automotive and automotive-related products. The Others segment includes lumber-related business. The company was founded by Kuraji Miroku in February 1893 and is headquartered in Nankoku, Japan.

MISUMI Group, Inc. engages in the business of industrial products. It operates through the following segments: Factory Automation (FA) Business, Die Components Business, and Variation and One-Stop by New Alliance (VONA) Business. The FA Business segment develops and provides components such as factory automation and auto locating modules for high precision production equipment. The Die Components Business segment develops and supplies die components for metal press and plastic injection moulding applications. The VONA Business segment provides third-party brands together with MISUMI-branded products through online sales. It also provides indirect materials and production equipment. The company was founded by Hiroshi Taguchi on February 23, 1963 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mitsubishi Chemical Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Functional Products, Chemicals, Industrial Gas, and Healthcare. The Functional Products segment sells electronics, displays, films, environment and life solutions, molding materials, polymers, chemicals, and new energy to domestic and overseas customers. The Chemicals segment markets methyl methacrylate, petrochemicals, and carbon. The Industrial Gas segment offers gas for the steel, chemical, and electronics industries. The Healthcare segment manufactures and sells pharmaceuticals, diagnostic reagents, and clinical testing products. The company was founded on October 3, 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mitsubishi Corp. engages in the provision of services utilizing the function of general trading. It operates through the following segments: Global Environmental and Infrastructure, Industrial Finance, Logistics and Development, Energy Business, Metals, Machinery, Chemicals, Living Essentials, and Others. The Global Environmental and Infrastructure segment handles trading and related business operations in power generation, water, transportation, and other necessary infrastructure. The Industrial Finance, Logistics and Development segment deals with asset management, infrastructure financing, corporate financing, and leasing. It also provides solutions in construction and real estate development focusing on commercial facilities and urban development, condominium development, and logistics. The Energy Business segment explores, develops and produces natural gas, crude oil, petroleum products, petroleum coke, coal coke, carbon products, and liquefied petroleum gas. The Metals segment supplies steel products, non-ferrous metals, and ferrous raw materials. The Machinery segment handles industrial machinery, shipping, defense and aerospace, motor vehicles and Isuzu business. The Chemicals segment supplies chemical products that include raw materials for synthetic resins and fibers, chemical fertilizers, inorganic raw materials, industrial salts, plastics, electronic materials, and life science products. The Living Essentials segment provides consumer necessities connected with clothing, food and housing, which includes food, textile, daily necessities, healthcare, distribution and retail services. The Others segment represents services and operational support of corporate staff departments to the company and its affiliates; income and expenses from financial and personnel-related activities; and cash and securities for financial and investment activities. The company was founded by Yataro Iwasaki on July 1, 1954 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of ships, industrial machinery, and aircrafts. It operates through the following segments: Power, Industry & Social Infrastructure, Aviation, Defense, Space, and Others and Common. The Power segment handles thermal power generation system, nuclear equipment, wind power generation equipment, and aircraft engines. The Industry & Social Infrastructure segment provides logistics equipment, turbochargers, cooling products, car air conditioners, transportation systems, and environmental equipment. The Aviation, Defense, Space segment deals with commercial and defense aircraft, ships, special vehicles, and space equipment. The Others and Common segment includes construction and real estate businesses. The company was founded by Yataro Iwasaki on July 7, 1884 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MITSUI-SOKO HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the warehousing and transport businesses. It operates through the Logistics and Real Estate segments. The Logistics segment offers warehouse storage, cargo handling, port operations, transportation, logistics services, and air cargo transportation. The Real Estate segment leases buildings. The company was founded on October 11, 1909 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mitsuuroko Group Holdings Co., Ltd. is engaged in the energy business. It operates through the following segments: Energy, Power, Food and Provisions, Health and Sports, Power and Others. The Energy segment sells petroleum products such as liquefied petroleum gas and gasoline, light oil, and kerosene; and housing equipment. The Food and Provisions segment manufactures and sells mineral water and beverages. The Health & Sports segment manages amusement facilities such as spas, hot baths, and bowling alleys. The Power segment sells power to general consumers, and wind generation and biomass-generation power companies. The Others segment includes insurance agency businesses. It also operates restaurant chains and offers leasing of offices and condominiums. The company was founded by Tatsusaku Tajima in 1910 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Miwon Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its products through subsidiaries include resin or energy soften material for paint. The company was founded on February 2, 2009 and is headquartered in Yongin-si, South Korea.

MIYAJI ENGINEERING GROUP, INC. provides civil engineering works and construction services. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Bridge, Construction and Others. The Bridge segment covers the design, manufacture and site construction of new bridges, maintenance and repair and reinforcement of existing bridges, and sells fiber-reinforced plastic (FRP) structures and other steel structures. The Construction segment engages in the construction of bridges, buildings, composite structures, skyscraper, towers, chimneys and factory building. It also handles other civil engineering projects. The Others segment provides the real estate services. The company was founded on May 12, 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MK Seiko Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, import, and export of automobile equipment, information equipment, and household products. It operates through the following segments: Mobility & Service, Life and Support, Housing Equipment, and Other Business. The Mobility & Service segment offers car wash machines, air conditioner fresheners, railroad information display equipment, and construction display equipment. The Life and Support segment provides cooking appliances and food processing machines. The Housing Equipment segment manufactures and sells wood and aluminum composite fittings, reflector-type silencers, and steel fire doors. The Other Business segment includes insurance, real estate management, and hotel businesses. The company was founded in July 1948 and is headquartered in Chikuma, Japan.

MOBASE ELECTRONICS CO., LTD. engages in the manufacture and supply of locks and switches. It operates through the following business areas: Security system, Electronic Control Unit and Sensor, HMI, and Magnesium Die Casting. The company was founded on January 7, 1978 and is headquartered in Suwon, South Korea.

Mobiletron Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of power & industrial tools, automotive parts and components. It operates through the following business segments: Electronics and Power Tool. The Electronics segment covers engine management systems and vehicle safety system products. The Power Tool segment covers electric power tools and rechargeable power tools. The company's products include electronic igniters, voltage regulators, rectifiers, electric drills, nailing machine, and locomotives. Mobiletron Electronics was founded on July 19, 1982 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

Monex Group, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides online brokerage and financial services through its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Japan, United States, Asia Pacific, Crypto Assets, and Investment. The regional segments (Japan, United States, and Asia Pacific) offer financial product trading services. The Crypto Assets segment deals with virtual currency exchange business. The Investment segment deals with securities investments. The company was founded on August 2, 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Money Partners Group Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company that engages in foreign exchange margin trading business. It also offers investment and financial services. The company was founded on June 10, 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MoneyMax Financial Services Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of pawn broking services. It operates through the following segments: Pawnbroking, Retail Trading of Pre-owned Luxury Items, and Others. The Other segment includes provision of other support services. The company was founded by Yong Guan Lim and Yong Sheng Lim on October 9, 2008 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Moriroku Holdings Co. Ltd. manages its group of companies and engages in indirect operations related to chemical manufacture and sales. It operates through the Chemical segment and Processed Resin Product segment. The Chemical segment manufactures, exports and sells chemicals and synthetic resin products. The Processed Resin Product segment produces and markets resin parts of automobiles. The company was founded in 1663 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MORITA HOLDINGS CORP. engages in the management of its group companies that deals with the manufacture, wholesale and distribution of fire and disaster prevention equipment. It operates through the following segments: Fire Fighting Vehicles Business, Fire Protection Business, Industrial Machinery Business, and Environment Vehicle Business. The Fire Fighting Vehicles Business segment manufactures and sells fire trucks. The Fire Protection Business segment handles the design, manufacture, and sale of fire fighting equipment such as fire extinguishers. The Industrial Machinery Business segment manages the design and construction of environmental plants. It also manufactures and sells environmental equipment. The Environmental Vehicles Business segment produces and markets environmental conservation vehicles. The company was founded by Shosaku Morita on April 23, 1907 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Morito Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of lifestyle-related materials. It offers eyelets, hooks, flat fasteners, apparel, footwear, camera components, and vehicle interiors. It operates through the following geographical segments: Japan; Asia; and Europe and the United States. The company was founded by Jyukichi Morito on June 1, 1908 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Morningstar Japan K.K. engages in the provision of financial information services. It operates through the Financial Service and Asset Management segments. The Financial Service segment provides consulting, data solution, and media solution services. The Asset Management segment handles investment advisory and management such as setting, recruitment, and operation of investment trust. The company was founded on March 27, 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Mosa Industrial Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of high pressure cylinders, hybrid inflators and vessels. Its products include high pressure chargers, cream whippers, soda siphons, tire inflators, power cleaners, and car airbag hybrid inflators. The company was founded on July 11, 1988 and is headquartered in Yunlin, Taiwan.

MOTONIC Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of vehicle carburetors. It offers high pressure and low pressure injection system, oil pump, continuously variable valve lift, vacuum pump, compressed natural gas bio fuel system, exhaust gas recirculation, air induction component, fuel rail, sensor, rocker arm. and other products. The company was founded on March 7, 1974 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

MOTREX Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of automobiles and parts. It offers audio vosual navigation, audio video, around view monitor, head up display, rear seat entertainment system, remote vehicle control, fleet management system, driver state monitoring and automotive intelligent docking adaptor. The company was founded on October 1, 2001 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

Moya Holdings Asia Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the development and operation of water treatment facilities. It focuses on build-operate-transfer that provides a comprehensive range of water solutions to government including commissioning, maintenance of water treatment plants on design, build, operate, and transfers arrangements. The company was founded on January 9, 2013 and is headquartered in Singapore.

MrMax Holdings Ltd. operates a chain of retail discount stores. Its products include household appliances, clothing, toys, pet goods, health and beauty care, and food items. The company was founded by Shigeru Hirano in October 1925 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

MS AUTOTECH Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. Its products include fender apron and side member, center floor, rear floor, front door, rear door, reinforcement side outer, side inner, quarter inner, rear combi lamp housing, rear package tray, dash board, and cowl. The company was founded on September 6, 1990 and headquartered in Gyeongju-si, Korea.

Muro Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive and industrial machinery parts, auto feed screw driving systems, and citrus peeler machines. It operates through the Automotive Parts and Others segments. The Automotive Parts segment manufactures automotive-related parts, industrial machinery-related parts and deals with contract business. The Others segment manufactures and sells auto feed screw driving systems and citrus peeler machines. The company was founded in April 1953 and is headquartered in Utsunomiya, Japan.

Musashi Seimitsu Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of transportation equipment such as vehicle engines, suspension, and steering parts. It operates through the following divisions: Power Train, Linkage and Suspension (L&S), and Two Wheels. The Power Train division includes transmission gears, differential and planetary assemblies, and camshafts. The Linkage and Suspension division covers ball joints and important security parts. The Two Wheels division includes kick starters, transmission gear, and camshaft for motorcycles, general purpose. The company was founded was founded by Miharu Otsuka in April 1938 and is headquartered in Toyohashi, Japan.

Myotoku Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of vacuum equipment and related products. Its products include suction pads, vacuum equipment, pressure sensors, pumps, switching valves, non-contact pads, and levitation transport units. The company was founded by Ikujiro Ise on April 16, 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nachi Fujikoshi Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of machine tools, cutting materials, bearings, and hydraulic equipment. It operates through the following segments: Machine Tools, Components and Others. The Machine Tools segment offers cutting materials, machine tools, and robots. The Components segment provides bearings and hydraulic equipment that are used in the automobiles, railroads, construction machinery, machine tools, and electric equipment. The Others segment includes special steel production and sale and information processing-related services. The company was founded by Kohki Imura on December 21, 1928 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Naito & Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of cutting tool, measurement, industrial equipment and machine tool. It operates through the following product divisions: Cutting Tools, Measurement, Industrial Devices, and Mechanical Tools. The Cutting Tools division offers carbide end mill cutter, abrasives, and diamond tools. The Measurement division includes three dimensional measuring machines, optical measurement device, torque machine, and foreign object detector. The Industrial Devices division provides pneumatic equipment,hydraulic tools, and environmental equipment. The Mechanical Tools division supplies lathes, milling machines, robots, and CAD systems. The company was founded in December 1945 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

NAK Sealing Technologies Corp. engages in the manufacturing and processing of various oil seals, rubber machinery, metal mouldings and technical sealing products. Its business scope includes the production and sale of rubber compounds, manufacturing of automobiles, motorcycles, transportation equipment and machinery. The company's seals are being used in a wide range of industrial sectors including Automotive, Industrial, Hydraulic & Pneumatic, Construction and Mining Equipment. It also engages in the import and export of processing oil seals. NAK Sealing Technologies was founded by Joseph Shek on August 4, 1976 and is headquartered in Nantou, Taiwan.

Nanfang Ventilator Co., Ltd. is engaged in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of ventilation and air handling systems. Its products include fan, damper, fire damper, air purification equipment, air conditioning terminal equipment, wind turbine blade and other auxiliary equipment. The company was founded in May 1988 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of stainless steel multistage centrifugal pumps. Its products include single stage centrifugal pump, multistage pump, immersion type multistage centrifugal pump, horizontal multistage stainless steel centrifugal pump, inline pump for heating and air-condition, horizontal single stage stainless steel pump, single stage stainless steel pump, self-priming jet pump, stainless steel borehole pump, non-clogging self-priming sewage water pump, metering pump, submersible pump for waste water, constant pressure booster pump system, and vertical turbine pump. Its other business activities include environmental protection consulting and design. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Nanhua Instruments Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of analysis instruments and systems used in vehicle environmental and security detection. Its products include automotive emission analyzer, smoke meters and opacimeters, headlight testers, and wheel alignment. The company was founded on April 24, 1996 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

Nanjing Aolian AE & EA Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of automobile electronics and electrical products. Its services include mold technology development, rental equipment, research and development. The company was founded on June 21, 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Nanjing Chervon Auto Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive components. Its products include automotive heat exchange components, automotive transmission parts, automotive engine parts, car steering and brake components, new energy auto parts, and household appliance parts. The company was founded on March 19, 2012 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Nanjing Gaoke Co., Ltd. engages in property and municipal business, pharmaceutical business, and equity investment. It develops land and residences, manages property, and constructs municipal infrastructures; researches and develops, manufactures, and sells drugs through its holding subsidiary; and invests in entrepreneurial companies. The company was founded on July 4, 1992 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Nanjing Sciyon Wisdom Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, production, research and development of industrial automation and management informatization products. Its products include process automation, process industry informatization, instruments, and equipment automation. Its solutions include control system, informatization, and equipment automation. The company was founded on May 27, 1993 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Nanjing YueBoo Power System Co., Ltd. focuses on research, development and industrialization of new energy automobile powertrain systems. It mainly engages in the production and sale of core components for new energy vehicles, integrated hardware & software powertrain systems, motor control systems, power electric vehicles and other related automotive systems. The company was founded on April 19, 2012 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

Nanyang Topsec Technologies Group, Inc. is engaged in the research, development, manufacture and sale of power cables and wires. It offers power cables, electric appliances wires and cables including bare wires and bare conductors, winding wires, power cables, communication cables and optical cables, as well as wires and cables for electrical equipment, among others. The company was founded on August 30, 1985 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

Nanyo Corp. engages in the sale and rental of construction and industrial machinery. It operates through the following business divisions: Industrial Machinery Business, Construction Machinery Business and Others. The Industrial Machinery Business division provides the rental and sale of semiconductor production equipment, precision machineries, inspection equipment, electronic and conduction devices, labor saving machineries and equipment, logistics equipment, industrial machineries and environment-related equipment. The Construction Machinery Business division provides the sale of construction machineries, attachments, vehicles and trucks, compaction equipment, environment-related equipment, sewer pipe cleaners and drills, and other products. The Others division engages in the manufacture and sale of quarry machineries. The company was founded on May 2, 1950 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

Naphtha Israel Petroleum Corp. Ltd. engages in oil and gas exploration, real estate, and hotel housekeeping. It operates through the following segments: Oil and Gas in Israel, Oil and Gas in the United States, and Other. The Oil and Gas in Israel segment engages in oil and gas exploration and production in Israel. The Oil and Gas in the United States segment engages in oil and gas exploration, and in the provision of oil and gas assets operations services in the United States. The Other segment engages in the provision of management services, rental of properties, and operation of hotels. The company was founded on February 2, 1956 and is headquartered in Petach-Tikva, Israel.

National Aerospace Fasteners Corp. designs, researches and manufactures fastener products for the aerospace, electronic and high-end industrial sectors. It offers aero and industry products, including fasteners, bolts, nuts, tubes, stamping, link, latch, stud, and others. The company was founded on October 14, 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

National Gas & Industrialization Co. engages in the distribution and marketing high-quality gas solutions in Saudi Arabia. The company also involves in the manufacture, transfer and marketing of petroleum products, chemical, glass, auto parts, equipment service centers and the establishment and maintenance of petroleum equipment and vehicles. The company was founded on December 9, 1963 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Natural Cool Holdings Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of installation, repair and replacement services for air conditioning systems. It operates through the following segments: Air-Conditioning (Aircon), Investment, and Paint. The Aircon segment is comprised of trading of air-conditioners, air-condition components, systems and units, air-condition installation, servicing and re-conditioning. The Investment segment refers to properties investment holding. The Paint segment manufactures and distributes paints and chemicals. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Singapore.

NCsoft Corp. engages in the development and publishing of online and mobile games. It operates through the following business areas: Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG), Casual Game, Web and Board game. The MMORPG provides services such as Lineage, Lineage II, Aion and Guild Wars. The Casual Game offers services such as Love Beat, Punch Monster, Dragonica and Point Blank. The Web and Board game provides services such as Might and Magic: Heroes of Kingdoms, Murim Jekook, Magic King and Myoung-in Jang-gi. The company was founded by Kim Taek-Jin on March 11, 1997 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

NE Neungyule, Inc. engages in the publishing of english educational materials and development of english learning programs. It operates through the following business divisions: Kindergarden and Elementary School, Middle and High School, Adults, Infants (i-challenge) and Others. The Kindergarden and Elementary School division provides NE kids and NE Build and grow. The Middle and High School division offers English test papers, English newpaper, and math. The Adults division provides Tomato English reviewers. the Infant (i-challenge) division provides monthly program, stage program and ABC Bubbles. The Others division provides NE efficiency junior lab and essay readings. The company was founded on June 28, 1994 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

NEO TECHNICAL SYSTEM Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of drills and routers used in the semiconductor and automobile industries. Its products include whirling shaft and mircro bit products such as micro drill bit, router bit and end mill. The company was founded on August 18, 2000 and is headquartered in Anseong-si, South Korea.

Neooto Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and processing of automotive components. Its products include automatic transmission parts such as carrier, piston, gear transfer, final gear, gear pinion, gear annulus, differential gear assembly; dual-clutch transmission parts such as shaft, gear transfer, clutch and gear speed; and continuously variable transmission parts such as pulley, shaft, piston, and carrier. The company was founded on January 6, 2010 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Neowiz Holdings Corp. engages in the investment holding activities. The company through its subsidiaries engaged in the following businesses: Gaming Business, Internet Business and others. The Gaming Business is composed of companies affiliated with online games publishing. The Internet Business is made up of companies that provide online music services. The Other business offers marketing and mobile gaming services. The company was founded on June 6, 1997 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

Netmarble Corp. develops and publishes online games. Its games include Magumagu, Modoo Marble, Lineage 2 Revolution, Seven Knights, Club M Star, Special Force 2, Age of Revolution, Netmarble Holdem, LowBaduki, 7 Poker, New Power and Baduk. The company was founded by Jun-Hyuk Bang On November 17, 2011 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Neway Valve (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of industrial valve. Its products include gate, globe, check, ball, butterfly, pipeline, and knife gate valves; switch control valves; nuclear globe, nuclear check, nuclear ball, and nuclear butterfly valve; strainer; and ship building, forged steel, for power plant jacket, and mud valves. The company's products are used in oil and gas, chemical, power, shipbuilding, mining, water treatment, and industrial systems. Neway Valve (Suzhou) was founded by Bao Qing Wang, Bin Lu, Zhang Wen Cheng and Chao Xi on November 14, 2002 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

NextEye Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of exterior inspection equipment for high-tech products and related parts through the machine vision technology. Its products include polarized light film testing and glass testing equipment, third dimension measuring instrument, x-ray, and frame grabber. The company was founded on September 7, 1998 and is headquartered in Anyang-si, South Korea.

Nexyz.Group Corp. engages in the provision of broadband, information, and communications technology services. It operates through the Energy and Environment-related Business and Electronic Media Business segments. The Energy and Environment-related Business segment sells LED lighting fixtures and manages LED light rental services. The Electronic Media Business segment provides sales promotions, advertising, and consulting services. The company was founded in May 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

NFK Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial furnace and combustion equipment. It operates through the Industrial Furnace, Burners, and Combustion Equipment, and Others segments. The Industrial Furnace, Burners, and Combustion Equipment segment provides combustion and heating systems for petroleum refineries, petrochemical plants, and cement kilns. It also offers industrial furnaces which are equipped with regenerative burners. The Others segment manages consolidated subsidiaries. The company was founded on April 12, 1950 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

NHK Spring Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive suspension springs, seats, precision springs, and other components. It operates through the following segments: Automotive Suspension Spring, Automotive Seating, Precision Springs and Components, and Industrial Machinery and Equipment and Others. The Automotive Suspension Spring segment provides leaf springs, coil springs, stabilizers, torsion bars, stabilizer links and gas springs. The Automotive Seating segment includes seats, mechanical seating components, trim parts, and interior. The Precision Spring and Components segment offers hard disk drive suspension and mechanical components, wire springs, flat springs, and probe units for liquid crystal displays and semiconductors, and precision machine components. The Industrial Machinery and Equipment and Others segment covers ceramic products, spring mechanisms, pipe support systems, automatic parking systems, polyurethane products, metal-based printed circuit board, security products, and lighting equipment, and golf club shafts. The company was founded on June 6, 1936 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

NHN Corp. engages in the development and distribution of online and mobile games. It operates through the following businesses: Online Game, Mobile Game, and Payco. The Online Game business provides personal computer and web-board games. The Mobile Game business offers smart phone and mobile device games. The Payco business provides simple payment system in online, offline, and mobile. The company was founded on August 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

NICHIDEN Corp. engages in the distribution and sale of power transmission and industrial equipment, and related products. It also offers mechanical installation of controlling devices. It operates through the following divisions: Power Transmission Equipment, Industrial Equipment, and Controlling Devices. The Power Transmission Equipment division offers decelerators, transmitters, chain, belt, and gear transmission materials, couplings, bearings, linear motion equipment, bearing units, metallic materials, and ceramics. The Industrial Equipment division includes conveyors, transport equipment, vibrators, lifters, storage-related equipment, delivery systems, structural systems equipment, transportation and loading equipment, motors, environmental devices, dust collection and cleaning equipment, and pumps. The Controlling Devices division supplies hydraulic, pneumatic, and vacuum equipment, hose and tubes, fittings, sequencers, indicators and actuators, sensors, switches, image processors, measuring equipment, industrial robots, nut runners, mechatronic parts, plumbing tools, communication network devices, and uninterruptible power systems. The company was founded by Rikichi Nishiki in March 1935 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Nichirei Corp. operates as a holding company that engages in food-related businesses. It operates through the following segments: Processed Foods, Marine Products, Meat and Poultry, Logistics, Real Estate, and Others. The Processed Foods segment provides processed and frozen food items. The Marine Products segment offers seafood products. The Meat and Poultry procures and processes livestock commodities. The Logistics segment supports food transport and storage. The Real Estate segment manages the development and sale of residential units of group-owned properties. The Others segment handles bioscience business, personnel related business, greening management, and cleaning related services. The company was founded on December 1, 1945 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Japan Hospice Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides care for patients with end-stage cancer and those with incurable diseases with the mission of the research and dissemination of home hospices. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Home Hospices and Hospice Houses. The Home Hospices division provides home visit nursing, nursing small-scale multifunctional in-home nursing care, home nursing care support offices, visiting nursing care, in-home care, 24 hours periodic patrol and occasional correspondence visiting nursing care services. The Hospice Houses division operated by the company are rental housing that tenants are limited to end-stage cancer patients and intractable diseases. It also engages in the planning, design and supervision of subcontracting business. The company was founded on January 4, 2017 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

NIHON ISK Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel products, archive lockers, and dental instruments. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Steel Product-Related Business, Dental-Related Business, Archive Locker-Related Business, Office Automation (OA) Floor-Related Business, Real Estate Leasing-Related Business, and Others. The Steel Product-Related Business segment provides fireproof vaults. The Dental-Related Business segment handles the dental equipment and machines. The Archive Locker-Related Business segment manages coin lockers and other multipurpose storages. The OA Floor-Related Business segment involves in the OA floor equipment that eliminates office wirings. The Real Estate Leasing-Related Business segment engages in the lease and rental of buildings. The Others segment includes the industrial tools business. The company was founded by Itsuro Sano on August 15, 1916 and is headquartered in Ibaraki, Japan.

Nihon Tokushu Toryo Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of paints and coatings, soundproofing, and rust proofing materials. It operates through the following segments: Paints and Coatings, Automotive Products, and Others. The Paints and Coatings segment handles the production, sale, and contracting of paints. The Automotive Products segment manages the production and sale of soundproofing materials and anti-rust coatings. The Others segment includes insurance agency business. The company was founded by Tashichi Nakanishi on June 1, 1929 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nihon Trim Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of water purifiers. It operates through Water Healthcare and Medical Care-related segments. The Water Healthcare segment handles the sale of water purifying equipment. The Medical Care-related segment deals with the research and development in the medical and preventive medicine fields. It is also involved genetic diagnosis field and regenerative medicine. The company was founded on June 12, 1982 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

NIKKON Holdings Co., Ltd. provides logistics and warehousing services. It operates through the following segments: Transportation, Warehousing, Packaging, Testing, and Others. The Transportation segment deals with the transportation of four and two wheeled vehicles, automobile parts, housing equipment, and agricultural machinery. The Warehousing segment handles the storage and safekeeping of two wheeled vehicles, automobile parts, housing equipment, and agricultural machinery. The Packaging segment consists of distribution processing, automobile parts delivery, and export packaging. The Testing segment involves with the testing of  four and two wheeled vehicles, automobile parts, and agricultural machinery. The Others segment includes customs clearance, automotive repair businesses, petroleum sales, non-life insurance business, real estate brokerage and waste materials collection and processing. The company was founded on August 27, 1953 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Ningbo Donly Co. Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and distribution of transmission equipment. Its products include modular gear motor, modular gearbox, planetary reducer, gearbox for the crane, high power and heavy duty gearbox, and industrial motor. The company was founded on June 8, 1998 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Haitian Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of computer-numerical-control machine tools. The company was founded on April 10, 2002 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Huaxiang Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and processing of automobile components. Its main products include automotive interior and exterior parts, automobile chassis accessories, automotive electrical & air-conditioning feature parts and automobile engine accessories. The company was founded on September 26, 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Ningbo Jifeng Auto Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of passenger car parts. Its products include molds, inspection tools, mechanical equipment, car seat headrests, armrests, and headrest rods. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corp. engages in the research, development and manufacturing of intelligent driving systems, automotive safety systems, new energy vehicle power management systems and high-end automotive functional components.
