Its businesses and products include sensor, air intake, washer, air management and mirror systems; and e-mobility, climate control, driver control, electronic control, car connect, front grille, fuel tank door, steering wheel and auto safety products. The company was founded on August 7, 1992 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Lehui International Engineering Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and development of beer, beverage and liquid food machinery and equipment. Its products include scale brewery, craft brewery equipment, bio & food equipment, automation technology machine and related equipment. The company was founded by September 15, 1998 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Shenglong Automotive Powertrain System Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automotive powertrain components. It focuses on pump products, shaft products, engine parts, and drive components. Its products include engine oil pump, camshaft, gearbox oil pump, and transfer case oil pump. The company was founded on April 17, 2007 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Shuanglin Auto Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacturing, and sale of automotive parts and accessories. Its products include automotive interior & exterior system components, wheel bearings, precision injection parts, seat system parts, transmissions, and electric drives for new energy vehicles. The company was founded on November 23, 2000 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Techmation Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing, sales and provision of plastic machinery automation products. It offers Hydraulic Servo Energy-Saving System, Injection Molding Machine Control System, Injection Molding Machine Control System, Injection Molding Machine Control System, Extruder control system, Injection blow system, Blow molding system, Blow molding system, Hot runner, Power meter and other related automation products. The company was founded on September 5, 2001 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Tuopu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of automotive and parts. Its product series include suspension, torsion vibration, bushing and automobile sound insulation parts. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Xusheng Auto Technology Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, production, and sales of precision aluminum alloy auto parts and industrial parts for new energy automotive. Its products include new energy vehicle speed changing systems, transmission systems, battery systems, suspension systems, and other core system precision machining parts. The company was founded on August 25, 2003 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningbo Yunsheng Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of rare earth permanent magnet materials. Its products include sintered neodymium, magnetic assemblies, bonded neodymium, and servo motor. The company was founded on June 30, 1994 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Ningxia Building Materials Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of cement, cement clinker, commercial concrete, and aggregate. Its products are mainly used in the construction of infrastructure and property. The company was founded on November 4, 1998 and is headquartered in Yinchuan, China.

NC Holdings Co. Ltd. operates as a holding company engages in the manufacture and sale of belt conveyors. Its operations are carried out through the following business divisions: Conveyor, Multi-story Parking Equipment, Temporary Staffing and Solar Power Generation System. The Conveyer business division manufactures, sells, and installs belt conveyors and accessory equipment. The Multi-story Parking Equipment manufactures, sells and also provides operation management, maintenance and inspection for multi-story parking equipment. The Temporary Staffing business division handles the temporary staffing business. The Solar Power Generation System business division sells and installs solar powered system equipment. The company was founded on April 1, 2016 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nippon Filcon Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of forming fabrics for paper machines and related materials and equipment. It operates through the following business segments: Industrial Filters and Conveyor Belt, Electronic Components and Photomask, Environment and Water Treatment related, and Real Estate Leasing. The Industrial Filters and Conveyor Belt segment produces meshes and industrial specialty nets. The Electronic Components and Photomask segment deals with photo-etching products, electronic components, photomasks, and solar power generation systems. The Environment and Water Treatment related segment consists of processing equipment and environment-related products. The Real Estate Leasing segment offers parking lot and store leasing services. It also provides the design, construction, and supervision of civil engineering, construction, and plumbing projects; manufacture and sale of compound materials, resin components, and chemicals; management of lodging, sports, and recreation facilities; and import and sale of alcohol beverages and food. The company was founded in April 1916 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nippon Light Metal Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of aluminum products. Its operations are carried through the following segments: Aluminum Ingot and Chemicals; Aluminum Sheet and Extrusions; Fabricated Products and Others. The Aluminum Ingot and Chemicals segment supplies aluminum re-melted ingot used for various industrial materials, and produces a wide spectrum of alumina and alumina hydrates ranging from raw materials to basic materials for ceramic compounds. The Aluminum Sheet and Extrusions segment produces sheet, coil, and extrusion products. The Fabricated Products segment offers wing bodies for transport vehicles; automobile components, and electronic materials. The Others segment covers aluminum foil and aluminum powder used for daily necessities, energy, electronics, and automobile. The company was founded on October 1, 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nippon Paint Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management and strategies of its group companies that is involved in the manufacture and sale of paints and fine chemicals. It offers automotive and industrial-use coatings and trade-use paints. It also provides surface treatments and fine chemical products. It operates through the following geographical segments: Japan, Asia, Americas, and Other. The company was founded by Jujiro Moteki on March 14, 1881 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Nippon Pillar Packing Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of fluid control equipment. It operates through the following segments: Industrial Equipment-related, Electronics-related, and Others. The Industrial Equipment-related segment produces mechanical seals, gland packing, gaskets, and fluid equipment which are applied into various industrial fields. The Electronics-related segment provides fluorocarbon resin as a sealing medium and other plastic products. The Others segment deals with real estate leasing business. The company was founded by Yoshishige Iwanami in May 1924 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corp. operates as a holding company, which engages in the provision of telecommunication services. It operates through the following businesses: Regional Communications, Long-Distance and International Communications, Mobile Communications, Data Communications, and Other Businesses. The Regional Communications business offers domestic intra-prefectural communication services such as fixed voice-related, Internet protocol (IP), and packet communications services; and sells telecommunications equipment. The Long Distance and International Communications business deals with the domestic intra-prefectural and international communications and system integration services. The Mobile Communications business provides mobile voice-related, IP, and packet communications services. The Data Communications business covers the system integration and network system services. The Other Businesses includes in the real estate, finance, engineering, system integration and data processing, and development of technologies and shared operations. The company was founded on August 1, 1952 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nippon Television Holdings Inc. engages in the management and operation of group companies that are in the general broadcasting business. It also engages in planning, production, and sales of broadcasting programs; and cultural activities. It operates in the following segments: Media and Content Business, Life and Health-Related, Real Estate Rental or Leasing, and Others. The Media and Content Business segment includes television broadcasting; program salesfrom commercialization and sale of package media, and from exhibiting movies; and events. The Life and Health-Related segment runs general fitness clubs. The Real Estate Rental or Leasing Business segment leases owned real estate and manages buildings. The Others segment includes information technology (IT) services and store management. The company was founded by Matsutaro Shoriki on October 15, 1952 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nishimoto Co., Ltd. imports, exports and distributes food products and ingredients. It operates through the following segments: Asian Food Global Business, Agriculture & Seafood Products Trading Business, and Other Businesses. The Asian Food Global Business segment deals with the wholesale of Asian foodstuff particularly Japanese food products. The Agriculture & Seafood Products Trading Business segment supplies frozen fruits and vegetables, fresh food items, raw materials to food manufacturers, merchandisers, and restaurants. The Other Businesses segment includes original character goods and supplement sales as well as mail-order catalog sales. The company was founded in May 1912 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
Nissan Medical Industries Ltd. engages in the manufacture of nonwoven fabrics. The company was founded by Yeheskel Nissan in 1984 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Nissan Tokyo Sales Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the automobile dealership and information system services. It operates through the following segments: Automobile, Information Systems, and Others. The Automobile segment sells vehicle and component part; and provides maintenance and car inspection services. The Information Systems segment merchandises computer hardware and software; and provides kitting equipment implementation, network construction, installation support, maintenance, and data center services. The Others segment includes real estate leasing business. The company was founded on November 16, 1942 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nisshinbo Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of management and operation of its subsidiaries. It operates through the following business segments: Electronics, Automobile Brakes, Precision Instruments, Chemicals, Textiles, Papers, Real Estate, and Other. The Electronics segment manufactures and sells radio communication equipment and electronic components. The Automobile Brakes segment offers friction materials and brake assemblies. The Precision Instruments segment handles mechatronic products, plastic molding, and precision parts processing. The Chemicals segment includes carbon products, bipolar plates for fuel cells, carbodilite high-performance resin additives, rigid urethane and bio wastewater treatment, and mobilon polyurethane elastomer. The Textiles segment produces and markets cotton, and yarn cloth and spandex. The Papers segment distributes fine and household papers, and processed paper products. The Real Estates segment manages the leasing and selling of real properties such as shopping centers. The Other segment trades food, insurance, and industrial products. The company was founded on February 5, 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nissin Foods Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the food manufacturing business. It operates through the following segments: Nissin Food Products, Myojo Foods, Chilled and Frozen Foods, The Americas, China, and Others. The Nissin Food Products, Myojo Foods, The Americas, and China segments produces and sells cup and bag-type instant noodles and processed food products. The Chilled and Frozen Foods segment offers chilled and frozen food products. The Others segment includes confectioneries, beverages, food services, and businesses in Europe and Asia region. The company was founded by Momofuku Ando on September 4, 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nissin Kogyo Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile and motorcycle brake systems and parts. It operates through the Automotive Parts and Others business divisions. The Automotive Parts business division offers products for four-wheeled and two-wheeled vehicles. These include disc brakes, drum brakes, electronic brakes, brake master cylinders, and clutch master cylinders. The Other business division provides cutting tools. The company was founded on October 27, 1953 and is headquartered in Tomi, Japan.

Nitori Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the sales of furniture and interior goods through its group companies. It offers beddings, curtains, carpets, rugs, mats, interior items, daily living items, kitchenware, cookware, tableware, bath ware, toilet, laundry, beds, sofas, cushions, television stands, living room storage, tables, chairs, cupboards, storage racks, office furniture, bookshelves, stationeries, relaxation, massage, health items, everyday life support items, children's room items, study desks, small home appliances, lighting products and kitchen units. The company was founded in December 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nitto Seiko Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial fasteners and assembly machines. It operates through the following segments: Fastener, Assembly Machinery, and Control Equipment. The Fastener segment provides fasteners for industrial use and metal products such as screw manufacturing tools. The Assembly Machinery segment manufactures general machinery such as automatic screw tighteners and automatic assembly machines. The Control Equipment segment offers flow meters, measurement and instrumentation system products, and ground survey machines. The company was founded on February 11, 1938 and is headquartered in Ayabe, Japan.

Nittoku Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of coil winding machines and peripheral systems, factory automation systems and contactless smart cards. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Winding Machines, Contactless Integrated Circuit (IC) Tags & Cards, and Real Estate Leasing. The Winding Machines segment provides winding machines, winding systems, and peripheral equipment. The Contactless IC Tags & Cards segment offers IC cards, tags, and inlets. The Real Estate Leasing segment leases company-owned buildings. The company was founded by Seiichi Sunaoka on September 28, 1972 and is headquartered in Saitama, Japan.

NJ Holdings, Inc. engages in the business of mobile communication sales and corporate solutions. It operates through the following segments: Game, Human Resources Solutions, and Others. The Game segment handles the planning, developing and management of games. The Human Resources Solutions segment provides temporary staffing for mobile shops, and recruits information technology and bilingual personnel. The Mobile segment manages mobile phone shops that deals with terminals and services of specific mobile carriers, or multiple carriers. The Others segment includes the credit settlement business. The company was founded on December 11, 1991 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

nms Holdings Corp. operates as a holding company which provides group business administration and management services to its subsidiaries engaged in the human resource solutions, electronics manufacturing and power supply business. Its operations are carried out through the following divisions: Human Resource Solution, Electronics Manufacturing Service (EMS), Vision (neo EMS) and Power Supply. The Human Resource Solution division provides human resources solutions for manufacturing, engineer dispatch, repairs and customer services. The EMS division provides electronic devices such as earth-friendly energy-saving home electric appliances and automobile, digitalized amusement devices, and automated and labor-saving devices in production facilities. The Vision (neo EMS) division provides repair, development, distribution, design, substrate mounting and product assembly services to the customers. The Power Supply division engages in the development and manufacturing of various power supply products to suit customer requirements. The company was founded in September 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Noevir Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the health and beauty industry. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Cosmetics, Pharmaceuticals and Health Food, and Others. The Cosmetics segment develops, produces, and sells skincare, cosmetics, and hypoallergenic products. The Pharmaceuticals and Health Food segment manufactures and markets cough and cold remedies, functional drinks, over-the-counter pharmaceuticals, eye drops, and nutritional supplements. The Others segment includes apparel and aircraft sales and leasing services. The company was founded in April 1964 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

Nohmi Bosai Ltd. engages in the provision of fire protection systems and integrated fire protection services. It operates through the following segments: Fire Alarm Systems, Fire Extinguishing Systems, and Maintenance Services. The Fire Alarm Systems segment develops automatic fire alarm, fire doors, smoke control, and environmental monitoring systems. The Fire Extinguishing Systems segment offers sprinkler and foam systems, and fire protection equipment for large-scale buildings and facilities. The Maintenance Services segment ensures safety by offering maintenance and inspection services such as online monitoring, repair, and telephone support services. The company was founded by Teruichi Nohmi in December 1916 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nomura Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides the investment and financial services. It operates through the following segments: Retail, Asset Management, Wholesale and Merchant Banking. The Retail segment includes investment consultation services, distribution of trust certificates, and management of insurance agencies. The Asset Management segment offers portfolio and trust management, and provides investment advisory services for pension funds. The Wholesale segment consists of global markets and investment banking services such as trading of bonds, stocks, foreign exchange, and derivatives, and the underwriting of debt, equity, and other financial instruments. The Merchant Banking offers equity to clients as a solution for business reorganizations and revitalizations, business succession and management buyouts. The company was founded by Tokushichi Nomura on December 25, 1925 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nomura Micro Science Co., Ltd. engages in the design, construction, maintenance, and sale of ultra pure water systems. Its products and services include water treatment plants and equipment, water treatment units, process related equipment and functional products, chemicals, and piping and environmental materials. The company was founded on April 2, 1969 and is headquartered in Kanagawa, Japan.

Nomura Real Estate Holdings, Inc. engages in the real estate business. It operates through the following segments: Residential Development, Commercial Real Estate, Investment Management, Property Brokerage and Corporate Real Estate (CRE), Property and Facility Management, and Other. The Residential Development segment develops and sells condominiums and detached houses; and operates senior homes. The Commercial Real Estate segment develops, leases, and sells office buildings, commercial facilities, and logistics facilities. The Investment Management segment deals with private placement fund, asset management, and real estate securitized products. The Property Brokerage and CRE segment refers to brokerage and real estate consulting. The Property and Facility Management segment manages condominiums and office buildings as well as handles repair work and construction contracts. The Other segment sells and leases land and buildings. The company was founded on June 1, 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nongshim Holdings Co., Ltd. is a holding company which engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its services include investment consulting and other consulting services to its subsidiaries. The company was founded on July 1, 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Nordic Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management and administrative support to its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Project Services, Maintenance Services, and Others. The Project Services segment includes projects that require engineering, design, procurement, construction, machining, scaffolding works, insulation services, and passive fireproofing services. The Maintenance Services segment deals with the maintenance and repair services, including the trading and supply of material, spare parts, and components. The Others segment relates to other revenue streams, including dividends from investment holding. The company was founded on April 8, 2010 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Noritsu Koki Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of environment solution, kitchen, and photo processing equipment. It operates through the following segments: Monodzukuri, Health Care, Drug Discovery, Senior Life, Agricultural Food, and Others. The Monodzukuri segment handles research, development, production, and sale of pens and cosmetic parts. The Health Care segment provides radiology services, survey data, and genetic testing. The Drug Discovery segment provides research, development and sale of biopharmaceuticals. The Senior Life segment handles publication and mail order services for seniors. The Agricultural Food segment produces and sells fresh vegetables. The Others segment handles investigation and investment of new growth areas. It also offers mail order for dental materials and development and sale of drug treatment database for insurance companies. The company was founded by Kanichi Nishimoto in June 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Noritz Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of heating energy systems and housing equipment. It operates through Domestic and Overseas segments. The Domestic segment handles the sales and after-sales services of the company's products in Japan. It also offers shared services and parts for hot water equipment and provides cash management services through its subsidiaries. The Overseas segment deals with the businesses in China, North America, Hong Kong, and Australia. The company was founded on March 10, 1951 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

NOROO HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the ownership and management of its subsidiaries. Its services include consulting and management to its subsidiaries. The company was founded on November 1, 1945 and is headquartered in Anyang-si, South Korea.

NS Tool Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cutting tools. Its products include solid carbide end mills for high technology industries. It operates through End Mills- related and Others segments. The End Mills segment deals with the production and sale of cutting tools focusing on small-diameter carbide end mill. The Others segment handles the manufacture and sale of plastic molded products focusing on tool case. The company was founded in December 1954 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

NSK Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of bearings, automotive products, precision machinery, and mechatronic products. It operates through the following segments: Industrial Machinery, Automotive, and Others. The Industrial Machinery segment produces and sells industrial machinery bearings, ball screws, and linear guides. The Automotive segment manufactures and sells bearings for car and automotive component manufacturers, steering columns, and automatic transmission components. The Others segment deals with the production and sale of steel balls. The company was founded by Korekiyo Takahashi and Takehiko Yamaguchi in February 1914 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Nuode Investment Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of lithium-ion battery with high-grade copper foil. It develops lithium battery materials. Its business scope includes research and development, production, and sale of new materials and new energy products; production and sale of copper foil and copper foil industrial equipment and lithium-ion battery materials; investment and management of high-tech industry projects; and domestic and import and export trade. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

NVH KOREA, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include headliner, isolation and insulation dashes, insulation hood, tunnel pad, floor carpet, door trim, and others. The company was founded on January 17, 1984 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

Obara Group, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides the management of its group companies. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: Welding Equipment-related Business and Plane Polishing Machine-related Business. The Welding Equipment-related Business segment deals with the manufacture and sale of resistance welding machines, arc welding consumables and electrodes for the automotive industries. The Plane Polishing Machine-related Business segment produces polishing machines for silicon wafers, crystals, and glass disks. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of laser processing equipment and consumable auxiliary materials. The company was founded on December 23, 1958 and is headquartered in Yamato, Japan.

Ochi Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the control and management of its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Construction Materials, Environmental Amenities, Processing and Others. The Construction Materials segment merchandises building materials to contractors, lumber dealers, house builders, construction firms, and home centers. The Environmental Amenities segment purchases and sells air conditioners and heating equipment. The Processing segment deals with the structural framework for wooden houses. The Others segment includes construction, nursing care and industrial materials sales. The company was founded on October 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

Oenon Holdings, Inc. engages in the development and sale of alcoholic beverages, food products, enzymes and pharmaceuticals, and real estate. It operates through the following segments: Alcohol, Starch for Food Processing, Enzymes and Pharmaceuticals, Real Estate, and Others. The Alcohol segment manages the sale, transportation, and cargo handling of liquors such as shochu, chuhai, sake, synthetic sake, processed foreign liquors, industrial alcohol, seasonings, and wine. The Starch for Food Processing segment covers the manufacture and sale of starch for food processing. The Enzymes and Pharmaceuticals segment sells enzyme, active pharmaceutical ingredients, diagnostic agents, and health food ingredients. The Real Estate segment deals with the purchase, sale, and lease of real estate properties. The Others segment includes warehousing and cargo handling businesses. The company was founded on October 31, 1924 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Oji Holdings Corp. manages group companies, which engages in the production and sale of pulp paper products and converted paper products. It operates through the following segments: Household and Industrial Materials, Functional Materials, Forest Resources and Environment Marketing, Printing and Communications Media, and Others. The Household and Industrial Materials segment includes containerboard, corrugated container, boxboard, packaging papers, folding cartons, paper bags, and household products. The Functional Materials segment includes specialty and thermal paper, adhesive, and film. The Forest Resources and Environment Marketing segment includes pulp, energy, and timber businesses. The Printing and Communications Media segment consists of newsprint, printing, publishing, and communications paper. The Others segment comprises of real estate, engineering, trading, and logistics businesses. The company was founded by Eiichi Shibusawa on February 12, 1873 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Okada Aiyon Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction machinery machines. It operates through following segments: Domestic, Overseas, and Aiyon. The Domestic segment offers crushers, wood waste processing equipment, and concrete waste processing equipment. The Overseas segment sells crushers to customers overseas. The Aiyon segment provides forestry and industrial machineries. The company was founded by Tatsuo Okada in 1938 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

OKP Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of infrastructure and civil engineering services. It operates through the following segments: Construction and Maintenance. The Construction segment relates to the construction of urban and arterial roads, expressways, vehicular bridges, flyovers & buildings, airports infrastructure and oil & gas-related infrastructure for petrochemical plants and oil storage terminals. The Maintenance segment includes the re-construction work performed on roads, road reserves, pavements, footpaths & kerbs, guardrails, drains, signboards as well as bus bays and shelters. The company was founded by Or Kim Peow in 1966 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Olympic Group Corp. operates as a holding company that engages in the retail business. It operates through the following business divisions: Holding, Retail, and Retail-related businesses. The Holding division handles the management strategies of the group; and engages in the placement of management resources; and contract management of indirect businesses. The Retail division covers the retail sale of foods, sports and leisure products, home essentials, home appliances, golf, car and pet products. It also operates pet shops and home center businesses. The Retail-related division includes the product transport, storage, handling, delivery, and construction; store development and shopping center management and operation; computer system development, operation, and sale; home appliances repair; insurance agency management; and retail sales. The company was founded on February 22, 1973 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

OM2 Network Co., Ltd. engages in the retail of meat products. It operates through the Meat Retail and Restaurant segments. The Meat Retail segment handles retail of meat and processed meat products. The Restaurant segment handles the management of yakiniku (grilled meat) and steak restaurants. The company was founded in December 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

OMH SCIENCE Group Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, installation, and commissioning of special equipment. It specializes in logistics equipment, automated production, transmission lines, storage equipment, painting equipment, automatic monitoring system, automated distribution center, parking lots, and industrial robot. Its products include unit-load stacker crane, racking, steel pallet, rail guide vehicle, pallet destacker, mini-load systems, shuttle systems, vertical picking system, shoe sorter, crossbelt sorter, free conveyor, belt conveyor, roller conveyor, chain-slat conveyor, lifter, and automated conveyors. The company was founded on December 14, 1995 and is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

Omnisystem Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of electronic meters and other measuring devices. It operates through the Card and Measuring Instrument business divisions. Its products include digital power meter, digital installation meter, and remote automatic meter reading system such as switch type, socket outlet type, apartment, single-phase for household, three-phase for general purpose, kepco, multi-purpose, telemetering apparatus, water meter, and gas meter. The company was founded on February 17, 1997 and is headquartered in Yeoju-si, South Korea.

Onward Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are involved in apparel, resort, and service-related businesses. Its operations are carried out through the Apparel related and Lifestyle related business segments. The Apparel related business segment covers the geographical locations Japan, Europe, Asia and North America. The Lifestyle related business segment includes the design and construction of commercial facilities and the management of resort facilities. The company was founded by Junzo Kashiyama in February 1927 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Digital Holdings, Inc. engages in the strategy planning and management of its group companies that provides electronic marketing services. It operates through the Marketing and Synergy Investment segments. The Marketing segment offers internet advertising related services and data marketing solutions for local small and medium enterprises (SMEs). The Synergy Investment segment includes investment in internet-related venture companies, information collection in the United States, artificial intelligence (AI) and AI platform development, digital shift support services, and general trade in China. The company was founded by Noboru Hachimine on March 3, 1994 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

OPTEX GROUP Co., Ltd. engages in the development, design, manufacture, and sale of sensors and similar systems. It operates through the following segments: Sensing Solution (SS), Factory Automation (FA), Machine Vision Lighting (MVL), Electronics Manufacturing Service (EMS), and Others. The SS segment develops and designs electronic parts and sensors for security devices, automatic doors, water quality measuring equipment, and traffic-related systems. The FA segment manufactures factory automation products. The MVL segment handles the light-emitting diode lighting device for image processing. The EMS segment provides electronic equipment manufacturing service. The Others segment deals with software development and sports club operations. The company was founded by Tatsuya Arimoto and Toru Kobayashi on May 25, 1979 and is headquartered in Otsu, Japan.

OPTORUN Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, distribution, import, and export of vacuum coating machines, peripheral equipment and units using vacuum coating products. It develops optical thin film coaters (OTFC) and general-use optical thin film equipment (GENER). It also offers reactive plasma deposition systems, multilayer optical coaters, and AR vacuum coaters. The company was founded by Son Daiyu on August 25, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Orchestra Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies which are into Internet advertising services. It operates through the following segments: Digital Marketing Business, Digital Transformation Business, and Others. The Digital Marketing Business segment offers operational advertising, search engine optimization consulting, creative services, and other supplementary services. The Digital Transformation Business covers cloud integration, tool application development, and web system development. The Other segment includes platform business and new business. The company was founded by Yoshiro Nakamura on June 17, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Organo Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of water purifiers and electrical equipments. It operates through the following segments: Water Treatment Engineering and Functional Products. The Water Treatment Engineering segment manufactures and sells large-scale water treatment equipment and provides its operation and maintenance. The Functional Products segment manufactures and sells standard water treatment equipment, various water treatment chemicals, and food additives. The company was founded on May 1, 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Oricon, Inc. engages in the business of content production and publication, and website production and management services. It operates through the following segments: Communication Business, Mobile Business, Publishing Business, Data Providing Business, and Others. The Communication Business segment offers web advertising sales and entertainment news, and production contract of digital content. The Mobile Business segment sells mobile phone content and provides contract production of websites for mobile phones. The Publishing Business segment sells magazines and provides magazine advertising services. The Data Providing Business segment provides marketing data in entertainment business; and music database for EC sites and broadcasting stations. The Others segment deals with the social game business. The company was founded on October 1, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Oriental Consultants Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of infrastructure consulting services. It operates through the following segments: Infrastructure Management Services, Environmental Management, and Others. The Infrastructure Management Services segment offers intellectual services such as planning, research, design, evaluation, and coaching. The Environmental Management segment deals with construction, survey, environmental cleanup, and demolition works. The Others segment includes construction management, measurement control, information technology solutions related to asset management, temporary staffing, resources management and business process outsourcing. The company was founded on August 28, 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ORIENTAL PRECISION & ENGINEERING Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of machineries and equipment for ships. Its products include lifting appliances, engine room crane, life saving appliances, deck machinery, deck house, engine room casing, funnel, and living quarter. The company was founded on July 19, 1980 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.

OSG Corp. Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of water products and purifying equipment. It operates through the following segments: Water-Related Equipment, Maintenance, Home & Office Delivery (HOD) and Others. The Water-Related Equipment segment provides water purifiers, ionizers, oxidizers, filters, and coolers. The Maintenance segment provides hollow fiber membrane and activated carbon cartridges, liquid electrolyte additives, and maintenance parts. The HOD segment delivers hot and cold mineral water to homes and offices. The Others segment provides home electronic medical equipment, health products and tools. The company was founded on August 29, 1970 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

OSJB Holdings Corp. operates as a holding company that engages in the planning and management of its group companies those are engaged in the design, fabrication, installation, and construction of bridges, steel frames, and steel structures. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Steel Structure and Others. The Construction segment engages in the construction, manufacture and sale of pre-stressed concrete; construction of pneumatic caisson and repair works; design and construction of anti-seismic reinforcement; and sale of construction materials. The Steel Structure segment handles the design, production, and installation of steel structures such as bridges and others. The Others segment engages in the generation and sale of power through solar power generation. The company was founded by Katsujiro Iwai on July 7, 1919 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Otsuka Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of pharmaceuticals and nutritional supplements. It operates through the following business segments: Pharmaceuticals, Nutraceuticals, Consumer Products, and Others. The Pharmaceuticals segment manufactures therapeutic drugs and infusions focusing on the central nervous system, oncology, and infectious diseases. The Nutraceuticals segment develops and markets nutrition products such as nutritional food, quasi-drugs, health drinks, and dietary supplements for homes, medical facilities, and nursing care units. The Consumer Products segment sells mineral water, food, and beverages. Its products include Bon Curry, Mannan Hikari, and ReSOLA. The Others segment distributes functional and fine chemicals, optical inspection devices, and clinical diagnosis equipment. The company was founded in1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Overseas Education Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of private foreign system school. It offers a fully integrated inquiry-based programme comprising the International Early Years Curriculum, the International Primary Curriculum, and the International Baccalaureate curriculum within a globalized multi-cultural environment to children. The company was founded on October 28, 2011 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Pacific Century Regional Developments Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of business management and consultancy services. It operates through the Investment Holding, and Business Management and Consultancy Services segment. The company was founded on October 25, 1963 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Pacific Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts, electric appliance components, electronic devices, and related products. It operates through the following segments: Stamping and Molding Products, Valve Products, and Others. The Stamping and Molding Products segment produces automotive press, mold, and resin products. The Valve Products segment offers tire valves, valve cores, compressors, and electronic materials, and tire pressure monitory system products. The Others segment includes information service business. The company was founded by Soichi Ogawa on August 8, 1930 and is headquartered in Ogaki, Japan.

PAL GROUP Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group of companies that deals in clothing and apparel business. It operates through the following segments: Apparel, General Merchandise, and Others. The Apparel segments deals with retail sale of clothing. The General Merchandise segment handles purchase and sale of daily essentials. The Others segment engages in the manpower agency business. The company was founded on October 27, 1973 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Palemo Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holdings company which provides the management of its subsidiary companies. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: Apparel and Miscellaneous Goods. The Apparel segment provides ladies clothing and accessories, through various types of specialty stores under the names GAL FIT, RecHerie, DOSCH, Re-J, Lilou de chouchou, Ludic Park, DAISY MERRY, FOREST HEART and SUPURE. The Miscellaneous Goods segment offers groceries, bags and apparel accessories for ladies, through special stores under the names Hare no hi, illusie300, Illusie, Soebelet and INCENSE. The company was founded on November 22, 1984 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Pan Asian Holdings Ltd. engages in the provision of piping solutions for infrastructure projects for water and wastewater infrastructure projects. It operates through the following business segments: General Trading (GT), Engineering Solutions (ES), Valves (VA), and Others. The GT segment involves the trading of water piping materials and related accessories. The ES segment offers specialized products to water infrastructure products. The VA segment includes valves for municipal and industrial applications. The Others segment supplies parts and accessories in the oil and gas industry and other non-water related products. The company was founded by Chye Heng Koh on September 18, 1979 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Pan-United Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in the production of cement products and provision of logistics services. It operates through the following segments: Concrete and Cement, Trading and Shipping and Others. The Concrete and Cement segment supplies mainly cement, granite, ready-mix concrete and refined petroleum products to the construction and marine industries of Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia and Indonesia. The Trading and Shipping segment consists of coal trading, bulk shipping and agency operations. The Others segment relates to companies which are of investment holding in nature. The company was founded by Ng Kar Cheong in 1958 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Paramount Bed Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, drafting, and implementation of group management strategies, auditing group management, and tasks related to group management control. Its group companies are involved in the manufacture and sale of beds, mattresses, and equipment for medical and nursing care environments. It also deals with services that include inspection and maintenance of Paramount Bed products and the leasing and wholesaling of welfare care products. The company was founded on October 1, 1982  and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Parker Corp. engages in the manufacture, development, and sale of fine chemicals for industrial use, and soundproofing materials for automotive use. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Machinery, Chemical Products, Chemicals, Industrial Materials, Processed Products, and Others. The Machinery segment includes food products and chemical equipment and machinery, shoe making machinery and materials, and automotive-related equipment and machinery. The Chemical Products segment includes automotive materials, automotive parts, and gas sealants. The Chemicals segment includes industrial cleaning agents, barrel finishing machines, polishing machines, and steel machinery chemicals. The Industrial Materials segment includes sound insulation for automotive and appliances. The Processed Materials segment includes fine chemicals, car wash chemicals, and hot air machine for cleaning-use. The Others segment includes petroleum products, real estate leasing, and nursing care equipment. The company was founded on August 23, 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
Payton Industries Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and marketing of transformers. The company was founded on March 10, 1987 and is headquartered in Ness Ziona, Israel.

Pegavision Corp. focusing on research, development, manufacture and marketing of soft contact lenses and the medical optic devices. Its products are Pega lens and Pega color. The company sells it products with "PEGAVISION" brand name. It also sells the product through online application. Pegavision was founded on August 26, 2009 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

Pengyao Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. provides environmental water treatment services. It operates through the following business segments: Investment and operations, Contracting, Equipment production and sale, and Design and consulting. The Investment and operations segment provides sewage treatment and water treatment services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.

PERSOL Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the temporary staffing business. It operates through the following business segments: Temporary Staffing and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO), Recruiting, PROGRAM MED, PERSOL KELLY, ITO, Engineering, and Others. The Temporary Staffing and BPO segment provides services in clerical work, research and clinical development, outsourcing, nursing, and government office contract businesses. The Recruiting segment includes services in mid-career recruitment, new graduate assessment, part time employment, and executive placement. The PROGRAM MED segment provides maintenance and staffing business in Australia. The PERSOL KELLY segment offers PERSOL KELLY brands in the Asia-Pacific region. It also manages temporary staffing, recruitment, and outsourcing businesses in the region. The ITO segment includes system solutions, business consulting, and outsourcing in energy and information and communications technology (ICT) fields. The Engineering segment designs and develops automobile and automobile parts, aerospace and industrial machineries, and electronics. The Others segment includes shared services such as education training. The company was founded by Yoshiko Shinohara in May 1973 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Petrovietnam General Services JSC engages in the manufacture and trade of oil and gas products. It also engages in the distribution of electronic and telecommunication equipment; catering and food services; management and operation of hotels, amusement, and entertainment parks; real estate business; property leasing; propylene plastic distribution; provision of logistic services for specialized material and equipment in oil industry; and trading of agricultural products and fertilizers. The company was founded on June 20, 1996 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corp. engages in the development and investment of real estate properties. The company's business operations include the construction and trade of houses; brokerage of real estate; the construction of civil, industrial, and road bridges; the lease of houses, warehouse, and heliports; the trade of interiors, equipment machines, construction materials and appliances; and investment consultancy. The company was founded on September 13, 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

PIA Corp. engages in the provision of entertainment services. Its business includes the sale of music items, sports, movies and events tickets; publishing; website management, planning, production, and operation of concerts and events. The company was founded by Hiroshi Yanai on July 10, 1972 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

PiPEDO HD, Inc. engages in the management of its subsidiaries and related businesses. It operates through the following segments: Information Asset Platform, Sales Promotion Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Solutions, Advertising, xTech, and Social Innovation. The Information Asset Platform segment provides platform as a service which customizes function to meet client needs in addition to the management and storage of asset information. The Sales Promotion CRM Solutions segment offers information technology systems that create contact opportunities with customers. The Advertising segment deals with Internet advertising services. The xTech segment shares information across companies and organizations, mainly through the use of information technology. The Social Innovation segment manages projects for solving social issues that exist beyond the boundaries of individual companies and industries. The company was founded on September 1, 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

PJ Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in electronic manufacturing service business. Its products include ultrasonic wave diagnosis device, integrated circuit card reader, security equipment, settop box, telecommunication equipment, automotive devices, and printed circuit board assemblies. The company was founded on July 18, 1969 and is headquartered in Bucheon-si, South Korea.

Plantynet Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of web-filtering services. It operates through the following business divisions: Internet Value Added Service and Internet Contents Service. The Internet Value Added Service division offers website filtering services, expanded services, time care and plantyware. The Internet Contents Service division provides Internet contents services through JoosMusic, Jamynote and Moazine, including music, magazines, images and other contents. The company was founded on June 1, 2000 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

Plasson Industries Ltd. engages in the provision of pipe fittings and valves. The company offers solutions for connecting polyethylene pipes used for conveying water and other fluids in urban and inter-urban infrastructure; industrial, mining, landscape, and farming applications; and for carrying communication lines. Its products include electrofusion fittings, adjustable elbow, mechanical fittings, and wastewater systems. The Company operates through two business segments: Pipes Connecting Accessories and Animal Related Products. Plasson Industries was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in D. N. Menashe, Israel.

PNC Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and development of terminal devices for power distribution automation. It offers products such as Distribution automation system, Numerical protection relay and Substation automation system. The company was founded on March 3, 1999 and is headquartered in Anyang-si, South Korea.

Pola Orbis Holdings Inc. engages in the management of its group companies that deals with the manufacture, distribution, and sale of cosmetics. It operates through the following segments: Beauty Care, Real Estate, and Others. The Beauty Care segment covers the flagship brands POLA and ORBIS, brands under development-pdc, FUTURE LABO, ORLANE, decencia, and THREE, and the overseas brands Jurlique and H2O PLUS. The Real Estate segment handles the leasing of office buildings and residential properties. The Others segment includes the pharmaceuticals business and building maintenance services. The company was founded on September 29, 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Poletown Pitcrew Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company which provides the control and management of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Testing, Verification & Evaluation Business and Internet Supporting Business. The Testing, Verification & Evaluation Business segment carries out defect detection (debugging) in support of improvement in product quality of software and hardware. The Internet Supporting Business which detects any frauds as well as illegal or harmful information presented in a variety of content to support the healthy development of the Internet. The company was founded on February 2, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

POONGSAN HOLDINGS Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries and in the manufacture and sale of packaging materials and machines. It operates through the Management and Manufacturing Business divisions. The Management division provides consulting, information technology, and brand management services to its subsidiaries. The Manufacturing divisions offers multi gage, packaging materials, and machines. The company was founded on October 22, 1968 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

POSCO Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of refractories. It operates through the Refractory Manufacturing and Lime Chemical Business Divisions. The company was founded on May 13, 1971and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea.

Posiflex Technologies, Inc. engages in the design and production of point of sale (POS) management systems and peripheral products. It also provides information service system overall solutions. The company's products include mobile POS, POS terminals, POS boxes, kiosks, POS monitors, line displays, POS printers, cash drawers, POS keyboards, and barcode scanners. Posiflex Technologies was founded on August 11, 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

Poten Environment Group Co. Ltd. engages in the provision of integrated solutions for pollution control. Its business activities include water treatment, management of water resources, development of ecological restoration technology, undertaking of water and environmental projects in engineering design, core equipment manufacturing, development and sale of environmental related products, investment & operation of covering industry and urban water, ecological restoration, energy & equipment and asset management. The company was founded on January 18, 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Procurri Corp. Ltd. operates as an investment holding company, which engages in the wholesale of computer hardware and peripheral equipment. It operates through the Information Technology Distribution Business and Lifecycle Services Business segments. The Information Technology Distribution Business segment resells hardware products such as pre-owned servers, storage and networking equipment, and provides supply chain management. The Lifecycle Services Business segment is the rendering of information technology maintenance services for a variety of (IT) systems and networks; hardware as a service on a transaction-based pricing model as well as the provision of service to extend the life of equipment and to extract greater value for retired technology, by means of equipment refurbishment and data destruction services, and asset disposal services. The company was founded in October 2009 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Protec Co., Ltd. manufactures equipment for semiconductor packaging. It operates through the following divisions: System and Pneumatic. The System division manufactures semiconductor packaging, automation equipment, dispenser system and die bonder system. The Pneumatic division produces pneumatic cylinders and precision parts. The company was founded on September 1, 1997 and is headquartered in Anyang, South Korea.
PSK, Inc. manufactures semiconductor processing machinery. The company was founded on April 1, 2019 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.

PT ABM Investama Tbk engages in the provision of business management consulting services. It operates through the following business segments: Services, Manufacturing, and Mining Contractors & Coal Mining. The Services segment consists of power engine rental, remanufacturing, integrated logistics, and vessel rental services. The Manufacturing segment produces heavy equipment components and accessories. The Mining Contractor and Coal Mining segment offers thermal coal, and provides mining contracting services. The company was founded on June 1, 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Apexindo Pratama Duta Tbk engages in the provision of onshore and offshore drilling services for the oil and gas, geothermal, and coal bed methane industries. It operates through the Offshore Drilling Services and Onshore Drilling Services segments. The Offshore Drilling Services segment includes Swampbarges and Jack-up. The company was founded on June 20, 1984 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Astra Otoparts Tbk engages in the production and distribution of automotive components and spare parts. The firm operates through the Trading and Automotive Component Manufacturing segments. It is also involved in aluminum die casting of automotive components and manufacturing of precision machineries, automation and production equipment. The company was founded on September 20, 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Austindo Nusantara Jaya Tbk is a holding company, which engages directly and through its subsidiaries in the production and sale of crude palm oil, and palm kernel. The company operates through the following segments: Palm Oil, Energy, Sago, and Others. It also involves in the direct operation of palm plantation, and the production and use of renewable energy through its subsidiaries. The company was founded in March 1986 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Dyandra Media International Tbk is a holding company, which engages in the provision of event solutions. The company operates through the following segments: Event Organizer, Hotel, Convention and Exhibition, and Supporting Event. It provides event and exhibition organizing, convention, and exhibition facilities; event organizing support services; and hotel accommodation and hospitality services. The company was founded on July 24, 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Elang Mahkota Teknologi Tbk engages in the provision of technology, media, and telecommunications services. It operates through the following segments: Media, Solutions, and Others. The Media segment deals with nationwide and local free-to-air televisions, online and digital media properties, and content distribution and production businesses. The Solutions segment provides a series of infrastructure and services in information, communication, telecommunication industry, banking and payment services. The Others segment includes pay television, internet service providers, home shopping, healthcare, and various investments. The company was founded on August 3, 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Indika Energy Tbk engages in the coal mining business. It operates through the following segments: Energy Resources, Energy Services, and Energy Infrastructure. The Energy Resources segment deals produces and distributes coal products. The Energy Services segment offers engineering, procurement, construction, and contract mining operations. The Energy Infrastructure segment manages power generation plant. The company was founded on October 19, 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Indofood CBP Sukses Makmur Tbk engages in the manufacture and production of foods. It operates through the following segments: Noodles Division, Dairy Division, Food Seasonings Division, Snack Foods Division, Nutrition and Special Foods Division, and Beverages Division. The Noodles Division produces and markets instant bag noodles, cup noodles, egg noodles, and vermicelli. The Dairy Division trades dairy products such as sweetened condensed milk and creamer, liquid milk, powdered milk, ice cream, and butter. The Food Seasonings Division markets culinary products such as soy sauce, chili sauce, tomato sauce, instant seasoning, and cordial syrup. The Snack Foods Division offers western and contemporized traditional snacks. The Nutrition and Special Foods Division supplies cereal and biscuits for infants and children, cereal snacks for kids, cereal drinks for adults, and milk products for expectant and lactating mothers. The Beverages Division delivers ready-to-drink tea and coffee, carbonated soft drinks, fruit juice drinks, and packaged water. The company was founded on September 2, 2009 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Intermedia Capital Tbk engages in the provision of television broadcasting services which focuses on family, children, and entertainment content. It operates through the following two segments: Advertisement and Non-Advertisement. The company was founded on February 25, 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Kirana Megatara Tbk engages in the production and manufacture of rubber. It operates through Crumb Rubber Factory and Agro Business segments. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Map Boga Adiperkasa Tbk is a holding company, which engages in the investment of cafes and restaurants. It operates through the following business segments: Beverages, Foods, and Others. Its brands include Starbucks, Pizza Marzano, Krispy Kreme, Godiva Chocolatier, and Cold Stone Creamery. The company was founded on January 7, 2013 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT MNC Investama Tbk is an investment holding company, which engages in the business of industry, mining, transportation, agriculture, construction, services, and trading. It operates through the following segments: Financing and Securities, Bank Financial Institution, FTA and Content, Pay TV and Broadband, and Others. The company was founded by Hary Iswanto Tanoesoedibjo on November 2, 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT City Retail Developments Tbk engages in the building construction, trading, and managing shopping malls. It operates through the following segments: Shopping Mall, Hotel, Real Estate, and Others. The company was founded on December 18, 2003 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Pacific Strategic Financial Tbk engages in the provision of investment management and securities trading services. Its activities include securities portfolio investment, securities brokerage, cash management, and financing institution. The company was founded on February 22, 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk engages in the provision of land transportation services. It operates through the following segments: Passenger Transportation Services, Inter-Cities Transportation Services, and Other Services. The company was founded on September 11, 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.

PT Polaris Investama Tbk is an investment company, which through its subsidiaries, engages in the business of securities underwriting and dealership, property, and trading businesses. It operates through the PT Universal Broker Indonesia and PT Binong Nuansa Permai segment. The company was founded on July 23, 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Samindo Resources Tbk is a holding company, which engages in the investment in coal mining, mining services, trading, transportation, agriculture, construction, electricity power generation, and industrial. It operates through the following segments: Overburden Removal and Coal Getting Services; Coal Hauling Services; Drilling, Exploration, and Other Services; and Other. The company was founded on March 15, 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Saratoga Investama Sedaya Tbk is an investment company, which engages in the management of investee companies. It operates through the following segments: Natural Resources, Infrastructure, Consumer Products, and Head Officer and Others. The Natural Resources segment offers investment opportunities relating to the natural resources the country can offer. The Infrastructure segment provides investment opportunities in the infrastructure field, such as toll roads, power plants, transportation, and related sectors. The Consumer Products segment focuses on investing in retail sector. The company was founded by Edwin Soeryadjaya and Sandliaga Salahuddin Uno on May 17, 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Selamat Sempurna Tbk engages in the manufacturing of filters, radiators, oil, coolers, condensers, brake pipe, fuel pipes, fuel tanks, exhaust systems, and press parts. It operates through the following segments: Filter, Radiator, Body Maker, Trading, and Others. The Filter segment produces and sells filters. The Radiator segment markets radiators. The Body Maker comprises of dump hoist and body maker of dump truck, trailer, mixer, and tank. The Trading segment distributes the Group‘s products to aftermarket sector. The Other consists of fuel tank, muffler and brake pipe. The company was founded on January 19, 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PT Sky Energy Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacturing of solar modules. It offers technical services for the solar power plant on grid and off grid, including technical design, installation and maintenance. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.

PT United Tractors Tbk engages in the sales and rental of heavy equipment and provision of related after-sales services, coal mining, and mining contracting services. It operates through the following segments: Construction Machinery, Mining Contracting, Mining, Construction Industry, and Energy. The Construction Machinery segment relates to heavy equipment distribution. The Mining Contracting segment delivers mining contracting services to coal's producers. The Mining segment provides is the production and trading of coal. The Construction Industry segment delivers construction works such as developing base, structures, civil, and infrastructure works. The Energy segment refers to participation in energy sector through development of power plant. The company was founded on October 13, 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

Pulmuone Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing and distribution of food materials. It offers products like tofu/herb salad, ramen, dumpling, rice, rice cake, jelly, sauce, seasoning, soup, egg, seaweed, mushroom, kimchi, ice, beverage, cafeteria, logistics and healthcare services. In addition, The company also engages in management of its subsidiaries. Pulmuone was founded by Nam Seung Woo on May 31, 1984 and is headquartered in Eumseong-gun, South Korea.

Puloon Technology Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of automation products. It operates through the following business divisions: Banking Automation, Automatic Fare Collection, Special terminal system, and Others. Its products include automated teller machine, gate system, optical mark recognition, materials, and others. The company was founded on July 26, 1997 and is headquartered in Seoul, Korea.

Pyeong Hwa Automotive Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive moving parts. Its products include latch systems, module systems, hinges, strikers, door checkers, regulator systems, safety catch, touch pad switch, hood catch, endgate handle, fuel filler opener, injection part, stamping parts, and power systems. The company was founded on April 11, 1985 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Q&M Dental Group (Singapore) Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management and consultancy services. It operates through the following segments: Primary Healthcare, and Dental Equipment and Supplies Distribution. The Primary Healthcare segment comprises of dentistry, family medicine, and aesthetic services. The Dental Equipment and Supplies Distribution segment offers dental equipment and supplies distribution comprising distribution of dental supplies and equipment. The company was founded by Chin Siau Ng in November 1996 and is headquartered in Singapore.

QAF Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture and distribution of food and beverages. It operates though the following segments: Bakery, Primary Production, Distribution & Warehousing, and Investments & Others. The Bakery segment manufactures and distributes bread, confectionery, and bakery products. The Primary Production segment involves in the production, processing, and marketing of meat; and feed milling and sale of animal feeds and related ingredients. The Distribution & Warehousing segment includes trading and distribution of food and beverage products and provision for warehousing logistics for food items. The Investments & Others segment covers investment holding and other activities. The company was founded on March 3, 1958 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Qatari Investors Group engages in the investment activities. Its services include shares, bonds, and securities. The firm operates through the following segments: Industrial, Contracting and Technology, Real Estate, Marine Services, Trading, and Others. The Industrial segment is involved in general industrial activity. The Contracting and Technology segment supplies and installs security systems. The Real Estate segment purchases, constructs, and sells lands and buildings. The Marine Services segment provides shipping, logistics, marine, and aviation services. The Trading segment trades sports equipment. The Others segment invests in agencies, sponsorship shares, and engineering businesses. The company was founded on May 4, 2006 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

Qiming Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture and sale of automotive industry management software and automotive electronics. The automotive electronics include body, vehicle, and new energy automotive electronics. The company was founded on October 25, 2000 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

Qingdao Tianneng Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of wind turbine tower equipment. Its business scopes include sale and operation of wind power generation, photovoltaic power generation, biomass energy generation, electricity, and wind farms; and installation of offshore wind power foundation piles and towers. Its products include onshore wind turbines, offshore wind power towers, photovoltaic power plant equipment, and onshore wind farm equipment. The company was founded on March 3, 2006 and is headquartered in Jiaozhou, China.

Qingdao Vland Biotech Co., Ltd. manufactures biotech products. It mainly specialized in the research and development of four main product categories which are enzymes, probiotics, vaccines and animal health products. It provide solutions to an industries including agriculture, animal husbandry, textile, paper making, household cleaning and detergents, food, biofuel and environmental protection. The company was founded on February 23, 2005 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

JA Solar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research & development, production, sales of silicon wafers, solar cells and solar cell components, as well as the development, construction and operation of solar photovoltaic power plants. The company was founded on October 20, 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Quick Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. provides integrated solutions for smart equipment and automation equipment. Its products include smart soldering stations, smart static elimination equipment, smoke purification filter equipment, and automatic industrial robots for automatic soldering, dispensing, screw locking, visual inspection, assembly testing, handling, and transportation. The company was founded on June 28, 2006 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

Rechi Precision Co., Ltd. manufactures compressors and pumps. Its products include rotary compressors & relevant pump sets; direct current variable-frequency controllers; as well as hot water equipment for commercial and residential uses. The company's products are applied primarily in the manufacturing of air conditioners, water heaters, dehumidifiers and cloth dryers. Rechi Precision was founded on December 19, 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

Recomm Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, lease sale, installation, and maintenance of information and communication equipment. It operates through the Information and Communication Equipment and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) segments. The Information and Communication Equipment segment sells business phones, digital combined machine, and office automation devices. The BPO segment handles telecommunication equipment sales in China, group management business contract, and outsource business from customers. The company was founded in September, 1994 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Recruit Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of integrated human resource services. It operates through the following business segments: Human Resources (HR) Technology, Media and Solutions, and Staffing. The HR Technology segment offers platforms for job searching such as Indeed and Glassdoor. The Media and Solutions segment provides marketing and human resources solutions. The Staffing segment handles staffing dispatch both domestically and internationally. The company was founded on March 31, 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Rekah Pharmaceutical Industry Ltd. engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of medicines, cosmetics products, and food supplements. It operates through the following segments: Industrial, Wholesale, Special Distribution and Retail. The Industrial segment engages in the manufacture of medicines and cosmetics products. The Wholesale segment engages in the marketing and distribution of medicines and cosmetics products. The Special Distribution and Retail segment engages in the marketing to end consumers. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Holon, Israel.

Relo Group, Inc. engages in the housing, leisure, and insurance businesses. It operates through the following segments: Domestic, Global, and Others. The Domestic segment deals with property management and brokerage, outsourcing, hotel management, and employee benefits agency services. The Global segment provides overseas assignment work support and home management services while the owners are away. The Others segment includes resort and financial businesses. The company was founded by Masanori Sasada on March 15, 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Restar Holdings Corp. manufactures and distributes semiconductors and electronic components. It operates through the following segments: Semiconductors and Electronic Components, Procurement, Electronic Equipment, and Environmental Energy. The Semiconductors and Electronic Components segment carries out the sale and evaluation testing of semiconductors and electronic parts. The Procurement segment deals with supply chain management through global procurement trading and related business outsourcing services. The Electronic Equipment segment sells audio-visual equipment, electronic measuring instruments, and applied products. The Environmental Energy segment engages in renewable energy from solar power and wind power plants. The company was founded in October 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

RETAIL PARTNERS CO., LTD. engages in the management of supermarkets. It operates through the following segments: Supermarket, Discount Store, and Others. The Supermarket segment sells fresh and processed food, prepared dishes, and miscellaneous goods. The Discount Store segment sells clothing items and daily goods. The Others segment include lunch box food preparation and insurance agency business. The company was founded on March 12, 1954 and is headquartered in Hofu, Japan.

Reward Wool Industry Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of wool top. Its products include wool top, special processing top, carbonized noil, lanolin, and fatty acid. The company was founded by Chang Chi Ying on May 1, 1964 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Ricoh Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, sale, and provision of services for imaging systems, industrial printers, and network equipment. It operates through the following segments: Office Printing, Office Services, Commercial Printing, Industrial Printing, Thermal, and Others. The Office Printing segment provides multifunction devices, printers, and copiers for offices. The Office Services segment deals with infrastructure construction, network communication support, and visual communication products. The Commercial Printing segment provides digital printing products and maintenance services. The Industrial Printing segment manufactures and sells industrial inkjet heads, inkjet inks, and industrial printers. The Thermal segment produces thermal paper and thermal transfer ribbons. The Others segment includes industrial products, Smart Vision, and new businesses. The company was founded by Kiyoshi Ichimura on February 6, 1936 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
