Rightway Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the business of general building construction, curtain wall decorations and real estate development. Its products include fiberboards, straw artificial, veneer artificial boards, wood suite doors, laminate wood floorings, building templates, steeping film adhesives, printing wood grained papers and coated, toughened, hollow and laminated glasses. The company was founded on May 22, 1993 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Riken Keiki Co., Ltd. engages in the production and distribution of gas detectors and alarms. Its products include gas monitoring system, indicator unit, detector head, stand-alone gas detector, portable gas detectors, and surface analyzers. The company was founded on July 30, 1934 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Ringer Hut Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of restaurant chains serving Japanese food. It operates through the following segments: Nagasaki Champon, Tonkatsu, and Facility Maintenance. The Nagasaki Champon segment manages the specialty store chain Nagasaki Champon. The Tonkatsu segment handles the specialty store Tonkatsu. The Facility Maintenance segment deals with the maintenance of group restaurants. The company was founded by Go Yonehama on July 22, 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Rinnai Corp. engages in the development, manufacture, and sales of comprehensive heating products. It products include water heaters, kitchen appliances, air-conditioning appliances, commercial-use equipment and others. The company was founded by Hidejiro Naito and Kanekichi Hayashi on September 1, 1920 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Riso Kyoiku Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of one-on-one educational guidance services. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Cram School, Tutor Dispatch, Early Childhood Education, In-school Tutorial, Personality Training Camp and Others. The Cram School segment offers individualized guidance system for learners in all grade levels. The Tutor Dispatch segment provides tutorial services for all grade levels. The Early Childhood Education segment gives examination guidance for entrance to prestigious kindergartens and elementary schools. The In-school Tutorial segment utilizes the TOMAS method in setting up tutoring booths in schools. The Personality Training Camp segment refers to the School TOMAS' plus one training. The Others segment includes personality enrichment camp education as well as student recruitment business. The company was founded by Mitsugu Iwasa on July 6, 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Riverstone Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the manufacture and trade of healthcare and room cleaning products. It operates through the following geographical segments: Malaysia, Thailand, China and Others. The company was founded by Wai Keong Lee and Teek Son Wong in 1989 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Riyue Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. Operates as a foundry manufacturer that specializes in research, production, and sales services. Its products include plastic injection molding, diesel engine series, wind power series, machining center series, giant mining machine series, and gear box series. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Robostar Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of industrial robot, FPD and IT component equipment. The company operates through following segments: Robot, Transfer Robot, Precision Stage and System. The Robot segment produces cartesian robot, linear robot, scara robot, desk top robot, controller and vertical articulated robot. The Transfer Robot segment manufacture robot for semiconductor, robot for liquid crystal display and vacuum environment robot. The Precision Stage segment provides process equipment such as gantry stage, hybrid type, customized stage and air bearing stage. It was founded on February 26, 1999 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

Robotis Co., Ltd. develops and commercializes robots. Its products include actuator parts, intelligent softwares, education robots, and open platform for developing robots. The company was founded on March 25, 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Roland DG Corp engages in the manufacture and sale of computer peripherals including printers, cutters, milling machines and engravers. It operates through the Product Development and Manufacturing System division and Sales System division. The Product Development stage is done by the company while the Manufacturing System division is done by same and its subsidiary in Thailand. Domestic Sales under the Sales System division is handled by the company, while overseas sales is handled by its subsidiaries and franchised dealers. The company was founded on May 1, 1981 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. provides electrical equipment, credit information, big data solutions, banking, business factoring, financial leasing and insurance broker services. The company was founded by Yong Xiang Lu on November 6, 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Rothwell International Co. Ltd. engages in the development, manufacturing and sales of auto electronic components and auto electric parts. Its products include CAN bus control system, Automotive air-conditioning system and NEV pack system. The company was founded on February 5, 2014 and is headquartered in Hong Kong.

ROUND ONE Corp. engages in the operation and management of indoor leisure complex with bowling alleys, arcade games; karaoke, billiards, and spoor-cha (indoor amusement facilities); leisure stadiums, billiard tables, table tennis game, music studios and other indoor facilities. It also offers darts, batting and pitching services. The company was founded by Masahiko Sugino on December 25, 1980 and is headquartered in Sakai, Japan.

Roxy-Pacific Holdings Ltd. operates as a investment holding company, which engages in the investment, development and sale of residential and commercial properties. It operates through the following business segments: Hotel Ownership, Property Development, Property Investment and Others. The Hotel Ownership segment relates to the ownership of hotel. The Property Development segment includes the development of properties for sale. The Property Investment segment refers to the investment in properties to earn rentals and for capital appreciation. The Others segment comprises of corporate office functions. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Royal Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company that engages in the management of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Restaurants, Contract Food, In-Flight Catering, Hotels, Food Manufacturing and Others. The Restaurants segment operates a chain of stores that includes hospitality, pizza, and specialty restaurants; grill and salad bars; English pubs; beer halls; and cafes. The Contract Food segment provides contract catering services for airport terminals, commercial, hospital, and welfare facilities; department stores; golf courses; and service areas in expressways. The In-Flight Catering segment provides food services for Kansai, Fukuoka, Naha, Haneda and Narita airports. The Hotels segment operates business hotels such as Richmond Hotels. The Food Manufacturing segment manufactures, purchases, and distributes food products for the restaurants and also provides contract business. The Others segment includes food sales and real estate leasing services. The company was founded by Kyoichi Egashira on April 4, 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
RPA Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company with an interest in robot outsourcing and Ad network business. The company was founded on April 3, 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

RS Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of the automation machines and equipment. It offers special industry machinery for robot motion contral and energy control. The company was founded on December 10, 2009 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.

Ryoden Corp. engages in the manufacture, trade, import, export and sale of industrial systems and devices. It operates through the following segments: Factory Automation (FA) Systems, Cooling and Heating Systems, Information Technology (IT) and Facilities Systems, Electronics, and Others. The FA Systems segment offers servo systems, inverters, and numerical control devices. The Cooling and Heating Systems segment provides package air conditioners, chilling units, and refrigerators. The IT and  Facilities Systems segment includes elevators, IT-related products, and medical facilities. The Electronics segment offers semiconductor memory, microcomputers, power devices, and raw materials. The Others segment includes property and life insurance business. The company was established on April 22, 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

S&T Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of heat exchange units. Its products include air fin coolers, heat recovery steam generator, steam surface condenser, selective non-catalytic reduction system. The company was founded on August 15, 1979 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

S&T DYNAMICS Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of automobile components. It operates through the following business divisions: Transportation equipment and Machinery. The Transportation equipment business division offers axles, transmission, defense products, and others. Machinery business division offers computerized numerical control lathe, gear processing machine and others. The company was founded on April 1, 1959 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

S&T Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the acquisition of substantial control on other companies through shareholding. It provides business management consulting services for its subsidiaries. Through its subsidiaries, it operates in the following business areas: Automotive Parts, Defense, Plant, Banking services, Financial Service, and Overseas. The company was founded on August 15, 1979 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

S&T MOTIV Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. It operates through the Automobile parts and Industrial engineering business divisions. Its products include suspension system, electronic stores, motor, airbag, engine parts, head exchanger, semiconductor equipment and others. The company was founded in December 1981 and is headquartered in Busan-si, South Korea.

SAC'S BAR Holdings, Inc. engages in the business and property management of its group companies. The company provides the sale of branded bags and pouches, wallets, and general merchandise through various directly-managed shops located in shopping centers, station buildings, and other commercial facilities. Its brands incude Lapax, Gran Sac's, Collage, Sac's Bar, Le Frau, Ama, Drastic the Baggage, and Beau Atout. The company was founded by Shikajiro Kiyama in May 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SAERON AUTOMOTIVE Corp. engages in the manufacture of friction materials. Its products include brake pads, brake lining, and rotor facing for cars. The company was founded on March 31, 1999 and is headquartered in Cheonan-si, South Korea.

Sagami Holdings Corp. engages in the business of restaurant services. It operates through the following divisions: Restaurant and Others. The Restaurant division operates Japanese style restaurant under the name "Sagami". The Others division engages in insurance agency, maintenance services, and real estate property leasing businesses. It also manages and supplies materials to its franchise stores, and provides store management guidance. The company was founded on March 4, 1970 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Sakai Heavy Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction equipment and industrial machinery. Its offers compaction equipment such as vibratory single drum roller, vibratory tandem roller, static pneumatic tired roller, static three wheel roller, vibratory tandem roller, vibratory combine roller, vibratory pneumatic tried roller, vibratory three wheel roller, rammer, plate compactor and walk behind rollers; road maintenance and repair equipment such as road planner, reclaimer, asphalt paver, road cleaner and water sprinkler. It also engages in the sale of out sourced industrial machinery. The company was founded by Kinnosuke Sakai in May 1918 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sakai Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the renewable energy business. It sells power to electric power companies through its installed photovoltaic power generation equipment. The company was founded on March 19, 1991 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Sala Corp. operates as a holding company that engages in the management and operation of its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Energy and Solutions, Engineering and Maintenance, Housing, Car Life Support, Animal Health Care, Property, and Others. The Energy and Solutions segment supplies liquefied petroleum gas, petroleum products, and high-pressure gas. The Engineering and Maintenance segment provides civil engineering and construction works; facility construction and maintenance; and installment services for telecommunication-related equipment. The Housing segment covers house construction and building renovation; real estate purchase, sale, leasing, brokerage and management services; and sales of construction and housing equipment. The Car Life Support segment sells and maintains imported cars. The Animal Health Care segment deals with veterinary pharmaceuticals, livestock machinery and equipment, and animal feed additives. The Property segment operates hotels, dining and drinking establishments. The Others segment includes automotive parts manufacturing, installment sales and leasing businesses. The company was founded on May 1, 2002 and is headquartered in Toyohashi, Japan.

Salam International Investment Ltd. engages in the acquisition, incorporation, and management of commercial, industrial and financial businesses. It operates through the following segments: Contracting; Energy & Power; Consumer & Luxury Product; Technology & Telecommunication; and Real Estate & Investments. The company was founded by Abdul Salam Mohammed Abu Issa on January 14, 1998 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

SAM Holdings Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of telecommunication cables and wires. Its products include copper cable, optical fiber cable, copper wire, and conductive wire. Its operations also deal with real estate and financial investments. The company was founded on April 10, 1986 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

SAMBO MOTORS Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of motor vehicle parts. It operates through the following divisions: Auto Part, Pipe Part, Plastic Part, Mold and Tuning. The Auto Part division manufactures plates for auto transmission. The Pipe Part division manufactures water and heater pipes, filler neck, oil screen, and gauge. The Plastic division supplies bumper, trim lugg side, cockpit, and others. The company was founded on September 25, 1987 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Samkee Automotive Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts. Its products include engine and transmission parts, alloy, and others. The company was founded on June 3, 1978 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.

Samko Timber Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture and trade of timber products. It operates through the following segments: SGS Division and ST Division. The SGS Division segment refers to the operations of PT Sumber Graha Sejahtera group of entities which involves in manufacturing and sales of primary processed timber products such as general plywood and laminated veneer lumber; and secondary processed timber products such as truck, piano body parts, and decking. The ST Division segment covers the operation of Samko Timber Limited and Samko Trading Pte Ltd group of entities which focuses on trading all types of timber products manufactured by the division, SGS division, and third parties. The company was founded by Koh Boon Hong in 1978 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Samyang Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its services cinclude investment and consulting. The company was founded on October 1, 1924 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

San Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of funeral services. It operates through the following segments: Koekisha Group, Sou Sen Group, Tarui Group, and Holding Company Group. The Koekisha Group segment provides funeral services in Kansai area and Tokyo metropolitan area. The Sou Sen Group segment offers funeral services in Tottori and Shimane regions. The Tarui Group segment handles funeral services in Hyogo area. The Holding Company Group segment leases real estate, office spaces, and parking lots. It also engages in the business of real estate and consigned administrative works. The company was founded in August 1932 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Sanoh Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts, electrical devices parts, and equipment. Its products include tubings, chassis products, brazed products, and wire condensers. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Japan, North and South America, Europe, China, and Asia. The company was founded on March 24, 1939 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sanwa Holdings Corp. engages in the management of group companies, which are involved in the manufacture and sale of commercial building and residential housing materials, maintenance service, home improvement, and other related services. Its products includes shutter-related products, building, house and garage doors, partitions, stainless products, window products, and exterior products. The company was founded on April 10, 1956 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sanxiang Advanced Materials Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, production and sale of new industrial materials. Its products include fused zirconia, sponge zirconium, zirconium oxychloride, casting modified materials, single crystal fused aluminum, and micro silicon powder. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Ningde, China.

Sany Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and selling of construction engineering machineries, heavy lifting machineries, parking warehouse, common equipment, mechanical and electrical equipment products. It also engages in the R&D and distribution of engineering machinery types such as construction machinery, road construction machinery, and hoisting machinery. Its products include the concrete pump, truck mounted concrete pump, concrete batching plant, asphalt batching plant, roller, asphalt paver, motor grader, truck crane, crawler crane, of which the market shares of truck mounted concrete pump, concrete pump, and full hydraulic roller stand and the production of pump truck stand. The company was founded by Tang Xiu Guo on November 22, 1994 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

Sapphire Corp. Ltd. is an investment management and holding company, which engages in the infrastructure business. It is involved in the design, civil engineering and construction for land transport infrastructure and water conservancy and environment projects, major tunneling works, underground structures, expressways, road and bridges for township development, and urbanization projects. The company was founded by Cheng Kwee Teo on November 26, 1985 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Sapporo Holdings, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. It operates through the following segments: Alcoholic Beverages (Japan), International, Food and Soft Drinks, Restaurants, Real Estate, and Others. The Alcoholic Beverages (Japan) segment manufactures and sells alcoholic beverages in Japan. The International segment produces and sells alcoholic beverages and soft drinks overseas. The Food and Soft Drinks segment manufactures and markets food and soft drinks. The Restaurants segment handles operations of restaurants. The Real Estate segment includes leasing and development of real estate. The Others segment includes the logistics business. The company was founded in September 1876 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sarine Technologies Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of precision technology products for the processing, grading and trade of diamonds and gemstones. It offers rough stone polishing and polished diamond grading and trade products and services. The company was founded on November 8, 1988 and is headquartered in Hod Ha'Sharon, Israel.

Sato Holdings Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of mechatronic and supply products, and provision of software and maintenance services. It operates through the following business segments: Auto-ID Solutions (Japan), Auto-ID Solutions (Overseas), and IDP. The Auto-ID Solutions (Japan) includes manufacture and sales of mechatronic products and supply products; planning and proposal of solutions in the medical field; and manufacture and sale of industrial rubber products, synthetic resins, RFID tags and labels. The Auto-ID Solutions (Overseas) segment handles the supply product manufacturing and sales; business process reform consulting, planning and construction of information systems; product package comprehensive production service; development and manufacture of RFID tags and labels; and manufacture and sales of supply products, sales of mechatronic products. The IDP segment covers the development and sales of inline digital printing products and technical support. The company was founded by Yo Sato in 1940 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Saudi Advanced Industries Co. engages in investment services. It services includes the import of advanced technologies in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia through the active participation in industrial joint ventures and other industrial projects. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Saudi Arabia Refineries Co. engages in the extraction of crude oil and construction of refineries, petrochemical plants and refineries. Its other activities also include securities dealing; buying and selling of lands and real estate; and the management and leasing of owned or leased non-residential real estate. The company was founded on June 14, 1960 and is headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

Saudi Industrial Investment Group engages in the production and export of petrochemicals. Its products include benzene, cyclohexane, motor gasoline, styrene, propylene, ethylene, polyethylene, polystyrene, and hexane. The company was founded on January 1, 1996 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Savola Group operates as an investment holding group, which invests in the food and retail sectors across the Middle East, North Africa and Turkey region. It operates through the following segments: Foods Processing, Retail, Food Services, Frozen Foods, and Investment. The Foods segment is involved in the manufacture and sale of edible oils, sugar, and pasta products. The Retail segment includes hyper markets, super markets and convenient store operations. The Food Services segment includes food products and fast food restaurants' chain operated by Herfy. The Frozen Food segment includes manufacturing, wholesale and retail distribution of frozen food products operated by Good Food Company. The Investments segment comprises of real estate activities, investments in associates, available-for-sale investments, and other investments. The company was founded on January 10, 1979 and is headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

SBI Holdings, Inc. manages the SBI group which engages in the provision of comprehensive financial services. It operates through the following segments: Financial Services, Asset Management, Biotechnology-related, and Others. The Financial Services segment covers finance-related businesses and the provision of information regarding financial products including securities brokerage, banking services, and life, property and casualty insurance. The Asset Management segment consists of fund management and investment in Internet technology, biotechnology, environmental energy, and finance-related venture companies in Japan and overseas. The Biotechnology-related segment develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and health foods. The Others segment includes housing and real estate businesses such as the development and trading of investment property and the operation of online intermediate services. The company was founded on July 8, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SBS Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group of companies that have interests in the logistics business. It operates through the following segments: Logistics, Real Estate, and Others. The Logistics segment provides general, food, specialized logistics and property management logistic facility services. The Real Estate segment leases office facilities, residences, and warehouses. The Others segment includes human resources, environmental, marketing, and solar power businesses. The company was founded on December 16, 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SBS Media Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of broadcasting and advertisement services. It operates through the following business divisions: Television Advertisement, Am-Radio Advertisement, Fm-Radio Advertisement, Digital Multimedia Broadcasting Advertisement, Program Sales, and others. The company was founded on March 4, 2008 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Scientech Corp. engages in the manufacturing and sale of semiconductor, flat panel display, light-emitting diode (LED), and solar products. Its business activities include the distribution of chemistry and biotechnology products, broadcast equipment, semiconductor, LED, liquid-crystal display, solar, data storage, and 3D printer; provision of research and development services for wafer reclaim technology; and research and development, and manufacture of chemical analysis equipment agent technology. Its products include wet bench, LED laser engraving tool, asher, single wafer wet process tool, and orion spray technology tool, scientific instruments, and hi-tech related products. The company was founded on October 17, 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

SCREEN Holdings Co., Ltd. manages its group companies, which are engaged in the manufacture and sale of semiconductors and printing equipment. It operates through the following segments: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment Business (SPE), Graphic Arts Equipment Business (GA), Display Manufacturing Equipment and Film Deposition Equipment Business (FT), Printed Board Related Equipment (PE) and Others. The Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment Business segment develops, manufactures, sells, and maintains semiconductor manufacturing equipment. The Graphic Arts Equipment Business segment engages in the develops, manufactures, sales and maintains printing-related equipment. The Display Manufacturing Equipment and Film Deposition Equipment Business segment develops, manufactures, sales and maintains display manufacturing equipment and film forming equipment. The Printed Board Related Equipment segment develops, manufactures, sales and maintains printed board related equipment. The Others segment includes development of software; manufacture and sale of life science field equipment; and planning and production of printed materials. The company was founded on October 11, 1943 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

SE Holdings & Incubations Co., Ltd. acts as a holding company with interests in publishing, software networking, and corporate services. It operates through the following segments: Publishing, Corporate Services, Software Networking, Training and Human Resources, and Investment Management. The Publishing segment engages in the publication and sale of computer -related books, technical materials, and references. The Corporate Services segment deals with the planning, marketing, and support services to the information technology-related companies. The Software Networking segment handles the development and sale of entertainment software, mobile phone applications, and web services. The Training and Human Resources segment operates a recruitment site and offers training in the information industry. The Investment Management segment deals with securities investment and real estate leasing. The company was founded on December 19, 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SeAH Besteel Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of special steel, forging and automobile parts. It operates through Special Steel and Auto Parts business divisions. The Special Steel division provides steel materials for automobile, construction machinery, industrial machinery, and energy. The Auto Parts offers axle assembly and die forging. The company was founded on April 5, 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

SeAH Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. Its companies include SeAH Steel, SeAH Besteel, SeAH Special Steel, Korea Bundy, SeAH ESAB, SeAH Engineering, SeAH M&S, SeAH Networks, SeAH Metal, and SeAH L&S. SeAH Steel provides steel pipes, general plumbing pipes for oil wells, mechanical structures, and pipelines. SeAH Besteel engages in large-size forgings, auto parts, axels, and rail wheels for transportation means. SeAH Special Steel produces CHQ wires and CD bars for nuts and bolts used in cars, machines, and electronic appliances. Korea Bundy manufactures small steel tubes used in consumer electronic appliances and automobiles. SeAH ESAB provides welding supplies and other related equipment. SeAH Engineering manufactures mechanical devices and specialty industrial equipment. SeAH M&S supplies Molybdenum alloy products for semiconductors, special steel, duplex pipes used in nuclear power plants. SeAH Networks provides information technology services for hardware and software. SeAH Metal produces wire products such as stainless steel wires and automotive rack bars. SeAH L&S provides domestic and overseas cargo shipping services. The company was founded on July 1, 2001 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Seera Holding Group engages in the ownership and operation of travel agencies. It primarily involves in selling tickets for scheduled air travel services, tourism, cargo, transportation, Hajj and Umrah, arranging conference and events, education, chartered flights, furnished suites and hotels, shipping and other travel related products and services. The company operates through the following segments: Ticketing, Tourism, Transportation, Hospitality, and Property Rentals. The Ticketing segment involves in the issuance of tickets of airlines, ferries, and trains. The Tourism segment consists of hotel booking services, package holidays, and room rentals. The Transportation segment includes transportation services, such as car rentals, chartered flights, and delivery of shipments. The Hospitality segment offers rebates and trade discounts. The Property Rental segment provides properties on operating lease. Seera Holding Group was founded by Nasser Aqeel Abdullah Al-Tayyar on April 30, 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Sega Sammy Holdings Inc. engages in the amusement and entertainment business. It operates through the following segments: Pachislot and Pachinko Machines, Entertainment Content, and Resort. The Pachislot and Pachinko segment includes the development, manufacture and sale of pachislot and pachinko machines. The Entertainment Content segment provides entertainment content that include digital contents, toys, game software, amusement machine, and amusement facilities. The Resort segment develops and operates hotels and theme parks. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Segue Group Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the distribution, integration and engineer resource services. Its operations are carried out through the Solution Product and Solution Service business divisions. The Solution Product business division engages in the importation of security products and IT infrastructure products necessary for building IT systems as agents. It also sells identity authentication solutions. The Solution Service division designs and builds IT systems. It also provides after service, help desk service and monitoring service. The company was founded by Yasuyuki Aisu on December 1, 2014 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seibu Holdings, Inc. engages in the management and general control of its group of companies. It operates through the following segments: Urban Transportation and Regional, Hotel and Leisure, Real Estate, Construction, Hawaii Business, and Other. The Urban Transportation and Regional segment handles railway, buses, and taxis operations. The Hotel and Leisure segment deals with the management of hotels, golf courses, ski resorts, and aquariums. The Real Estate segment manages stores I train stations, destination-type shopping malls, and large-scale developments such as Tokyo Garden Terrace Kiocho and Daiya Gate Ikebukuro. The Construction segment provides construction services for railway lines and hotel renovations. The Hawaii Business segment operates hotels and golf courses in Hawaii. The Other segment deals with businesses in Izu-Hakone and areas around Lake Biwa. It also manages the Saitama Seibu Lions baseball team. The company was founded on February 3, 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seika Corp. engages in the provision of systems and equipment for plants, machinery and equipment, environmental protection equipment, and electronic information system equipment businesses. It operates through the following segments: Power Plant, Chemicals and Energy Plant, Industrial Machinery, Advanced Materials and Measuring Instruments, and Global Business. The Power Plant segment covers power generation equipment, environmental protection equipment and related equipment. The Chemicals and Energy Plant segment includes general industrial power generation equipment, environmental protection equipment and related equipment and process manufacturing equipment. The Advanced Materials and Measuring Instruments segment handles the medicine, food, beverage, brewing, plant engineering, textiles and machinery equipment for publishing, printing and maintenance. The Global Business segment handles submersible pump, wastewater treatment equipment, textile / chemical machinery equipment, raw materials (fiber raw materials) and electronics packaging related equipment. The company was founded on October 1, 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seiko Holdings Corp. engages in the management and organization of its clock, watch, electronics, and eyeglass businesses. It operates through the following business segments: Watches, Electronic Devices, Systems Solutions, and Others. The Watches segment manufactures and sells watches and watch movements. The Electronic Devices segment includes semiconductors, quartz crystals, micro batteries and materials, printers, hard disk  drive components, and shutters for cameras. The Systems Solutions segment offers wireless communication equipment, information network systems, and data services. The Others provides clocks, jewelry, apparel and fashion accessories, and system clocks. The company was founded by Kintaro Hattori in December 1881 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seino Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of transport services. It operates through the following segments: Transportation Services, Vehicle Sales, Merchandise Sales, Real Estate Leasing Services, and Others. The Transportation Services segment deals with truck, cargo, and air transportation, warehousing, customs brokerage, and insurance agency services. The Vehicle Sales segment sells and repairs trucks, passenger cars, and automobile parts. The Merchandise Sales segment markets fuel and paper products. The Real Estate Leasing Services segment rents out land, buildings, and truck terminals. The Others segment includes information services, housing sales, taxi, travel agency, construction consignment, and staffing services. The company was founded by Rihachi Taguchi on February 11, 1930 and is headquartered in Ogaki, Japan.

Seiwa Chuo Holdings Corp. engages in the wholesale business of steel products like steel bars, rods, plates and shaped steel. It also handles contract work related to steel, cargo and freight handling, and storage businesses. It operates through the following geographical segments: Western Japan, Eastern Japan and Others. The company was founded by Kiyoshi Sakagami on March 31, 1954 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Sejong Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include mufflers, catalytic converter, D-beam, and electronic parts. The company was founded by Se-Jong Park on June 10, 1976 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.

Sembcorp Industries Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the production and supply of utilities services, terminalling and storage of petroleum products and chemicals. It operates through the following four segments: Energy, Marine, Urban and Others/Corporate. The Energy segment involves in providing energy to industrial and municipal customers. The Marine segment provides integrated solutions for the offshore and marine industry, which include rigs and floaters; repairs and upgrades; offshore platforms; and specialized shipbuilding. The Urban segment owns, develops, markets and manages industrial parks as well as business, commercial, and residential space in Asia. The Others/Corporate segment comprises businesses mainly relating to minting, design and construction activities, offshore engineering and others. The company was founded on May 20, 1998 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SEMPIO Co. engages in the provision of food processing services. Its products include vegetable essence, soy sauce, jang paste, Korean cuisine sauce, noodles, canned, dried seafood, tea, drinking vinegar, and others. The company was founded on December 9, 1971 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Semyung Electric Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of electrical fittings. It operates though the following business areas: Transmission and Distribution, Textile, Railway, and Automobile. The Transmission and Distribution business offers transmission line fittings used in electric equipment. The Textile business offers sectional beams. The Railway business offers trolley wire equipment. The Automobile business offers casting and forging products such as manifolders, special alloy forged products, and air ducts and delivery pipes. The company was founded on February 3, 1984 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.

Sen Yue Holdings Ltd. engages in the manufacture and designing of tool and die. It operates through the following segments: Metal Components and Tool & Die, Electro-Deposition Coating, Commodities, and Others. The Metal Components and Tool and Die segment involves in the manufacture and sale of perforated materials, speakers nets, tool, die, and other metal components. The Electro-Deposition Coating segment focuses on the coating services and secondary process. The Commodities segment includes the trading of copper, stainless steel, and other special alloy. The Others segment comprises corporate services. The company was founded by Kong Sin Tan and Kwong Soon Tan in 1992 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SENKO Group Holdings Co., Ltd. provides holdings in shipping, logistics and warehousing services. It operates through the following segments: Logistics, Trading and Commerce, and Others. The Logistics segment includes trucking, railway forwarding, marine transport, warehousing, global logistics service, and integrated retail logistics. The Trading and Commerce segment deals with petroleum sales, trading sales, and international trading business. The Others segment provides data outsourcing processing, automobile maintenance, and insurance agency services. The company was founded in September 1916 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seoam Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures gears, curvic coupling, industrial machinery, chuck and cylinder. Its main products include gears, reducer, hydraulic cylinder, curvic coupling, chuck and special chuck which are used in machine tools, marine engines, turbo compressor, wind power generators, railroad cars and robots. The company was founded on February 15, 1978 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea.

SEOYON E-HWA Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include door trims, bumpers, console, package tray, pillar trim, and seat assembly. The company was founded on July 1, 2014 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Septeni Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in Internet business. It operates through the Internet Marketing and Media Contents segments. The Internet Marketing segment handles Internet advertising sales, web solutions, marketing platform operations, cloud customer relationship management services, and internet marketing. The Media Contents segment cultivates and produces Manga (Japanese comics) artists; and offers Manga distribution services. The company was founded in October 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Seven & i Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, management, and operation of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Convenience Store, Oversea Convenience Store, Superstore Operations, Department Store Operations, Financial Services, Specialty store, and Others. The Domestic Convenience Store segment operates directly managed and franchised stores under the name of 7-Eleven in Japan. The Oversea Convenience Store segment operates directly managed and franchised stores under the name of 7-Eleven in oversea. The Superstore Operations segment manages supermarkets and specialty shops. The Department Store Operations segment includes department store business, which mainly centers on Sogo and Seibu Co., Ltd. The Financial Services segment deals with bank, credit card, lease, and other businesses. The Specialty store segment engages in the retail business that provides distinctive products and services. The Others segment includes information technology business and other services. The company was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sewon Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include seat motor bracket; heating, ventilation, and air conditioning end shield; radiator cap; header condenser; clutch stopper; and wiper crank arm. The company was founded on December 23, 1991 and is headquartered at Pyeongtaek-si, South Korea.

SFP Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the restaurant business with focus on Japanese-style bar. It operates through the following business divisions: Toriyoshi Business, Isomaru Business, and Others. The Toriyoshi Business division handles the operation of restaurants Toriyoshi, Omotenashi Toriyoshi and Toriyoshi Shoten. The Isomaru Business division handles the operation of Isomaru Suisan. The Others division include Teppan Nihyaku, CASA DEL GUAPO, Tamacho Honten, Bistro Isomaru, Kizunasushi, Nama Soba Tamagawa, Ichigoro, Homebase, Gonogo, Hamayaki Dragon and Hitsji Hachiban. The company was founded on November 17, 2011 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SG Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management strategies and administration of its group companies with interests in delivery services. It operates through the following business segments: Delivery, Logistics, Real Estate and Others. The Delivery segment covers domestic and international deliveries, specialized mode of transport, product recalls service, temporary storage and call center customer service. The Logistics segment includes logistics processing facilities for product shipping, storage, inspection and packing. The Real Estate segment performs general management and operation of real estate facilities and provides solar power generation as a clean energy supply business. The Others segment comprises of product sales, insurance agency, fuel sales, automobile maintenance and sales, system sales and maintenance, e-collect, temporary staffing and contracting. The company was founded on March 22, 2006 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

SG&G Corp. engages in the provision of e-commerce services. It operates through the following business divisions: Logistics, Automobile Parts, Molding, Nuclear Power Plant Parts, and Others. The Logistics business provides air freight, charter, cargo, and inland transportation services. The Automobile Parts business manufactures automobile seats and seat parts. The company was founded on November 8, 1993 and is headquartered in Ansan-si, South Korea.

Shaanxi Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of engineering machinery, construction machinery, and metal structural products. It specializes in asphalt paver, roller, milling machine, stabilized soil mixing machine, and asphalt mixing plant suitable for road construction equipment; spin ground foundation construction engineering drilling rig used in municipal construction, bridges, and high-rise buildings; and tower cranes suitable for housing construction. It provides metal structure installation, and rental and maintenance of construction machinery equipment. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

Shandong Hiking International Co., Ltd. engages processing and export trade of hair products and textile and apparel products. It focuses on research and development, design, procurement, production, and sales of human hair and chemical fiber mixed hair products. Its products include male hair, women's wig, hair extension, and wig accessories. Its business covers textile and apparel, handcrafted gift, hair products, agricultural products, metal products, steel products, copper concentrate, nickel ore, and textile raw materials. The company was founded on November 28, 1993 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

Shandong Longertek Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on the design, manufacture, research and development of energy-saving automobile and railway air conditioners. It offers automobile air conditioner, refrigerators, chiller, refrigeration accessories, inverter controllers, electronic components and refrigeration engineering installation services. The company was founded on April 7, 2000 and is headquartered in Laiwu, China.

Shandong Longji Machinery Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive components and parts. Its business activities include the development, production, and sale of brake disc, brake hub, hub, brake block, brake shoes for automobiles or air pump, water pump, and oil pump for automobiles; and supply of auto parts. Its products are brake rotors, brake drums, heavy duty discs, heavy duty drums, clutch pressure plates, and wheel hubs. The company was founded on March 26, 2008 and is headquartered in Longkou, China.

Shandong Shanda Wit Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in pharmaceutical and environmental protection businesses. Its products include medical products, environmentally friendly products, informatic products and new materials. The company was founded on June 26, 1993 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.

SAIC Motor Corp. Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, sale of automobiles and related parts. It operates through the following business segments: Vehicles & Parts and Financing. The company's business activities include the sale of passenger and commercial vehicles, and components such as engine, transmission, power train, chassis, exterior trim and also offers automotive trade services such as auto financing business. It is currently establishing an intelligent logistics service platform to deliver extended services to clients. SAIC Motor was founded on November 24, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Bairun Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of wine, beverage and refined tea. It operates through the Flavors and Fragrances, and Pre-mixed Cocktail segments. The  Flavors and Fragrances segment  includes the research and development, production, sales and service of Flavors and Fragrances under the brand Bairun. The Pre-mixed Cocktail segment offers different alcohol percentage as well as flavor choices. The company was founded on June 19, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Baolong Automotive Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of intelligent and lightweight automotive products. Its products include automobile tire pressure monitoring systems, automobile metal pipe fittings, valves, balance weights, sensors and advanced driving assistance systems. The company was founded by Hong Ling Chen on May 20, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Beite Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of metal products. Its products include rack blank, semi-finished rack, finished rack, finished valve sleeve, semi-finished input shaft, semi-finished worm shaft, pinion blank, semi-finished pinion, piston rod blank, semi-finished piston rod, and finished piston rod. The company was founded on June 21, 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Carthane Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of car components and parts. It produces polyurethane elastomer and polyurethane products. The car components and parts involve buffering bit blocks, dust covers, plastic parts, plastic pedal assemblies, and wheels and rollers. Its products include suspension products such as buffer stoppers and supporting plastic and top support; control products such as pedal assembly; and polyurethanes products such as high-bearing polyurethanes rubber tyres and poured with polyurethane elastomer. The company was founded on July 31, 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Chengtou Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of comprehensive real estate, environmental and venture capital services. Its business sectors include environmental services, real estate business and equity investment. The environmental service provides a full range of services from transfer, landfill to waste-to-energy of the municipal solid waste. The real estate business covers land development, ordinary commercial housing and low-income housing projects, historic architecture preservation as well as the technology park development. The equity investment develops the venture capital business in finance field. Shanghai Chengtou Holding was founded on July 21, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

QITIAN Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of optical lenses. Its products include hard resin lens, middle index lens, high index lens, polarized lens, photochromic lens, Rx lens and free form, and hi-vex lens. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of car components and auto parts. Its products include sun visors, steering wheels, headrests, overhead consoles, armrests, gear knobs, and rear vanity mirrors. The company was founded on February 20, 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Dazhong Public Utilities (Group) Co., Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of public utilities services and financial investments. It operates through City Gas, Urban Transportation, Environment and Public Infrastructure, and Financial Investment segments. The company was founded on December 24, 1991 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Dragon Corp. engages in the businesses of brand management and international trade. It provides knitting, apparel, and home textile products. The company’s products include knitted underwear, socks, duvet covers, pillowcases, quilts, blankets, towels, shirts, sweaters, and jackets. Shanghai Dragon was founded on June 30, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Fudan Forward S&T Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical products. It also develops financial insurance system software products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of automatic fare collection system terminal equipment. It offers system integration, equipment supply and technical services of venues and attractions ticketing and access control system. Its business segment includes rail transit automated fare collection (AFC) system, pavilion and scenic spot AFC system, library entry guard AFC system, and core modules. The products of rail transit AFC system include booking office machine, ticket vending machine, automatic gate machine, and automatic query machine. The products of library entry guard AFC system include tripod turnstile series, sector door series, and retractable door series. The products of corer module include coin, distribution, recycle, and barrier module. The company was founded on August 9, 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Jiao Yun Co., Ltd. engages in operation of logistics activities. Its business activities include provision of road freight and logistics services; provision of road passenger transportation and tourism services; sale and after-sale services of passenger cars; and manufacturing and sale services of auto parts. The company also involves in warehousing, steel sales, and import & export businesses. Shanghai Jiao Yun was founded on July 28, 1993 and it is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Kelai Mechatronics Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and manufacturing of electromechanical intelligent equipment and industrial robot system integration; and the research, development, production, and sale of automotive engine parts. It provides assembly, inspection, welding, spraying, and bending lines, fuel distributor, fuel pipe, and cooling water pipe. The company was founded by Shi Li Tan and Jiu Kang Chen on May 30, 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Lansheng Corp. engages in the operation of import and export trade. Its business scope is self-operated and agent import and export business of commodities and technologies, domestic trade, industrial investment and asset management, warehousing, technical service, and business consulting Its products include mechanical and electrical machinery products, textile raw materials and products, steel products, footwear products, plastic products, electrical appliances, hardware, daily necessities, luggage, travel goods, and porting goods and toys. The company was founded on October 7, 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Mechanical & Electrical Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electromechanical equipment. It operates through the following business segments: Elevators, Printing and packaging machinery, Hydraulic machinery, Welding equipment, and Energy engineering. The Elevators segment engages in the production, maintenance, and sale of elevators and escalators. The Printing and packaging machinery segment includes the production and sale of printing and packaging machinery equipment and spare parts, raw and auxiliary materials, and instruments and meters. The Hydraulic machinery segment engages in the production and sale of hydraulic pumps, hydraulic valves, hydraulic equipment, and pressure reducers. The Welding equipment segment includes welding wires, electrodes, brazing materials, and thermal spray powders. The Energy engineering segment engages in the research and development of energy-saving building technology and contract energy management. The company was founded on July 29, 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Xinnanyang Only Education & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the education services and precision manufacturing business. Its education services involve in K12 education, vocational education, international education and high end management trainings. The company was founded on December 18, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Pharmaceuticals Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, distribution, and retail of pharmaceutical products. The company was founded on January 18, 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Precise Packaging Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of liquid food packaging machinery and aseptic packaging material. Its products include full-automatic sterile brick-type packaging machine, full-automatic sterile flexible packaging machine, full-automatic flexible packaging machine, in-line cup machine, full-automatic ultra-high-temperature tubular sterilization machine, sub-high-temperature sterilization machine, box filling machine, pipe sticking machine, hydraulic paper pushing machine, sterilize brick machine, hydraulic paper embracing machine, application of high pressure homogenizer, sealed large-scale horizontal high pressure homogenizer, high-pressure spray pump, full-automatic high pressure homogenizer, colloid mill, rotor pump, high-pressure dispersion emulsifying machine, three-leaf pump, hydraulic pressure regulating components, special and wear-resisting plungers of various materials, and packaging materials. The company was founded on June 27, 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Qiangsheng Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of taxi, car rental, automotive service, tourism, and housing industry. The company was founded on February 1, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Sinotec Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and development of auto parts and turbocharger components. Its business activities include sand casting, precision casting, welding assemblies, heat-resistance stainless steel, heat treatment, mechanical and electrical equipment development. The company was founded on June 22, 2006 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Tianyong Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, design, installation, research and development of automation equipment, machinery and other related electronics. The company was founded on July 11, 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Tofflon Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, distribution of pharmaceuticals equipment. Its products and services include freeze dryer, auto loading systems, barrier systems, plastic packaging machines, auto solution preparation systems, and aseptic filing line for ampoule, vial, syringe and powder. The company was founded on December 25, 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Tongji Science & Technology Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in real estate development. Its business activities include provision of travel and food services; industrial investment and management; training industry investment and talent training; provision of consultancy services; local trading; trading consultancy; self management and operation in export and import industry. The company was founded in November 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Yahong Moulding Co. Ltd. designs and manufactures precision injection molds. It sells small and medium size precise plastic molds. The company was founded on April 7, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Group Co., Ltd is principally engaged in the distribution of general merchandise and provision of technology on import and export business. Its products include jewelry products, general merchandise, hardware, arts and crafts, tobacco and wine products, electronics, raw materials used in the chemical industry, medicine, furniture, unique merchandise, snacks and beverages, construction and decoration materials, metal goods and other related products. The company other activities include provision of network information services and development of real estate. Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart Group was founded on May 30, 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the design, construction, installation and contracting of large-scale port handling systems and equipment. It designs heavy sea equipment, construction machinery, engineering ships, and large metal structure parts and components. The firm's products include container cranes, heavy equipment, and steel structures. It also provides build-transfer project, bulk cargo, ship transportation and equipment lease services. The company was founded on September 8, 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Shantui Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and maintenance of construction machinery. Its products include bulldozers, excavators, road machinery, wheel loaders, concrete machinery, municipal machinery, and spare parts. The company was founded on January 1, 1980 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

Shanxi Guoxin Energy Corp. Ltd. engages in the planning and construction, operation management, and foreign franchise of natural gas transmission network. Its business includes storage, transportation, distribution, and sales of pipeline natural gas, compressed natural gas, and liquefied natural gas; and construction and operation of natural gas filling stations. The company was founded on April 30, 1992 and is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

Shanxi Road & Bridge Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of chemical products. It specializes in polyvinyl alcohol, 1.4-butanediol, adhesives, benzene, coke, and maleic anhydride series. Its products include polyvinyl alcohol, 1.4-butanediol, tetrahydrofuran, y-butyrolactone, polytetramethylene ether glycol, white latex, can be further dispersion latex powder, ethylene vinyl acetate emulsion, sodium acetate, diacetate, and ester series. The company was founded on February 6, 1996 and is headquartered in Linfen, China.

Sheng Siong Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the operation of supermarket and grocery stores under the Sheng Siong brand. It sells live, fresh, and chilled produce, preserved food, general merchandise, and household products. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Sunrise Group Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production and sale of metal packaging products. Its products include cans, tin cans, easy-open lid and other metal products for the beverage and food industries. The company was founded on December 4, 1992 and headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

Shenyang Blue Silver Industry Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture and development of automatic control technologies. It offers automatic control products and services for tire, energy saving, metallurgy and machine tool industries, automatic equipment, as well as production lines, among others. The company was founded on September 29, 2004 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Co., Ltd. principally engages in the research, development, production and sale of light trucks and automobile parts. Its products include light trucks and automobile parts, such as interior accessories, seats, and rubber parts. The company was founded on April 18, 1988 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

SIASUN Robot & Automation CO., Ltd. principally engages in the provision of robots and digital solutions. It offers smart products and services for smart manufacturing, semiconductor equipment, defence security, and consumer services. The company was founded on April 30, 2000 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

Shenzhen Anche Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacturing and sale of vehicle safety inspection system. Its products include brake tester, chassis dynamometer, steering checker, play detector, platform and speedometer tester. The company was founded on August 6, 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Centralcon Investment Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the development of real estate properties. Its business scopes include hotel management, asset management, property management, business management, and equity investment industries. Its business activities include construction of residential and commercial properties, and hotels; and property sales support services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Colibri Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the design and building of precision automated equipment; mass replication of precision automated equipment; as well as provision of precision matching, tools, and dies. It provides solutions encompassing design, research and development, processing and manufacturing, as well as project management. The company was founded on May 23, 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Envicool Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and marketing of environment control equipment. It specializes in temperature control solutions and products. The company's products include data center, outdoor cabinet, telecom site, industrial, and electric vehicle cooling products. Its solutions include outdoor cabinet station climate control, telecom site cooling, data center, and modular and container data center cooling solutions. The company was founded on August 15, 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Hekeda Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of precision cleaning equipment. Its business scopes include glass cleaning equipment, ultrasonic cleaning equipment, electroplating equipment, and water treatment equipment divisions. Its Glass Cleaning Equipment business designs, manufactures, and sells liquid crystal flat plate glass precision cleaning equipment. Its Ultrasonic Cleaning Equipment business offers ultrasonic series cleaning equipment which are used in mobile phone lenses, optical devices, camera lenses, and liquid crystal display manufacturing industries. Its Electroplating Equipment business provides printed circuit board plating, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene plating, metal plastic plating, oxidation and phosphate, and anodizing production lines equipment. Its Water Treatment Equipment business supplies water treatment equipment. The company was founded on January 5, 2009 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale and research & development of industrial automation control products. Its main products include intelligent equipment and robot core components such as AC drive, servo system, control system, industrial vision system & sensor and electrical solutions; new energy vehicle power assembly core components such as standalone motor controller, integrated motor controller and auxiliary power system; rail transit traction and control system such as traction converter, auxiliary converter, high-voltage compartment, traction motor and TCMS; and industrial Internet solutions such as intelligent hardware and information management platform. The company’s products are widely used in new energy vehicles, robot & manipulator, 3C manufacturing, elevator, crane, machine tool, metal products, wire & cable, plastics, printing & packaging, textile fiber, construction materials, metallurgy, coal mining, municipal construction, rail transit and photovoltaic. The company was founded on April 10, 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Jinjia Group Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of packaging materials. It manufacters cigarette packaging, holographic packaging, high-end packaging and electronics packaging products. The company was founded on October 14, 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen JT Automation Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale and service of intelligent equipment systems and advanced manufacturing system. Its product categorization are electronic machine equipment, photoelectric flat panel liquid crystal display module production equipment, and aviation special manufacturing equipment. It offers reflow oven, wave soldering, welding spot and components automated optical inspection, printed circuit board inspection audio video interleave, 3-dimension solder paste inspection serial peripheral interface, selecting soldering, dispensing and coating equipment, and peripheral equipment. The company was founded on July 27, 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Liande Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of flat panel display module assembly equipment. Its products include misalignment equipment, binding equipment, fitting equipment, lamination equipment, mobile terminal devices, and automated optical inspection equipment. The company was founded by Quan Nie in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and development of precision technology. It also provides the global tooling & molding solution for large precision injection mold and precision structural part. Its product include Large Automotive Exterior Parts Mold, Large Automotive Interior Parts Mold, Large Automobile Function Parts Mold and Automobile Security System Mold. The company was founded on October 27, 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Tellus Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of energy materials, machinery, and electronic equipment. It offers automotive services, which includes testing equipment maintenance, property leasing and management. The company operates through the following segments: Automobile Sales; Vehicle Inspection & Component Sales; Leasing and Services. Shenzhen Tellus Holding was founded on October, 11, 1986 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Universe (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the concrete commodity, real estate development, and property management. It specializes in the manufacture of ordinary concrete, special concrete, and ready-mixed mortar. The company's real estate development includes comprehensive building, office building, apartments, houses, subway business, and underground shopping malls. Its property management includes domestic commerce, materials supply and marketing industry, and real estate brokerage. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and supply of whole intelligent equipment system for new energy sector. It offers lithium-ion batteries, semi-automatic winders for prismatic lithium-ion and power batteries, semi-automatic single-head winders for prismatic lithium-ion batteries, fully-automatic winders for prismatic power batteries and coated cutting, winding, welding and laser cutting, lamination. The company was founded on June 26, 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shenzhen Zhenye (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development and management. It focuses on the development and construction of real estate projects. Its product categories involve ordinary residential, commercial properties, townhouse, and villas. The company was founded on May 25, 1989 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Shijiazhuang Kelin Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of power systems and electrical equipment. Its products include intelligent substation systems, microcomputer protection and monitoring, intelligent integration power supply, electric power communication, distribution automation systems, fault monitoring systems for cable line and overhead network, concentrator and collector, and smart and electronic meters. The company also offers photovoltaic generation systems, inverters, smart micro-grid photovoltaic monitoring systems, circuit breakers, box-type substation, and switchgear equipment. Shijiazhuang Kelin Electric was founded on February 12, 2000 and is headquartered in ShiJiaZhuang, China.

Shin Maint Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of kitchen facilities and equipment maintenance services. It operates through the following business divisions: Emergency Maintenance Services, Preventive Maintenance Services, and Maintenance Outsourcing. The Emergency Maintenance Services division offers support for problems with kitchen, electrical, lighting, water and drainage sanitation, and air-conditioning equipment. The Preventive Maintenance Services division provides air conditionings, exhaust fans, drainage pipes, grease trap cleaning; water tank and pump inspection and maintenance; and periodic inspection services. The Maintenance Outsourcing division offers after service support from kitchen equipment manufacturers; and maintenance service support from service providing companies. It also provides the import, export and sale of furniture. The company was founded by Hideo Naito on August 23, 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Shinil Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of household appliances. Its products include electric fans, dehumidifier, heater, and others. The company was founded on July 14, 1959 and is headquartered in Cheonan, South Korea.

ShinMaywa Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of transportation equipment. It operates through the following segments: Aircraft, Special Purpose Trucks, Industrial Machinery and Environmental Systems, Parking Systems, and Other. The Aircraft segment deals with the manufacture and sale of aircraft parts for flying boats and overseas aircraft manufacturers. The Special Purpose Trucks segment manufactures and sells dump trucks, tail gate lifters, refuse collectors, and forestry machinery. The Industrial Machinery and Environmental Systems segment handles the manufacture and sale of pumps, water treatment equipment, automatic electric wire processors, and refuse treatment facilities. The Parking Systems segment manufactures, sells, maintains, and restores mechanical parking facilities and air passenger boarding bridges. The Other segment includes construction, real estate, and software development businesses. The company was founded by Seibe Kawanishi in May 1918 and is headquartered in Takarazuka, Japan.

Shinoken Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate business. It operates through the following segments: Real Estate Sales, Real Estate Service, General Contractor, Energy Business, Life Care Business, and Others. The Real Estate Sales Business segment handles apartment and condominium sales. The Real Estate Service segment manages property and rental management, rent guarantee, and short-term insurance. The General Contractor segment plans, designs, and handles contract services for buildings, condominiums, and individual houses. The Energy segment retails liquefied petroleum (LP) gas and electricity. The Life Care segment runs a serviced housing for the elderly and also offers day services. The Others segment includes overseas business. The company was founded on June 5, 1990 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

SHIP HEALTHCARE HOLDINGS, INC. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the healthcare business. It operates through the following segments: Total Pack Produce, Medical Supply, Life Care, Pharmacy, and Others. The Total Pack Produce segment offers consulting, sales, and leasing services related to medical equipment and institutions. The Medical Supply segment sells medical materials and supplies. The Life Care segment provides private nursing home, meal, and rehabilitation support services. The Pharmacy segment dispenses pharmaceutical products. The Others segment includes veterinary hospital and equipment sales businesses. The company was founded on August 27, 1992 and is headquartered in Suita, Japan.

Sichuan Crun Co., Ltd. engages in development, production and sale of lubrication hydraulic equipment and its integrated system & parts. The company provides thin oil centralized lubrication system series, drying oil centralized lubrication system, hydraulic control system series and related components, and boiler components for large scale power stations. Its business activities include the manufacture and sale of general machinery and equipment, industrial pumps, electrical equipment, and hydraulic machinery, equipment, and components. Sichuan Crun was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of mechanical transmission parts. Its products include pulleys, cone sleeves, timing belt pulleys, expansion sleeves, sprockets, reducers, couplings, gears, flanges, industrial belts, and polyurethane timing belts. The company was founded on October 10, 2003 and is headquartered in Meishan, China.

Sichuan EM Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of chemical new materials. It focuses on the development of new insulation materials, optical materials, and environmental protection flame retardant materials. Its products include mica tapes, film coating products, polypropylene films, cast sheets or films, and electrical polyester films. The company was founded on December 26, 1994 and is headquartered in Mianyang, China.

Sichuan Goldstone Asia Pharmaceutical, Inc. engages in the research, development, and application of plastic composite pipe technology and machinery. The products of the company include: reinforced pipe equipment, vacuum coating equipment and smart parking system. It also provides technical solutions through the following segments: public works, oil and gas, slurry transport, architecture glass, automobile glass, energy saving material, smart parking. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

Sichuan Haowu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing and sale of multi-cylinder engine crankshafts. It also manufactures auto parts products. The company was founded on June 23, 1997 and is headquartered in Neijiang, China.

Sichuan Western Resources Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the mining and sales of copper ore and copper concentrate. Its businesses include new energy vehicle manufacturing, financial leasing and mineral resources. The company was founded on December 2, 1997 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

SIIC Environment Holdings Ltd. engages in water treatment, solid waste treatment, and other environment-related businesses. It operates through following segments: Construction, Water and Sludge Treatment, Water Supply, Waste Incineration, and Other. The Construction segment engages in the design, assembly, construction, installation, and commissioning of water supply or waste water treatment systems and plants for industrials and municipals.
