The Water and Sludge Treatment segment constructs, includes construction, management and operation of water and sludge. The Water Supply segment consists of construction, management and operation of water supply related infrastructure under service concession arrangements. The Waste Incineration segment includes construction, management, and operation of waste incineration related infrastructure under service concession arrangements. The Other segment involves design and consultancy on the projects and installation of water meters. The company was founded on November 19, 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Silkroad Nickel Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the exploration, mining, production, and sales of nickel ore. It involves in undertaking the construction of nickel smelter in Morowali. The company was founded on August 31, 2005 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SIMMTECH HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of management and consulting services to its subsidiaries. Its services include dividend, royalty, rental, and consulting management. The company was founded by Chun Se-Ho on August 24, 1987 and is headquartered in Cheongju-si, South Korea.

SIMPAC Inc. engages in the manufacture of metal cutting and compressing machines. It operates through the following business divisions: Press, Ferroalloy, and Roll. Its products include mechanical, servo, hydraulic, and automation presses. The company was founded on August 9, 1973 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

SINANEN Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of petroleum products and gas. It operates through the following segments: Wholesale and Retail Energy Peripheral Business (BtoC Business), Energy Solutions Business (BtoB Business), and Non-Energy and Overseas Business. The Wholesale and Retail Energy Peripheral (BtoC Business) segment offers services for house, living or lifestyle, and energy businesses. The Energy Solutions Business (BtoB Business) segment includes oil, solutions, electricity, and fabheat businesses. The Non-Energy and Overseas Business segment includes bicycle, antibacterial, recycling, system, and overseas businesses. The company was founded on April 11, 1927 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sinarmas Land Ltd. is a property investment holding company, which engages in the development of commercial real estates. It operates through the following segments: Indonesia Property, International Property, United Kingdom Property, and Others. The Indonesia Property segment involves the investment and development of commercial, industrial and residential properties and ownership and management of hotels and resorts in Indonesia. The International Property segment comprises of investment and development of commercial and residential properties in Malaysia, China, and Singapore. The United Kingdom Property segment leases investment properties. The Others segment covers investment holding and corporate office activities. The company was founded on January 27, 1994 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Sinoma Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of special fiber composites. It operates through the following business segments: Glass fiber and composite materials, Technology and equipment, and Others. Its products include wind power blades, fiberglass products, lithium battery separators, high-pressure gas cylinders, filtration and separation materials, special fibers and composites, and engineering technology and equipment. The company was founded on December 28, 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Sinomach General Machinery Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of pipes and pipe fittings. It focuses on the fluid machinery related business and plastic pipe business. The firm's products include drainage series, water supply series, gas series, trenchless pipes, cable sheathing, pipeline used inside the building, ground source heat pump system piping, PE-RT floor heating pipe, and fittings series. The company was founded on December 30, 1993 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

Sinops, Inc develops system software. The company offers automatic ordering systems and inventory optimization solutions. It also provides the logistics diagnosis, shed cutting, and other services. The company was founded on October 2, 1987 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Sinostar PEC Holdings Ltd. engages in producing and supplying downstream petrochemical products. It operates through the following segments: Gas Separation and Transport and Logistic Services. The Gas Separation segment involves in the manufacture and sale of liquefied petroleum gas, propylene, and polypropylene. The Transport and Logistic Services segment focuses on the provision of logistics and transportation for petroleum products. The company was founded on July 5, 2006 and is headquartered in Dongming, China.

Sintokogio Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of foundry and casting equipment. It operates through the following segments: Foundry, Surface Treatment, Environment Equipment, Material Handling, Special Equipment, and Others. The Foundry segment consists of chemically bonded sand systems, V-process molding systems, aluminium casting products, core making machines, molten metal transfer and automatic pouring, and after treatment equipment. The Surface Treatment segment engages in the business of deburring, sand and rust removing, polishing, high-precision processing and anti-slip finishing. The Environment Equipment segment deals with dust collectors, exhaust gas purifiers, wastewater treatment equipment, and suction hoods. The Material Handling segment produces various kinds of conveyors, scissor lifts,original conveyance systems and clean systems. The Special Equipment segment composes of mechatronics, servo cylinders, and servo press machines; dies and forming, forming machines, and breathable metallic molds; and powdery processing granulators. The Others segment includes machinery design, information, and social welfare operations. The company was founded on October 2, 1934 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Siward Crystal Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of crystal and oscillators. Its products range from synthetic quartz to module. The company offers product mix, such as tuning fork, crystals, X'tal series, OSC series, TCXO series, VCXO series and VCTCXO series. It products are widely used in Mobile Communication?Tablet PC?GPS?Computer Clocks?DSC and AV Machine industry. Siward Crystal Technology was founded by Tseng Ying Tang on January 26, 1988 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

SJM Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of automotive parts. It operates through Automotive and Plant divisions. The Automotive division provides flexible coupling tubes, flexlers, and crossover joints. The Plant division offers ball and slip joints for industrial sector, expansion joints and pump connectors for construction sector, and shipbuilding sector products. The company was founded on May 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

SJM Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company that establishes specialized management strategy, supports their management, and manages the portfolio of contributed assets within the business areas of its subsidiaries. Its subsidiaries are engaged in the business of automobile that manufactures monolithic microwave integrated circuits for communications semiconductor components. The company was founded on March 31, 1975 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

SK Discovery Co. Ltd. operates as an investment holding company which invests mainly in chemicals, pharmaceuticals, energy projects and real estate. The company was founded on July 1, 1969 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

SK Jewellery Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture and distribution of jewelry, watches, and luxury goods. It operates through the following segment: Jewellery, and Others. The company was founded by Yong Guan Lim, Yong Sheng Lim, and Liang Eng Lim in 1991 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Skylark Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the food service and related businesses. It operates family restaurants, coffee shops, and fine dining through the following restaurants brands: Gusto, Bamiyan, Jonathan's, Syabuyo, Yumean, Steak Gusot, Grazie Gardens, Aiya, S Gusto, Totoyamichi, chawan, miwami, Yumean Shokudo, Tonkaratei, Katsukyu, Karayoshi, Bamiyan Ken, MUSAHI NO MORI COFFEE, Tomato and Onion, Jyu-Jyu Karubi and FLO PRESTIGE. It also provides food delivery services, linen supply, maintenance and cleaning services, as well as, site development services for its restaurants. The company was founded on April 4, 1962 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SoftBank Group Corp., formerly SoftBank Corp., is a holding company. The Company is engaged in various businesses in the information industry. Its segments are Domestic Telecommunications, Sprint, Yahoo Japan and Distribution. Domestic Telecommunications is engaged in the provision of mobile communications services in Japan; sale of mobile devices in Japan; provision of broadband services to retail customers in Japan, and provision of telecom services to corporate customers in Japan. Sprint is engaged in the provision of mobile communications services in the United States; the sale and lease of mobile devices and sale of accessories in the United States, and the provision of fixed-line telecommunications services in the United States. Yahoo Japan is engaged in Internet advertising, e-commerce business, and membership services. Distribution is engaged in the distribution of mobile devices overseas, and sale of personal computer (PC) software, peripherals and mobile device accessories.

Softcreate Holdings Corp. engages in the website construction for electronic commerce and related services. It operates through the following segments: Electronic Commerce (EC) Solutions, Systems Integration, and Product Sales. The EC Solutions segment offers electronic commerce site construction packages, data center hosting, and customized value-added services. The Systems Integration segment includes network construction and sells software products by the company which includes X-point, AgileWorks, and L2Blocker. The Product Sales segment engages in the sale of personal computers, servers, and related devices. The company was founded on August 8, 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Solareast Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the solar thermal utilization. Its business segments include solar energy, kitchen appliance, and heat storage. Its products include research and development, production, and sale of solar energy, water purifiers, and air energy; manufacture and sale of kitchen electric series and hot water series such as smoke range, gas stove, disinfection cabinet, electric water heaters, and gas water heaters; and cross-season heat storage and solar wall. The company was founded on April 1, 1997 and is headquartered in Lianyungang, China.

Solborn, Inc., a holding company, engages in the management participation and management advisory of other companies through shareholding. It operates through the following business divisions: Investment, Rent and Services. The company was founded on August 5, 1994 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Solueta Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electromagnetic shield products. Its products include conductive tapes, cushions, electromagnetic wave absorbers, and others. The company was founded on June 27, 2003 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.

Songz Automobile Air Conditioning Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of mobile air conditioning systems. Its business areas include Industrial and Commercial. Its products include large and medium bus air conditioning, passenger car air conditioning, automotive air conditioning parts, rail car air conditioning, and refrigerated car air conditioning. The company was founded on May 15, 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Soon Lian Holdings Ltd. engages in the manufacture, design, and supply of aluminium alloy products. It operates through the following segments: Precision Engineering, Marine, Stockists and Traders, and Other Customers. The Precision Engineering segment supplies aluminium alloy products to be used for precision instruments, equipment for semiconductors, and automated assembly lines. The Marine segment assembles aluminium alloy products for marine applications including hulls, decks, superstructures, and cabins of light crafts such as catamarans, pleasure crafts, and patrol boats. The Stockists and Traders segment consists of trading companies comprising other aluminium alloy stockists, construction companies, and companies in the oil and gas industry. The Other Customers segment includes aircraft industries, oil tankers, automotive parts, rail coaches, truck frames, bridges, and towers. The company was founded on December 18, 2004 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Soosan Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction equipment. It operates through the Attachments and Special Equipment business divisions. The Attachments business division includes crusher, processor, pulverizer, demolition grab, and quick couplers. The Special Equipment business division consists of breakers and drilling rigs. The company was founded on March 12, 1984 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.

Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of printing and converting industries machinery. Its products include rotogravure and flexographic printing machines, extrusion machines, slitting rewinders, coating machines, extrusion coaters and laminating machines. The company was founded on April 18, 1997 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.

Sotetsu Holdings, Inc. engages in the operation and management of railways through its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Transportation, Distribution, Real Estate, Hotel, and Others. The Transportation segment provides railway and automotive services. The Distribution segment involves supermarket and gravel businesses. The Real Estate segment includes brokerage and management of real estate properties. The Hotel segment operates hotels. The Others segment engages in building maintenance business. The company was founded on December 18, 1917 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

Southern Packaging Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture of packaging products. It operates through the Flexible Packaging and Rigid Packaging segments. The Flexible Packaging segment comprises of plastic packaging bags with design supplied by the customers for the pharmaceutical industry, food & beverage industry, and hygienic industry. The Rigid Packaging segment includes the production of polyethylene terephthalate bottles together with printing of design onto the bottle for pharmaceutical, food & beverage, and hygienic industries. The company was founded by Shu Ying Mai and Shun Ming Pan in 1981 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SP Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management services. It operates through the following Commodities Trading, Investments, and Corporate and Others business segments. The Commodities Trading segment trades and markets products including coal, rubber and metals used by manufacturers in the energy, tyre, metal and automotive industries. The investment segment includes in the Investment holding activities. The Corporate and Others segment includes general corporate activities and others. The company was founded on November 27, 1952 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SPARX Group Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides management services to its subsidiaries. Its services include investment advisory services, research of Japanese equity, equity investment; securities brokerage, provision of information and related consulting services, and joint-investment in management buy-out and others. The company was founded on July 1, 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Speco Ltd. engages in the construction of plant facilities for various sectors. It operates through following business divisions: Plant, Wind Power, and Defense Equipment. The company was founded on February 7, 1979 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Sprix Ltd. engages in the educational service business. It offers learning cram school and educational related services. It also handles educational IT, educational contents, and individual guidance. The company was founded by Akira Hiraishi in January 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of entertainment contents and services. It operates through the following segments: Digital Entertainment, Amusement, Publication, and Merchandising. The Digital Entertainment segment handles the design, development, sale, license sale, and operation of digital entertainment contents mainly on computer games. The Amusement segment provides the design, development, manufacture, sale, and rental of amusement equipment as well as conducts the planning, development, and distribution of arcade game machines. The Publishing segment provides comic magazines, comics, and game strategy books. The Merchandising segment includes the planning, production, distribution, and licensing of derivative works. The company was founded on September 22, 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Star Mica Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group of companies with an interest in the renovation, investment and advisory business. It operates through the following segments: Renovation, Investment and Advisory. The Renovation segment covers renovation condominium sales and rental business. The Investment segment includes real estate sales business, rental business and investment development business. The Advisory segment handles real estate brokerage business, rental management business and investment advisory business. The company was founded on July 24, 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Starland Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in development of integrated residential and commercial properties. It operates through the following segments: Property Development, Property Management, and Rental. The Property Development segment develops residential, commercial, and other properties. The Property Management segment offers property management, and other services. The Rental segment leases properties held for sale to generate rental income. The company was founded by Hoe San Tan and Yi Ru Fan in August 2008 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Startia Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of information technology (IT) services. It operates through the following segments: Digital Marketing-related, IT Infrastructure-related, Corporate Venture Capital (CVC)-related, and Overseas-related. The Digital Marketing-related segment offers an integrated digital marketing service Cloud Circus. It also plans and develops web applications such as ActiBook AR COCOAR, CMS Blue Monkey, and Plusdb. The IT Infrastructure-related segment provides total network integration and solutions, cloud computing, network equipment, and counter services. The CVC-related segment deals with handling out support to investee companies by investing in IT venture companies. The Overseas-related segment manages the business activities in China and Singapore. The company was founded by Hideyuki Hongo on February 21, 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Starts Corp., Inc. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the construction and real estate business. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Leasing Brokerage, Brokerage, Real Estate Management, Real Estate Sales, Publishing, Yutori, Consulting, and Product Sales. The Construction segment accepts construction orders for rental housing and detached residential houses; and contract renovation works. The Leasing Brokerage segment performs the mediation of real estate lease. The Brokerage segment provides mediation services for real estate properties. The Real Estate Management segment deals with property management and leasing. The Real Estate Sales segment sells houses. The Publishing segment deals with publishing and media activities. The Yutori segment includes elderly support and childcare, travel, hotel, and restaurant operations. The Consulting segment offers management guidance and consulting services for real estate, securities, and investment industries. The Product Sales segment sells securities products. The company was founded by Hisaji Muraishi on March 27, 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Step Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of cram schools for primary, junior, and senior high school students. It also deals with the production, editing, printing, and bookbinding of educational materials. The company was founded by Kyoji Tatsui in January 1975 and is headquartered in Fujisawa, Japan.

Straco Corp. Ltd. engages in the development and operation of tourism-related businesses. It operates through the following segments: Aquariums and Giant Observation Wheel. The Aquariums segment focuses in the operation of aquatic-related facilities and tourist attractions, including sea mammal performances. The Giant Observation Wheel segment involves in the management of a circular giant observation structure, and provision of commercial space. The company was founded by Hsioh Kwang Wu on April 25, 2002 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Striders Corp. engages in the real estate management business. It operates through the following segments: Information Technology (IT) Business, Turnaround Consultancy Business, Real Estate Lease Management Business, Food Business, and Hotel Business. The IT Business segment includes the development and sale of motor vehicle communication systems for logistic company. The Turnaround Consultancy Business segment provides enterprise reconstruction and reorganization schemes for the clients to revitalize companies in financial difficulties. The Real Estate Lease Management Business segment consists of residential property management, building management, rental agency, rent guarantee, and real estate transaction businesses. The Food Business segment covers the manufacture and sale of Chinese noodles. The Hotel Business segment provides the turnaround solution to owners of the hotels in difficulties, caused by low occupancy, or weak earning. The company was founded on February 4, 1965 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

STX Corp. engages in the provision of trading services. It operates through the following businesses areas: Energy Trading, Commodity Trading, Machinery and Engine Trading, Shipping and Logistics, and Industrial and Consumer Goods. The company was founded on December 24, 1976 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.

Subaru Co., Ltd. engages in the planning and operation of cram schools for toddlers, elementary, junior and high school students. Its services include tutorials, test preparatory classes, personalized academic guidance and others. It also offers preparation classes for entrance examinations and supplementary classes. The company was founded in September 1965 and is headquartered in Kagoshima, Japan.

Sugi Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies which are in the medical business. It sells pharmaceuticals, health food, cosmetic products, and daily necessities. The company was founded in December 1976 and is headquartered in Obu, Japan.

Sumida Corp. operates as a holding company which engages in the design and manufacture of coil-related components and modules for consumer electronics, automotive, and industrial markets. Its products include audio and visual devices, office automation equipment, automotive-related and industrial equipment, and other electronic components. It also provides the complimentary products and services such as magnetic materials, ceramics, flexible connectors and electronic manufacturing services (EMS). The company was founded by Ichiro Yawata in May 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sunflower Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and marketing of proprietary Chinese medicines. It products include pediatrics medicine, gynecology medicine, digestive system medicine, respiratory cold medicine, rheumatic bone disease medicine, cardiovascular medicine and cerebrovascular medicine. The company was founded on September 7, 2005 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

SUNGCHANG AUTOTECH Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts. Its products include inverters, cluster ionizers, cabin air filters, injection molding products, and sponge. The company was founded on October 18, 1996 and is headquartered in Anseong-si, South Korea.

Sunningdale Tech Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of dies, tools, jigs, fixtures, high precision steel moulds, and plastic components. It operates through the following segments: Healthcare, Automotive, Consumer/Information Technology, and Mould Fabrication. The Automotive segment produces mainly faceplates for automotive audio systems and climate controls, speedometers/clusters, steering switches, and exterior antenna covers. The Healthcare segment includes scoops, caps, drug delivery, and diagnostic devices. The Consumer/Information Technology segment consists of point-of-sale terminals, water filtration products, grooming products, and inkjet cartridges. The Mould Fabrication segment designs and manufactures the moulds used in the manufacturing of plastic injection parts. The company was founded on December 5, 1995 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Sunrise Shares Holdings Ltd. is an investment holding company. It engages in the provision of property management and consultancy services. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Sunspring Metal Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of water pipe switch accessories and waterway sanitation equipment. It specializes in bathroom accessories, door hardware, and communication equipment. The company was founded in July 1978 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

Suntront Technology Co., Ltd. engages in prepaid smart meters business. It operates through the following product divisions: Smart Water Meter and Systems, Smart Heat Meter and Systems, Smart Prepaid Gas Meter and Systems, and Smart Energy Meter and Systems. The Smart Water Meter and Systems division manufactures water meters that measure water volume. The Smart Heat Meter and Systems division offers common and ultrasonic heat energy meters in measuring heat passing through pipes. The Smart Prepaid Gas Meter and Systems division provides contactless and large caliber contactless integrated circuit card gas meters. The Smart Energy Meter and Systems division supplies single-phase, three-phase, public, and multi-tariff prepaid energy meters. The company was founded by Zhan Bo Fei and Zhan Jun Fei on November 2, 2000 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

Sun-Wa Technos Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial machinery, electric motors, and control instruments. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Japan, Asia, Europe and Americas, and Others. The regional segments pertain to business activities per region. The Others segment deals with business activities of domestic subsidiaries. Its products include mechatronics-related electrical equipment, electronic components, factory automation systems, communication and information equipment, semiconductor manufacturing equipment, industrial robots, clean robots, circuit board-related apparatus, transportation equipment, inspection equipment, and medical devices. The company was founded by Tokuro Yamada on November 4, 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sunward Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture and sale of construction machinery. It offer the products include, Excavator, Underground machinery, Drilling equipment, Hoisting machinery, Earth-moving machinery, Piling machineries, Mining machineries, Rock drilling machines and other related machineries. The company sell the products with "SUNWARD" brand name. Sunward Intelligent Equipment was founded on July 29, 1999 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

SurplusGLOBAL, Inc. engages in the trading of secondary equipment in semiconductor front-end, back-end, display LED, solar and medical industries. Its activities include Secondary Equipment Trading, Refurbishment and Reconfiguration, Remarketing, Valuation, Auction and Rental. The company was founded by Kim Jung-Woong on March 28, 2000 and is headquartered in Osan, South Korea.

Sushiro Global Holdings Ltd. engages in the management policy formulation and operation and management of SUSHIRO brand of sushi restaurant chain. The company was founded by Yoshio Shimizu in July 1975 and is headquartered in Suita, Japan.

SUTL Enterprise Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the development, operation and consultation of integrated marinas and consultancy services. Its businesses include ONE°15 marina, ONE15 management and technical services, and ONE15 luxury yachting. The company was founded on November 3, 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Suzhou Harmontronics Automation Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the business of research, development, design, manufacturing, sale and after-sale service of automatic equipment. It offers automotive electronics, battery, health care, test solutions and smart manufacturing system equipment. The company's products include electrical connections automation, connector automation, cable automation, switch & fuse automation, sensor automation, control unit automation, actuator automation, laminating machine, formation & grading integrated machine, cylindrical lithium battery automatic production line, fully automatic cell cryogenic storage device, medical mask automatic testing & packing line, medical mask automatic welding machine, medical rubber gloves folding packaging machine, medical automatic pillow type packaging machine, medical plastic infusion bags, EOL test machine, PDB functional machine, automotive cable AOI test machine, cellphone antenna automatic detection machine, LED module color test machine and other related products. The company was founded on November 16, 2012 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou Jin Hong Shun Auto Parts Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of automobile body and chassis stamping parts as well as related molds. Its products include structured parts, automobile body stamping parts, chassis parts, chassis pipe fittings, chassis assembly parts, vacuum boosters, assembly parts, and aluminum stamping and welding assembly parts. The company was founded on September 23, 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou Maxwell Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures solar cell equipment. It mainly engages in the mechanical design, electrical development, software algorithm development and precision manufacturing assembly of solar cell, SMT, semiconductor and other equipment. The company was founded on September 8, 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou Secote Precision Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the providing of automation solutions. It offers turnkey capabilities of technical consultancy, feasibility studies, data experimentation, system design, programming, system integration, installation & tuning, and other services. Secote also provides measurement & detection equipment and fixtures. It products are widely used in the consumer electronics, automotive, medical, household appliance, apparel and personal care, food service and cosmetics industries. The company was founded on June 19, 2007 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou SLAC Precision Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of production equipment sets. It focuses on the high-speed production set for Easy Open Ends (EOE), and related precision molds and spare parts. Its business scope includes the design and manufacture of high-speed ends production equipment sets, rebuilding and improvement of related systems, and production of equipment parts. The company was founded by Shu An on January 6, 2004 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou Sushi Testing Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of mechanical environmental testing equipment. Its products are used in aerospace, electronics, ships, weapons, nuclear industry, automotive, instrumentation, home appliances and other industries, colleges, universities and research institutes. The company was founded on December 29, 2007 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Suzhou Thvow Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and application of environmental technology. It provides a one-stop system "engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) project general contracting service. Its power engineering, new energy, and clean energy service includes regional power plants, and power transmission network EPC construction such as cogeneration, photovoltaic power generation, biomass power generation, waste power generation, transmission and transformation, and wind power generation. Its equipment manufacturing business includes large and medium sized heat exchangers, separators, reactors, tanks, towers, filters, and evaporators used in petrochemical, coal chemical industry, metallurgy, and electric power. In the field of national defense and military industry, its products include heavy-duty boat bridge, special boat bridge, military oil tankers, military auxiliary boats, cruise ships, and all-round tugboat. The company was founded on March 18, 1998 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

Syncmold Enterprise Corp. engages in the processing, manufacturing, and selling of monitor stands, molds and related products. Its products include injection & molding, stands, hinge and electronic peripherals and medical devices. The company was founded on July 7, 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

TA Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the construction business and real estate development activities. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Real Estate Investment, Real Estate Development, Distribution, and Others. The Construction segment includes general builders and construction contractors, training of workers, general engineering, sale of construction materials and design, installation and maintenance of air conditioning, and mechanical ventilation systems. The Real Estate Investment segment deals with investment in real estate. The Real Estate Development segment develops residential and commercial projects and project management services. The Distribution segment covers the sale and distribution of petroleum based lubricant products, automotive tires, and commercial vehicles. The Others segment comprises management and administration services. The company was founded by Kiam Teck Liong in 1972 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Ta Liang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of machines and mold. It specializes in computer numerical control (CNC) precision machines. Its products include printed circuit board (PCB) routing machine, PCB drilling machine, glass panel processing, resin panel cutter, CNC film plotter, light guide processing, and auto edge coating. The company was founded on December 26, 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

Ta Yih Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of vehicle lighting devices, automobile, motorcycle, marine, and aircraft spare parts. It also involves in the import and export business. The company was founded in November 1964 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

Tacmina Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of pumps and water treatment equipment. Its products include smooth flow pumps, processing metering pumps, precision coating pumps, general-purpose metering pumps, chemical injection systems, chemical tanks, chemical transfer pumps, water quality measurement and control equipment, mixing equipment and static mixers, weak-acid sodium hypochlorite solution generators, supercritical carbon dioxide supply units, fluid control units and others. It also provides the maintenance and customer support services. The company was founded by Toshio Yamada in November 1956 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

TADANO Ltd. engages in the production and distribution of construction cranes, truck loader cranes and aerial work platforms. Its products include mobile cranes, loader cranes, telescopic boom crawler cranes, boom truck cranes, aerial work platforms, special purpose vehicles, used equipment and components. The company was founded by Masuo Tadano in 1919 and is headquartered in Takamatsu, Japan.

TAE WON MULSAN Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile parts and gypsum products. It operates through the Gypsum and Automobile Parts Business Divisions. The Gypsum business provides refined phosphate gypsum, gypsum resin mortar, gypsum plaster, and calcined gypsum. The Automobile Parts business offers engine water pumps, transmission, chassis, and other engine parts. The company was founded on January 11, 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Taekwang Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of petrochemical products and synthetic fibers and textiles. It operates through the Manufacturing and Rent and Broadcasting businesses. The Manufacturing business provides purified terephtahalic acid, acrylonitrile, propylene, nylon, spandex and others. The Broadcasting business offers planning, scheduling, and making of broadcasts. The company was founded on September 15, 1961 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Taiho Kogyo Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile manufacturing facilities and automobile components. It operates through the following segments: Automobile Parts, Automobile Manufacturing Facilities, and Others. The Automobile Parts segment provides bushings and thrust washers, engine and special bearings, aluminum die casts and precision dies, EGR valves and actuators. The Automobile Manufacturing Facilities segment offers precision mold, transport equipment, and welding machines and parts. The Others segment handles product retail sales and the packaging and shipping of automobile parts. The company was founded in December 1944 and is headquartered in Toyota, Japan.

Taisho Pharmaceutical Holdings Co. Ltd. engages in the management and administration of its group companies that manufactures and sells over-the-counter (OTC) drugs, foods, and other goods, etc. It operates through the following segments: Self-Medication and Prescription Pharmaceutical. The Self-Medication segment conducts research and development (R&D), manufacturing and sale of over-the-counter drugs, quasi-drugs, food, and general medical and hygiene supplies. The Prescription Pharmaceutical segment handles R&D, manufacturing, and sale of ethical drugs. It also provides the manufacture and sale of prescription pharmaceuticals; and businesses incidental or related thereto. The company was founded on October 3, 2011 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Taiwan Chelic Corp. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of pneumatic and electric actuator automation components. Its products include air source units, control valves, miniature, standard, stopper, dual rod, compact, slide table, guide, rodless, clamp, rotary & hydraulic cylinder; gripper; vacuum equipment and fitting & auxiliary equipment. The company's products widely used in machinery sectors such as production facilities, inspection machines, packing machines, forming machines, repairmen equipment and factory automation. Taiwan Cheli company was founded on November 19, 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Taiwan Paiho Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture and distribution of textile tapes, elastic tapes webbings and touch fasteners. It offers textile tapes, jacquard tapes, specialty tapes, elastic tapes, jacquard elastic tapes, thermal insulation, shoelaces, knitting fabrics, bamboo carbon series products and hook-and-loop fasteners, as well as reflective materials. Its products are applied primarily in the production of shoes, leather products, sports bags, hats, trousers, coats, electronic products, medical equipment and outdoor sports equipment and among others. The company was founded by Cheng Sen Mei in 1979 and is headquartered in changhua, Taiwan.

Taiwan Sanyo Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sales of electric appliances. It also involves in the wholesale and retail of telecommunication equipment; and the development, lease, and sales of residential and commercial buildings. Its products include refrigerators, air conditioners, washing machines, juicers, bread toasters, televisions, radios, electric transistor radios, phonographs, flashlights, horns, voltage transformers, electric fans, ventilation, electric rice cookers, cassette recorders, personal computers, disk drives, freezers, clothes dryer, electric ovens, electric heaters, vacuum cleaners, dishwashers, electric razors, microwave ovens, electric irons, and hair dryers. The company was founded on February 13, 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Taiyo Bussan Kaisha, Ltd. engages in the import and sale of agricultural and livestock products. It operates through the following segments: Food 1, Food 2, General Food Products, Sales Development, and Living Industry. The Food 1 segment handles cattle meat. The Food 2 segment deals with chicken meat. The General Food Products segment manufactures processed food items. The Sales Development segment offers vehicle parts, agricultural products, buckwheat, and chemicals. The Living Industry segment provides pork meat. The company was founded by Masao Kashiwabara in October 1936 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Taiyo Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the business management of its group companies that manufacture and sell chemical products for electronic components and industries' use. Its products include printing wire board materials and conductive silver paste. It operates through the following segments: Japan, China, Taiwan, Korea and Others. The Others segment covers United States and other Asian group companies. The company was founded on September 29, 1953 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Taiyo Koki Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of grinding machine tools. Its products include vertical grinding machines, internal grinding machines, cylindrical grinding machines, and thread grinding machines. The company was founded by Noboru Watanabe on March 14, 1986 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.

Taiyuan Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of heavy machinery. Its products include forging equipment, crane equipment, excavation coking equipment, train axles and wheelsets, oil film bearings, casting and forging parts, gear transmission machinery, coal chemical equipment, and wind power equipment. The company was founded on July 6, 1998 and is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

Takamatsu Construction Group Co. Ltd. engages in the construction business. It operates through the following segments: Construction, Civil Engineering, and Real Estate. The Construction segment offers general construction, remodeling, and renovation of residential and commercial buildings, and warehouses. The Civil Engineering segment deals with the construction, repair, and maintenance of bridges, highways, tunnels, roads, and sewage systems. The Real Estate segment offers real estate development, sales, leasing, and management. The company was founded by Tomekichi Takamatsu in October 1917 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Takara Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of the operations of its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Takara Shuzo Group, Takara Bio Group, Takara Healthcare, and Others. The Takara Shuzo Group segment provides alcoholic beverages and seasonings. The Takara Bio Group offers contract research services, and manufactures and sells research reagents, scientific instruments, and mushrooms. The Takara Healthcare segment deals with health food products. The Others segment handles the printing business. The company was founded in 1842 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

Takatori Corp. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of semiconductor-related equipment, LCD panel related equipment, multi wire saws, textile machinery and medical devices. It operates through the following segments: Electronic Equipment, Textile Equipment and Medical Care Equipment. The Electronic Equipment segment provides liquid crystal device (LCD) and semiconductor manufacturing tools, and multi-wire saws. The Textile Equipment segment manages the manufacture and sale of automatic cutting machines. The Medical Care Equipment segment develops mobile chest ascites filtration concentrated equipment. The company was founded by Osho Takatori in May 1950 and is headquartered in Kashihara, Japan.

Takeuchi Mfg. Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of construction machinery. It operates through the Construction Machinery and Others business divisions. The Construction Machinery division produces and markets construction machinery. The Others division sells agitators used for wastewater treatment and to chemical and food industries. The company was founded by Akio Takeuchi on August 21, 1963 and is headquartered in Hanishina, Japan.

TAKUMA CO., LTD. engages in the design, manufacture and superintendence of a wide variety of boilers, gas turbine and cogeneration system, anti-pollution plants, waste treatment plants, and water treatment plants. It operates through the following segments: Domestic Environment and Energy, Overseas Environment and Energy, Package Boiler, and Equipment and System Business. The Domestic Environment and Energy Business segment involves gas-turbine cogeneration systems and waste treatment, waste recycling, sludge combustion, and biomass power plants. The Overseas Environment and Energy segment includes waste combusting and biomass power plants. The Package Boiler segment handles compact through-flow boilers and vacuum heating systems. The Equipment and System Business segment offers construction equipment and equipment for semiconductor industry and cleaning systems. The company was founded by Tsunekichi Takuma on June 10, 1938 and is headquartered in Amagasaki, Japan.

Talkmed Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of medical oncology, stem cell transplants, and palliative care services. It operates through Oncology Services; Stem Cells Related Products and Services segments; Cellular and Gene Therapy Related Products and Services. The Oncology Services segment offers services to Parkway Cancer Centre. The Stem Cells Related Products and Services segment includes processing, culturing, and storage of stem cells to Parkway Cancer Centre. The Cellular and Gene Therapy Related Products and Services segment provides goods and services related to cellular and gene therapy through its subsidiary, CellVec Pte. Ltd.. The company was founded on September 10, 2013 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of winding machines and others equipment. Its products include Multi-spindle CNC Auto Winding Mchine MX series, Multi-spindle CNC Auto Winding Mchine MSC series, Bobbin loading and unloading unit, CNC Automatic Taping Machine, CNC Auto Bobbinless Winding Machine BXC series, CNC Auto Motor Winding Machine MDC series, CNC Automobile Air-condition Clutch coil Winding Machine CLC series & CNC Auto Flier Winding Machine FWC series. The company was founded on July 9, 2003 and is headquartered in Jiashan, China.

Tanaka Seimitsu Kogyo Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile and motorcycle parts. Its products include VTEC rocker arm ASSY, synchronizer ring and spring, piston pin, VEZEL, N-BOX, valve spring retainer, shaft, and clutch cam plate COMP. It operates through the following geographical segments: Japan, United States, Thailand, India, and Vietnam. The company was founded by Giichiro Tanaka on March 1, 1948 and is headquartered in Toyama, Japan.

TBI MOTION Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of linear motion products. Its products include linear guide, ball spline, ball screw, rotary series, linear ball bearing series, support unit of ball screw, coupling, and single axis robot. The company was founded on July 9, 2010 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

Techno Alpha Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of power semiconductor back-end equipment, electronics materials, inspection machines, laboratory use products, marine equipment, environmental equipment and others. It operates through the following business segments: Electronics, Marine Machinery and Filtration, System Integrator (SI), and Chemical Science. The Electronics segment imports semiconductor manufacturing equipment for assembly. Its main products are electronic equipment and materials for universities and laboratories in the surface mount technology (SMT) field. The Marine Machinery and Filtration segment supplies and sells marine equipment to Japan coast guard and ship building companies. The System Integrator segment develops and sells software and hardware such as measurement and inspection systems. The Chemical Science segment offers biochemistry instruments such as nanoLC pumps and the DiNa Series that are used in the proteomics field. The company was founded by Tsutomu Aoshima on December 22, 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Technoflex Corp. engages in the manufacturing of metal hoses, steel pipes, and semiconductors. It operates through the following segments: Fitting, Disaster Prevention and Construction, Automotive and Robot, Nursing Care, and Others. The Fitting segment handles the manufacture and sale of stainless flexible hoses, bellow expansion joints, and semiconductor-related equipment parts. The Disaster Prevention and Construction segment deals with the construction of firefighting equipment and manufacture and sale of processing tubes, cast iron pipe cutting machines, and water supply pipe equipment. The Automotive and Robot segment offers transportation and industrial equipment parts. The Nursing Care segment includes rental and sale of welfare equipment and renovation of nursing homes. The Others segment covers real estate leasing business. The company was founded by Takashi Maejima in August 1977 and is headquartered Tokyo, Japan.

Teckwah Industrial Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of management and financial services. It operates through the following segments: Packaging Printing, Logistics, and Services. The Packaging Printing segment includes printing and packaging, digital database management, packaging design, and provision of value chain services. The Logistics segment provides third party logistic, return, refurbishment, and remarketing services for computer equipment. The Services segment refers to the property management and others. The company was founded by Seng Tek Chua in 1968 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Tempus Global Business Service Group Holding Ltd. engages in the provision of travel management, airline transportation ticketing and tourism solutions. It offers hotel reservation services, business trip management services, as well as travelling and vacation services, among others. The company was founded on April 29, 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

teno.Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Public Child Care, Consigned Child Care, and Others. The Public Child Care segment owns and manages licensed and certified nursery schools. The Consigned Child Care segment deals with the commissioned child care businesses inside offices and hospitals. The Others segment provides child care personnel dispatch services to kindergartens and nursery schools; housekeeping services; and school management. The company was founded on December 15, 2015 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

Test Research, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of assembled circuit board automatic test equipment. Its products include circuit board testing & semiconductor test equipment, 3D solder paste inspection, automatic optical inspection, automated x-ray inspection, manufacturing defects analyzer and in circuit tester. Test Research was founded on April 10, 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

Thac Mo Hydro Power JSC engages in hydroelectric power generation. It manages, maintains, installs, and trades hydroelectric equipment. The company also provides training for the operation and management of power plants and related equipment. Its other activities include civil and industrial construction, investment and consultancy services, office leasing and real estate business, and import and export of electrical materials and equipment. The company was founded on June 11, 1994 and is headquartered in Binh Phuoc, Vietnam.

Thai Beverage Public Co., Ltd. is a holding company, which engages in the production and distribution of beverage. It operates through the following segments: Spirits, Beer, Non-alcoholic Beverage, and Food. The Spirits segment produces and sell spirits products. The Beer segment manufactures branded beer products. The Non-Alcoholic Beverages segment offers branded water, soda, ready-to-drink coffee, energy drink, green tea, and fruit flavoured drinks. The Food segment involves in the operation of Japanese restaurants, and allocation of foods and beverages. Its brands include Ruang Khao, SangSom, Mekhong, Hong Thong, Blend 285, Oishi RTD green tea, and Chang Beer.The company was founded on October 29, 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Thakral Corp. Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the marketing and distribution of beauty, wellness, and lifestyle products. It operates through the following segments: Lifestyle, Investments, and Others. The Lifestyle segment comprises marketing and distributing beauty, wellness and lifestyle products. The Investments segment includes real estate the property investments. The company was founded on October 7, 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Thanh Cong Textile Garment Investment Trading JSC engages in the production and trading of yarn, fabric, and garment. Its activities include spinning, weaving, knitting, and dyeing. It is also involved in fashion retail and real estate business. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

The Straits Trading Co. Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in the provision of real estate, hospitality, resources and investment activities. It operates through the following segments: Resources, Real Estate, Hospitality and Others. The Resources segment includes smelting of tin concentrates and tin bearing materials, the production of various grades of refined tin metal, and the sale and delivery of refined tin metal and by products, as well as investments in other metals and mineral resources. The Real Estate segment comprises of property investment, sales and leasing and property development. The Hospitality segment focuses on hotel ownership and hotel management. The Others segment engages in the provision of group-level corporate and treasury services. The company was founded by James Sword and Herman Muhlinghaus on November 8, 1887 and is headquartered in Singapore.

THN Corp. engages in the manufacture and supply of automotive part. Its products include wire harness and junction box. The company was founded on July 23, 1986 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

Tianjin Capital Environmental Protection Group Co., Ltd. engages in the treatment of sewage water. Its business areas include Water and environment and New energy cooling and heating. The Water and environment business includes traditional sewage treatment, tap water supply, and recycled water. The New energy cooling and heating business makes use of underground cold and heat exchange technology to provide cooling and heating services. The company was founded on June 8, 1993 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

Tianjin Motor Dies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of automobile body cover dies and its ancillary products. It specializes in the car body cover mold; and car body stamping parts, seized, and welding fixture, Its business segments include dies experiences for the automotive industry formetal forming and cutting sector, dies plants, pattern shop, equipment shop, and stamping assembly and welding shop. The company was founded on December 3, 1996 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

Tianjin Saixiang Technology Co. Ltd. engages in the research, development, trading, and production of complete set of radial tires equipment. It offers the following products: rubber machine, forming machine, extrusion calendar equipment, cutting equipment, tire ring manufacturing type equipment, triangular rubber laminating equipment, and rubber mixing equipment. It also engages in the provision technical and marketing services, and production of meridian tires series. The company was founded by Zhi Quan Zhang in 1989 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

Tianjin TEDA Co., Ltd. engages in ecological environment protection, regional development, energy trading, and equity investment. It generates power by burning waste; as well as develops and utilizes renewable energy, including the generation of biomass power. It develops municipal supporting projects, residences, commercial complexes, and social housings. The company also conducts bulk trade of refined oil, petrochemical products, and non-ferrous metals; as well as stores and manages non-ferrous metals, petroleum, and petrochemical products. Tianjin TEDA was founded on August 20, 1981 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.

Tianrun Industry Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and distribution of engine crankshafts. Its products include crankshafts, connecting rods, blanks, castings, and forgings. The company also provides automation equipment and technical services. Tianrun Industry Technology was founded on December 19, 1995 and is headquartered in Weihai, China.

Tibet Tourism Co., Ltd. engages in the businesses of scenic area operation and media culture. Its business activities include ticket sales for scenic spots, passenger transportation, boat cruise, low altitude flights, Tibetan opera performances, magazine operation, and tourism services. The company was founded on June 27, 1996 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.

Tibet Urban Development & Investment Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of real estate properties. It offers affordable housings, commercial housings, commercial office buildings, and commercial complexes. The company also involves in the mining investment, hotel operation, and real estate leasing business. Tibet Urban Development & Investment was founded on October 25, 1996 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.

Time Publishing & Media Co., Ltd. engages in the publishing of books, journals, and media. It specializes in planning business, printing reproduction, media technology research & development and equity investment. Its business segment includes publishing and distribution. The publishing business includes publish of self-taught teaching materials, rent-type teaching materials, general book, and magazine; The distribution business includes distribution of teaching materials, general book, and news media. The company was founded on December 12, 1999 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

Toa Valve Engineering, Inc. engages in the manufacture, sale and maintenance of various valves for nuclear power generation, general thermal power generation, petroleum, petrochemicals, general chemicals, and various vessels. It operates through the following business segments: Valve Business, Steel Manufacturing Business, and Decontamination Business. The Valve Business segment engages in the manufacture and sale of high-temperature and pressure valves for power plant use, as well as valves for ships, petrochemical plants and other various industrial uses. The Steel Manufacturing Business segment manufactures steel products. The Decontamination Business segments handles the removal of nuclear radiation. The company was founded on March 16, 2000 and is headquartered in Amagasaki, Japan.

Toabo Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of textile products, semiconductors, and fine chemicals. It operates through the following segments: Clothing Business, Interior Industrial Materials Business, Electronics Business, Fine Chemicals Business, Real Estate Business, and Others. The Clothing Business segment handles the manufacture and sale of yarn, knitted wool, and woolen materials. The Interior Industrial Materials Business segment sells interior materials for automobiles, and industrial materials for wastewater treatment, civil engineering, and greening. The Electronics Business segment deals with semiconductors and electronic equipment. The Fine Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells healthcare-related chemicals and industrial chemical products. The Real Estate Business segment leases shopping centers and office buildings. The Others segment includes driving schools and healthcare business. The company was founded on February 8, 1922 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Toba Inc. engages in the sale, import, and export of control machinery, industrial robots, measuring and instrumentation devices. Its products include pneumatic, hydraulic and linear products, robot and automatic assembly equipment, printed circuit board mounting products, imaging and measuring equipment, logistics and transport equipment, computers, electronic machinery, transport equipment, construction and conduit equipment, fasteners, environmental maintenance equipment, tools, machinery tools, laboratory equipment, chemicals, and general industrial equipment. It also provides the installation of machinery and equipment. The company was founded by Shinsaku Toba on September 15, 1906 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toho Co., Ltd. manages its group companies that are engaged in the food business. It operates through the following segments: Distributor, Cash and Carry, Food Supermarket, and Food Solutions. The Distributor segment manages the supply and sale of food ingredients to the restaurant industry. The Cash and Carry segment wholesales food ingredients to small and medium-scale restaurants in cash. The Food Supermarket segment handles the procurement of food products and miscellaneous goods. The Food Solutions segment offers quality management, construction, interior design, and comprehensive solutions to the food service industry. The company was founded in October 1947 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

Toho Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the planning and management of its group companies which are in the pharmaceuticals business. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Pharmaceutical Wholesaling, Dispensing Pharmacy, Clinical Trial Facilities Support, and Information Equipment Sales. The Pharmaceutical Wholesaling segment supplies prescription pharmaceuticals, reagents, and medical devices to hospitals, clinics, and dispensing pharmacies. The Dispensing Pharmacy segment deals with dispensing pharmacy management, home care support services, and pharmaceutical sales. The Clinical Trial Facilities Support segment assists medical establishments with clinical trials under contract. The Information Equipment Sales segment includes software sales, information processing, and in-house logistics assistance. The company was founded on September 17, 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TOKAI CARBON KOREA Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of semiconductor, solar battery and light emitting diode (LED) parts. It operates through the following divisions: Graphite, Susceptor, Solid silicone carbide, and others. Its products include high purity graphite products for semiconductor and sun light, LED and semiconductor parts, processed semiconductor parts, heaters, and others. The company was founded on August 7, 1996 and is headquartered in Anseong-si, South Korea.

TOKAI Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies which provides the energy, and information and communications related businesses. It operates through the following business segments: Gas and Petroleum, Building Construction and Real Estate, CATV(Community Antenna TV), Information and Communication Services, Aqua, and Others. The Gas and Petroleum segment offers liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), liquefied natural gas (LNG), other high-pressure gases and petroleum products, city gas, construction of related facilities and equipment, and drinking water. The Building Construction and Real Estate segment deals with the construction of residential houses; development, sales, and lease of real estate; sales of materials and equipment for housing construction; and construction of buildings, and other ancillary facilities. The CATV segment handles the broadcasting and Internet connection through a cable television (CATV) network. The Information and Communication Services segment includes software development, information processing, Internet connection, and communication equipment sales. The Aqua segment delivers and distributes natural water with minerals from Mount Fuji. The Others segment provides wedding ceremonies, nursing care, ship repair, comprehensive renovation and other services. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Shizuoka, Japan.

Tokushu Tokai Paper Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of paper pulp. It operates through the following segments: Industrial Material, Special Material, Household Product, and Others. The Industrial Material segment produces and sells raw paper for cardboards and packaging papers. The Special Material segment handles the production, processing, and sale of paper for special printing and special functional papers. The Household Product segment engages in the production, processing, and sale of paper towels and toilet papers. The Others segment provides civil engineering and landscaping works. It also includes production and sales of thermal recycled fuel. The company was founded on April 2, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tokyo Broadcasting System Holdings, Inc. engages in the business of television and radio broadcasting, as well as production and sale of visual and audio media, cultural productions, associated maintenance, and real estate services. It operates through the following business segments: Media Content, Lifestyle, Real Estate and Other Business. The Media Content segment handles the broadcast related business, and planning and production of various entertainment and video software and CS business. the Lifestyle segment covers mail order, general merchandise retail, manufacturing and sales of cosmetic. The Real Estate and Other Business segment comprises of real estate leasing, maintenance and service business. It also provides studio management, air conditioning management, parking management, equipment leasing, and insurance agency. The company was founded on May 10, 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tokyo Electric Power Co. Holdings, Inc. engages in the generation and distribution of electric power. It operates through the following segments: Fuel, Power Grid, Customer Support, Corporate, and Others. The Fuel segment deals with thermal power generation. The Power Grid segment deals with power generation and supply, hydroelectric power generation, power transmission and distribution facility and communication facility construction and maintenance. The Customer Support segment deals with customer service. The Corporate segment deals with business support and nuclear power generation. The Others segment includes information and telecommunications, energy and environment, living environment and life style related, and overseas businesses. The company was founded on May 1, 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tokyo Individualized Educational Institute, Inc. engages in the management of preparatory schools. It operates private preparatory schools for elementary students, junior high-school students and high-school students corresponding to their different purposes, abilities and characters. It also offers one-on-one learnings, tutorial lessons, and condensed review courses for entrance tests through online and class-based teaching. The company was founded on August 3, 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tokyo Koki Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of testing and measurement machines. It operates through the following segments: Testing Machine, Engineering, Overseas, and Others. The Testing Machine segment manufactures and sells test and measurement equipment through its subsidiaries. The Engineering segment sells fasteners or locks and also offers consumer services through its subsidiaries. The Overseas segment manufactures and sells plastic injection molded products such as parts of office furniture, automobiles, and home appliances. The Others segment includes real estate leasing. The company was founded on March 20, 1923 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tokyu Fudosan Holdings Corp. engages in the management and administration of its group companies. It operates through the following segments: Urban Development, Residential, Property Management, Real-Estate Agents, Wellness, Tokyu Hands, and Business Innovation and Others. The Urban Development segment covers the development, leasing and facility operations of office buildings, commercial facilities and other properties. It also handles the real estate private placement funds and real estate investment trusts. The Residential segment includes real estate sales of condominiums, detached houses. The Property Management segment handles the general management and repair work services for condominiums, buildings. The Real-Estate Agents segment covers real-estate agents, sales as agents, and the purchase and resale business. The Wellness segment manages the real estate sales of membership resort hotels; management of resort facilities such as membership resort hotels; golf courses and ski resorts; senior housing; and membership sports clubs. The Tokyu Hands segment includes retail sales of materials, products related to housing life and handicrafts. The Business Innovation and Others segment handles overseas business; construction of houses built to order and renovations, including extensions and reconstructions; landscape gardening; and corporate welfare operations. The company was founded on October 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Ton Yi Industrial Corp. engages in the manufacturing and sale of various cans of steel and tin plates. It operates through the following divisions: Tin Mill Black Plates, Tinplate and Tin Can. The Tin Mill Black Plates division involves in the production and sale of tin mill black plates and cold rolled coils. The Tinplate division includes the production and sale of tin plates. The Tin Can division engages in the production and sale of cans for various foods, drinks, greases and chemicals. The company was founded on April 14, 1969 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

Tong Yang Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts and mold. Its products are categorized into automotive plastic, sheet metal parts, cooling parts, mold and paints. The automotive plastic includes dashboard foam molding, casing powder molding, die casting injection molding, gas-assisted molding, and vibration friction welding technology. The sheet metal parts include engine cover and leaf board automation, anodized coating, sheet metal cutting, multi-axis anti-vibration plastic, and waterproof plastic automatic arm and carbon dioxide spot welding robot arm. The cooling system components include condenser, aluminum water tank, and car fan. The auto parts mold includes hot runner mold, gas-assisted mold, and blow molding. The paint includes its coating technology products and services. Tong Yang Industry was founded by Kao Wu in 1952 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

Top Global Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the development of real estate properties. It operates through the following segments: Property Development, Hospitality Management, Property Management, and Investment and Others. The Property Development segment refers to the development of residential properties. The Hospitality Management segment manages the golf, country club, and hotel. The Property Management segment comprises of residential and commercial properties. The Investment and Others segment includes the other investment activities. The company was founded on October 9, 1980 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. engages in the investment, research and development, and construction of waste hear power generation projects. Its business activities include water treatment engineering; natural gas supply business; and waste heat power generation and fuel gas treatment engineering, and contract energy management services. The company was founded on May 30, 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

Topcon Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of optical and digital technological products. It operates through the following business segments: Smart Infrastructure, Positioning Company, Eye Care, and Others. The Smart Infrastructure segment provides positioning and surveying instruments including Total station, Layout navigator, Mobile mapping, 3D Laser scanner, Field controller, Level, Theodolite, Rotating laser, and Pipe laser. The Positioning Company segment provides solutions for the geospatial, construction, agricultural, and mapping industries using global positioning system, optical, scanning, and machine control technologies. The Eye Care segment offers ophthalmic instruments and systems for eye examination, measurement, diagnosis, treatment, and eyeglass lens processing. The Others segment includes precision measurement and photo devices. The company was founded on September 1, 1932 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toptec Corp. engages in the manufacturing of automation equipment, alternative and renewable energy related businesses. The company operates through the following business divisions: Factory Automation, Nano and Solar. The Factory Automation business division offers equipment for display such as auto assembly machine, glass handling robot system, glass cell cutting system, indium tin oxide sputter logistics system, ultraviolet ray dispenser and cell handling robot system; secondary cell, such as can cap laser welding machine, JR insert tap welding machine, circular swage machine, circular tab welding, cap assembly line and reserve battery assembly line; automotive, such as comp oil injector, comp assembly line, comp measure and supply line, motor driven power steering electronic control unit (ECU) assembly line, battery pack assembly line, and mobis electronic brake ECU assembly line; and semiconductor, including test logistics system, device and box location based service systems. The Nano business division offers nano equipment, including unwinder, main control room, re-winder, solution feeding system, regenerative thermal oxidizer, heat ventilation air conditioning and nano separators. The Solar business division provides manufacturing equipment such as cell tester and sorter, laminator machine, tabbing and stringer machine, module assembly line, module line and module logistics; operates solar power plants. The company was founded on June 20, 1996 and is headquartered in Gumi-si, South Korea.

Topy Industries, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel products, and automotive and construction machinery components. It operates through the following business segments: Steel, Automotive and Industrial Machinery Components, Power Generation and Others. The Steel segment includes general steel, deformed bars, flat bars, mast rail sections for forklifts, and universal mill plates with grooves. The Automotive and Industrial Machinery Components segment produces wheels for automotive, industrial, and construction use, press products, fasteners for industrial use, and products for construction machinery. The Power Generation segment generates electricity through coal-powered facilities. It also sells wholesale electricity. The Others segment includes wholesale power supplies, indoor and outdoor sign systems, synthetic micas, crawler robots and management of real estate leases and construction. The company was founded in October 1921 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Totech Corp. engages in the supply, sale, and support for air-conditioning, energy-saving, and control equipment. It operates through the following segments: Product Sales, Construction, Restaurant and Other. The Product Sales segment supplies and sells air-conditioning equipment, energy-saving equipment, and control equipment. The Construction segment designs, constructs, and maintains instrumentation work, electrical work, plumbing, and machinery installation. The Restaurant segment supplies, processes, retails, and wholesales food ingredients. The Other segment provides educational services. The company was founded on July 6, 1955 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toyo Corp. engages in the import and sale of information and communication measuring instruments. It operates through the following business segments: Information and Communications Technologies, Mechatronics/Noise and Vibration, Materials/Energies, Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC)/ Antenna Systems, Ocean/Defense and Security, Software Quality and Productivity, Nano Imaging, Medical Systems, and Security and Laboratory Company. The Information and Communications Technologies segment provides solutions including test systems, analysis and monitoring systems, information security test systems, and technical assistance. The Mechatronics/Noise and Vibration segment offers accelerometers, impact hammers, sound quality evaluation, 3D sound rendering, pressure sensors, force sensors, torsional vibration analysis, and telemetry. The Materials/Energies segment assists in the generation and utilization of renewable energy. The EMC/ Antenna Systems segment provides test and measurement systems in the EMC field. It also offers post-installation support services such as system maintenance, calibration, and overhaul. The Ocean/Defense and Security segment offers multibeam echo sounders and other marine measurement instruments together with installation and other technical support. The Software Quality and Productivity segment handles solutions for quality and reliable software for the entire system development process.
