The Nano Imaging segment includes imaging tools such as scanning electron microscopes, 3D nano-/micro- CT scanners, and scanning probe microscopes. The Medical Systems segment offers products such as display systems for imaging diagnosis, orthopedic digital planning tools, and image processing technologies for chest X-rays. The Security and Laboratory Company segment cybersecurity and wireless communications terminal laboratory testing services. The company was founded on September 4, 1953 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toyo Ink SC Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the strategic planning and management of its group companies. Its operations are carried out through the following business segments: Colorants and Functional Materials, Polymers and Coatings, Packaging Materials, Printing and Information, and Others. The Colorants and Functional Materials segment offers organic pigments, processed pigments, plastic colorants, and materials for color filters. The Polymers and Coatings segment produces and markets can paints, resins, adhesives, coating materials, natural extracts, and medical products. The Packaging Materials segment deals with gravure inks, flexo inks, and gravure cylinder making systems. The Printing and Information segment manufactures and sells offset inks, metal decorative inks, printers, printing materials, and prepress. The Others segment includes provision of services and sale of raw materials. The company was founded by Kamataro Kobayashi in January 1896 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toyo Seikan Group Holdings Ltd. manages its group companies, which are involved in the manufacture and sale of packaging containers and equipment for packaging systems. It operates through the following segments: Packaging Business, Steel Plate-related Business, Functional Materials-related Business, Real Estate-related Business, and Other Businesses. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and markets containers and general filling products. The Steel Plate-related Business segment includes steel plate materials for cans, electronic components, and industry machinery parts. The Functional Materials-related Business segment sells aluminum substrates for magnetic disks, functional films for optics, pigments, and gel coats. The Real Estate-related Business segment leases office buildings and commercial facilities. The Other Businesses segment includes automobile press dies, hard alloys, and non-life insurance agency business. The company was founded on June 25, 1917 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Toyobo Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of specialty and functional products. It operates through the following segments: Films and Functional Polymers, Industrial Materials, Healthcare, Textiles and Trading, Real Estate, and Other Businesses. The Films and Functional Polymers segment produces and sells packaging and industrial films, adhesives, engineering plastics, and optical functional materials. The Industrial Materials segment covers automobile fiber materials, super fibers, functional filters, and non-woven fabrics. The Healthcare segment includes bio products, pharmaceuticals, medical membranes and equipment, and water treatment membranes. The Textiles and Trading segment deals with functional apparels, textiles, and fibers. The Real Estate segment leases and manages properties. The Other Businesses segment includes building design and construction, and information processing and logistic services. The company was founded by Eiichi Shibusawa on May 3, 1882 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Toyota Boshoku Corp. engages in manufacturing, developing, and selling of automobile parts and textile products. The company's products include seats, door trims, instrument panels, headliners, illuminations, filter products, fuel parts, and textile components. The company was founded by Sakichi Toyoda on January 30, 1918 and is headquartered in Kariya, Japan.

Toyota Tsusho Corp. engages in domestic trade of various products, their import and export, foreign government trading, contracted construction, and insurance agency services. It operates through the following business segments: Metals, Global Production Parts and Logistics, Automotive, Machinery, Energy, and Project, Chemicals and Electronics, Food and Consumer Products, Africa, and Others. The Metals segment manufactures, processes, sells, and disposes ordinary and special steel products, non-ferrous and precious metals, copper and copper alloy products, rare earth materials, and new metals. The Global Production Parts and Logistics segment ensures stable supply of automotive parts and utilizes integrated logistics services encompassing packaging, marine container transport, sorting, reloading, and final delivery. The Automotive segment sells and provides services for passenger, commercial, light, and two-wheeled vehicles, trucks and buses, and automotive parts. The Machinery, Energy, and Project segment handles various machinery and equipment, industrial vehicles, and construction machinery; procures basic energy resources such as petroleum, coal, and natural gas; and engages in energy and electric power supply and water treatment businesses. The Chemicals and Electronics segment offers automotive components, semiconductor, electronic parts, module products, and automotive integration software. It also provides network construction and maintenance. The Produce and Consumer Products segment manufactures, processes, and sells livestock feeds, grains, processed food products, food ingredients, agricultural, marine, livestock, and alcoholic beverages. It also covers products and services related to insurance and securities, textile products and apparel, nursing and medical-related products, office furniture, construction and housing materials, hospitals, and hotel residences. The Africa segment deals with the Africa automobile, healthcare, and consumer finance and retail businesses; as well as electricity infrastructure, agriculture, and information and communications technology (ICT). The Others segment includes functional services to provide operational support to the whole group. The company was founded on July 1, 1948 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Traders Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in financial instruments trading business. It operates through the following segments: Financial Instruments, Renewable Energy, Overseas Financial Instruments, System Development and Consulting, and Others. The Financial Instruments segment acts as an investment advisory which provides financial derivative products targeting foreign currencies. The Renewable Energy segment manufactures wood biomass gasification power generation equipment. The Overseas Financial Instruments segment operates commodity futures brokerage business in Indonesia. The System Development and Consulting segment comprises of subsidiary and office in China and Vietnam that develop systems and provides consultations. The Others segment includes electronic equipment rental business, administrative office consignment business, and investment business. The company was founded on November 5, 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Trusco Nakayama Corp. engages in the wholesale distribution of "PRO TOOL" including consumables, machine tools, furniture and fixtures, and environmental safety equipment. It operates through the following business segments: Factory Route, e-Business Route, Home Center Route, and Overseas Route. The Factory Route segment handles the sales related to manufacturing and constructions works. The e-Business Route segment manages the sales for Internet mail-orders. The Home Center Route segment deals with the sales of home centers and specialty shops. The Overseas Route segment covers the sales of products to foreign countries. The company was founded by Chuji Nakayama on May 15, 1959 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TS TECH CO., LTD. engages in the manufacture and sale of parts and accessories for automobiles and motorcycles. Its product includes automobile seats and interior items, motorcycle seats and resin-based products, and chairs for medical care. It operates through the following segments: Japan, America, China, and Asia/Europe. The company was founded on December 5, 1960 and is headquartered in Asaka, Japan.

TSI Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the control and management of its group companies with interests in apparel-related business. It operates through the Apparels and Others segments. The Apparels segment deals with clothing production, brand licensing, and logistics operations. The Others segment includes synthetic resin, and store design and management services. The company was founded June 1, 2011 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tsuchiya Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies in construction business. It also handles management and consultancy business. It operates through the following segments: Housing Business, Reform Business, Real Estate Business, and Rental Business. The Housing Business segment develops residential lands and designs, manages, constructs, and sells condominiums. The Reform Business segment constructs extension and structural alteration of buildings and houses. The Real Estate Business segment sells condominiums and used houses and offers agency services for real estate properties. The Rental Business segment leases and manages real estate properties. The company was founded by Kozo Tsuchiya on June 12, 1969 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

Tsugami Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of precision machine tools and measuring equipment. Its products include automatic lathes, grinding machines, machining centers, turrets, and rolling machines. The company was founded by Taisuke Tsugami on March 15, 1937 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tsukada Global Holdings, Inc. manages its group companies which are into the planning and development of guest houses, hotels, weddings, and restaurants. It operates through the following segments: Wedding Ceremony, Hotel, and Wellness and Relaxation. The Wedding Ceremony segment provides wedding reception, wedding gown rental and beauty services, and wedding facilities. The Hotel segment offers wedding ceremonies, banquets, and accommodation services in hotels. The Wellness and Relaxation segment operates reflexology salon, hot spring facility, and fitness club. The company was founded on October 6, 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tsukishima Kikai Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of industrial machines and systems. It operates through the following segments: Water Environment, Industrial, and Others. The Water Environment segment deals with water purification and sewage treatment plants, dehydrators, dryers, and incinerators. The Industrial segment manages the design and construction of chemical, steel, and food production plants, waste management systems, and biomass ethanol plants. The Others segment deals with printing, bookbinding, and real estate leasing businesses. The company was founded in August 1905 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tsunagu Group Holdings, Inc. engages in staff support and employment placement services. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Staffing Services, Media Services, and Retail Services. The Staffing Services segment offers recruitment outsourcing services. The Media Services segment provides web matching services for part-time job seekers. The Retail Services segment includes training of part-time applicants to be assigned in convenient stores. The company was founded on February 28, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tuan Sing Holding Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the provision of property development, property investment and hotel ownership. It operates through the following segments: Property, Hotels Investment, Industrial Services, Other Investments and Corporate & Others. The Property segment focuses on the development of properties for sale, property investment and provision of property management services. The Hotels Investment segment covers investment in hotels in Australia. The Industrial Services segment involves trading and marketing of industrial commodities, distribution of tyres and re-treading of tyres, as well as manufacturing of polypropylene woven bags. The Other Investments segment includes investments in GulTech, which is a printed circuit board's manufacturer with operations in Singapore and China. The Corporate and Others segment consists of corporate-level services. The company was founded on March 13, 1969 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Tuong An Vegetable Oil JSC engages in the production and sale of edible oil. Its activities include production and sale of packaging, machinery and equipment; lease of properties; and manufacture and sale of sauces and noodle products. Its products include cooking oil, soy bean oil, sesame oil, margarine, shortening, extra virgin olive oil, olive oil, van tho oil, and olita. The company was founded on November 20, 1977 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Turvo International Co., Ltd. engages in the processing, manufacturing and trading of precision metal components. It offers precision metal components including forging, production and inspection equipment. The company's products applied in manufacturing automotive engine systems, automotive transmission systems, automotive chassis systems, medical equipment, industrial communication and aerospace connectors and electronics, among others. Turvo International was founded on December 29, 1987 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

TV Asahi Holdings Corp. engages in the provision of television broadcasting services. It operates through the following business segments: Television (TV) Broadcasting, Music Publication, and Other Businesses. The Television Broadcasting segment handles the production and transmission of television programs aired on the Group's network. The Music Publication segment includes administration of copyrights for music compositions, manages artists and scouts for new talents in coordination with television programs. The Other Businesses engages in event management business, sales and publication of videos and digital versatile discs (DVD), sales of broadcasting equipment, motion picture investment business, shopping business, and content distribution to digital devices. The company was founded on November 1, 1957 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TV TOKYO Holdings Corp. engages in the broadcasting business. It operates through the following segments: Terrestrial Broadcasting, Broadcast Outskirts, Broadcasting Satellite, and Internet Mobile. The Terrestrial Broadcasting segment produces and distributes television programs, advertising, and peripheral rights. The Broadcast Outskirts segment covers planning, production, technology, and communication sales of broadcasting programs; and music-related business. The Broadcasting Satellite segment handles contract broadcasting and advertising via satellite. The Internet Mobile segment distributes and supplies video contents. The company was founded on October 1, 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TVZone Media Co., Ltd. is engaged in the production and distribution of television and video programs. It has two business segments: Video Programs and Related Services and Teleplay Broadcast Operation. The Video Programs and Related Services segment is mainly engaged in the production and distribution of television, internet and mobile internet video contents and others, such as variety shows, documentary story programs, column dramas and others. The Teleplay Broadcast Operation segment is mainly engaged in purchase teleplays for local channels, and provides choreography services, promo production, publicity and planning services. The company was founded on April 13, 2007 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

Suzhou TZTEK Technology Co., Ltd. provides size measurement, surface defect detection and automated production and assembly solutions for precision manufacturing industries. Its products include precision measuring instruments, VMU video measuring machine, measurement automation systems, 3D surfaced glass measuring system, wafers sorting system, intelligent warehousing system, test automation systems, and assembly automation systems. The company was founded in December 2005 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

Uematsu Shokai Co., Ltd. engages in the purchase and sale of tools and machineries. Its products include machine tools, machine toll accessories, industrial machinery, conductors, and environmental products. The company was founded on May 1, 1950 and is headquartered in Sendai, Japan.

Ultrafabrics Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in investment management of its group of companies that handle the manufacture and sales of synthetic leather. Its leather products are used for furniture, automobiles, aircrafts, trucks, and boats. The company was founded on January 12, 1966 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

UMS Holdings Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in manufacturing high precision front-end semiconductor components, perform electromechanical assembly and final testing services. It operates through the following segments: Semiconductor and Others. The Semiconductor segment provides precision machining components and equipment modules for semiconductor equipment manufacturers. The Others segment provides shipment of water disinfection systems and the supplier of base components to oil and gas original manufacturers. The company was founded by Andy Luong in 1984 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Unick Corp. engages in the development and manufacture of automotive parts. Its products include power train control, instrument, fuel, onboard refuelling vapour recovery system, emission control system, and sensor part. The company was founded on April 21, 1976 and is headquartered in Gimhae, South Korea.

Union Gas Holdings Ltd. engages in the sale of fuel products. It operates through the following segments: Retail LPG (Domestic) Business; Retail LPG (Commercial) Business, Retail Station Business, and Corporate. The Retail LPG (Domestic) Business segment sells and distributes bottled LPG and LPG-related accessories, and provision of LPG-related services to domestic households. The Retail LPG (Commercial) Business segment offers LFG and LPG-related services to commercial customers. The Retail Station Business segment focuses on the retail sale of compressed natural gas (CNG) and diesel to vehicles through a CNG and diesel refilling station. The company was founded by Kiang Ang Teo in 1974 and is headquartered in Singapore.

United Global Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture of lubricant and specialty fluids for automotive, industrial and marine, and metal works applications. It operates through the Manufacturing and Trading segments. The Manufacturing segment produces lubricants under in-house brands such as United Oil, U Star Lube, and Bell1. The Trading segment sells base oils, additives, and finished products by buying from suppliers. The company was founded by Thuan Hor Tan and Wiranto on September 15, 2015 and is headquartered in Singapore.

United Super Markets Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of supermarket business. Its services include the retail, manufacture, process, wholesale, import and export of goods; real estate leasing and its related services. The company was founded on March 2, 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

UNITED, Inc. engages in advertising technology and smartphone applications business. It operates through the following segments: Ad Technology, Games, Contents, Investments, and Others. The Ad Technology segment deals with the planning, development, and operation of advertising distribution platforms for advertisers and advertising agencies. The Games segment operates smartphone game applications. The Contents segment produces digital contents, programming instructions, smartphone applications, and web services. The Investments segment manages venture capital funds and venture investments. The Others segment includes auxiliary activities not mentioned above. The company was founded by Kiyoshi Nishikawa on February 20, 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

UOB-Kay Hian Holdings Ltd. operates as a brokerage firm. The firm engages in the business of stock broking, futures broking, investment trading, margin financing, investment holding business, and the provision of nominee and research services. Its products include Equities, Bonds, Contracts for Difference, Daily Leverage Certificates, Exchange Traded Funds, Futures & Options, and Robo Advisory. The firm operates through the following segment: Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, and Others. The company was founded in June 1970 and is headquartered in Singapore.

UT Group Co., Ltd. engages in the support and management of its group companies that dispatches and outsources permanent employees to different industries in the fields of manufacturing, design, development, and construction. It operates through the following segments: Manufacturing Sector, Engineering Dispatch and Others. The Manufacturing Sector segment outsources and dispatches permanent employees to semiconductor, electronics, environment & energy, automobile, and construction sectors. The Engineering Dispatch segment includes design and construction engineers dispatch to software outsourcing, electrical and electronic machinery design and development, and construction industries. The Others segment includes re-employment support business. The company was founded on April 2, 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Valor Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the supermarket and home center business. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Supermarket (SM), Drugstore, Home Improvement Center (HC), Sports Club, Distribution-related Operations, and Others. The Supermarket segment handles supermarket operations, food manufacturing, and wholesale businesses. The Drugstore segment covers the drug store operations. The Home Improvement Center segment deals with home center business. The Sports Club segment engages in sports club business. The Distribution-related Operations segment handles operation of commercial facilities. The Others segment includes pet shops, sale of clothing, and insurance agencies. The company was founded by Yoshimi Ito in July 1958 and is headquartered in Tajimi, Japan.

ValueMax Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of pawn broking, loans, and other related solutions. It operates through the following segments: Pawnbroking, Retail and Trading of Jewelry and Gold, Moneylending, and Other Operations. The Other Operations segment includes investment holding and provision of other support services. The company was founded on August 7, 2003 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Vector Inc. engages in the public relations (PR) business that includes PR planning and implementation, risk management, PR business agency and consulting, marketing research, branding, events planning and implementation, investor relations (IR) communication, social networking site (SNS) communication, casting, and marketing. It operates through the following segments: Press release (PR), News Release Distribution, Video Release Distribution, Direct Marketing, Media, HR and Others. The PR segment deals with PR consulting services. The News Release Distribution segment provides press release service catering to public listed corporations through PR Times. The Video Release Distribution segment distributes news and earning announcement videos directly to desired audience through an advertising network. The Direct Marketing segment handles the online sale of goods. The Media segment handles media construction services by a subsidiary. The HR segment covers the development of HR cloud services that support the introduction and operation of corporate personnel evaluation systems. The Others segment covers the investment businesses. The company was founded by Keiji Nishie on March 30, 1993 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Very Good Tour Co., Ltd. engages in the provision and sale of tour packages and air tickets. It offers tour services including transportation, accommodation, food, activities, and entertainment. It also engages in real estate lease services. The company was founded on February 20, 2007 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Vinh Son Song Hinh Hydropower JSC engages in the generation and distribution of electricity. Its other activities include construction, operation, and maintenance of hydropower plants; investment in building power projects; and provision of irrigation design consultancy and real estate businesses. The company was founded on September 15, 1991 and is headquartered in Quy Nhon, Vietnam.

Vital KSK Holdings, Inc. engages in the management of its group companies which are involved in the pharmaceutical business. It operates through the Pharmaceutical Wholesale and Others segments. The Pharmaceutical Wholesale segment sells medicines, diagnostics, and medical devices to hospitals, medical institutions, and health practitioners. The Others segment includes retail of pharmaceutical products, wholesale of agrochemical and veterinary drugs, transportation, nursing care services, and medical consultancies. The company was founded on April 1, 2009 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

V-One Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the development and manufacture of display inspection software and equipment. Its products include automated optical inspection (AOI), chip-on-glass or film on glass bonding alignment system, system alignment and inspection system, AOI machines, rechargeable battery inspection system, fine dust measurement equipment and others. The company was founded on May 30, 2006 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

Wacoal Holdings Corp. engages in the management of its group companies which are involved in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of women's intimate apparel, outerwear, sportswear, textile products and accessories. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Wacoal Business (Domestic), Wacoal Business (Overseas), Peach John Business, and Others. The Wacoal Business (Domestic) segment produces and sells innerwear, outerwear, sportswear, and hosiery on a domestic scale. The Wacoal Business (Overseas) segment manufactures and markets innerwear, outerwear, sportswear, and hosiery on a global scale. The Peach John Business segment sells innerwear, outerwear, and other textile-related products under the "Peach John" brand. The Others segment includes other textile-related business, construction, and interior design. The company was founded by Koichi Tsukamoto on June 15, 1946 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

Wanxiang Qianchao Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of auto parts. It offers chassis and suspension systems, automotive brake systems, automotive transmission systems, automotive fuel exhaust systems, wheel hub units, bearings, precision parts, engineering machinery parts, and other automotive system parts and assemblies. The company was founded on December 25, 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

WARABEYA NICHIYO HOLDINGS Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of food items that include boxed meals and prepared dishes. It operates through the following segments: Food-related, Ingredient-related, Logistics-related, and Others. The Food-related segment deals with the manufacture and sale of lunch boxes, rice balls, sushi, stuffed bread, and prepared food. The Ingredient-related segment covers the processing, sale, and supply of food ingredients. The Logistics-related segment provides food delivery services. The Others segment includes food manufacturing equipment sales, staffing, and contracting businesses. The company was founded by Tarou Ohtomo on March 18, 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Wavelock Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company which provides the strategy formulation for the entire group, resource allocation, financial strategy and business management services. Its products include construction and civil engineering materials, residence and household related materials, food container and packaging related materials, industrial and agricultural related materials; and automobile & light electrical related materials. It also provides shared services to the management departments within the group. The company was founded on June 20, 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Wedge Industrial Co., Ltd. principally engages in the sale of property projects. The company's main business is real estate investment, development and operation, power production, steam heat supply and so on. Wedge Industrial company was founded on July 18, 1992 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

Wee Hur Holdings Ltd. is an investment company, which engages in the provision of construction and property development services. It operates through the following business segments: Building Construction, Workers' Dormitory, Property Development, Corporate, Purpose-Built Student Accommodation (PBSA), and Fund Management. The Building Construction segment deals in the business of constructing residential and commercial properties. The Workers' Dormitory segment builds and operates workers’ dormitories and leasing of office and commercial properties. The Property Development segment develops and markets residential and industrial properties. The Corporate segment involves in the company’s corporate services. The PBSA segment builds accommodation for local and foreign students. The Fund Management segment is in the business of fund management services. The company was founded by Yeow Lian Goh and Yeo Hwa Goh on 1980 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Weifu High-Technology Group Co. Ltd. is engaged in the development, manufacture and sales of automotive fuel injection, air management, exhaust after treatment, automotive post-processing system, and key components. The company's main products include fuel injection systems, air management systems, exhaust after-treatment systems and key components. Weifu High-Technology Group was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Weihai Guangtai Airport Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of airport ground support and special equipment. Its products include tow tractors, jet start units, baggage conveyor belts, deicing vehicles, passenger steps, electric passenger steps, ambulift, aircraft push tractor, airport bus, catering trucks, passenger boarding stairs, and baggage or freight handlings. The company was founded by Guangtai Li in 1991 and is headquartered in Weihai, China.

Welcia Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its subsidiaries and group companies which are in the pharmaceutical business. Its core business deals with the operation of drug store chains which offer prescription drugs and pharmaceuticals, sanitation and nursing care items, health food products, baby supplies, cosmetics, and household sundries. The company was founded on September 1, 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Wenzhou Hongfeng Electrical Alloy Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of electrical contact composite materials, components and assemblies. Its products covers three categories such as particle and fiber reinforced electrical contact composite materials and components, layered electrical contact, and unitized electrical contact components. The company was founded on September 11, 1997 and is headquartered in Yueqing, China.

Will Group, Inc. engages in the human resources business through temporary staffing, outsourcing, and permanent placement. It operates through the following segments: Sales Outsourcing, Call Center Outsourcing, Factory Outsourcing, Care Business Support, and Others. The Sales Outsourcing segment manages staffing and recommendation of sales workforce for consumer electronics stores. The Call Center segment handles professional staffing and recommendation for call centers as well as other contract services. The Factory Outsourcing segment undertakes business contract services; and staffing and recommendation of operating workforce in factories. The Care Business Support segment dispatches and refers caregivers primarily in care facilities. The Others segment offers staffing services focusing on offices, assistant language teachers (ALT), overseas, and recruitment via the Internet. The company was founded on April 3, 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Willy Food Investments Ltd. engages in the import, manufacture, and marketing of food products. It operates through the Import segment and Non-Bank Credit segment. The import segment engages in the import, marketing, and distribution of food products. The Non-Bank Credit segment engages in the provision of loans to other corporations. The company was founded on November 27, 1992 and is headquartered in Yavne, Israel.

Wilmar International Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the processing, merchandising, and distribution of agricultural products. It operates through the following segments: Tropical Oils; Oilseeds and Grains; Sugar; and Others. The Tropical Oils segments processes, merchandise, brands and distributes palm oil and laurics related products including oleochemical and biodiesel. The Oilseeds and Grains segment comprises the merchandising and processing of a wide range of agricultural products including non palm and lauric edible oils, oilseeds, flour and rice milling, corn processing and downstream products like wheat and rice noodles in consumer pack, medium pack and in bulk. The Sugar segment engages in milling, refining, merchandising, branding, and distribution of sugar and its related products. The Others segment includes the manufacturing and distribution of fertiliser products and ship-chartering services. The company was founded by Kuok Khoon Hong and Martua Sitorus in 1991 and is headquartered in Singapore.

WIN-Partners Co., Ltd. engages in the management of group companies that sell medical devices. Its medical devices are used for angina or myocardial infarction, irregular pulse, aortic aneurysm, arteriosclerosis obliterans, cerebral aneurysm, diabetes and tests.  The company was founded on April 1, 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

With us Corp. engages in the provision of educational services. It operates through the following segments: Cram School, High School and Career Support, and Others. The Cram School segment manages cram schools for elementary, middle, and high school students. The High School and Career Support segment offers certification and examination tutorial services. The Others segment includes advertising, language service, information and communications technology education, corporate training portal, and content development sales business. The company was founded on July 10, 1976 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Wong Fong Industries Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the provision of business and management consultancy services. It operates through the Engineering and Training business segments. The Engineering segment comprises of the equipment sales, repairs and servicing, and project activities. The Training segment provides training courses primarily to the construction and hospitality related industries. Wong Fong Industries was founded by Foo Liew and Ah Kuie Liew on January 2, 2015 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Wonik Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of electronic medical equipment. It operates through the following business divisions: Electronic components, Healthcare and Trade. The Electronic component business division offers Hybrid integrated circuit (HIC) regular, HIC sensor, HIC field radio frequency filter and others. The Healthcare business division provides surgery, skin care, and laser equipment. The Trade business division offers industrial materials, lighting instrument, semiconductor measuring equipment, and gas pressure checking sensors. The company was founded on October 31, 1983 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

WOONGJIN Co., Ltd. engages in the operation and management of its subsidiaries. It provides consulting and management services to its subsidiaries. The company was founded on March 21, 1983 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Woory Industrial Co., Ltd. is engaged in manufacturing and distributing automobile parts. Its products include actuator, clutch coil, control head, resistors, power module, sensor, and PTC heater. The company was founded on April 01, 2015 and is headquartered at Yongin-si, South Korea.

WOOSHIN SYSTEMS Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive body assembly line and parts. It operates through the Body Equipment and Automotive Parts business divisions. The Body Equipment business division engages in the manufacture of automotive body assembly line. The Automotive Parts business division offers car doors, car seat belts and other automobile built-in products. The company was founded on February 23, 1984 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Woosu AMS Co., Ltd. manufactures automobile parts. It provides engine and transmission parts. Its engine parts include air compressor assembly, drive pump assembly, intake manifold, adaptor water outlet, cap-cam shaft, rocker arm shaft assembly, and valve guide. The company's transmission parts include intermediate plate assembly, differential case assembly, transmission case and clutch housing, control shaft complete, rail shift assembly, fork shift, main shaft and parking system sub parts. The company was founded by Jong-In Jeon in February 1983 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.

World Class Global Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the property development and investment services. The firm operates through the following geographical segments Malaysia, Australia, and Others. It undertakes property development projects, including residential and mixed use developments. The company was founded on October 29, 2013 and is headquartered in Singapore.

World Co., Ltd. manufactures, plans, retails and wholesales clothing for women, men, children and other related products. It also creates different brands and distributes their clothing line through its own retail outlets. The company was established on January 13, 1959 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

World Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the human resource services, telecommunications, and real estate businesses. It operates through the following segments: Factory Business, Technology Business, Research and Development (R&D) Business, Sales and Marketing Business, Real Estate Business, Information and Telecommunications Business, and Others. The Factory Business segment deals with manufacturing dispatch, logistics contracts, business contracts, administrative outsourcing, and staffing. The Technology Business segment manages technical and construction engineer personnel dispatch, software and system outsourcing development, and digital equipment repair. The R&D Business segment handles researcher and clinical dispatch and contracted clinical trials (CRO). The Sales and Marketing Business segment covers sales staff and office dispatch. The Real Estate Business segment sells houses and residential land. It also provides real estate brokerage, management, and consulting services. The Information and Telecommunications Business segment manages call center operations, communication and office automation (OA) equipment sales. The Others segment includes management of agricultural parks; operation of a computer school; and web production. The company was founded by Eikichi Iida on February 12, 1993 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

World Precision Machinery Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the manufacture and sale of stamping machines and related metal components. Its products are used for manual and automated metal-stamping operations, and stamping applications such as cutting, punching, stretching, forming, bending, and straightening. The company was founded on July 28, 2004 and is headquartered in Danyang, China.

WPG (Shanghai) Smart Water Public Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of secondary water supply equipment. It provides research and development, construction, operation, and maintenance of developing a secondary water supply smart management platform system. Its products include water supply equipment, centralized drinking water equipment, urban water supply pipe network pumping station non-negative pressure water supply equipment, regulated compensation type non-negative pressure water supply equipment, box type non-negative pressure water supply equipment, smart water management platform, and water pump. The company was founded on July 29, 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of department stores, discount stores, and supermarkets. Its business areas include Volume trade and Department Stores. The company was founded on December 25, 1986 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Wuhan East Lake High Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, construction, operation and maintenance of science & technology park, environmental protection technology project and high-tech industry. The company was founded on March 19, 1993 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Wuhan Guide Infrared Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of infrared core devices, infrared thermal imagers, and optoelectronic systems. It operates through the following segments: Infrared Focal Plane Detector Chip, Infrared Thermal Imaging Machine & Integrated Photoelectric System, New Complete Weapon System, and Traditional Non-Lethal Ammunition & Information Ammunition. The Infrared Focal Plane Detector Chip segment manufactures infrared detector chips. The Infrared Thermal Imaging Machine & Integrated Photoelectric System segment provides high-end equipment products and integrated optoelectronic systems. The New Complete Weapon System segment involves in the development and production of advanced precision strike weapon systems. The Traditional Non-Lethal Ammunition & Information Ammunition segment engages in the research, development, production and sale of non-lethal ammunitions, ground explosion equipment, artillery sub-munition ammunitions, fuzes and other military products. The company was founded by Li Huang in 1999 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Wuhan Jingce Electronic Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of software products. It also engages in the FPD test research and services. Its products include module test system, panel test system, OLED test system, AOI system, touch panel test system and FPD automation equipment. The company was founded on April 20, 2006 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

Wuxi Best Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale of various types of precision parts and fixture products. It also engages in the manufacturing and sale of mechanical component, pneumatic and power tools. The company was founded on April 16, 1997 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of port operation equipment. Its products include ship-to-shore container cranes, rail-mounted gantry container cranes, rubber tyred gantry container cranes, general gantry cranes, portal cranes, bulk handling, and other gantry cranes. The company was founded on January 9, 2004 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production and sales of automation equipment. Its products include lithium battery, photovoltaic, fuel cell, laser, 3C intelligent and capacitor equipment; intelligent warehousing & logistics, vehicle production line and manufacturing execution system. The company was founded by Yan Qing Wang on April 30, 2002 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Wuxi Lihu Corp. Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of turbocharger key components. Its products include compressor casing and turbine casing. Turbocharger is an important accessory for automobile internal combustion engines in motivating fuel efficiency. The company was founded on April 11, 1994 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Wuxi Longsheng Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of engine exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) systems. Its products include EGR valves, sensors, EGR coolers, engine control units, and accessories. The company was founded on June 16, 2004 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Wuxi Xinje Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of industrial automation control product. It provides intelligent control system solutions to.the original equipment manufacturer automation industry. It focuses on industrial electrical control system. Its products include main controller, man-machine interface and electric actuator, programmable controller, man-machine interface and drive system such as servo driver and servomotor. The company was founded on April 22, 2008 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

XCMG Construction Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of construction machinery and construction machinery spare parts. Its products include hoisting machinery, shovel machinery, compaction machinery, concrete machinery, road machinery, pile construction machinery, fire fighting machinery, and construction machinery spare parts. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.

XDC Industries (Shenzhen) Ltd. engages in the development and manufacture of RF components, optoelectronic components and precision components. The company was founded on 10 May 2005, and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

Xiamen Goldenhome Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, sale, installation, and after-sale service for kitchen cabinet and custom house furniture. Its products include kitchen cabinet, closet, and wooden door. The company was founded by Jian Huai Wen and Xiao Zhen Pan on January 26, 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

Xiamen R & T Plumbing Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of bathroom products. Its product includes fill valves, flush valves, induction faucets, toilet seat covers, flush meters, toilets, wrench, water tanks, flush panels, and flush buttons. The company was founded on April 19, 1999 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

Xiamen Sunrise Group Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, design, production and sales of steel structures and automobile wheels. Its products include industrial production room, equipment steel structure, steel structure bridge, tubeless steel ring and steel ring. The company was founded on August 1, 1995 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

Xiamen Unigroup Xue Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of education services. The company provides tutoring services for primary and secondary schools; education consulting, investment advisory, software development, management of real estate properties and more. Its business activities also include the sale of electronic and rubber products, communication equipment, metal and building materials, automobile spare parts, computers and software, fishing supplies, plastic goods, and textiles. Xiamen Unigroup Xue was founded on January 18, 1993 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

Xiamen XGMA Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and after-sales service of engineering machinery products. Its business covers loaders, excavators, forklifts, road machinery, and environmental protection machinery series. Its products include scrapping machinery, mining machinery, compaction machinery, building machinery, industrial vehicles, concrete machinery, pile driving machinery, hoisting machinery, tunneling machinery, and garbage compression transfer station. Its products are used in construction, mining, agriculture, forestry, water, electricity, roads, ports and other engineering areas. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

Dagang Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of road construction machines and equipment. Its business segments include high-end pavement equipment, comprehensive recycling of hazardous and solid waste, and urban road smart operation and maintenance management. Its High-End Pavement Equipment segment offers intelligent asphalt spreaders, micro-surface or slurry sealing cars, liquid asphalt carriers, self-propelled gravel spreaders, and powder spreaders. Its Comprehensive Recycling of Hazardous and Solid Waste segment sells recycled materials in metals such as bismuth, lead, silver, and gold. Its Urban Road Smart Operation and Maintenance Management develops a business platform for intelligent operation, maintenance, and service of road facilities. The company was founded by Tai Jie Li on May 16, 2002 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

Xingmin Intelligent Transportation Systems (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of vehicle wheels. Its products include small and large tubeless, snow, steel, and agriculture and forestry engineering machinery wheels. The company was founded by Jia Min Wang on December 28, 1999 and is headquartered in Longkou, China.

Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of filter press filtration integration solution, combining slurry, filtration process research, control system design, filter press production, and system commissioning services. Its products include filter press, filter plate, auxiliary system, chamber filter press, overhead filter press and automatic filter press. The company was founded on July 15, 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Xinjiang Youhao (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the commercial retail business in the form of department stores, shopping malls, and supermarkets. It operates through the following business segments: Commercial retail and catering, Real Estate, Fuel, and Other. It also provides logistics and advertising services. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Urumqi, China.

HBIS Resources Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of construction machinery. Its products include bulldozers, loaders, excavators, pipe machines, cranes, forklifts, self-made semi-finished products, and related components. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Zhangjiakou, China.

Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co., Ltd. manufactures automobile drive shaft assembly. Its products include whole automobile axis and accessories, which are mainly used in the manufacture of commercial vehicles and construction machinery. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Xuchang, China.

Y.D. More Investments Ltd. is a holding company that engages in activities related to the capital market, including investment portfolio management, mutual fund management, and hedge fund management. The company was founded by Yosef Levy on May 24, 2006 and is headquartered in Ramat Gan, Israel.

YaGuang Technology Group Co. Ltd. engages in the design, research, development, manufacture, and sale of composite boats and yachts. It also offers maintenance services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Yuanjiang, China.

Yamabiko Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of agricultural, industrial, and outdoor power equipment. Its operations are carried out through the following segments: Small Outdoor Work Machinery, Agricultural Management Machinery, General Industrial Machinery and Others. The Small Outdoor Work Machinery segment manufactures and sells brush cutters, chain saws, and power blowers. The Agricultural Management Machinery segment manufactures and sells mowers and power sprayers. The General Industrial Machinery segment manufactures and sells generators and welding machines. The Others segment offers after-sale s service parts and accessories. The company was founded on December 1, 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yamato Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of its group companies and subsidiaries. It operates through the following segments: Delivery, BIZ-Logistics, Home Convenience, e-Business, Financial, Auto Works, and Others. The Delivery segment offers small parcel delivery services for the general public and corporations centring on TA-Q-BIN. The BIZ-Logistic segment handles logistics and other B2B (Business to Business) distribution operations. The Home Convenience segment provides moving, lifestyle support and distribution services, and also offers pick-up, delivery, and installation of appliances. The e-Business segment provides information services for corporations, including ASP (Application Service Provider) services and information systems development. The Financial segment includes settlement and other financial services targeted at consumers and business customers, beginning with mail order firms. The Auto Works segment mainly comprises maintenance of trucks and other vehicles for transportation companies. The Others segment consists of shared services, including highway transportation and personnel placement services. The company was founded by Yasuomi Ogura on November 29, 1919 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yamato Kogyo Co., Ltd. engages in the management and support of its group of companies that manufacture and distribute steel, railroad track components, and industrial materials. It operates through the following business segments: Steel (Japan), Steel (South Korea), Steel (Thailand), Railway Track Accessories, and Others. The Steel (Japan) segment produces and supplies H-steel, channel steel, I-Steel, steel sheet pile, striped H-steel, steel and can for shipbuilding, elevator guide rail, cast steel products, and heavy industrial machineries. The Steel (South Korea) segment offers steal bars. The Steel (Thailand) segment manufactures H-steel, I-steel, channel steel, and steel sheet pile products. The Railway Track Accessories segment processes and markets turnouts, elastic joints, new crossings, adhesive insulated rails, derailment prevention guards, tie plates, and bolts. The Others segment includes transportation, medical waste treatment, and real estate businesses. The company was founded on November 8, 1944 and is headquartered in Himeji, Japan.

Yamazen Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of production equipment and consumer goods. It operates through the following segments: Production Equipment, Building Materials, Home Products, and Others. The Production Equipment segment produces machine tools and industrial equipment. The Building Materials segment deals with interior and exterior construction materials, structural frameworks, air conditioning and ventilation-related equipment as well as construction machinery. The Home Products segment plans and develops home appliances, leisure and sporting goods, pet supplies, housing equipment, and garden products. The Others segment carries out event planning, travel placement, warehousing, and storage services. The company was founded by Takeo Yamamoto on May 30, 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Yangzijiang Shipbuilding (Holdings) Ltd. engages in the provision of agency services for shipbuilding and related activities. It operates through the following segments: Shipbuilding, Investments, Trading and Others. The Shipbuilding segment handles offshore marine equipment construction and ship design. The Investment segment consists of micro-financing and investments in financial assets. The Trading segment consists of trading of goods. The Others segment includes ship demolition and vessel owning companies. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jingjiang, China.

Yanlord Land Group Ltd. is an investment holding company, which engages in the procurement of funds. It operates through the following segments: Property Development, Property Investment and Hotel Operations, and Others. The Property Development segment focuses on the development of residential, commercial, and other properties. The Property Investment and Hotel Operations segment includes leasing of properties to generate rental income and to gain from the appreciation in the value of the properties in the long term. It also operates hotels to generate accommodation service and related income. The Others segment provides property management; ancillary services; business of mining and manufacture of die-cast precision parts and components; supply and installation of building materials; provision of system integration for broadcasting and multimedia; and others. The firm's projects include Yanlord Sunland Gardens, Yanlord Town, Yanlord Riverside City, and Yanlord Yunjie Riverside Garden. The company was founded by Sheng Jian Zhong in 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Yantai Eddie Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production and sale of construction machinery. Its products include hydraulic breaker, quick coupler, high-frequency vibration breaker, stone grab, hydraulic compactor, log grab and other attachments for construction machinery. The company was founded on August 6, 2003 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

Moon Environment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the complete service of integration and engineering of equipment and operating systems for low temperature freezing, central air conditioning, and energy-saving heating. It also engages in other businesses such as housing rental. The company was founded on January 16, 1956 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of high performance fiber such as spandex and Kevlar aramid. It operates through the following business segments: Spandex and Aramid. Its products include spandex fiber, meta-aramid, para-aramid, anti-static fiber, and aramid paper. The company was founded on July 10, 1986 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

Yantai Zhenghai Magnetic Material Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and marketing of neodymium-iron-boron permanent magnets and other magnetic assemblies. It also provides new energy vehicle motor drive system. Its products are used in the fields of information technology, automobile, petrochemical, mechanics, aerospace, and medical. The company was founded on April 6, 2000 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

Yanzhou Coal Mining Co., Ltd. engages primarily in the mining business. It also engages in the coal railway transportation business. It operates through the following segments: Coal Mining, Coal Railway Transportation, Methanol, Electricity and Heat Supply, and Equipment Manufacturing. The Coal Mining segment refers to the underground and open-cut mining, preparation and sales of coal and potash mineral exploration. The Coal Railway Transportation segment is the provision of railway transportation services. The Methanol, Electricity and Heat Supply segment is the production and sales of methanol and electricity and related heat supply services. The Equipment Manufacturing segment manufactures comprehensive coal mining and excavating equipment. The company was founded on September 25, 1997 and is headquartered in Zoucheng City, China.

YASKAWA Electric Corp. engages in the manufacture, sale, installation, and maintenance of systems control and industrial products. It operates through the following segments: Motion Control, Robotics, System Engineering, and Others. The Motion Control provides servo motors, controllers, and alternating current drives. The Robotics segment offers automation of various industrial processes including arc welding, spot welding, painting, assembly, and handling for the automobile, electrical equipment, and semiconductor markets. The System Engineering segment provides engineering solutions for iron and steel plants such as blast furnaces and continuous casting equipment. The Others segment includes information-related products, software processing and related services, office automation devices, and distribution services.  The company was founded on July 16, 1915 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

YBM NET, Inc. engages in the provision of online educational services and programs. It operates through the following businesses: Online Education, Online Test, Content Providing, Offline Junior, Job Consulting, Education Learning, Academic Credit Bank, Online Reading, and the Other. The company was founded on June 7, 2000 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.

YHI International Ltd. is an investment holding company. The firm engages in the manufacture, marketing and distribution of alloy wheels. It operates through the following segments: Manufacturing, Distribution and Rental. The Manufacturing segment includes North East Asia and Association of South East Asian Nation that produces alloy wheels. The Distribution segment comprises of North East Asia, ASEAN and Oceania regions that supplies automotive and industrial products. The Rental segment covers leasing activities. The company was founded by Chin Kiat Tay in 1948 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Yinbang Clad Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of aluminum clad and multi-metal clad material. Its products are applied in fields like automobiles heat exchangers, engineering machinery, air cooling in power station, rail transit, household appliance, aerospace, cellphone, and shipping. The company was founded on August 25, 1998 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

Yindu Kitchen Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and service of commercial dining equipment. Its products include commercial cooking and cooling equipment such as commercial refrigerators, workbenches, display cabinets, and ice makers; buffet equipment such as meal stoves, juice and coffee tripods, and trays; and Western kitchen equipment such as fryers, ovens, and grills. The company was founded on April 10, 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Yingkou Jinchen Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of production line equipment for solar photovoltaic modules. Its products include photovoltaic module automated production lines, software, laminating machines, string welders, and accessories. The company was founded on August 30, 2004 and is headquartered in Yingkou, China.

YKT Corp. engages in the import and export of electronic equipment, machine tools, measuring equipment, welding machines, and industrial machinery. It operates through the Electronics Equipment and Machine Tools, and Optoelectronic Device segments. The Electronics Equipment and Machine Tools segment markets electronic component mounting systems, machine tools, measuring equipment, welding machines, and industrial machineries. The Optoelectronic Device segment sells optical communication-related products, research laser equipment, and laser processing devices. The company was founded by Keizo Yamamoto in 1924 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

YMT Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of chemical materials used in printed circuit board, semiconductors, electronic components and others. Its products include finish plating chemical, copper plating chemical and process chemical. The company was founded on February 11, 1999 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.

Yokogawa Bridge Holdings Corp. engages in the construction of bridges. It operates through the following business segments: Bridge, Civil Engineering, Advanced Technology and Real Estate. The Bridge segment designs, builds, maintains, and repairs bridges; pre-stressed concrete and composite structures; and provides civil engineering works such as on-site construction and tunnel segment design. The Civil Engineering segment covers mobile systems architecture, architectural design, steel frame and forging works construction, solar energy generation systems installation, and waste treatment systems. The Advanced Technology segment offers structural analysis, design, and processing of precision frames for liquid crystal panel manufacturing equipment; information processing; and software development and sales. The Real Estate segment includes property leasing and manpower dispatch services. The company was founded by Tamisuke Yokogawa in February 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yondoshi Holdings, Inc. engages in the jewelry business. It operates through the following segments: Jewelry and Apparel. The Jewelry segment retails necklaces, earrings, bracelets, hair jewelry, chains, and charms. The Apparel segment manufactures and sells clothing and bags. The company was founded on May 18, 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yoosung Enterprise Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing of automobile parts and accessories for motor engines. Its products include piston rings, cylinder liners, LSVAC(Loose Sand Vacuum Assisted Counter-gravity casting), air compressors, camshafts and valve guides. The company was founded on March 18, 1960 by Ryu Hong-Woo and is headquartered in Asan-si, South Korea.

Yoshimura Food Holdings KK operates as a holding company which engages in the food business. It manufactures and sells food ingredients, chilled and processed food, noodles, processed meat, sake, liquor, fish pastes and frozen goods, and others. The company was founded by Motohisa Yoshimura on March 18, 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yoshinoya Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of beef bowl fast food restaurants. It operates through the following business segments: Yoshinoya, Hanamaru, Arcmeal, Kyotaru, Overseas, and Others. The Yoshinoya segment manages beef bowl restaurants and franchise stores. The Hanamaru segment handles Sanuki Udon restaurant. The Arcmeal segment covers steaks and shabu shabu restaurants. The Kyotaru segment includes sushi restaurants. The Overseas segment comprises of beef bowl restaurants and its franchises in United States, China, and Malaysia. The Others segment includes the operation of the subsidiary companies. It also provides management guidance to its franchise stores. It also provides management guidance to its franchise stores. The company was founded on December 27, 1958 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Youji Corp. engages in the supervision and management of physical education in kindergarten and nursery schools. It operates thorough the following segments: Children's Physical Education and Consulting. The Children's Physical Education segment provides regular physical education, extracurricular physical education, event planning, and nursery school management. The Consulting segment offers kindergarten and nursery management consulting services; and seminar planning and hosting services. The company was founded on September 14, 1972 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Youngone Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of subsidiary companies. Its services include consulting and management of its subsidiaries. The company was founded on June 5, 1974 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Youngor Group Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, sale and trade of clothing products and accessories. Its business activities include developing, leasing and selling of condominiums and residential buildings. It also engages in the provision of transportations, technical consultations and investment services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

Yuasa Trading Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial equipment, machine tools, building supplies, energy products, and consumer goods. It operates through the following segments: Industrial Equipment and Tools, Machine Tools, Housing and Building Supplies, Air and Fluidic Control System, Construction Machines, Energy, and Others. The Industrial Equipment and Tools segment offers industrial tools, logistics equipment, and control devices. The Machine Tools segment provides cutting and electric tools, control and carrier equipment, energy-saving devices, and maintenance services of its products. The Housing and Building Supplies segment sells exterior housing materials, architectural hardware, and landscaping products. The Air and Fluidic Control System segment consists of air-conditioning, plumbing, sanitary, and water systems. The Construction Machines segment includes civil engineering machinery, power sources, welders, construction equipment, and makeshift materials. The Energy segment markets petroleum products. . The company was founded by Shokuro Yuasa in March 1666 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yunnan Energy Investment Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of chemicals and salt. Its products include chloride alkali, liquid salt, industrial salt, edible salt, casing salt, mineral salt, and salts used for poultry and medicine. The company's business activities also include the construction and operation of natural gas network, sale of natural gas, and provision of wind power. Yunnan Energy Investment was founded on July 25, 2002 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.

Yunnan Tourism Co., Ltd. engages in the operation in tourism industry. Its main business is divided as cultural tourism complex operation, tourism integrated services, and tourism culture and technology three major sectors. The cultural tourism complex operation section is the planning, design, investment construction and operation management of cultural tourism complex. The integrated tourism service segment is the company's travel agency, tourism transportation, hotel, wedding culture, gardening and other businesses. The tourism culture and technology sector is the business of cultural tourism technology companies, including tourism park planning and design, high-tech amusement equipment research and development production, theme park project construction, and system software provision. The company was founded on December 29, 2000 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.

Yunnan Xiyi Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of automobile engine parts. It offers automobile engine connecting rods, machine parts and mechanical tools, auto parts, motorcycles and accessories, bicycle products, measuring tools, clip molds, wooden products, agricultural machinery products, and components for precision instruments and meters. The company was founded in April 1939 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.

Z Holdings Corp. engages in the management of group companies and related operations. It operates through the Media and Commerce business segments. The Media business segment covers advertisement related services that include search linked advertisement and display advertisement. The Commerce business segment handles commerce related services in Yahoo Auction!, Yahoo! Shopping, ASKUL Corp., and Yahoo! Premium. It also provides settlement finance related services. The company was founded on January 31, 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Zad Holding Co. engages in the import of wheat, production of flour, and manufacturing and marketing of pasta, biscuits, and other bakery products. It also involves in contracting for building, investing, establishing and managing of industrial projects and real estate as well as selling and rental of heavy equipment and manufacturing and supply of ready mix concrete and rock blasting. The company was founded on July 7, 1969 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.

Zensho Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the management of food service chain restaurants. It operates through the following segments: Restaurant and Retail. The Restaurant segment handles the operations of restaurants. The Retails segment handles the operation of supermarkets. It also provides the development and sale of food processing systems. The company was founded by on June 30, 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Zhangjiagang Furui Special Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production, and sale of metal pressure vessels. Its products include special energy equipment such as liquefied natural gas (LNG) and liquefied-to-compressed natural gas (L-CNG) car filling stations, LNG vehicle air supply systems, LNG marine gas supply systems, LNG storage tanks, boiler gas supply systems, cryogenic liquid carriers, cryogenic liquid tank containers, low temperature valves, and vacuum insulated tubes. It also provides seawater desalination, gas separation and liquefaction, equipment installation, and ocean engineering services. The company was founded on August 5, 2003 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co., Ltd. is engaged in the development, production and sale of automotive braking system. Its products include disc brake, drum brake, wheel cylinder, brake caliper, axle and pump, vacuum boosters and anti-lock braking systems. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Baida Precision Manufacturing Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of compressor parts and auto parts. Its products include compressor components such as blade, balance block, and cross ring connector; and auto parts such as blade, balance block, cross ring connector, generator claw pole, brake calipers piston, starter series, drive series, and steering series. The company was founded by Xiao You Shi, Qui Chun Zhang, Qi Bin Zhang and Ji Lin Ran on August 7, 2000 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

Zhejiang Century Huatong Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive plastic parts, metal stamping, photovoltaic packaging materials and non-ferrous die casting products. Its products include engine cooling; heating, ventilation, and air conditioning; lighting; interior and exterior systems, and safety system. The company was founded on October 21, 2008 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang CF Moto Power Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of motorcycles and scooters, all terrain vehicles, utility vehicles, boat and power sports engines. The company was founded on December 9, 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development, leasing, marketing, logistics and property management services for textile industry. It offers office spaces and other commercial properties in China. The company also engages in the real estate and import and export business. It also operates online textile distribution center. Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group was founded in March 1993 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang Dehong Automotive Electronic & Electrical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and technical service of vehicle alternators. Its products include generators for commercial vehicles and passenger cars, and aftermarket alternator product series. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

Zhejiang Dun'an Artificial Environment Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of electrical refrigeration type central air condition mainframe, terminal facility, industrial air condition, and air condition heat exchanger. Its business activities include the provision of service, manufacture, and sale of refrigeration general equipment, household electrical appliance parts, metal materials; technical consultation; and installation of systems engineering. The company was founded on December 19, 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Golden Eagle Co.,Ltd. engages in the textile industry. It operates through the Linen Yarn and Silk, and Textile Cachinery businesses. Its Linen Yarn and Silk business provides linen yarns, linens, thin fabrics, and silk. The Textile Machinery business comprises of the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of textile machineries; testing and marketing; and procurement of raw materials. The company was founded on September 23, 1994 and is headquartered in Zhoushan, China.

Zhejiang Goldensea Environment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of air treatment products. It focuses on air filters, air conditioning wind wheel, sand-blocking and sand-fixing network. Its products include environmental protection filter new materials; filter plate; air purification filters; car, train, aviation, and ship air filters; full air heat exchanger; wind wheel; vacuum cleaner; fan filter; tubular, axial, and centrifugal fan; sediment control and sand-blocking products. The company was founded on July 5, 1995 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.

Zhejiang Guangsha Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of real estate. It operates through the following business segments: Real estate, Television, and Other. Its products include real estate and television programs such as film and television dramas and foreign films. The company was founded on July 13, 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang HangKe Technology, Inc. Co. engages in the research and development, manufacturing and marketing of Li-battery test equipment. The company was founded by Cao Ji on November 21, 2011 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Hangmin Co., Ltd. engages in the dyeing, printing and finishing of cotton, hemp, corduroy, polyester wool and chemical fiber fabrics; and design, development, production, wholesale and brand building of gold jewelry. It also involves in the businesses of thermal power, weaving, non-woven fabrics, industrial water, sewage treatment and offshore logistics & transportation. The company was founded on January 6, 1998 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Jasan Holding Group Co., Ltd. is engaged in the manufacturing of high quality men's, women's and children's socks, pantyhose and sport socks. Its products include men's casual, sports and business socks, as well as men's underwear; and ladies casual and sports socks, stockings, ladies underwear, and lingerie. The company was founded on May 18, 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Jianfeng Group Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and distribution of cement and other related products. The company focuses on the construction and sale of buildings and other infrastructure projects. It also involves in the activities relating to pharmaceuticals, health products, telecommunication cables, warehousing, and logistics. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Jinhua, China.

Zhejiang Jihua Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of dye, polyurethane sponge, coating, sulfuric acid, thermoelectric and other fundamental raw material, pharmaceutical, and financial industries.
