Its products include disperse dye, reactive dyes, acid dyes, direct dyes, vulcanizing dyes, intermediate, hyaluronic acid, synthetic-anthraquinone, sulfuric acid, macromolecular materials, and polyurethane foam. The company was founded on August 15, 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Jinfei Kaida Wheel Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of aluminum alloy auto wheels. Its products include motorcycle and automobile wheels, bicycle and motorcycle rims, and electric motorcycle wheels. It offers coated wheels, bright sliver wheels, bright black wheels, and electroplated wheels. The company was founded on February 1, 2005 and is headquartered in Jinhua, China.

Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of high-tech products such as mechatronics, energy equipment, and engineering equipment. Its products include building material machinery, textile machinery, construction machinery, solar photovoltaic equipment, intelligent equipment, and carbon fiber production lines. It also provides processing and repair services. The company was founded on August 20, 1992 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and sale of crystalline silicon growing equipment. Its products include automatic single crystal silicon growth furnaces, polysilicon ingot furnaces, and monocrystalline silicon growth furnace control systems. The company was founded by Jian Wei Cao and Min Xiu Qiu on December 14, 2006 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang RIFA Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of computer numerical control machine, and lathe products. The firm's businesses include metal cutting solution, aircraft digital assembly, aerospace parts processing, and industrial software management business. Its products consist of computer numerical control vertical and horizontal machines, vertical and horizontal computer numerical control lathe, computer numerical control gantry machines, floor type boring machines, automatic bearing systems, and specialized grinding machines. The company was founded by Ben Shan Wang in 1998 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China..

Zhejiang Shuanghuan Driveline Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, and sale of mechanical transmission gears. It focuses on vehicle gears, non-road machinery gears, electric tool gears, robot reduction fears, and rail transit gears. The company was founded on August 25, 2005 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Tiancheng Controls Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, sale, and service of vehicle seats. Its products include passenger car, construction machinery, commercial vehicle, and agricultural machinery seats. The company was founded in May 1992 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, research and development of fume cleaning equipment used in power plants. Its products include FGD system equipments, cellular type denitration catalyst, dedusting system equipment and plant type denitration catalyst. The company was founded on September 6, 2005 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang VIE Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of car chassis control system. Its product coverage includes passenger cars and commercial vehicle chassis control system series. It specializes in chassis front and rear suspension system, automotive electronic control system, pneumatic brake system, hydraulic brake system, clutch control system, and plastic automotive engineering. The company was founded on September 22, 1999 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of automotive component systems. It operates through the following segments: Aluminum Alloy Wheels, Lightweight Magnesium Alloy, Environmentally Friendly Dacromet Coating, and Die Stamping Parts. The Aluminum Alloy Wheels segment engages in the research, development, manufacturing, sale and after-sales service of aluminum alloy wheels. The Lightweight Magnesium Alloy segment provides powertrain components, front-end carriers, instrument panel skeletons, brackets, and rear lift door inner panels. The Environmentally Friendly Dacromet Coating segment involves in the metal bolt manufacturing and processing, mechanical parts coating, and coating equipment businesses. The Die Stamping Parts segment offers auto stamping parts and dies. The company was founded on September 30, 2001 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

Zhejiang Wanliyang Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, and production of automobile transmissions and interior parts. Its products include transmission gearbox, gear, casting, and synchronizer. The company was founded on October 22, 2003 and is headquartered in Jinhua, China.

Zhejiang Xiantong Rubber & Plastic Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of automotive seals and other auto parts. Its products include automotive door and door frame seals, back door seals, vehicle external water cut, windshield exterior adhesive tapes, triangular window glass seals, sunroof seals, vehicle roof trim, and luggage seals. The company was founded on January 18, 1994 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

Zhejiang Xinan Chemical Industrial Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of pesticide and silicone products. It offers pesticide such as herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, agrochemical adjuvants, and chemical products; and silicon-based materials such as chlorosilane, siloxane intermediates, basic polysiloxane, heat cured silicone rubber, liquid silicone rubber, one-component room temperature vulcanising (RTV) silicone rubber, two-component RTV silicone rubber, silicone additives, silicone resin, silane, and fumed silica. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

Zhejiang Xinao Textiles, Inc. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of worsted yarn. Its products include wool/acrylic blended yarn, wool/natural fiber blended yarn, velvety yarn, stream yarn, pibroch yarn, free yarn, silence yarn, and breezy yarn. The company was founded in October 1991 and is headquartered in Tongxiang, China.

Zhejiang Yueling Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of aluminium alloy wheels. Its key products include aluminium alloy wheels for cars and aluminium alloy wheels for motorcycles. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Wenling, China.

Zhejiang Zomax Transmission Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automotive transmissions and vehicle gears. Its products include car transmission, car steering, auto oil pump shaft, automotive engine, motorcycle engine, and agricultural machinery transmission gears, automobile transmissions, and new energy automobile reducers. The company was founded on December 15, 2005 and is headquartered in Wenling, China.

Zhongtian Financial Group Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of financial services. Its business segment includes insurance, securities, bank, and investment. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Guiyang, China.

Zhuhai Port Co. Ltd. engages in the port logistics operations. Its main business includes electric power & energy and industrial manufacturing. The company Industrial manufacturing is composed of manufacturing and selling of chemical fiber, polyester and composite materials. Its other business include real estate management, investment consulting and pharmaceuticals production. Zhuhai Port was founded on March 9, 1989 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

Zhuzhou Tianqiao Crane Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture and sales of lifting machineries. Its products include aluminum smelting and electrolytic lead special lifting equipment, nuclear power and port cranes, general bridge and gantry cranes, iron and steel smelting dedicated lifting equipment, pot trending machines (PTM), furnace tending machines (FTM), stacking cranes, cathode cranes and railway framing devices. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Zhuzhou, China.

ZICO Holdings, Inc. is a investment company engages in the provision multidisciplinary professional service. It operates through the following segments: Advisory and Transactional Services, Management, Support and Licensing Services. The Advisory and Transactional Services segment offers legal services, Shariah advisory services, trust services, corporate services, consulting services, investor services, intellectual property services, asset management services, corporate finance services, insourcing services and immigration services. The Management, Support and Licensing Services segment refers to regional management services, business support services and licensing services. The company was founded on December 9, 2010 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science & Technology Co. Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture and sale of construction machineries and agricultural machineries. It operates through the following segments: Construction Machinery, Agricultural Machinery, and Financial Services. The Construction Machinery segment consists of concrete machinery sub-segment, crane machinery sub-segment, and others. The Agricultural Machinery offers a range of agricultural machineries, including tractors, grain harvesters, and drying machines. The Financial Services comprises of finance lease services to customers for purchasing machinery products of the group, and from other vendors. The company was founded by Chun Xin Zhan in 1992 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

Zuiko Corp. engages in the manufacture and sale of sanitary napkin machines, diaper machines, and its ancillary machine parts. It operates through the following segments: Sanitary Materials Production Systems and Other Production System. The Sanitary Materials Production Systems operates diaper production machines, sanitary napkin production machines and pulp recycling machines. The Other Production System develops and offers new machines to produce pet sheets, wet wipes, 3D masks, nursing pads, puffs, and a variety of daily-life products. It also provides engineering advice on product development and manufacturing productivity in addition to production hardware. The company was founded on May 1, 1946 and is headquartered in Settsu, Japan.

ZYNP Corp. engages in research, development, manufacture and sales of cylinder liners for gasoline and diesel engines. Its products are mainly applied in commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, engineering machinery, agricultural machinery, garden machinery, military, ships and generator sets, among others. The Company also provides bearing pads. The company was founded in March, 1953 and is headquartered in Meizhou, China.
